[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba ga bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu lnga pa/_thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya 
[\[1b.2\]]ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste 'byor pa dang zhes rgyas par bya ste/_de'i tshe smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /_skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba zhig gnas so/_/
[\[1b.3\]]des de la dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang /_rgyan rnams bskur ba dang /_des gos dang rgyan rnams bgos nas song ba las/_skyes pa gzhan zhig kyang dong tshe lnga brgya 
[\[1b.4\]]thogs te 'ongs nas/_bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog ces smras so/_/des bsams pa/_gal te song na ni dong tshe lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la/_khyim du 
[\[1b.5\]]'ongs pa bor te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni gsol ka mi yang bar yang 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_song la pad ma'i rtsa lag la jo bo re zhig 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]bdag gis sta gon ma bgyis kyis slad kyis mchi'o zhes zer ro zhes smros shig/_de de'i gan du song nas smras so/_/skyes pa de yang bya ba mang po zhig pas dga' mgur spyad nas srod nyid la phyir song ngo /_/des 
[\[2a.2\]]bsams pa/_thun mong du yod pas bdag gis de'i sems kyang bsrung nus so snyam nas/_des yang bu mo de la smras pa/_song la pad ma'i rtsa lag la jo bo sta gon bgyis lags na/_skyed mos tshal gang du mchi shig ces mchi'o 
[\[2a.3\]]zhes smros shig_/des de'i drung du song nas smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod kyi jo mo skad cig gis ni sta gon byas/_skad cig gis ni sta gon ma byas/_bu mo de yang de dang rigs mi 'phrod pa zhig pas des smras pa/_rje'i sras des 
[\[2a.4\]]sta gon ma bgyis te/_'on kyang khyod kyi gos dang rgyan rnams kyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do/_/de 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang ni bral/_gnod sems kyis kun nas dkris pa ni skyes par gyur te/_
[\[2a.5\]]de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_bu mo bzang mo'i drung du song la/_pad ma'i rtsa lag na re skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog shig ces zer ro zhes smros shig_/des song nas bzang mo la smras pa dang /_de nas de skyed mos tshal der song ba dang /_
[\[2a.6\]]skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/_khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur yongs su spyad pa ji ga rigs sam des smras pa/_rje'i sras 'di ni bdag gis nongs lags te/_'on kyang bud med ni 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]rtag par skyon can lags kyis bzod pa mdzod cig_/de nas des mi bzod pa skyes nas/_ral gri shubs nas phyung ste srog dang phral lo/_/de nas bu mo des jo mo bsad do jo mo bsad do zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa de skye bo'i tshogs chen pos thos nas 
[\[2b.2\]]brgyugs so/_/de tsam na skyed mos tshal de na rang sangs rgyas legs smon zhes bya ba bsam gtan byed do/_/de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de skrag pas ral gri khrag can rang sangs rgyas legs smon gyi mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs chen 
[\[2b.3\]]po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos ral gri khrag can mthong nas rab tu byung ba 'dis ni bzang mo'i srog dang phral lo zhes de nas rang sangs rgyas de kun nas bskor nas mi bzod pa bskyed de smras pa/_kye rab tu byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 
[\[2b.4\]]bsrel nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/_des smras pa ci zhig byas/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod kyis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de srog dang phral lo/_/des smras pa/_rnas mi bzod pa de nga ni las 'di mi byed do/_/des 
[\[2b.5\]]rnas mi bzod pa'i tshig smras kyang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po des lag pa phying ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/_lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas des srog dang phral lags so/_/rgyal po dag ni mi 
[\[2b.6\]]rtog pa yin pas des smras pa/_gal te de lta na rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis deng la sod cig_/de nas de'i mgul par me tog ka ra bI ra'i phreng bas btags nas gshed ma gos sngon po gyon pa mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam 
[\[2b.7\]]po che dang /[ (]tshos [,]tshong [)]dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su bsgrags te/_grong khyer nas skyed mos tshal logs su khrid do/_/de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag gi blo skyes pa rab tu byung ba dka' thub can skyon med pa nyes pa mi byed pa 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]'di la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur ba btab pas da 'di gsad pa la thug na/_bdag gis 'di yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam du bsams nas slar log ste/_rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras 
[\[3a.2\]]pa/_lha rab tu byung ba 'dis ni las 'di ma bgyis te/_sdig pa'i las 'di ni bdag gis bgyis kyis rab tu byung ba 'di gtang bar gsol/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag gang yin pa 
[\[3a.3\]]de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas rang sangs rgyas la yang dag par ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga lo mang po dang zhes bya ba nas/_sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/
[\[3a.4\]]las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mis yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab ste/_'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/_phrin las de'i 
[\[3a.5\]]rnam par smin pas yul dgra mthar dge slong gnyis kyis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba'i dge slong rnams dang thabs cig nas rul gsol la/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni lha'i zhal zas la longs spyod lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[3a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye 
[\[3a.7\]]dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'jig rten du ston pa rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba zhig byung nas zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de 'khor drug khri dang ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]ba shes ldan du byon to/_/bshes ldan de'i bram ze zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/_/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'khor lnga brgya dang mthong nas/_des bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 
[\[3b.2\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag lha'i zhal zas la longs spyad pa'i 'os ma yin gyi/_nas rul pa za ba'i 'os yin no/_/de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_mkhan po de mad de/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni lha'i zhal zas 
[\[3b.3\]]la longs spyad pa'i 'os ma lags kyi nas rul pa 'tshal ba'i 'os lags so/_/de na yang bram ze'i khye'u dkar po can gnyis shig gis smras pa/_mkhan pos ni ma legs pa zhig gsungs te/_bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni lha'i zhal zas la longs spyod pa'i 'os 
[\[3b.4\]]lags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze lnga brgya can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ngag gi las rtsub mo phyung ba gang yin pa 
[\[3b.5\]]de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por nas rul pa zos so/_/las kyi lhag ma de kho nas de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang dgra mthar dge slong 
[\[3b.6\]]gnyis kyis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba'i dge slong rnams dang thabs cig nas rul pa la longs spyad do/_/bram ze'i khye'u gnyis po gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu 'di dag nyid yin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig 
[\[3b.7\]]mdzad na phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ljongs kyi grong rdal bai b+hi Ting gi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang rgyas pa/_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba 
[\[4a.2\]]zhig yod de/_dge slong dag ljongs kyi grong rdal bai b+hi Ting gi na rdza mkhan dga' skyong zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba/_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba/_
[\[4a.3\]]sangs rgyas la gcig tu byed pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la gcig tu byed pa/_sangs rgyas la yid gnyis dang the tshom med pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la yid gnyis dang the tshom med pa/_sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam la 
[\[4a.4\]]yid gnyis dang the tshom med pa/_bden pa mthong ba/_'bras bu thob pa/_lo ma dang /_gtun spangs pa zhig byung ste/_de gang na chus brkos pa'am/_byi brun ma gtogs pa rang gi lag gis sa mi rko zhing rkor mi 'jug go/_/de nas rang gis sa 
[\[4a.5\]]blangs nas srog chags med pa'i chus sprus te snod rnams byas nas mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_'di skad ces 'phags pa'am/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'dir til lam/_'bras sam/_sran mud ga tshal tshol dag mtha' gcig tu zhog la/_khyed cag 
[\[4a.6\]]las gang zhig snod gang dgos pa de de long la deng shig ces smras nas/_de nas pha ma long ba gnyis gso zhing dus dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsod snyoms 'bul lo/_/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i grogs po dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_
[\[4a.7\]]ne'u zla yang yin no/_/dge slong dag ljongs kyi grong khyer bai b+hi Ting gi na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu n+ya gro d+ha zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig byung ste/_bai b+hi Ting gi rgyas pa/_'du thang dang bcas rtswa shing dang 'bab chur bcas pa/_rgyal 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]po kr-i kIs bram ze'i sbyin par byin pa la yongs su longs spyod do/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu n+ya gro d+ha'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba pha dang ma'i rigs dang ldan pa/_mo phyogs nas dag pa/_mes po'i phyogs dang /_phyi mo'i phyogs zung 
[\[4b.2\]]bdun rgyud kyi bar gyis bzung ste/_rigs la gtam gyis ma phog pa/_klog tu 'jug pa/_gsang tshig 'dzin pa/_rig byed gsum po sgra nges par sbyar ba dang /_shes gsal dang bcas pa'i yi ge rab tu 'byed pa dang bcas pa dang /_lnga pa de 
[\[4b.3\]]lta bu byung ba can rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin cing lung ston par byed pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa zhig yod de/_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu n+ya gro d+ha'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/_/
[\[4b.4\]]rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi grogs po dang /_snying du sdug pa dang ne'u zla yang yin no/_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis 
[\[4b.5\]]la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rdza mkhan dga' skyong la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[4b.6\]]'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag 
[\[4b.7\]]par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]las langs nas song ngo /_/de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u bla ma rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shing rta thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te/_gser gyi ril ba dang /_dbyug pa thogs nas bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_bram ze'i 
[\[5a.2\]]khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar nas/_bai b+hi Ting gi phyi rol du bram ze rnams klog tu 'jug par 'dod nas/_bai b+hi Ting gi nas byung ba dang bram ze'i khye'u bla mas rdza mkhan dga' skyong thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[5a.3\]]des pa dga' skyong khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/_des pa bla ma kho bo ni 'o ni nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'gros des pa bla ma tshur shog_/bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 
[\[5a.4\]]'dong ngo /_/des pa dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed pa thong shig_/dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub ga la yod/_byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba yin no/_/des pa bla ma dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub 
[\[5a.5\]]ga la yod/_byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba'o zhes de skad ma smra zhig_/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de nyid sangs rgyas yin te/_'dis chos thams cad sangs rgyas so/_/des pa bla ma tshur bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen 
[\[5a.6\]]bkur byed du 'dong /_bram ze'i khye'u bla mas lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong thong shig/_sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba nas/_byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[5a.7\]]bzhin du'o/_/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa bla ma khyod de skad ma smra bar zhes bya ba nas/_bsnyen bkur byed du zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i shing rta la 'dzegs nas bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i co to nas bzung ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa bla ma tshur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong /_de nas bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di snyam du sems 
[\[5b.2\]]te/_e ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin pas da ltar rdza mkhan dga' skyong yun ring po nas gtum po ma yin/_gzu lums can ma yin/_brlang po ma yin bsri ba med pa ma yin pa des bdag gi skra 
[\[5b.3\]]rnams bzung bar gyur to snyam du rig nas/_rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong de tsam bya ba la thug gam/_des pa de tsam bya ba la thug ces so/_/des pa dga' skyong de lta na thong shig dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[5b.4\]]rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong ngo /_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong dang bram ze'i khye'u bla ma shing rta gcig gi nang du zhugs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der dong ste/_de gnyis kyis ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas 
[\[5b.5\]]song nas bzhon pa las babs te/_rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zhugs te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der phyin pa dang /_de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis 
[\[5b.6\]]la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/bram ze'i khye'u bla mas ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[5b.7\]]de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis thal mo sbyar ba btud de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba de logs su 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par ma dad cing chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par ma dad 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu legs par bshad du gsol/_de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[6a.2\]]'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos 
[\[6a.3\]]dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u bla mas rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[6a.4\]]so/_/des pa dga' skyong khyod chos 'dul ba 'di lta bu thos na ci'i phyir dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu mi 'byung /_des pa bla ma kho bo 'di ltar pha ma long ba gnyis gso ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[6a.5\]]la dus dus su bsod snyoms 'bul ba khyod kyis mi shes sam/_des pa bla ma khyod rab tu byung shig_/kho bo ni re zhig rab tu mi 'byung ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[6a.6\]]btsun pa bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad 
[\[6a.7\]]du gsol/_bram ze'i khye'u bla mas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]rdzogs par mdzad nas/_bai b+hi Ting gir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas bA rA Na sI gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang bA rA Na sIr byon to/_/rgyal po kr-i kIs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yul ka shi nas 
[\[6b.2\]]ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang bA rA Na sIr gshegs te/_bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der song ste/_phyin pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[6b.3\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_
[\[6b.4\]]yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs 
[\[6b.5\]]bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kI stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba de 
[\[6b.6\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la sang bdag gis gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_yang 
[\[6b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kIs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kIs de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba rnams sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams/_
[\[7a.2\]]nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[7a.3\]]rgyas 'od srung snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/_rgyal po kr-i kI'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi 
[\[7a.4\]]dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kIs sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs zin par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba rnams kyis rang gi lag nas stobs shing 
[\[7a.5\]]tshim par byed de/_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams kyis rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/_lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' 
[\[7a.6\]]ba zhig blangs te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar gsol ba btab pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_
[\[7a.7\]]snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing /_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya tsam brtsig cing khri dang khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_sngas nang tshangs can dang /_gor bu lnga brgya tsam dbul zhing 'bras sbubs su 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]smin pa de lta bu 'dis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_rgyal po chen po ji tsam sems mngon par dad par byas pa de tsam gyis byas zin gyis chog go/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par 
[\[7b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rgyal po kr-i kIs 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la zhes bya ba nas/_bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/lan gnyis 
[\[7b.3\]]lan gsum du yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po ji tsam sems mngon par dad par byas pa de tsam gyis byas zin gyis chog go/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[7b.4\]]rgyas 'od srung la rgyal po kr-i kIs 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa/_dper na da ltar gyi bdag 'dra ba gzhan 'ga' lta mchis lags sam/_rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul na bai b+hi Ting gi zhes bya ba'i grong yod 
[\[7b.5\]]de/_de na rdza mkhan dga' skyong zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa zhes bya ba nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/des pha ma long ba gnyis gso zhing dus dus su nga la yang bsod snyoms kyis stobs par byed de/_rgyal po chen po dus 
[\[7b.6\]]gcig cig na nga bai b+hi Ting gi'i ljongs kyi grong rdal na nye bar bsten cing bzhugs nas snga dro sham thabs mnabs te lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas/_bai b+hi Ting gi ljongs kyi grong rdal du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/_ngas bai b+hi Ting gir bsod snyoms spyod cing rdza 
[\[7b.7\]]mkhan dga' skyong gi khyim gang na ba der gshegs pa dang /_de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga' skyong dgos pa zhig la phyi logs su song nas/_ngas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi sgo 'phar la rim gyis dal bu dal bus brdungs pa las rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi pha dang mas sgo 'phar la 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]brdungs pa'i sgra thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa 'di su zhig bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di su zhig rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi sgo 'phar la rdung /_de gnyis la ngas 'di skad ces smras te/_nga ni yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[8a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yin te bsod snyoms bzhed do/_/de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa nang du spyon cig/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nang du spyon cig_/khyod la rim gro bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis kyis phru ba na zan dron dang rdze'u na sran 
[\[8a.3\]]tshod mchis kyis nyid kyis bzhes te longs spyad du gsol/_rgyal po chen po ngas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus byin gyis brlabs nas phru ba na zan dron dang /_rje'u na sran tshod yod pa de nyid kyis blangs nas longs spyad do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rdza mkhan dga' 
[\[8a.4\]]skyong 'ongs nas phru ba na zan dron dang rdze'u na sran tshod yod pa zos par mthong nas pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum phru ba na zan dron dang rdze'u'i sran tshod su zhig gis 'tshal lags/_de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/dga' skyong khyod 'di nas phyir 
[\[8a.5\]]byung ba na bdag cag gis sgo 'phar la rdung ba'i sgra zhig thos so/_/thos nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa 'di su zhig bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di su zhig sgo 'phar la rdung /_des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/nga ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[8a.6\]]'od srung yin te bsod snyoms bzhed do/_/de la bdag cag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'phags pa nang du spyon cig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nang du spyon cig_/khyod la rim gro bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis kyis phru ba na zan dron dang /_rdze'u na sran tshod 
[\[8a.7\]]mchis kyis nyid kyis bzhes la longs spyad du gsol/_des de dag longs spyad par gyur to/_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'di snyam du sems te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi khyim du shin tu bag phab cing 'dris par gyur pa 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas dga' ba dang rab tu dga' bas skyil mo krung bcas te zhag bdun 'das par byas so/_/zla ba phyed kyi bar du yang de'i lhan cig ldan pa'i dga' ba lus mi 'dor zhing de rtag tu lus la bar chad med par 'dug go/_/'di ltar 
[\[8b.2\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus zhag bdun gyi bar du pha dang ma gnyis kyi phru ba'i zan dron dang rje'u'i sran tshod kyang de bzhin du 'dug go rgyal po chen po dus gcig na nga bai b+hi Ting gi ljongs kyi grong rdal du nye bar brten te dbyar gnas par 
[\[8b.3\]]dam bzhes pa dang /_nga'i gtsug lag khang du char 'bebs pa'i lhas thog mar char phab par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa rtswa sar pas g.yogs so/_/nga'i zhabs 'bring byed pa dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[8b.4\]]dag khyed cag deng la rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs mas nga'i gtsug lag khang g.yogs shig/_btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis nga las mnyan nas/_rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma 
[\[8b.5\]]'chu bar byed pa na/_de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga' skyong dgos pa 'ga' zhig la phyi rol tu song ngo /_/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi pha dang ma gnyis kyis las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma 'chu ba'i sgra thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa 'di su 
[\[8b.6\]]zhig bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di su zhig las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma 'chu/_de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs 'bring ba'i dge slong dag yin te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[8b.7\]]'od srung gi gtsug lag khang du char 'bebs pa'i lhas thog mar char phab pas kho bo cag gis 'di bshus te de g.yogs so/_/de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed la rim gro bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis kyis/_'phags pa dag snoms shig_/
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag snoms shig_/de nas dge slong de rnams kyis las byed pa'i khang pa bshus nas nga'i gtsug lag khang g.yogs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'ongs nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis las byed pa'i khang pa'i 
[\[9a.2\]]g.yogs ma bshus pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum las byed pa'i khang pa 'di su zhig gis bshus de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di nas khyod phyi logs su song ba na bdag cag gis las byed pa'i 
[\[9a.3\]]khang pa'i g.yogs ma 'chu ba'i sgra thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa 'di su zhig bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di su zhig las byed pa'i khang pa 'chu/_de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[9a.4\]]rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs 'bring ba dge slong dag yin te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang du char 'bebs pa'i lhas thog mar char phab pas kho bo cag gis 'di bshus la de g.yogs so/_/de rnams la bdag cag gis 'di skad ces 
[\[9a.5\]]smras so/_/khyed cag la rim gro bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis kyis 'phags pa dag snoms shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag snoms shig_/de rnams kyis las byed pa'i khang pa de bshus so/_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'di snyam du sems te/_yang dag par 
[\[9a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi khyim du shin tu bag phab cing 'dris par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bya ba nas zhag bdun du zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi 
[\[9a.7\]]lha'i mthus rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi pha ma'i dbyar gyi gnas der las byed pa'i khang par char pa thigs pa gcig kyang ma bab bo/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul na ma gnang ngo /_/zhes khyod kyi sems gzhan du 'gyur gyi/_dga' skyong ni las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma bshus kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur to/_/btsun pa rdza mkhan dga' skyong 
[\[9b.2\]]gis ni thob pa legs par thob lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sdum par shin tu bag phab cing 'dris par gyur lags so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI'i sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar 
[\[9b.3\]]mdzad de/_sbyin sreg mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog_/bde sbyor mchog ni nyi ma'i lha/_/mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste/_/rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog_/zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso/_/nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso/_/steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang /_/
[\[9b.4\]]'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 
[\[9b.5\]]'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas ring po ma lon par rgyal po kr-i kIs mi zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod 
[\[9b.6\]]song la sbubs su smin pa'i 'bras kyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam khong la/_rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_de la 'di skad ces des pa dga' skyong rgyal po kr-i kIs khyod la sbubs su smin pa'i 'bras kyis bkang ba'i shing rta lnga brgya tsam po 'di 
[\[9b.7\]]dag bskur gyis 'dis khyod kyi pha ma long ba gnyis gso ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus dus su bsod snyoms dbul ba dang /_bdag nyid kyang legs par bde bas tshim par byos shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]po kr-i kI las mnyan nas sbubs su smin pa'i 'bras kyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste/_rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong rgyal po kr-i kIs khyod 
[\[10a.2\]]la sbubs su smin pa'i 'bras kyis bkang ba'i shing rta lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag bskur gyis/_'dis khyod kyi pha ma long ba gnyis gso ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsod snyoms dbul ba dang /_bdag nyid kyang legs 
[\[10a.3\]]par bde bas tshim par byos shig ces gsung ngo /_/kye nang rje rgyal po kr-i kI ni dgos pa mang zhing bya ba mang ba yin la/_bdag ni dgos pa nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba yin no zhes smras nas ma blangs so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[10a.4\]]dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u bla ma gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas gang zag la skur gyi byang chub la ma yin pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas byang chub kyi snying por dka' ba lo drug spyad do/_/gal te ngas byang chub la bskur bar gyur na/_ngas slar yang 
[\[10a.5\]]bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du byang chub kyi ched du bdag nyid shin tu dub par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/_phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang bcom ldan 'das la 'khru ba'i snyun 
[\[10a.6\]]gyis thebs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/
[\[10a.7\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na sman pa zhig yod pa las de na khyim bdag cig gi bu nad kyis thebs nas/_des sman pa de bkug ste dris nas des de la sman byin pas sos par gyur na/_khyim bdag des de la rngan pa ma byin no/_/khyim bdag gi bu de lan gsum 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]gyi bar du nad kyis thebs te/_sman pa des lan gsum gyi bar du sos par byas kyang des de la rngan pa ma byin nas de nas sman pa de kun nas dkris pa drag pos mi bzod par gyur nas bsams pa/_khyim bdag gi bu 'di bdag gis lan gsum gyi bar du dpyad byas kyang 'dis 
[\[10b.2\]]cung zad kyang lan du phan ma btags kyis/_da ni brgya la nad kyis thebs par gyur dang /_de la sman ma yin pa gang zhig gis de'i nang grol rnams dum bu dum bur 'dzag par 'gyur ba de lta bu sbyin no snyam pa las ji tsam na khyim bdag de'i bu ma bde ste slar na bar gyur pa dang /_
[\[10b.3\]]sman pa des mi bzod pa skyes pas/_de la sman ma yin pa byin nas des nang grol rnams dum bu dum bur zags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sman pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas ngan sems kyis khyim bdag gi bu la sman ma yin 
[\[10b.4\]]pa byin pas des nang grol rnams dum bu dum bur zags pa gang yin pa de'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lo mang po zhes bya ba nas/_sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/las de'i lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs 
[\[10b.5\]]par byang chub pa na yang 'khru ba'i snyun gyis thebs so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/_phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas shAkya rnams bkum pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu snyun rab tu drag pos thebs par gyur lags/_bcom 
[\[10b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su 'di dag byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[10b.7\]]chu bo gnyen ldan gyi 'gram na nya pa lnga brgya rten cing gnas te/_de rnams kyis nya shin tu che ba gnyis shig ji ltar gnyen ldan gyi nang du zhugs te nyal ba zin pa dang /_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te 'di gnyis bsad na sha lom par mi 'gyur zhing rul bar 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]'gyur ro snyam nas de rnams kyis de gnyis phur pa la btags nas bzhag go/_/gang gi tshe lan 'ga' zhig nyo bar 'ongs pa de'i tshe bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par byed do/_/de gnyis kyi lus la gcod pa na sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen pas rang gi 
[\[11a.2\]]ris mthun pa'i skad 'byin pas 'bo sgra 'don par byed do/_/de na nya pa'i khye'u gcig cig de gnyis kyi sha gcod pa na yang dang yang du 'bo sgra 'don pa la dga' bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nya pa'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga 
[\[11a.3\]]yin te/_ngas nya gsod par byed pa la dga' ba bskyed pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga lo mang po zhes bya ba nas/_klad pa na bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 
[\[11a.4\]]na yang shAkya rnams bsad pa na klad nad rab tu drag pos thebs par gyur to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/_phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku rgyab bser ma'i snyun 
[\[11a.5\]]gyis thebs par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las 'di dag byas shing bsags pas zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i 
[\[11a.6\]]bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba gyad gcig gis yul ljongs kyi gyad thams cad brdabs nas rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang de na rgyal po'i gyad stobs dang pha rol gnon pa thub rlag pa zhig yod de/_de de dang lhan 
[\[11a.7\]]cig rgyal mtshan gyi phyir stobs 'gyed pa la zhugs so/_/gyad de dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni lag pa nas bzung ba kho nas gyad kyis gyad shes pa yin pas/_de nas rgyal po'i gyad des yul ljongs kyi gyad 'di ni bdag pas stobs che'o zhes bya bar shes nas des smras 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]pa/_ne'u zla bdag gi 'di ni rigs kyi rgyud kyis 'ongs pa yin gyis/_khyod bdag nyid 'gyel bar byos shig dang /_bdag la ni grags par zad la ru mtshon ni khyod kyi yin par 'gyur ro/_/des khas blangs pa dang /_des de mnan to/_/des ru 
[\[11b.2\]]mtshon blang bar brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_ne'u zla sgyu'am mthus rgyal ba don du gnyer ba yin pa las khyod ngas sgyus bslus na/_ci'i phyir ru mtshon sbyin bdag nyid chen po de nga rgyal bcom pa zhig pas lan gsum gyi bar du gyad de dang lhan cig 'gyed 
[\[11b.3\]]par zhugs pa na yang de la bslu bar brtsams pa na ne'u zla khyod la ru mtshon gyis ci zhig bya bdag gi sring mo phyugs chung ma khyim thab la ma song ba zhig yod pa de khyod la sbyin gyis bdag nyid 'gyel bar byos shig_/bslus pa de de'i chung mas thos nas des smras pa/_rje'i 
[\[11b.4\]]sras snga ma'i gleng gzhi dag dgongs sam/_de nas de'i chung mas nga rgyal bskyed nas kun nas dkris pa drag pos de bteg ste/_brdabs pas de sgal tshigs chag nas shi'o/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi yul ljongs kyi gyad gang yin pa 
[\[11b.5\]]de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas ngan sems bskyed nas kun nas dkris pa drag pos rgyal po'i gyad sgal tshigs bcag pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang po rnams 
[\[11b.6\]]su sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so/_/las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang nga'i sgal tshigs rlung nad kyis thebs par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/_
[\[11b.7\]]dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu drug pa/_thams cad zil gnon thams cad gzigs/_/thub pa 'jig rten kun la sman/_/sred pa thams cad 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]zad pa brnyes/_/sbyor ba kun gyi mthar phyin mdzad/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad rig_/thub chen thams cad mngon par mkhyen/_/'khon dang 'jigs pa kun las 'das/_/chos kun gyi ni pha rol gshegs/_/bsam pa kun 
[\[12a.2\]]la mkhas pa po/_/sred pa thams cad rab tu bcom/_/sems can kun la phan dgongs pa/_/mdud pa thams cad rab tu grol/_/bag la nyal kun bcad nas ni/_/'ching ba thams cad yang dag bcad/_/sems can kun gyi mchog rab ste/_/
[\[12a.3\]]thub pa chos rnams ston par mdzad/_/sems can chen po shes rab che/_/brtson 'grus chen po grags pa che/_/chos chen 'od ni chen po pa/_/chos chen don gyi pha rol gshegs/_/klu chen seng ge chen po pa/_/dge slong chen po drang srong che/_/shes 
[\[12a.4\]]rab chen po'i ral gri mtshon/_/nyon mongs chen po rab tu bcom/_/stobs dang brtson 'grus rab tu che/_/brtan pa chen po pha rol gnon/_/byang chub chen po brnyes pa gang /_/dgra chen rnams las rnam par rgyal/_/nad chen po yi dpyad mdzad pas/_/
[\[12a.5\]]bcom ldan sman pa chen po lags/_/'dod chags chen po zil gnon la/_/sman chen po ni stsol ba po/_/'khor ba chen po'i btson ra na/_/'ching ba chen pos bcings rnams la/_/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/_/'ching ba kun las grol 
[\[12a.6\]]bar mdzad/_/skyes bu chen po lha chen po/_/tshogs rnams kyi ni tshogs chen ldan/_/sbyin pa'i mchog ni sbyin chen po/_/zhi ba chen po'i go 'phang reg_/sems can mchog ste drang srong mchog_/de bzhin rnam par 'dren mchog brnyes/_/nyan 
[\[12a.7\]]thos mchog ni phun sum tshogs/_/chos kyi mchog ni rab ston pa/_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i mchog_/yon gnas rnams kyi mchog tu 'os/_/rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog_/mtshan ni mchog rab kun dang ldan/_/bcom ldan srid las 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]rab tu grol/_/srid pa'i dga' ba las 'phags pa/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags kun nas bcad/_/srid pa'i sred pa rab tu bcom/_/chos chen po ni bsgoms pas na/_/'jigs dang 'jigs su rung ba spangs/_/klu yi rgyal po rnams kyi gnas/_/
[\[12b.2\]]ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/thams cad bya ba byas pa yi/_/nyan thos rnams kyi mdun byas te/_/lnga brgya rnams dang thabs cig tu/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' las gshegs/_/chu bo de yi 'gram dag tu/_/smra ba'i mchog ni bzhugs nas ni/_/
[\[12b.3\]]rjes su brtse ba thugs rje can/_/lus can kun la phan mdzad pas/_/mtsho la gzigs nas dge slong la/_/'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to/_/ngas ni sdig pa gang byas dang /_/nga yi tshig 'di mnyan par gyis/_/ngas ni sngon gyi tshe rabs su/_/g.yon 
[\[12b.4\]]can pad ma'i rtsa lag gyur/_/rang sangs rgyas ni legs smon te/_/skyon med la ni skur btab nas/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen lhags nas su/_/thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'/_/bcing ba dam pos de bcings nas/_/grong khyer nas ni phyung ba dang /_/dge 
[\[12b.5\]]sbyong bcing bas dam bcings pas/_/sdug bsngal gyur de nga yis mthong /_/de la snying rje bskyed nas kyang /_/nga nyid kyis ni thar bar byas/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/dmyal ba rnams su yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]'phangs/_/slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/_/ngas 
[\[12b.6\]]ni skur pa thob par gyur/_/de nas las kyi lhag mas kyang /_/nga yi yang srid tha ma la/_/mu stegs rnams kyis mdzes ma'i phyir/_/yang dag ma yin skur pa btab/_/nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na/_/gsang tshig 'dzin cing mang thos pa/_/bram ze lnga brgya 
[\[12b.7\]]rnams la ni/_/tshal na gsang tshig brjod pa'i tshe/_/mngon shes lnga ldan rdzu 'phrul che/_/byin can drang srong der 'ongs pa/_/bkur sti byed pa ngas mthong nas/_/skyon med la ni skur pa btab/_/drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces/_/ngas ni bram ze'i khye'u la 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]smras/_/bram ze'i khye'u rnams nga yi tshig_/thos nas rjes su yi rang zhing /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis/_/khyim dang khyim du slong ba na/_/drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces/_/skye bo mang po dag la smras/_/las kyi rnam par smin 
[\[13a.2\]]pa des/_/dge slong lnga brgya dag dang yang /_/mdzes ma kho na'i rgyu las ni/_/skur pa dag ni thob par gyur/_/sangs rgyas thams cad zil non gyis/_/nyan thos gyur pa gnas 'jog bu/_/de tshe dge sbyong de la ni/_/ngas ni mi bden skur pa btab/_/sdig 
[\[13a.3\]]pa'i las de byas pas na/_/mi bzad ngan 'gror song nas ni/_/sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong /_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/nga la bram ze rtsa mis 'dir/_/skye bo'i tshogs ni 'dus pa na/_/yang dag ma 
[\[13a.4\]]yin skur pa btab/_/nor gyi phyir ni skyon med par/_/ngas ni g.yas khyim nu bo ni/_/ri yi gseb tu bcug nas su/_/ngas ni rdo ba dag gis bsnun/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/dmyal ba dag tu yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]'phangs/_/rab tu tsha dang thig nag gi/_/
[\[13a.5\]]sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar gyur/_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/lha sbyin gyis ni rdo 'phangs te/_/nga yi zhabs kyi mthe bo ni/_/rdo ba'i dum bus rma yang phyung /_/rgya mtsho yi ni gru bo ches/_/rgya mtsho la ni 'gro ba na/_/gru na 'dug pa'i tshong pa ni/_/mdung 
[\[13a.6\]]thung rnon pos bsad par gyur/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/dmyal ba rnams su yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]'phangs/_/de yi las kyi lhag mas nga'i/_/zhabs la tshal pas zug par gyur/_/sngon ni nya pa'i grong khyer gyi/_/nya pa'i bur ni gyur pa na/_/nya rnams gsod 
[\[13a.7\]]par byed pa dang /_/yid dga' ba ni skyes par gyur/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/nga ni dmyal bar yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]'phangs/_/rab tu tsha dang thig nag dang /_/sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur/_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/gang gi tshe na 'phags 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]skyes pos/_/shAkya rnams ni gsod pa na/_/klad pa mi bzad nad kyis thebs/_/rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi/_/nyan thos yongs su smad byas te/_/khyed ni nas dag za bar 'os/_/khyed la 'bras ni mi rigs zhes/_/ngag gis nyes par 
[\[13b.2\]]spyad pa dang /_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/dmyal ba thig nag rnams su ni/_/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong /_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/dgra mthar dbyar ni gnas bcas te/_/bram ze yis ni spyan drangs tshe/_/zla ba gsum du nas 
[\[13b.3\]]dag zos/_/nga ni sman par gyur pa na/_/tshong dpon bu pho 'khrur 'jug tshe/_/nad kyis sdug bsngal gyur pa la/_/sman ma yin pa ngas byin no/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong /_/de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/_/
[\[13b.4\]]de 'dra'i 'khru ba'i nad kyis thebs/_/sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/_/nga ni mthu can gyad gyur tshe/_/stobs dag 'gyed par byed pa na/_/ngas ni gyad kyi bu zhig bsad/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong /_/de nas 
[\[13b.5\]]las kyi lhag mas ni/_/'di na nga yi rgyab bsnyung ngo /_/sngon ni ngan spong bur gyur pa/_/dga' skyong la ni smras pa ni/_/mgo reg ngas mthong ci zhig bya/_/'di la byang chub yod ma yin/_/ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang /_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/
[\[13b.6\]]'dir yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/_/khyim med par ni rab byung nas/_/byang chub mchog ni 'dod pa'i phyir/_/lteng rgyas 'gram du lo drug tu/_/mchog tu dka' ba spyad pa ngas/_/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong /_/sems can kun gyi rab mchog gis/_/
[\[13b.7\]]chos kyi dam pa thugs chud nas/_/sdig pa'i las ni gang mdzad pa/_/tshogs kyi mchog la bka' stsal to/_/thams cad zil gnon stobs brnyes kyis/_/dge slong dge 'dun gung bzhugs nas/_/ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/_/nyid kyi phrin las 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]lung bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u'o//_//sdom ni/_gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can dang ni/_/rgyu can kauN+Di n+ya nye ba 'khor/_/'od byed dang ni nam gru ste/_/phyi ma bde bar gshegs pa yin/_/ma dros pa'i tshigs 
[\[14a.2\]]su bcad pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu mtsho chen po ma dros par phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/_mnyan yod kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na 
[\[14a.3\]]bzhugs so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa gas/_bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/_mnyan yod du gshegs nas mnyan yod kyi bdag gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas 
[\[14a.4\]]byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[14a.5\]]btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros par rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya gang dag lags pa dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/_bcom 
[\[14a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa gas gnang bar rig nas zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_stan ches dma' ba zhig 
[\[14a.7\]]blangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[14b.2\]]dag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga la ma rdzogs pa yod de/_des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na/_'on kyang dge 'dun gyi ched du yon ma phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_grong khyer 
[\[14b.3\]]thigs pa can du byon nas/_grong khyer thigs pa can gyi byang phyogs kyi grong shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas zhes bya ba nas shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes 
[\[14b.4\]]thos so bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang khyu nas khyur phrad cing 'dus te grong khyer thigs pa can nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[14b.5\]]byas te zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[14b.6\]]btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze 
[\[14b.7\]]dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rus gong sbrel ba bsgreng ba lta bu rang gi skras yog pa lto ri rab tsam/_kha khab kyi mig tsam 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15a.2\]]ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la kun nas yongs su bskor te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di dag ni bdag cag gi nye dur gyur pa lags na/_kye ma bcom 
[\[15a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_bdag cag kho na'i ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas dam zhig bcas te/_gal te khyed cag cha byad 'di nyid kyis yon sngo ba byed pa'i tshe 'ong na ni khyed 
[\[15a.4\]]cag gi ming nas yon bsngo bar bya'o/_/de rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das g.yar tsha lags na ji ltar mchi lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_ngo tsha med la ngo tsha byed/_/ngo tsha ba la ngo mi tsha/_/
[\[15a.5\]]'jigs pa med la 'jigs par lta/_/'jigs pa la ni mi 'jigs lta/_/log pa'i lta ba blangs pas na/_/sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/_/ngo tsha ba la ngo tsha dang /_/ngo tsha med la ngo mi tsha/_/mi 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs lta/_/'jigs pa la 
[\[15a.6\]]ni 'jigs lta ba'i/_/yang dag lta ba blangs pa yis/_/sems can rnams ni bde 'gror 'gro/_/de rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na mchi lags so/_/de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyi 
[\[15a.7\]]nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lnga brgya po de dag 'ongs pa dang /_de 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams mthong nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/_de rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yi 
[\[15b.2\]]dgas 'o ni dag mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshur shog 'di dag ni khyed cag gi nye du yin no/_/gal te khyed cag gis gnang na ngas 'di rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo'o/_/de rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rung 
[\[15b.3\]]lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis de rnams kyi ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad de/_sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang /_/de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rjes 'gro zhing /_/'di dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten ni/_/mi bzad 
[\[15b.4\]]pa nas myur ldang shog_/'di yis gos dang skom dang zas/_/gnas mal rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/dus kun tu ni mi zad par/_/de rnams la ni grub par shog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 
[\[15b.5\]]la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /_khyim 
[\[15b.6\]]bdag rnams rtog khang du lhags shing tshogs nas 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed de/_kye dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'dod zhen che zhing de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen che ba yin no/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung 
[\[15b.7\]]zhing de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ste/_mu stegs can rnams ni de lta ma yin no/_/de'i tshe bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang /_
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma 'dod zhen che'am 'dod zhen chung ba dang /_de'i nyan thos rnams 'dod zhen che'am/_'dod zhen chung ba ngas khyed cag yid ches par bya'o/_/de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges 
[\[16a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/shes ldan gau ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag gis bca' ba bu ram zhig 'bul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 
[\[16a.3\]]'das kyis bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[16a.4\]]pa/_dge slong dag bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge klan ka tshol bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bca' ba bu ram la spyan drangs kyis/_khyed cag las gang gis ji tsam yog pa des de tsam zhig blang bar bya'o/_/bram ze smra 'dod kyi bu seng ge la 
[\[16a.5\]]bu ram 'tshong ba'i khang pa lnga brgya yod pa nas des bu ram gyi khang pa re re nas bu ram gyi snod blangs te/_bu ram gyi snod lnga brgya khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/shes ldan gau ta ma bu ram 
[\[16a.6\]]bsdogs lags na/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_longs spyad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag dang lhung bzed bcabs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze smra 'dod 
[\[16a.7\]]kyi seng ges bu ram gyi snod cig blangs te brim par brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi bar du brims kyang lhag pas thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'dug pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge mngon par 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]dad par gyur to/_/de nas de dad pa skyes nas phyogs mtha' dag tu sgra bsgrags pa/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no/_/de nas des mu stegs can rnams bu ram la longs spyod du gzhug pa'i 
[\[16b.2\]]phyir mgron du bos pa dang /_de rnams kyis bu ram bag med par blangs nas kha cig gis ni longs spyod do/_/kha cig gis ni snod bkang nas bor zhing khyer te dong ngo /_/de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges smras pa/_skyes bu blun po khyed cag kho na 'dod zhen che 
[\[16b.3\]]ba yin la dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig 
[\[16b.4\]]mngon du zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag ces bya ba nas tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[16b.5\]]kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba nas dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungs pa zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 
[\[16b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dus sam dus ma yin pa'am/_na ba'am mi na bas/_bu ram la longs spyad par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge ro myags pa'i dri mi zhim pas sems rtse gcig pa 
[\[16b.7\]]nyid ma thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge ni/_srid pa tha ma yin na ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam du dgongs na/_lus rul pa'i dri mi zhim pa las gyur par gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge'i gtsug lag khang dri dang me tog gi phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma rnams kyis gtor la gnas mal la yang bdug pas bdug cing me tog dri zhim pos brgyan pa'i 
[\[17a.2\]]me tog gi gdugs bres shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/ji tsam na de bsod snyoms la song ba de'i bar du de'i gtsug lag khang du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba bzhin 
[\[17a.3\]]thams cad byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge bsod snyoms la brgyus nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang lha'i 'byor pa mthong nas/_de nas dga' ba'i yid kyis bsod snyoms la longs spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol 
[\[17a.4\]]du rkang pa gnyis bkrus te gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/_skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por bsrang nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par der bzhag ste 'dug pa dang /_dri zhim po mnam nas de'i sems mnyam par bzhag par skyes so/_/de nas des nyon mongs pa 
[\[17a.5\]]thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas zhes bya ba nas/_mngon du smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dang nga'i nyan thos 
[\[17a.6\]]sdug pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong smra 'dod kyi seng ge 'di yin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong gzhan rnams ni mi sdug pas rnam 
[\[17a.7\]]par grol na/_tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge sdug pas rnam par grol ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya btud mar sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos shing de nyid du skyes te/_da ltar 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]gyi srid pa tha ma mi rnams su skyes pa na lus rul ba'i dri mnam pas sems rtse gcig pa ma grub pa'o/_/dri zhim po'i dri mnam pa dang /_sems mnyam pa thob nas sdug pas rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/gal te 'di la thabs 'di ma byas par gyur na/_dro bar gyur pa 
[\[17b.2\]]yang 'dis bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_gzhan gang zhig sdug pa 'di lta bus rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba des rim pa de lta bu bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing 
[\[17b.3\]]gshegs te yangs pa can du byon nas/_yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te yangs pa can du 
[\[17b.4\]]byon nas yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang gcig tu 'dus nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te yangs pa can du byon nas 
[\[17b.5\]]yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes grag gis/_gal te bdag cag re re nas bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na ni/_bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs dang /_gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed par 
[\[17b.6\]]'gyur bas de la khrims shig bcas te/_ci nas kyang tshogs shing 'dus pa kho nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol gyi mi gcig pus ni ma yin no zhes de rnams kyis khrims su bca' ba dag byas nas bzhag go/_/de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi bsod nams 
[\[17b.7\]]chen po dang ldan pa bzhi zhig gnas te/_nor can dang /_nor can gyi chung ma dang /_nor can gyi bu dang /_nor can gyi mna' ma'o/_/de dag gi khyim du ni lha dang mi rnams kyi g.yang babs par gyur to/_/de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa de ma thos par khyim bdag 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]nor can gyis bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te yangs pa can du byon nas/_yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang yangs pa can nas byung nas 
[\[18a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas khyim bdag nor can stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na 
[\[18a.3\]]ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[18a.4\]]kyis cang mi gsung bas khyim bdag nor can la gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag nor can gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/
[\[18a.5\]]de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams yangs pa can nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar 
[\[18a.6\]]mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'jog gi bu dag nga sngar khyim bdag nor can gyis spyan drangs zin to/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyim bdag nor can gyis ni tshogs kyi 
[\[18a.7\]]khrims bcas pa las 'das par byas so/_/kha cig dag gis smras pa/_ci ste de 'das par byed/_gdon mi za bar des khrims bcas pa ma thos so/_/'on kyang bdag cag pas de ni skyes bu dam pa yin pas gdugs tshod gsol du chug bdag cag gis ni 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]gnangs gdugs tshod gsol lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas/_khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas shar sgo nas zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na gdan ma bshams shing 
[\[18b.2\]]zhal zas rnams sta gon ma byas pa mthong nas/_de nas khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas snying las chung ngus gnas sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[18b.3\]]kun dga' bo ci ste de skad gsung /_khyim bdag gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo /_/'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs khyim bdag shar nas so/_/'phags pa lho nas zhugs shig_/des zhugs pa las ji 
[\[18b.4\]]tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shing lha'i zhal zas rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag nor can gyi spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod 
[\[18b.5\]]bshams lags shing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[18b.6\]]phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas nor can gyi chung ma stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[18b.7\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi chung ma la gnang ngo /_/gnang nas kyang khyim bdag nor can la chos bshad pa mdzad 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/nor can gyi chung mas kyang zhal zas rnams sta gon byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der 
[\[19a.2\]]song ste phyin nas lho sgo nas zhugs na gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang nor can gyi chung ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas ci 
[\[19a.3\]]snying las chung ngus gnas sam des smras pa/_'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo /_/'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs lho nas so/_/'phags pa shar nas zhugs shig_/ji tsam 
[\[19a.4\]]na gdan bzang po bshams shing zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/_/de nas nor can gyi chung ma'i spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[19a.5\]]gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[19a.6\]]spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas nor can gyi bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[19a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi bu la gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi chung 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ma la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so/_/nor can gyi bus kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te nor can gyi khyim gang na 
[\[19b.2\]]ba der song ste phyin nas lho sgo nas zhugs na gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang nor can gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag gi bu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas ci snying 
[\[19b.3\]]las chung ngus gnas sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa ji ste de skad gsung /_gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo /_/'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs lho nas so/_/'phags pa nub nas zhugs shig_/ji tsam na gdan 
[\[19b.4\]]bzang po bshams shing zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/_/de nas nor can gyi bu'i spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing 
[\[19b.5\]]mchis na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin 
[\[19b.6\]]du'o/_/de nas nor can gyi mna' ma stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs 
[\[19b.7\]]tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi mna' ma la gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi bu la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram 
[\[20a.2\]]ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na 
[\[20a.3\]]ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[20a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'jog gi bu dag nga sngar nor can gyi mna' mas spyan drangs zin to/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams rngam nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag nor can gcig pu la nor yod kyi bdag cag la med dam ci na/_des sangs 
[\[20a.5\]]rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nyi ma re re gdugs tshod sbyor zhing bdag cag kho nas skabs ma thob par gyur to/_/de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas 
[\[20a.6\]]gshegs par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i khyim rdo ba re re nas bkogs te gzhig go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas nub sgo nas zhugs na gdan ma 
[\[20a.7\]]bshams shing zhal zas kyang sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang nor can gyi mna' ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nor can gyi mna' ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas ci snying las chung ngus gnas sam/_des smras 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]pa/_'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung /_gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo /_/'phags pa chab sgo gang nas zhugs nub nas so/_/'phags pa byang nas zhugs shig_/des byang nas zhugs na ji tsam na lha'i gdan 
[\[20b.2\]]bshams shing lha'i zhal zas sta gon byas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/_/de nas nor can gyi mna' ma'i spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na bcom 
[\[20b.3\]]ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag thams cad 'dus nas khyim 
[\[20b.4\]]bdag nor can gyi sgo na 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag yangs pa can gyi tshogs rngam nas sgo na 'dug ste de dag gis khyed cag la gnod pa byas par 'gyur du 'ong gis song la bzod par gsol 
[\[20b.5\]]cig_/de phyir byung nas bzod par gsol bar brtsams pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag ci khyod gcig pu la nor yod dam/_gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyin re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te kho bo cag gis skabs mi rnyed 
[\[20b.6\]]par byed/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag gis tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa ma thos kyis/_de bas na tshogs kyis bzod par bya ba'i rigs so/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di ni dam pa yin pas 'di la bzod par bya'o zhes de rnams 
[\[20b.7\]]bzod par gyur pa dang /_des smras pa/_gal te de lta na nang du zhugs shig de rnams khyim du zhugs pa dang /_gdan bzang po bshams shing zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur nas smras pa/_khyim bdag 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar 'os kyi/_kho bo cag ni ma yin no/_/des de rnams la rin po che dag byin pa dang de rnams kyis ma blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[21a.2\]]rin po che 'di dag ni rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis long shig_/de rnams kyis blangs pa las gang gis ci 'dra ba blangs pa de'i kha dog de 'dra ba kho nar snang bar gyur to/_/de nas nor can gyi mna' mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig 
[\[21a.3\]]nas/_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te/_lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[21a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis nor can dang /_nor can gyi chung ma dang /_nor can gyi bu dang /_nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos na nor can dang /_nor can gyi chung ma dang /_nor can gyi bu dang /_nor 
[\[21a.5\]]can gyi mna' ma rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de rnams kyis bden 
[\[21a.6\]]pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba nas/_bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_
[\[21a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang /_nor can gyi chung ma dang /_nor can gyi bu dang /_nor 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]can gyi mna' ma rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//_//'dul ba 
[\[21b.2\]]gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu bdun pa/_dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa nor can dang /_nor can gyi mchis 'brang dang /_nor can gyi bu dang /_nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyis las ci zhig 
[\[21b.3\]]bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shing lha dang mi rnams kyi dpal nyams su myong bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di rnams kho nas las rnams byas shing bsags 
[\[21b.4\]]pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI na me tog phreng rgyud mkhan zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar 
[\[21b.5\]]byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so/_/des de yang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs so/_/de dus phyi zhig na bkren zhing shin tu bkren par gyur te/_
[\[21b.6\]]de dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_mna' mas brtson pa chen pos 'bad pas ras yug gcig cig grub nas/_de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan yang de bgos nas/_rgyal po la me tog 'bul me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma yang de nyid bgos nas btsun mo la 'bul/_
[\[21b.7\]]me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu yang de nyid bgos nas gzhon nu rnams la 'bul/_me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma yang de nyid bgos nas rgyal po'i mna' ma rnams la me tog phreng 'bul bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]dman pa dang /_ngan pa la snying brtse ba dang /_gnas mal bas mtha' la brten pa/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na nyi ma nub ka'i dus su bA rA Na sIr phyin nas 
[\[22a.2\]]me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de'i khyim grong khyer gyi sgo na 'dug pa de'i ldum rar nub mo gnas btab ste me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan des me'i phung po 'bar ba lta bur mthong nas de dad pa skyes te chung ma la smras pa dang de yang dad par 
[\[22a.3\]]gyur to/_/des bu la smras pa dang de yang dad par gyur to/_/des mna' ma la smras pa dang de yang dad par gyur to/_/de nas de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa/_bdag cag sang zan ma zos kyang bla 'dus la rab tu byung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can 'di bshos 
[\[22a.4\]]gsol lo/_/de nas nam nangs nas de rnams kyis de la bsod snyoms phul lo/_/me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyis smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo'i ras kyi bgo skal gang yin pa de ni rab tu byung ba 'di la 'bul lo/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag gi yang dbul 
[\[22a.5\]]lo/_/bus smras pa/_bdag gi yang dbul lo/_/mna' mas smras pa/_bdag gi yang dbul lo/_/de nas de rnams 'dus nas de la ras bskon to/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi tshig gis ma yin pas de nas bdag nyid chen po de 
[\[22a.6\]]de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas shing rtsa ba nas bcad 
[\[22a.7\]]pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing bdag cag gi khyim du lha dang 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]mi'i g.yang 'bab par gyur cig_/'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed kyi/_mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas kyis de rnams la snying brtse bar rdzu 'phrul byas nas 
[\[22b.2\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi steng nas phar chas te song ba dang /_de'i grib ma rgyal po'i steng du bab pa las de gdong bstod de blta bar brtsams pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po de mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag nyid chen po 'dis yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i rtsa ba phyung 
[\[22b.3\]]bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal po la me tog 'bul ba'i dus gang yin pa de las theg gi tsam zhig yol lo/_/rgyal po yang me tog la sdod cing 'dug go/_/de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis bkug pa 
[\[22b.4\]]dang rgyal pos de la smras pa/_ci'i phyir khyod kyis me tog de ring dus las yol des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos ji snyed gyon pa byin no/_/de bzhin du me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma la ni btsun mo rnams kyis ji snyed gyon pa byin no/_/
[\[22b.5\]]me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu la ni gzhon nu rnams kyis so/_/me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma la ni rgyal po'i mna' ma rnams kyis te/_de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la nor gyi me tog mngon par grub par gyur te dbul ba med par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji 
[\[22b.6\]]snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gang yin pa de ni nor can 'di nyid yin no/_/me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma ni nor can gyi chung ma yin no/_/me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu ni nor can gyi bu yin no/_/me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' 
[\[22b.7\]]ma ni nor can gyi mna' ma yin te/_'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/_khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang babs par gyur to/_/nga'i 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]spyan snga nas kyang bden pa mthong bar byas te/_nga rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa 'di dag gis mnyes par byas kyi mi mnyes par ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi ni zhes 
[\[23a.2\]]bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[23a.3\]]gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag cag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun 
[\[23a.4\]]dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la gnang ngo /_/de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 
[\[23a.5\]]'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo /_/de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang 
[\[23a.6\]]bca' ba dag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas/_phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs 
[\[23a.7\]]pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de bzhin du nyi 
[\[23b\]]
