[\[23b.1\]]ma gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du 'das so/_/yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'khor rgya chen po mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas de rnams kyi nye du dag zas kyi phyir nyi ma re re zhing 'ong bas de dag gis gtses par gyur nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_
[\[23b.2\]]'phags pa dag mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas bdag cag gi nye du dag skur mchis te de rnams la bdag cag gdugs gcig bzhin du stsol bas khyed cag dang de rnams la khyad par rngo mi thog na/_kye 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis yo byad rnams dbul gyis zhal ta kho 
[\[23b.3\]]na mdzod cig_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o zhes dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste dge slong rnams kyis zhal ta bya'o/_/
[\[23b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bar brtsams te ji tsam na steng g.yogs med par thug pa 'tshed pa'i zhal ta byas pa las lhas char phab pas de ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[23b.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_steng g.yogs med par btso bar mi bya'o/_/sgo khang dang khyams su 'tshed par byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo khang dang khyams su btso bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i 
[\[23b.6\]]gnas kyi gzhir mi rung ba ni bcu po 'di dag ste/_'di rnams su zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_steng g.yogs med pa dang /_sgo khang dang /_khyams dang /_bsro gang dang /_khrus khang dang /_rgyal po'i gnas dang /_mchod rten gyi gnas dang /_mu 
[\[23b.7\]]stegs can gyi gnas dang /_khyim bdag gi gnas dang /_dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngo /_/gzhi bcu po 'di dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'i gnas kyi gzhi yin te/_de rnams su dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o/_/zhal ta byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]sdom ni/_nad bu can dang zas dag dang /_/g.yar tshus lhag pa dag dang yang /_/tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang /_/pad ma'i rtsa dang lug dag go/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na dge slong nad bu can zhig yod pa des sman pa la 
[\[24a.2\]]dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag kho bo la sman ston cig_/des nad kyi gzhi dris nas smras pa/_'phags pa thug pa gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/sman pas smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[24a.3\]]khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do/_/des skabs de dge slong rnams la'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te 
[\[24a.4\]]sman pas thug pa 'thung shig ces zer na sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya ste de la 'gyod pa mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de'i nad g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer te byin no/_/
[\[24a.5\]]de nas sman pas 'ongs nas dris pa 'phags pa khyod bde'am/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mi bde'o/_/ci khyod kyis thug pa ma gsol tam/_'thungs so/_/ci 'dra ba zhig_/grang mo'o/_/'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so/_/sang ni dron mo 
[\[24a.6\]]gsol cig_/de nas nad g.yog gis blangs nas grang mo kho na rnyed nas des de la bsros te byin no/_/de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du dris pa dang des smras pa/_mi bde'o/_/ci thug pa ma gsol tam/_'thungs so/_/ci 'dra ba zhig_/grang mo zhig bsros nas so/_/
[\[24a.7\]]'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so/_/de grangs te bsros pa lags kyis sang ni rang bzhin gyis dron por mdzod la gsol cig_/de nas de'i nad g.yog gis 'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi shing drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa las de nas 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]khwa'i rtug pas de ma rung bar byas pas dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams la'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i gnas bsko bar 
[\[24b.2\]]bya'o/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang ji tsam pa ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rung ba'i gnas lnga ste/_rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang /_sems gtod 
[\[24b.3\]]pa'i mtha' can dang /_ba nyal ba lta bu dang /_stong pa'i gnas dang /_bskos pa'o/_/de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong lag gi blas gnas rtsom pa na der thog mar gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes sems bskyed cing tshig 
[\[24b.4\]]tu smras pa ste/_'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o/_/sems gtod pa'i mtha' can gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong lag gi blas der thog mar gzhi rdo ba 'dren pa na nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 
[\[24b.5\]]'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur bar nges par zung shig nges par zung shig ces bya ste/_'di ni sems gtod pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o/_/ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/_gang la sgo tha dad par gses pa ste/_'di ni ba nyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o/_/gnas stong pa gang zhe na/_
[\[24b.6\]]spangs pa'i gnas te 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o/_/bskos pa gang zhe na/_gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bskos pa'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsko ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par 
[\[24b.7\]]byas pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa la dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o/_/bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun 
[\[25a.2\]]gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 
[\[25a.3\]]bsko'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzhed de/_de'i 
[\[25a.4\]]slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang 
[\[25a.5\]]dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol 
[\[25a.6\]]nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos pa der gnyis skabs dbye ste/_mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang /_
[\[25a.7\]]mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/yangs pa can na sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis de'i ched 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]du sha khyer te 'ongs nas de yang za bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe des bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe mi za bas khyer te 'ongs nas yang dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed do/_/dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang mu stegs can rnams smod par byed/_
[\[25b.2\]]gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed de/_shes ldan dag sde dpon seng ge'i ched du byas te sha khyer te 'ongs na ni des de dag ma zos la/_shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la byin pa dang /_shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi ched du byas pa'i sha ni zos so zhes 
[\[25b.3\]]pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa gsum gang zhe na/_bdag gi ched du byas par mngon du mthong ba rung ba 
[\[25b.4\]]ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_yid ches pa las khyod kyi ched du byas pa yin no zhes thos pa rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_rang nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa skyes pa tshul las 'di ni bdag gi ched du byas pa 
[\[25b.5\]]yin no snyam du rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gsum gang zhe na/_'dis bdag gi ched du byas par mngon sum du ma mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' 
[\[25b.6\]]bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_yid ches pa las 'dis khyod kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa skyes pa tshul las 'di ni bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam pa ma skyes pa 
[\[25b.7\]]rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas dge slong dag ltogs par gyur pas de rnams glos phab ste 'dug pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa la ci'i slad du glos phab ste bzhugs shing dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzad/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas bsod snyoms lto 'grangs par mi rnyed pas kho bo cag ltogs te nyam 
[\[26a.2\]]chung bas des na glos phab ste 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_ci ste zhal tshus mi gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[26a.3\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/_mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur dge slong rnams kyis g.yar tshus bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng 
[\[26a.4\]]gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas dge slong rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer nas 
[\[26a.5\]]gtsug lag khang du song ste/_de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang bza' bar 'dod na 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/_
[\[26a.6\]]mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'dod na sngar blangs zin to snyam du soms la sngar rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis 
[\[26a.7\]]dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la mgron du bos nas de rnams kyis zos pa dang bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed kyi ched du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyis snoms te bzhud la phyis gsol cig_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo /_/dong nas de yang za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/_mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta 
[\[26b.2\]]bur 'di dag ni byin pa yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams zas la mgron du bos te/_de rnams 
[\[26b.3\]]kyis zos nas bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhag ste/_dge slong rnams dong ba dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na la yongs su btang ba lags te/_'tshal te mchis la khyod kho na la dbul lo zhes de rnams 
[\[26b.4\]]kyis khyer te 'ongs pa dang /_dge slong rnams de la za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/_mu ge'i dgon pa sdug bsngal 'di 
[\[26b.5\]]lta bur sngar yongs su btang ba'o snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis nub phyogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas de rnams kyis bsams 
[\[26b.6\]]pa/_'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba yin pas 'phags pa rnams la 'bul lo zhes de dag gis dge slong rnams zas zos nas spang ba byas pa rnams la de dag byin pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad 
[\[26b.7\]]pa can rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas bgyid pa las/_da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas khyed rnams kyang da ni yon gnas su gyur pa lags na/_gal te 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag gi dge ba'i shul rgyags dang bral te/_'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi bar bgyi'am/_de lta bas na thugs brtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[27a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/_rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam nas bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin te/_rgun 'brum dang /_bal po se'u dang /_'bra go dang /_sta rga dang /_yon 
[\[27a.3\]]tshe dang /_shing tog u ra ma na dang /_shing tog u ru ma yi ka dang /_shing tog ni ko tsa dang /_shing tog ba b+hu dang /_shing tog sin tsi ka'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang /_chu nas skyes 
[\[27a.4\]]pa dag phul ba dang /_dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spang ba byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/_de la 
[\[27a.5\]]'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de la chu nas skyes pa ni 'di dag yin te/_ut+pa la'i rtsa ba dang /_pad ma'i rtsa ba dang /_ku mu da'i sa bon dang /_pad ma'i sa bon no/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur to/_/
[\[27a.6\]]de'i rim gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/_bdag rang gi blos ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyi lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyis/_ma la bdag gis dri'o snyam nas des sman pa la dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[27a.7\]]ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur na de'i sman ston cig_/des smras pa 'phags pa pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la pad ma'i rtsa ba phal pa'i 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam du bsams nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/_dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi 
[\[27b.2\]]gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang /_de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir byon/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs nas de la sman pas pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma bstan to/_/klu'i rgyal po rab 
[\[27b.3\]]brtan gyis smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de ltar na re zhig gzhes shig_/de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas mi'i tshad tsam gyi pad ma'i rtsa ba dag bton cing pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad ma'i 'dab ma'i skyo rar gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo /_/
[\[27b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos pad ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa la lta bar brtsams pa dang de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci gzigs pad ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol bar bzhed dam/_de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang smras pa/_'phags pa bzhud cig 
[\[27b.5\]]dang bskur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lhung bzed bkang ba khyer nas dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyin to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[27b.6\]]shA ri'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to/_/klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la pad ma'i rtsa ba khur cig bkur nas mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la gtsug lag khang gi khyams 
[\[27b.7\]]kyi mdun du zhog la shog shig_/de rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa'i mthus mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas pad ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi mdun du bzhag nas slar log pa las lam gyi phyed na tshal gyi bal glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]cig 'dus par gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na bal glang mo de las bal glang phrug gu cig 'brangs te 'brangs pa'i mod la seng ge'i sgra 'byin to/_/de nas bal glang mo de skrag pas gcin rtug shor nas bal glang phrug gu bor te bros so/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas 
[\[28a.2\]]pa'i shing mkhan zhig shing gi ched du tshal du song ba las bal glang phrug gu de mthong nas khyim du blangs te bsnun gsos bskyed de/_nor gyis bskyangs pas ming nor skyong nor skyong zhes bya bar grags so/_/kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor skyong skyes 
[\[28a.3\]]su bskur ba las/_de mnyan yod kyi yul na gnas pa'i skye bos nor gyis bskyangs pas na nor skyong zhes 'don to/_/pad ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos zos/_kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_kha cig ni dge 'dun la brims pa las 'on kyang lhag 
[\[28a.4\]]par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas nas kyang za bar 'dod na bdag cag gis spang ba byas so zhes ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad ma'i 
[\[28a.5\]]rtsa ba rnyed par dka' bas de'i phyir rjes su gnang ngo /_/pad ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba drug gnas te/_khyim 
[\[28a.6\]]bdag lug ces bya ba dang /_lug gi chung ma dang /_lug gi bu dang /_lug gi mna' ma dang /_lug gi bran pho dang /_lug gi bran mo'o/_/khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar ji ltar shes zhe na/_gal te bang mdzod stong pa rnams la bltas na mthong ma thag kho nar dgang bar 
[\[28a.7\]]'gyur te/_de ltar na khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so/_/lug gi chung ma ji lta bu zhe na/_des gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa ni brgya stong gi bza' ba 'byung ste/_lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin no/_/lug gi bu ji lta bu zhe na/_de'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]btags te 'dug la/_des gang gi tshe brgya'am stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/_yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/_lug gi bu ni de lta bu yin no/_/lug gi mna' ma ji lta bu zhe na/_des gcig gi don du dri sbyar na brgya stong khyed par 'gyur te/_lug gi 
[\[28b.2\]]mna' ma ni de lta bu yin no/_/lug gi bran pho ji lta bu zhe na/_des gang gi tshe zhing la rol gcig rmos pa de'i tshe zhing la rol bdun rmos par 'gyur te/_lug gi bran pho ni de lta bu yin no/_/lug gi bran mo ni ji ltar bsod nams che bar shes zhe na/_de gang gi tshe 'bras gtun gang 
[\[28b.3\]]tsam drus pa de'i tshe bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/_de ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la 
[\[28b.4\]]dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/_khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams long shig ces sgo zhig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 
[\[28b.5\]]'tshal zhes nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/_khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu 
[\[28b.6\]]ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams long shig_/tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/_'khor dul ba/_zhi ba/_'khor zhi ba/_
[\[28b.7\]]dgra bcom pa/_'khor dgra bcom pa dang ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams mtha' 'khob tu dong ba las de nas kha cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong nas 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]gnas pa de rnams kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rod rod por gyur nas bdag cag sngon ni dge sbyong gau ta mas yul dbus nas spyugs so/_/de gal te 'dir 'ongs na/_gdon mi za bar bdag cag 'di nas kyang spyugs par 'gyur gyis de la thabs 
[\[29a.2\]]shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo/_/de rnams rigs kyi khyim dag tu dong nas smras pa/_chos thob par gyur cig_/chos thob par gyur cig_/'phags pa dag de ci lags/_shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis 'gro'o/_/ci'i slad du re zhig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni 
[\[29a.3\]]kho bo cag gis mthong gis ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'dong ngo /_/'phags pa dag bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing du ma zhig bu med pa dang /_khyim thab med par byed cing 'ong ngo /_/'phags 
[\[29a.4\]]pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar gzhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi'am/_bzhugs shig ma bzhud cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag ci ste 'dug khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan du mi btub bo/_/'phags pa dag gsung shig mnyan 
[\[29a.5\]]par bgyi'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas phyung la grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du tshud cig rtswa sngon po rnams rngos shig_/'dug gnas rnams ni shig cig_/me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni 
[\[29a.6\]]tshod cig_/chu rnams ni dug lugs shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bzhugs shig dang thams cad bgyi'o/_/de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du btsud de/_
[\[29a.7\]]rtswa sngon po rnams ni brngas/_'dug gnas rnams ni bshig_/me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ni bcad/_chu rnams ni dug blugs so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa byed pa yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]yin te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong rgyu zhing gshegs par bya 'am/_
[\[29b.2\]]ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bde ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o snyam nas des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/_song la chu dug can rnams skoms shig_/char 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/_'di rnams kyis bskams 
[\[29b.3\]]pa dang /_khyod kyis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas khong shig_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la yang bsgo ba/_khyed kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas thob shig_/de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni chu dug can rnams bskams so/_/char 'bebs pa'i lha'i bus 
[\[29b.4\]]ni der yang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang ngo /_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas btab nas ljongs rnams 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to/_/mu stegs can rnams kyis grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams 
[\[29b.5\]]bsogs nas de rnams kyis rtog chen dag mngags te ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shig_/de rnams dong ba las ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas slar 'ongs te smras pa/_shes ldan dag ljongs rnams 'di lta bur 'byor cing rgyas pa ni sngon lan 'ga' 
[\[29b.6\]]yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo /_/mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis mthong ngam/_re zhig gang zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang sgyur bar byed pa des/_khyed cag sgyur bar mi byed pa de lta srid re skan/_khyed cag rnam pa thams 
[\[29b.7\]]cad du bltas zin te/_blta ba'i tha ma byas nas 'gro'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bzhugs shig_/khyed cag la dge sbyong gau ta mas ci zhig bgyir mchis/_de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/_khyed kyang rab tu byung ba slong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]ci des khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam mam/_mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/_dam zhig bcas te gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma la blta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par kAr ShA pa Na drug bcus gcad par 
[\[30a.2\]]khrims 'cha' na 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs nas bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'i bram 
[\[30a.3\]]ze'i bu mo grong khyer bzang byed du bag mar btang ba de ra ba'i kha na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das mun khung na bzhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/_shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ni 'di yin te/_gal te 'di 
[\[30a.4\]]la them skas shig yod par gyur na bdag mar me thogs la 'babs pa zhig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas them skas zhig sprul to/_/de nas de snying dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' bas mar me thogs te them skas las babs nas bcom ldan 
[\[30a.5\]]'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mar me bzhag nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas 
[\[30a.6\]]de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do zhes bya ba nas/_skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo khyod 
[\[30a.7\]]tshur khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang de la nga na re nad med par gyur cig ces smros la 'di skad ces kyang smros shig_/khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho nar nga 'dir 'ongs na khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pas glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de ci ga rigs sam/_gal te 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]tshogs kyis khrims su bca' ba byas so zhes smras pa dang /_khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya'am stong 'ged par btang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na khyod kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu byin nas 'ong mi nus sam zhes smros 
[\[30b.2\]]shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas chas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod 
[\[30b.3\]]la nad med par gyur cig ces gsung ngo /_/des smras pa/_bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyim bdag_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kho na'i ched du nga 'dir gshegs na khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de 
[\[30b.4\]]lta bur bya ba cig rigs sam/_des smras pa/_bu mo tshogs kyis khrims su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma la blta bar bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i chad pas gcad do zhes dam bcas so/_/khyim bdag_/bcom 
[\[30b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya'am stong 'ged par btang na yang gang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu byin nas khyod 'ong bar mi nus sam zhes gsung ngo /_/des 
[\[30b.6\]]bsams pa/_'di ni sus kyang mi shes na bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu sgor bzhag nas bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them skas las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom 
[\[30b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_khyim bdag lug gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[31a.2\]]'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag khyod las brten nas phal cher kun gyis 'thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[31a.3\]]lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/_de khyim du phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kAr ShA pa Na'i phung po bcer te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod med pa/_/mtshungs pa med 
[\[31a.4\]]pa gser gyi mdog can lta 'dod pa/_/de ni 'jigs med snying gis shin tu nges byos la/_/myur du dengs shig de yi nor ni kho bos gzhal/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur ram/_des smras pa/_dge bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams 
[\[31a.5\]]kyis smras pa/_gal te de lta bas na tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa tshogs kho nas bshig tu zad mod/_'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/_de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsams so/_/de nas phan tshun sdos pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang gnod sbyin lag 
[\[31a.6\]]na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phangs pas ra ba dral nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/_kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo /_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor 
[\[31a.7\]]dpag tshad gcig tshun chad 'khor bar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas sems can du ma dag gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]thos nas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so zhes bya ba nas/_kha cig ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring 
[\[31b.2\]]po zhig tu chos bshad pas gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag zas kyi dus las yol bar gyur to/_/des gsol 
[\[31b.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung ba ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mar dang /_bu ram dang /_hwags dang /_sha kha ra dang /_btung ba dag go/_/de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa/_shes ldan dag dus 
[\[31b.4\]]ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur du sta gon gyis shig_/de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag lug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i btung ba rnams kyis 
[\[31b.5\]]tshim par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/_ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du btul te gshegs pa na khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[31b.6\]]shul gyi snyun rgyags kyi zong kAr ShA pa Na dag bzhes shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kAr ShA pa Na blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[31b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rung ba byed pas so/_/rung ba byed pa med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge tshul gyis so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcu 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]par gser dngul len par gsungs la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nye ba 'khor ngas 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs te gsungs kyis mi blang ba ni ma yin te/_
[\[32a.2\]]de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'i blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o/_/khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes 
[\[32a.3\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim pa'am dge tshul med na/_dge slong gis zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs nas rang nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[32a.4\]]lag pa gnyis bkrus nas byin len byas te lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas dge slong gi mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i sman 'di bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir 
[\[32a.5\]]zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab bo zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa su zhig gis 'tshal 
[\[32a.6\]]bar bgyi lags/_nye ba 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/_lam du zhugs pa dang smyung ba byas pa dang /_nad pa dang /_dge skos dang /_lag gi blas so/_/dge slong ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis 'bras dang phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las lam gyis ngal nas 
[\[32a.7\]]bza' bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag zas de zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus pas 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sprugs nas bza' bar bya'o/_/
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]phye rnams kyi gang yin pa de ni chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya'o/_/kha cig zhu bar gyur pa de bkrur ma rung ste zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smyug ma'i tshal pas bzhar la chus bkru bar bya'o/_/'on kyang zas med par bya ma nus nas/_
[\[32b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs par bsal te/_chu'i nang du mnyes la btung bar byas nas de tshags kyis btsags la btung bar bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[32b.3\]]'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa/_khyim bdag lug dang /_lug gi mchis 'brang dang /_lug gi bu dang /_lug gi mna' ma dang /_lug gi bran pho dang /_lug gi bran mos las ci zhig bgyis na/_des na de drug bsod nams chen por gyur cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[32b.4\]]sngar bden pa mthong nas 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis kyi ma mnyes par ni ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur 
[\[32b.5\]]ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pas thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge 
[\[32b.6\]]chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/mu ge rnam pa gsum ni za ma tog dang /_rus gong dkar po dang /_thur mas 'tsho ba'o/_/de la za ma tog ces bya ba ni za ma tog de'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag blugs te/_ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzhag 
[\[32b.7\]]nas bdag cag shi nas 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro snyam pa ste/_'di ni za ma tog dang 'brel bas za ma tog ces bya'o/_/rus gong dkar po gang zhe na/_dus de na mi rnams kyi rus pa dag bsdus nas re zhig btsos te/_ji tsam na rus pa de dkar por gyur pa 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]dang /_de nas de'i khu ba 'thung ba ste/_'di ni rus gong dkar po dang 'brel bas rus gong dkar po zhes bya'o/_/thur mas 'tsho ba gang zhe na/_dus de na mi rnams kyis g.yul gyi ser ga nas 'bru'i 'brum bu dag thur mas brus nas chu mang po'i snod du btsos nas 
[\[33a.2\]]'thung ba ste/_'di ni thur ma dang 'brel bas thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer pa dag nyon cig_/ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pas 
[\[33a.3\]]za ma tog dang /_rus gong dkar po dang /_thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge 'byung bar lung bstan gyis/_khyed las gang dag lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod pa de rnams ni 'khod cig_/gang dag la med pa de dag ni gar dga' bar deng la mu ge med cing lo legs par gyur nas slar 
[\[33a.4\]]gshegs shig_/de'i tshe na bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_'khor yangs shing rgya che ba zhig yod de/_des mngan bkug ste smras pa/_kye nang rje kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod dam/_des smras pa/_dpon po 
[\[33a.5\]]mchis so/_/de de nyid na gnas pa las mu ge de brgyud ma kho nar byung bas de'i bang mdzod rnams yongs su zad pas 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad shi bar gyur te bdag nyid dang drug cig lus so/_/de nas khyim bdag des bang mdzod rnams phyags pa las/_'bras bre'u chung gang 
[\[33a.6\]]zhig byung nas/_de'i chung mas snod du blugs te btsos so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/ji tsam na rang sangs 
[\[33a.7\]]rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang bA rA Na sIr phyin nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na khyim bdag des kyang bza' ba bsdogs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas de yang rim bzhin du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]de'i khyim du phyin to/_/khyim bdag des de lus mdzes shing sems dang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bsams pa/_'di bdag gis zos kyang gdon mi za bar srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gi skal ba rab tu byung ba 'di la sbyin no snyam nas des chung ma la smras pa/_
[\[33b.2\]]bzang mo kho bo'i skal ba ni rab tu byung ba 'di la dbul lo/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gi khyim thab mi za na bdag gis ci ste bza' snyam nas/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag gi skal ba yang 'di la dbul lo/_/de bzhin du bu dang /_mna' ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran 
[\[33b.3\]]mos kyang dpyad nas rang rang gi skal ba yongs su btang ste/_de nas de thams cad 'dus nas rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul lo/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi tshig gis ni ma yin pas des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' 
[\[33b.4\]]la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas shing rtsa ba nas bcad de 'gyel ba bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la 
[\[33b.5\]]gtugs nas smon lam ci 'dod pa gdab par rtsom ste/_khyim bdag gis smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te bang ba dang mdzod stong pa dag la bltas na mthong ba de'i mod 
[\[33b.6\]]la gang bar gyur cig_/'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig_/chung mas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge 
[\[33b.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te gcig cig gi don du snod du btsos pa de brgya'am stong gis zos kyang ji srid bdag gis sbyor ba ma btang ba'i bar du yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing /_'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig_/bus smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gi rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa gal te brgya 
[\[34a.2\]]'am stong 'ged par btang yang gang ba nyid du 'dug ste yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing /_'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig_/mna' mas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis 
[\[34a.3\]]yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/_bdag gis gal te gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbyar na des brgya'am stong byugs kyang ji srid sbyor ba ma btang gi bar du zad par mi 'gyur zhing /_'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 
[\[34a.4\]]'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig_/bran phos smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te zhing rol gcig rmos na rol bdun rmos 
[\[34a.5\]]par 'gyur zhing /_'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig_/bran mos smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[34a.6\]]ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te snod gang tsam drus pa gang yin pa des snod bdun tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig_/
[\[34a.7\]]de rnams kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs byin steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir song ste 'dug pa las/_rdzu 'phrul gyis song ba'i grib ma rgyal po tshangs byin 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]gyi steng du babs nas/_des gyen du blta bar brtsams pa las rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas de 'di snyam du bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gshol chen pos yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i drungs phyung bar gyur snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag de re ba chen pos mdzod dang bang mdzod rnams la 
[\[34b.2\]]bltas pa dang /_ji tsam na gang bar mthong ngo /_/des chung ma la smras pa/_re zhig kho bo'i smon lam ni rdzogs par gyur gyis da khyed cag gi blta'o/_/de nas bran mos 'bras snod gang tsam drus na bdun tsam du 'phel bar gyur to/_/chung mas gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa la de 
[\[34b.3\]]dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug_/nye 'khor gyi srog chags stong phrag du mas zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag des bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag las su zhig ci don du gnyer ba de shog shig_/bA rA Na sIr 
[\[34b.4\]]sgra gsal ba dang sgra chen por byung ba rgyal pos thos nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag sgra gsal ba dang /_sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha khyim bdag che ge mo zhig ces bya bas mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye ba lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gang 
[\[34b.5\]]gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe khyim bdag des mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye'am/_shes ldan dag khyim bdag de khug shig_/de rnams kyis bkug pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe khyod kyis mdzod 
[\[34b.6\]]dang bang ba rnams phye'am/_lha su'i mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye/_'on kyang de ring kho nar sa bon stsal ba'i 'bras bu de nyid du grub lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de ji lta bu zhig_/des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag nyid 
[\[34b.7\]]chen po de la bsod snyoms phul lam/_lha bdag gis phul lo/_/de yang lhag par dad par gyur nas/_tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_kye ma'o yon tan las byung ba'i/_/skyon kun rnam par spangs pa'i zhing /_/de la sa bon btab pa yi/_/'bras bu de nyid thob par 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]gyur/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_khyim bdag dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma dang /_khyim bdag gi bu dang /_khyim bdag gi mna' ma dang /_khyim bdag gi bran pho dang /_khyim bdag gi bran mo gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag lug dang /_lug gi chung 
[\[35a.2\]]ma dang /_lug gi bu dang /_lug gi mna' ma dang /_lug gi bran pho dang /_lug gi bran mo 'di dag nyid yin no/_/'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas drug char yang bsod nams chen por gyur cing nga'i spyan sngar 
[\[35a.3\]]bden pa mthong zhing /_rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong pas ches khyad par 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi/_mi mnyes par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na/_las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams 
[\[35a.4\]]kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin pas zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//_//sdom ni/_ke na'i bu yis btung ba blangs/_/ka shi'i tshong rdal nas thug dang /_/sdig can du ni bca' ba dang /_/'gyod dang sbyar ba'i zas 
[\[35a.5\]]dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das yul a du ma'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i bu gnas ni yul a du ma na 'dug go/_/nyin par ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram na gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_ngas gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams 
[\[35a.6\]]la chos bshad na der ngas tshegs chung ngus drang srong ke na'i bu thul bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bshad na der thul bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i 
[\[35a.7\]]thugs bskyed de chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bsams pa/_
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa bltas na/_bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams kho na la chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rig nas/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba lngas rtsen song la rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi 'gram du bcom 
[\[35b.2\]]ldan 'das kyi gdan shoms te/_'dus pa chen po 'dus pa na sus kyang de'i mdangs 'phrogs par mi 'gyur bar drang srong ke na'i bu'i srung ma gcig kyang skos shig_/des rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du drang srong ke na'i bu'i srung ma bzhag nas gnas shom par rtsom pa na de na skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[35b.3\]]chen po'i ca co'i sgra byung ba dang /_de nas drang srong ke na'i bu ca co'i sgras langs nas srung ma de la dris pa/_ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig des smras pa/_gdan shom par byed pa'i'o/_/ci kho bo'i phyir ram/_khyod kyi phyir ni ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir yin no/_/khyod 
[\[35b.4\]]'di na ci zhig la sdod/_khyod kho na srung ngo /_/ci'i phyir 'byung po mang po 'du bar 'gyur bas so/_/des smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de su zhig gis srung bar byed par 'gyur/_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la su zhig srung /_bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni 'jig rten lha dang 
[\[35b.5\]]bcas pa'i srung ma mdzad do zhes byas pa dang drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas cang mi smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas a du mar bsod snyoms la zhugs te/_a du mar bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba mdzad 
[\[35b.6\]]de/_zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu a du ma nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du byon par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[35b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dri za du ma'i 'khor dang /_dri za brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_dri za stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_dri za brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_lha'i nor 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]bus thu ba bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas shar 
[\[36a.2\]]phyogs su brten te 'dug go/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum du ma'i 'khor dang /_grul bum brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_grul bum stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_lha'i mu tig gis thu ba bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[36a.3\]]gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mu tig gis gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas lho phyogs su brten te 'dug go/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[36a.4\]]mig mi bzang yang klu du ma'i 'khor dang /_klu brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_klu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_klu brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 
[\[36a.5\]]'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba rnams kyis gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge 
[\[36a.6\]]slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas nub phyogs su brten te 'dug go/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yang gnod sbyin du ma'i 'khor dang /_gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor 
[\[36a.7\]]dang /_lha'i dbyig dang /_gser gyis thu ba bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbyig dang /_gser gyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas byang phyogs su brten te 'dug go/_/de la dbus pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/_yul 'khor skyong dang /_'phags skyes po'o/_/mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/_mig mi bzang dang /_rnam thos kyi bu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[36b.2\]]'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad na gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyis ni mi shes la/_gal te mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad na gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyis ni mi shes pas ma la ngas gnyis la ni dbus pa'i tshig 
[\[36b.3\]]gis chos bshad do/_/gnyis la ni mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do snyam du dgongs nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus zhig pa dang /_tshor ba bsil bar gyur pa dang /_'du shes 'gags pa dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[36b.4\]]nye bar zhi ba dang /_rnam par shes pa nub par gyur pa de nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang /_de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i dri za brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang 
[\[36b.5\]]bral ba skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de la khyod kyis mthong ba la mthong ba tsam dang /_thos pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa tsam du gyis shig_/chos kyi 
[\[36b.6\]]rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[36b.7\]]de ltar na rgyal po chen po e ne me ne/_dab be/_da Dab phe 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /_de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i klu brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]bral ba skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_de ltar na rgyal po chen po mA ShA/_tu ShA/_sang shA mA/_sarba tra bi rA DI 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/_rgyal po chen 
[\[37a.2\]]po rnam thos kyi bu dang de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_da ni bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la khad kyis nye na/_su la bstan pa gtad nas 
[\[37a.3\]]yongs su mya ngan 'da'/_gal te lha rnams la ni lha rnams bag med pa la dga' ba mang bas yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/'on te mi rnams la ni mi ni tshe thung ba yin pas de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyi/_ma la ngas lha dang /_mi rnams dang /_dge slong 'od 
[\[37a.4\]]srung la gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du dgongs nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa shar phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' 
[\[37a.5\]]stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang lho phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig_/rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang nub phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 
[\[37a.6\]]kyang byang phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi lags 
[\[37a.7\]]so zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gi bya ba rnams gtad nas tshe dang 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang bstan pa'i don gyi bya ba la brtson par gyis shig_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams 
[\[37b.2\]]kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po chen po bzhir gyur cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las 
[\[37b.3\]]rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa zhes bya ba nas/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston 
[\[37b.4\]]pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po na klu gnyis shig gnas te dbugs 'byin dang /_dbugs cher 'byin no/_/shing shal ma brtsegs pa na yang nam mkha' lding gnyis 
[\[37b.5\]]shig yod pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang /_gtsug gi dbang phyug go/_/gang gi tshe dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i tshe de gnyis sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dbugs 'byin dang /_dbugs 
[\[37b.6\]]cher 'byin gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang /_de gnyis la nam mkha' lding gis gnod pa bya bar brtsams pa las/_ri rab la rlung dang chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas slar logs pa dang /_
[\[37b.7\]]de gnyis kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag sngon ni kho bo cag gis khyed cag gnod pa byas na sa'i 'og tu 'gro na/_da gang gis na kho bo cag khyed dang phrad nas ri rab la rlung dang chu bzhin du rdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/_dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]gyis smras pa/_bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_gal te de lta na bdag cag gis kyang blang ngo zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te 
[\[38a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar dong nas de dag phyin pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan snga nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag gis chos thos nas dong ba de dag de gnyis kyis mthong nas/_nam mkha' lding de gnyis kyis klu dbugs 
[\[38a.3\]]'byin dang /_dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa/_'gro ba pha bi dag su dag yin/_de gnyis kyis rgyas par smras pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/_gal te de ltar bdag cag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro 
[\[38a.4\]]ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs la smon lam gdab bo zhes de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis ni sngar blangs so/_/de nas lhan cig 'dus 
[\[38a.5\]]nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/_ji ltar 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar chos mnyan nas bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su mchis pa de 
[\[38a.6\]]bzhin du bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing /_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[38a.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das des kyang de bzhin du rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bdag cag la chos bshad de bdag cag gis chos de thos nas bden pa mthong ste/_'di bzhin 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]du rang gi gnas su mchi bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_klu dang nam mkha' lding bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dbugs 'byin gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin 
[\[38b.2\]]no/_/dbugs cher 'byin gang yin pa de ni 'phags skyes po yin no/_/'gro ba'i dbang phyug ni mig mi bzang yin no/_/gtsug gi dbang phyug ni rnam thos kyi bu yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang 
[\[38b.3\]]bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/chos bshad pa de drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_bcom 
[\[38b.4\]]ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos nas mod la drang srong ke na'i bus 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[38b.5\]]bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/_/de nas de rtogs pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/_btung ba brgyad po tso tsa'i btung ba dang /_chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang /_rgya shug gi btung ba dang /_a shwat+tha'i btung ba dang /_u dum bA ra'i 
[\[38b.6\]]btung ba dang /_rtsub 'gyur gyi btung ba dang /_'bra go'i btung ba dang /_rgun gyi btung ba khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa btung ba brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis bstod 
[\[38b.7\]]cing bsngags pa lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas btung ba brgyad po dag bzhes so/_/bzhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]dge slong dag btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/_dus su mnyes/_dus su btsags/_dus su byin gyis brlabs na dus su longs spyad par bya zhing dus ma yin par yang longs spyad par bya la/_nam gyi thun dang po thal nas ni longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/
[\[39a.2\]]btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas la dus ma yin par mnyes/_dus ma yin par btsags/_dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/_dus su mnyes la/_dus ma yin par btsags dus ma 
[\[39a.3\]]yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus ma yin par byin len byas/_dus ma yin par mnyes/_dus ma yin par btsags pa ni zas kyi 'og tu yang longs spyad par mi bya la/_nam gyi cha stod 'das na yang longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/
[\[39a.4\]]de nas drang srong ke na'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gis 
[\[39a.5\]]gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas drang srong ke na'i bu bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing 
[\[39a.6\]]bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar mdzad de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu a du mar gshegs so/_/de nas drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/_'phags pa dag bzhengs shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag longs shig_/
[\[39a.7\]]shing dag gshegs shig_/me bus shig_/zhal zas dag brim par gyis shig_/bkad sa dag byi dor gyis shig_/de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i bu'i sring mo'i bu drang srong ri bo zhes bya ba gnas de nyid du nub mo gnas btab pa las/_drang srong ri bos drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]langs par langs nas nang mi rnams la smra ba thos so/_/thos nas kyang drang srong ke na'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong ci khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mgron du bos sam/_yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'am/_pho brang 'khor na 
[\[39b.2\]]gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs sam/_drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_des smras pa/_ri bo kho bo ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mgron du bos pa yang ma yin/_yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang ma yin/_pho brang 
[\[39b.3\]]'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang ma yin/_drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/des sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos 
[\[39b.4\]]nas ba spu thams cad zing zhes byed nas gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa/_drang srong sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/_ri bo dge sbyong gau tam shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par 
[\[39b.5\]]rab tu byung nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/_ri bo sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de yin no/_/ri bos smras pa/_drang srong dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin/_drang srong ke na'i bus smras pa/_ri bo rgyal 
[\[39b.6\]]rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yang yod/_bram ze'i rigs dang /_rje'u'i rigs dang /_dmangs rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang zhes bya ba 
[\[39b.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba yod de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_ri bo 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o/_/ri bo dge 'dun 'di dang sngar smos pa'i sangs 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]rgyas te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di kho bos gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas nang par sngar langs te 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom 
[\[40a.2\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas drang srong ri bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par 
[\[40a.3\]]rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o/_/drang srong ri bo dang 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to//_//
[\[40a.4\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu dgu pa/_de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[40a.5\]]'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na ri bo rab tu byung ba mthong nas des smras pa/_ri bo khyod rab tu byung ngam/_rab tu byung ngo /_/legs par byas so/_/shin tu legs par byas so/_/kho bo yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas rab 
[\[40a.6\]]tu 'byung ngo /_/de nas drang srong ke na'i bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/_lhung 
[\[40a.7\]]bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yon bsngo ba dang chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so/_/de nas drang srong ke na'i bus rgyu lhag de dag thams cad 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]btang ba'i chos byas nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas drang srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[40b.2\]]btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o/_/drang srong ke na'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 
[\[40b.3\]]byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stong po de dag dang /_'bab chu rab tu bzang po'i 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de 
[\[40b.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na la dge slong lnga brgya gtad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang 
[\[40b.5\]]yin pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs 
[\[40b.6\]]pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni shes rab che ba rnams dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni mthu che ba dang /_rdzu 
[\[40b.7\]]'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags na/_'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_tshe dang 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ka pi na'i gdams ngag phog pa gang 
[\[41a.2\]]dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/_maud gal gyi bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang /_shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[41a.3\]]zhig na drang srong gnyis shig gnas te so sor 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis las gcig shi nas de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde bas gdungs nas phan tshun 'phyan 'phyan nas drang srong 
[\[41a.4\]]cig shos de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /_des de rnams mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas dris pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyi mkhan po de gar song /_gum mo/_/des bsams pa/_bdag 'das na bram ze'i khye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur gyis/_ma la 
[\[41a.5\]]bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar bya'o snyam nas des de rnams dbugs phyung ste bsdus so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de yang nad kyis thebs par gyur nas/_de'i slob ma mchog gsum yod pa la des gcig la ni lnga brgya/_gnyis pa la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu/_gsum pa 
[\[41a.6\]]la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/_/de ni 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/de la lnga brgya gtad pa gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs med pa'i khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/_/nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad pa gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs kyi khams la bkod 
[\[41a.7\]]pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/_/nyis brgya lnga bcu phog pa cig shos kyis ni ji ltar mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gzugs med pa'i khams la 'god pa gang 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]yin pa de ni dge slong ka pi na 'di nyid yin no/_/nyis brgya lnga bcu gzugs kyi khams la rab tu 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/_/cig shos kyis nyis brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu dgod pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin 
[\[41b.2\]]no/_/'on kyang dge slong ka pi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnon po yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu'i gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po 'bring po yin no/_/shA ri'i bu'i gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po rtul po yin no/_/gal te shA ri'i bus gdams ngag phog par ma gyur na de 
[\[41b.3\]]dag gis dro bar gyur pa yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/ke na'i bu ni ral pa can/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas bsngags brjod pa/_/rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/_/thams cad mthun par mnyan par gyis/_/ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni/_/dus gcig cig na ston pa po/_/dpa' chen nyan 
[\[41b.4\]]thos thabs cig tu/_/gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so/_/ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni/_/zas kyi zhal ta byed pa dag_/bram ze ri bos mthong gyur te/_/mthong nas ke na'i bu la dris/_/bag ma len tam 'on te ci/_/rgyal po yul 'khor mgron bos sam/_/khyod kyi mchod 
[\[41b.5\]]sbyin che dus sam/_/dris pa de ni bdag la smros/_/bdag ni bag ma mi len la/_/rgyal po'am yul 'khor mgron ma bos/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog_/gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so/_/ri bos sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/_/yid skyo ba ni skyes 
[\[41b.6\]]gyur te/_/sangs rgyas de ci ke na'i bu/_/dris pa de ni bdag la smros/_/shAkya'i rigs las skyes pa yi/_/ston pa gang zag zla med yod/_/de ni chos kun blo ldan pas/_/de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/'dus byas 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos/_/'das pa sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[41b.7\]]gzigs la/_/de bzhin ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing /_/da ltar byung ba rnams kyang gzigs/_/mngon shes bya ba ji snyed pa/_/de kun rtogs pas thams cad rig_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/_/de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/mngon par shes bya mngon 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]shes byas/_/bsgom par bya ba rnams kyang bsgoms/_/spang bar bya ba spangs pas na/_/de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/gang zhig bltams par gyur pa na/_/rgya mtsho ri bor bcas pa yi/_/sa 'di rab tu g.yos mdzad pa/_/de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[42a.2\]]gang gis bdud dang nag po yi/_/rtsa lag bzhon bcas bcom nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs thob pa/_/de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/_/bA rA Na sI'i grong bzhud nas/_/gang gis rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i/_/chos kyi 'khor lo de bskor ba/_/de la thal sbyar phyag 
[\[42a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/gang gis 'dod chags bcing bas bcings/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gis gdungs pa'i/_/sems can mang po grol mdzad pa'i/_/de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan gang zhig na/_/rnam 'dren de ni ji srid na/_/shAkya'i sras po 'od mdzad 
[\[42a.4\]]la/_/de ring nyid nas skyabs su 'gro/_/tshal sdug yid du 'ong ba de/_/gang na ba ni bram ze'i chos/_/dri za'i rgyal po lta bu yi/_/sangs rgyas bla med mthong bar gyur/_/na bza' ngur smrig 'od ldan de/_/gser mdog nyi ma'i 'od zer can/_/de bzhin gser ni btso ma yi/_/
[\[42a.5\]]gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin/_/sA la shing gi me tog dang /_/kar ni ka ra'i me tog 'dra/_/rin chen sna tshogs spras pa yi/_/rin chen mchod sdong ji bzhin no/_/n+ya gro d+ha lta bur ni/_/chu zheng gab par gyur pa dang /_/khor yug 'dom gang 'od kyis ni/_/kun 
[\[42a.6\]]nas snang ba dag tu mdzad/_/rgyal srid rgyas dang nye dur bcas/_/'dod pa kun dga' spangs nas ni/_/rab tu byung bar mngon byung ba'i/_/thub pa dben pa rnams la dgyes/_/spos ngad ldang ba'i seng ge ni/_/nags su 'jigs pa med pa ltar/_/seng ge lta bur 
[\[42a.7\]]bsnyengs med gsung /_/bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/zhal 'dzum 'jam pa'i gsung dang ni/_/tshangs pa'i gsung dang snyan pa'i gsung /_/rnga yi sgra yi gsung lta bu'i/_/sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/_/zla ba dag pa nam mkha' la/_/rgyu skar rnams kyis 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]yongs bskor ba'i/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi/_/sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/_/nam mkha'i ngos la mdzes lta yi/_/sangs rgyas mun pa bral gyur cing /_/mdzes pa bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar khyu ba'i khyu mchog ni/_/nog 
[\[42b.2\]]dang ldan pa mi g.yo gnas/_/skyes bu khyu mchog stobs bcu ldan/_/sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho dag ni gting zab pa'i/_/chu chen tshad gzung med lta yi/_/sangs rgyas bsam gtan pa yi mchog_/bsam gyis mi khyab bla med mthong /_/nag po'i phyogs 
[\[42b.3\]]las nges byung ba'i/_/nyi ma mkha' la gsal ba dang /_/me yi phung po 'bar ba lta'i/_/gau tam sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'khor los sgyur rgyal po/_/zhabs 'bring bye bas yongs bskor ltar/_/de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/dgra bcom rnams kyis mdun byas 
[\[42b.4\]]mdzes/_/'dod pa rnams la dbang sgyur dang /_/ji ltar tshangs chen dbang phyug ltar/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams/_/thub pa dbang ni sgyur bar mdzad/_/gang thos nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing /_/sdug bsngal mtsho chen las sgrol ba/_/sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang /_/sdug bsngal 
[\[42b.5\]]kun 'byung gang yin dang /_/sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang /_/lam ni yan lag bzhi tshan gnyis/_/sbrang rtsi ma bskol ro lta bu'i/_/bden pa dag ni rab tu 'chad/_/nor med rnams la nor sbyin zhing /_/nad pa rnams kyi dpyad kyang mdzad/_/gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs gyur pas/_/
[\[42b.6\]]skye dgu sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad/_/mun par gyur pa'i sems can dang /_/blun po lam gol rgyu ba dang /_/bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/_/lam ni drang po rab tu ston/_/'dod chags zhe sdang kun 'bar zhing /_/gti mug rab 'bar skye dgu rnams/_/ji ltar sprin chen 
[\[42b.7\]]char 'bebs ltar/_/thub pa chen pos zhi bar mdzad/_/gzugs dang kha dog stobs ldan pa/_/de dang 'dra ba yod ma yin/_/sku mkhregs stobs mchog ldan pa ni/_/ri bo bzhin du shin tu gnas/_/rnyed dang ma rnyed bde sdug dang /_/smad pa dang ni bstod pa dang /_/grags 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]pa dang ni ma grags pas/_/chu yis pad ma bzhin ma gos/_/srog gcod pa ni rnam spangs te/_/ma byin pa la dga' mi byed/_/bden pa gsung zhing tshangs par spyod/_/de ni phra ma spangs pa yin/_/tshig rtsub dag ni mi gsung zhing /_/dus su bab pa 'jam por gsung /_/
[\[43a.2\]]de ni 'dod la brnab sems med/_/skye bo rnams la de sems byams/_/yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs/_/ting nge 'dzin stobs spyod yul ba/_/bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la gshegs/_/lha dang mi yi sgra dag ni/_/gang yin rnam pa sna 
[\[43a.3\]]tshogs gsan/_/nyon mongs can nam dge yang rung /_/pha rol gyi ni sems kyang mkhyen/_/gang dang gang du sngon gnas pa/_/sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa dang /_/sems can 'gro dang 'ong ba yi/_/'chi 'pho dang ni skye ba mkhyen/_/zag pa zad cing mi ldan pas/_/nyer zhi shin 
[\[43a.4\]]tu mya ngan 'das/_/dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba/_/mtsho ni gang ba bzhin du gnas/_/pad ma'i rdzing na glang po che/_/dam pa drug bcu lon pa ltar/_/mthong na ngoms ni mi shes pas/_/bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur/_/ri bo bcom ldan 'di 'dra ste/_/de yi sku ni skyes chen gyi/_/
[\[43a.5\]]sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing /_/gzi brjid me yi phung po bzhin/_/gang gis lo brgya tshang bar ni/_/skyob pa'i bsngags pa brjod byas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pas/_/des ni mthar phyin mi 'gyur ro/_/bram ze gang gis de mthong ba/_/de yi rnyed pa bla 
[\[43a.6\]]na med/_/gang gis mthong bas skyabs song ba/_/de yi rnyed pa de bas 'phags/_/bram ze ri bos thub chen gyi/_/bsngags pa thos nas skyo bar gyur/_/dben pa'i sems kyi rtog pa yis/_/ka na'i bu la 'di skad smras/_/mir gyur pa la bdag gis ni/_/de 'dra'i bsngags 
[\[43a.7\]]pa thos ma myong /_/ke na 'chad pa dang sbyar na/_/de ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/_/tshong pa nor dag don gnyer ltar/_/khyod kyis nga rgyal rgyal mtshan spongs/_/de la bkur sti gus byos dang /_/bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur/_/bram ze khye'u ni lnga brgya yis/_/slob 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]ma dag gis mdun bdar te/_/sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzang po der/_/bram ze ri bo song bar gyur/_/lha rnams kyi ni dga' tshal ltar/_/me tog shing ni phun sum tshogs/_/rnam par dben zhing sgra med cing /_/bya yi tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa/_/mi min gdug pa mi rgyu ba/_/
[\[43b.2\]]shAkya'i sras kyis bsten pa yi/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas su ni/_/de nas bram zes zhugs par gyur/_/ma dul 'dul ba kha lo sgyur/_/skyes bu dam pa mthong nas ni/_/ri bo yis ni tshig gsol pa/_/shes ldan cig snyun mi mnga'am/_/ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs can/_/
[\[43b.3\]]sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas/_/ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa/_/nga la nad ni yod min te/_/nyes pa med cing sdig pa med/_/the tshom thams cad rnam par chad/_/rnam par grol zhing mi ldan pa/_/nga ni zag med tha ba med/_/'jig rten na ni rdul med rgyu/_/gtsang zhing dag la 
[\[43b.4\]]dri nga med/_/des na bram ze nga gtsang ste/_/khon dang 'jigs pa kun las rgal/_/ri bo khyod kyang 'ongs pa legs/_/stan 'di la ni legs par 'dug_/bram ze ci ga bde 'am khyod/_/lus ni ngal bar ma gyur mod/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod mthong bas/_/thub pa chen po da ltar 
[\[43b.5\]]bde/_/rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa ltar/_/yid ni rab tu dga' ba yis/_/de dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i gtam/_/rim pa bzhin du byas nas ni/_/de nas bram ze 'dzem pa dang /_/dman pa'i yid kyis 'dug par gyur/_/klog pa dang ni gsang tshig 'dzin/_/rig byed gsum 
[\[43b.6\]]gyi rig mthar phyin/_/bram ze ri bo 'dug nas ni/_/thub pa'i mtshan la rtog par byed/_/'jig rten gyi ni mgon po yi/_/sku la mtshan ni sum bcu mthong /_/ljags srab mdoms sba sbubs nub pa/_/gnyis la ri bo the tshom za/_/thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams la/_/the
