[\[43b.7\]]tshom yid gnyis gyur nas ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs/_/bden pa'i mchan la yongs zhus pa/_/thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/_/sum bcu rtsa gnyis thob pa gang /_/gau tam khyod kyis sku dag la/_/gnyis ni g.yar sngar ma bab bo/_/mi yi dam pa mdoms 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]kyi ni/_/sba ba sbubs su nub lags sam/_/ljags bzang zhes ni bgyi ba yang /_/ci ga thung ba ma lags grang /_/thub chen bdag gis ci nas kyang /_/ljags ring glo bar chud 'gyur ba/_/ljags srab myur du [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}]dzad de/_/bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/_/rnam 
[\[44a.2\]]par 'dren rnams 'jig rten du/_/brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' 'byung /_/u dum bA ri'i me tog bzhin/_/thub pa chen po dkon pa lags/_/sos ka skam pa chab dang ni/_/bkres pa la ni g.yar zas dang /_/nad pa sman la ji lta bar/_/ston pa la ni bkur sti bgyid/_/ka la 
[\[44a.3\]]ping ka'i sgra dbyangs can/_/sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas/_/ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa/_/bram ze the tshom spang bar gyis/_/ljags kyis spyan dang snyan dag ni/_/rab tu khebs par ljags ring gis/_/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs par mdzad/_/rdzu 'phrul bzhi la 
[\[44a.4\]]mkhas pa yis/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang bstan mdzad pas/_/thub pa'i mdoms sba sbubs nub pa/_/bram ze ri bos mthong bar gyur/_/thub pa chen pos mtshan rnams la/_/the tshom med cing zug rngu phyung /_/sems kyi rtog pa rab dga' nas/_/ri bo yis ni tshig gsol pa/_/sum 
[\[44a.5\]]bcu gnyis dang dpe byad rnams/_/bdag gis gsang tshig las thos pa/_/de kun khyod kyi sku 'di la/_/yongs su rdzogs te ma tshang med/_/dge dang ldan pas spyod pa bzang /_/legs par 'khrungs pas blta na sdug_/nyan thos dge 'dun dbus na ni/_/gdugs bdal 
[\[44a.6\]]ba ni lta bur mdzes/_/dam par bsngags pa khyod la ni/_/dge sbyong dngos pos ci zhig bgyi/_/mi yi khyu mchog khyod lta bu/_/dpung gi yan lag bzhi dag dang /_/rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yi/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'os/_/sa bdag rgyal po mdzad nas ni/_/
[\[44a.7\]]sa steng 'khor los sgyur bar mdzod/_/ri bo nga ni rgyal po ste/_/chos kyi rgyal chen bla na med/_/nga ni sa yi dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed/_/nga yi rigs ni rgyal rigs te/_/nga ni dge ba'i rig las 'khrungs/_/bdud dpung bcas par 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bcom nas ni/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa thob/_/bram ze nga'i dran 'khor lo ste/_/nga yi shes rab blon po yin/_/brtson 'grus shugs mgyogs rta pho ni/_/btang na dang la 'byung ba yin/_/nga yi nor bu dam pa ni/_/ting 'dzin mun pa gsal byed yin/_/btang 
[\[44b.2\]]snyoms glang chen dam pa ste/_/bskul na dang la rgyug pa yin/_/chags bcas bud med 'dod pa ltar/_/bram ze nga'i dga' 'dod pa yin/_/bram ze nga yi khyim bdag ni/_/shin tu sbyangs nor dam pa yin/_/nga yi byang chub yan lag bdun/_/'jig rten kun 'das rin chen 
[\[44b.3\]]des/_/long bar gyur cing gnyid log pa'i/_/skye dgu 'di dag sad par bya/_/phyogs rnams kun nas nga rgyal bas/_/nga la sdo ba'i dgra yod min/_/nyon mongs tshogs rnams 'joms pa yi/_/'khor bzhi po dag nga yi sras/_/rdzu 'phrul kun dga' phun sum tshogs/_/lam 
[\[44b.4\]]gyi bzhi mdor sprul pa byas/_/mdo sde skyes pa'i rabs dag bkram/_/skyes bu chen po rnams kyis sten/_/rnam thar gsum gyi sgo mo can/_/dran pa'i srung ma rnams kyis bsrungs/_/ngo tsha khrel yod kyis g.yogs pa'i/_/grong khyer sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis/_/bsten 
[\[44b.5\]]pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs/_/rgyal po nga ni bzhugs nas su/_/nga yi chos kyi g.yul sprad de/_/chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs nas/_/bdud rnams mtha' dag bcom byas te/_/nga ni byang chub phyir dbang bskur/_/tshad med pa dag rab bsgoms pa/_/nga yi rgyan du bdog pa 
[\[44b.6\]]yin/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yis/_/nyon mongs pa dag rab tu bzlog_/pha rol rab tu rgol bcom ste/_/rnam par bcom zhing rmeg med byas/_/srog chags rnams la 'jig rten 'dir/_/snang ba sbyin zhing yang dag spyad/_/nga ni bde bar gnas bcas nas/_/
[\[44b.7\]]ye shes kyi ni mtshon gyis bcad/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gnas yin te/_/zhi gnas dag ni 'dzin stangs yin/_/tshul khrims shing rta sgra snyan la/_/nga yi lhag mthong kha lo sgyur/_/bzod dang des pa'i go bgos nas/_/lam bsgoms pas na g.yul ngor ni/_/gang gis 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]sgrib pa 'joms pa yi/_/dbang po lnga yi dong ba dang /_/gang gi nyon mongs thag 'jud pa'i/_/yang dag spong ba bzhi po yis/_/ngas ni dpa' bo g.yul sprad de/_/chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs nas/_/bdud dpung bcas par bcom byas te/_/nga ni byang chub dbang 
[\[45a.2\]]bskur ro/_/rig pas ma rig bcom nas ni/_/phung po skye zhing 'jig pa can/_/g.yul gyi rtse mo rgal te nga /_/skye dgu byang chub phyir sangs rgyas/_/gang gi skye dgu gnod byed pa/_/'jig rten chom rkun chen po gsum/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de kun 
[\[45a.3\]]nga yis bcom pas na/_/mngon shes kun gyi stobs byung bas/_/nga ni dgra bcom yon gnas 'os/_/zhing gshin pa la zhugs pa yi/_/sbyin sreg rnams kyang len pa yin/_/brtson 'grus dam pa brtsams nas ni/_/ngas ni zag pa rnams bcom mo/_/chu bo che las rgal 
[\[45a.4\]]nas ni/_/bsgral ba'i phyir ni gnas pa yin/_/ji ltar seng ge mche ba'i stobs/_/nags su srog chags dang phrad nas/_/chung dang 'bring dang chen po'ang rung /_/de la mtshungs par snun pa ltar/_/mi yi seng ge rnam 'dren pa/_/rdzogs sangs de bzhin 'jig rten ni/_/
[\[45a.5\]]byis pa'am 'bring ngam chen po la/_/mnyam por chos ni ston par mdzad/_/gau tam khyod kyis 'di ru ni/_/nad pa bdag ni the tshom sol/_/zug rngu 'byin pa rnams dang ni/_/mig mkhan rnams kyi mchog khyod lags/_/khyod kyi the tshom bsal bar byas/_/bram ze khyod 
[\[45a.6\]]ni 'dun par gyis/_/grags ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/mthong ba rnyed par dka' ba ste/_/gang zhig 'di na rnyed dka' ba/_/brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' 'byung /_/bram ze rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga /_/chos kyi rgyal po bla med yin/_/de bzhin gshegs la 
[\[45a.7\]]ris gsol ba/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bka' stsal te/_/ma 'dres 'khor lo skor mdzad na/_/gau tam ji skad gsung ba bzhin/_/khyod kyis 'khor lo bskor ba gang /_/rjes su mkhas par bskor bgyid pa/_/stong pa nyid 'khrungs nyan thos ni/_/sde dpon dag tu 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]su 'gyur lags/_/bram ze nga la nyan thos ni/_/shes rab mtshungs pa'i sras yod pa/_/nye rgyal zhes ni grags pa po/_/mang du thos pa shA ri'i bu/_/mdud pa kun las rnam grol ba/_/nyer zhi zag pa med yod de/_/ngas ni 'khor lo gang bskor ba/_/mkhas pa rjes su skor bar 
[\[45b.2\]]byed/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas chos dang ni/_/e ma'o nyan thos phun sum tshogs/_/e ma'o rin chen dam pa gsum/_/'jig rten byung ba ngo mtshar che/_/bzang po khyod kyi nyan thos su/_/bdag gis g.yar gyis blang bgyis la/_/kye ma'o chos kyi bcud 'tshal nas/_/shin tu mya 
[\[45b.3\]]ngan 'das par bgyi/_/sems rtog rab tu dga' gyur nas/_/de nas bram ze skyo gyur te/_/dben pa 'dod pa'i sems kyis ni/_/'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nags na seng ge sgra 'byin ltar/_/bsam gtan chen po'i zug rngu 'byin/_/spyan dang ldan pas ci gsungs pa/_/'di 
[\[45b.4\]]ni shes ldan dag nyon cig_/gang dag 'dod pa rjes su song /_/gang dag mi 'dod de dag deng /_/shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la/_/de ring kho na rab 'byung ngo /_/tshangs spyod 'di la legs spyad cing /_/lam nyid shin tu goms byas na/_/bag yod pa la gnas pa yi/_/rab 
[\[45b.5\]]byung 'bras bu bcas par 'gyur/_/gal te khyed cag rab 'byung zhing /_/bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod na ni/_/bram ze ral pa 'di bregs te/_/bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bya/_/sems rtog rab tu mgu gyur pas/_/sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te/_/bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar 
[\[45b.6\]]nas/_/bram ze ri bo des gsol pa/_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po/_/'di dag thal sbyar 'khod pa ni/_/thub chen rab tu 'byung ba dang /_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob par 'tshal/_/de nas ston pa thugs rje can/_/drang srong chen po thugs brtse bas/_/dge slong tshur shog bka' stsal 
[\[45b.7\]]pas/_/de dag bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/_/shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa maud gal dang /_/dga' yod gnas brtan ka pi na/_/spobs pa rtogs par khong du chud/_/chu bo bzang po'i 'gram du ni/_/yid du 'ong ba'i tshal khrod du/_/spobs pa byang ba'i gnas 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]brtan gyis/_/de dag la ni gdams ngag phog_/der ni de las chos kyi gtam/_/rjes su mthun pa de shes nas/_/ring po ma thogs rnam grol te/_/dam pa'i don la rab tu bkod/_/de dag mthong thob bde gyur pas/_/mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/_/
[\[46a.2\]]sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la/_/rab tu mgu bas phyag byas so/_/dam pa'i chos dang tshogs gtso dang /_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bslab pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dang bged pa dang /_/bag yod pa la phyag byas so/_/de bas bdag la phan 'dod pa'am/_/bdag nyid chen 
[\[46a.3\]]po mngon 'dod pas/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/bkur sti byos la skyabs su deng /_/'di ni de nyid gzigs pa yis/_/'jig rten na ni skyabs su bsngags/_/gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la/_/bde ba kun ni rab sbyin mdzad/_/chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen/_/
[\[46a.4\]]sangs rgyas bstan pa chos kyi ni/_/bdag nyid chen por mchog gyur la/_/thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu bsten/_/ke na'i bu'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_ka shi'i tshong rdal du byon to/_/ka shi'i 
[\[46a.5\]]tshong rdal de na sngon 'dreg mkhan byed byed pa rab tu byung ba pha spad gnyis shig yod pa las/_bus smras pa/_pha bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon pa bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 
[\[46a.6\]]'dun sku mnyel gyis/_ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drang na/_de la ci khyod thug pa sta gon byed dam/_'on te dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren/_des smras pa/_khyod song la dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs shig_/
[\[46a.7\]]nga ni thug pa sta gon byed do/_/des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so/_/de yang me long zhig thogs nas tshong dus su song ba las/_des de na tshong dpon zhig skra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas/_des de la me long bstan pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa 'di lta bu'i 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]mkhyen pa yang mnga' 'am/_des smras pa yod do/_/gal te mnga' na bregs shig_/des breg par brtsams pa dang khyim bdag gnyid log nas bregs zin pa dang sad do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bregs lags sam/_khyim bdag bregs zin to/_/de mgu nas smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[46b.2\]]bdag lhag par glo ba dga' bas khyod mchog ci bzhed pa don to/_/des smras pa/_kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nas thug la spyan drangs kyis nas thug byin cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa nas thug lta khyod ci rung bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag 'bul gyis bzhud la 
[\[46b.3\]]spyan drongs shig_/nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas de song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag brims pa na/_
[\[46b.4\]]dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag ngan pa la mgron du bos na kha zas bsod pa 'di bdag cag gis ji ltar blang zhes de rnams kyis ma blangs pa'i skabs de/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te ngan pa la mgron du bos la 
[\[46b.5\]]kha zas bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes pa gang byung ba de ni dge slong dag rigs dang mthun pa'i snod thogs pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis rang gi bzo bstan par mi bya/_rigs dang mthun pa'i snod kyang bsrel bar mi 
[\[46b.6\]]bya'o/_/srel na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sngon sman pa yin na gtsa' khab kyi snod srel ba dang /_sngon yi ge pa yin na ram phyis srel ba dang /_bzo mkhan rab tu byung na khab ral srel ba ni ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te sdig can du byon nas sdig can 
[\[46b.7\]]na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so/_/sdig can na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhang po gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de shin tu ma dad pa zhig ste/_bcom ldan 'das sdig can gyi gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_sdig can du byon nas sdig can na 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so/_/zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sdig can du byon nas/_sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so/_/zhes thos 
[\[47a.2\]]kyis/_gal te bdag cag re res sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas ye khrims zhig bca' bar bya ste/_bdag cag sus kyang gcig pus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar mi bya 
[\[47a.3\]]zhing bdag cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o/_/bdag cag las gang zhig gcig pu kho nas gdugs tshod gsol na/_de la tshogs kyis kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i chad pa gcad do/_/de nas sdig can gyi gyad thams cad 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa 
[\[47a.4\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la zhes bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya 
[\[47a.5\]]ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang 
[\[47a.6\]]bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[47a.7\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/_rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs te song ngo /_/gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan ni de nyid na 'dug pa dang /_de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_'od ldan ci khyod 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]dad par gyur tam/_des smras pa/_bdag dad par ni ma gyur mod kyi 'on kyang tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/_kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i chad pas gcad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/khyod chad pas 'jigs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig//
[\[47b.2\]]btsun pa de lta lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa/_gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni sangs rgyas la 
[\[47b.3\]]mngon par ma dad/_chos la ma lags/_dge 'dun lam lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la cang mi 
[\[47b.4\]]gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gang thos pas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/_/de nas gyad sna chen po la 
[\[47b.5\]]gtogs pa 'od ldan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing 
[\[47b.6\]]mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_'od ldan nga sngar sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis spyan drangs zin to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_ji ltar sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub pa de ltar bdag bgyid do/_/'od ldan gal te sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub na de bzhin du ngas 
[\[47b.7\]]khyod la gnang ngo /_/de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te chas nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_sdig can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]re zhig sdod cig bdag gis thog mar bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/_de'i 'og tu khyed cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag 
[\[48a.2\]]gis sngar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs zin pas kho bo cag mi nyan to/_/des smras pa/_ji ste mi btub na bca' ba dang btung ba re re zhing brim mo/_/de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/_mi gnang ngo /_/dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/_shes 
[\[48a.3\]]ldan dag 'di dad pa med pa zhig las/_'dis dge 'dun mnga' ba'i yon dag 'bul bar 'gyur bas gnang ngo zhes de rnams kyis de la gnang ngo /_/de nas des g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyis bca' ba gcig pu gang kho nas 
[\[48a.4\]]'grangs par 'gyur ba de lta bur sta gon gyis shig_/des dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yo byad rnams phog pa dang /_de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa re res re re 'grangs par 'gyur ba'i bca' ba gang yin pa dag byas so/_/de nas sdig can gyi 
[\[48a.5\]]gyad rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba dang btung ba brim par brtsams pa dang /_dge 
[\[48a.6\]]slong rnams 'gyod pas longs ma spyad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yon bdag la blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la bltas pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bdag cag bslus 
[\[48a.7\]]lags kyis bzhes shig_/de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba brims pa dang de kho nas dge slong rnams 'grangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs pas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to/_/nyi ma gzhan zhig 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]la dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_sangs rgyas tshur spyon/_chos tshur spyon/_dge 'dun tshur spyon 'di dag snoms shig_/dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci kho bo la 
[\[48b.2\]]sbyin nam/_'on te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la dbul zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'o zhes smra na bdag gir mi bya'o/_/'on te bdag cag gi sangs rgyas ni khyod nyid lags so zhes smra na blang 
[\[48b.3\]]bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du chos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes brjod par bya zhing /_dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/khyim bdag cig 
[\[48b.4\]]gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro khang la spyan drangs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pas ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/_chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa/_des 
[\[48b.5\]]bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis nyung ngu byin pa dang gang gis mang du byin pa dang /_gang gis bzang po byin pa dang /_gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang /_gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi skal ba can du 'gyur 
[\[48b.6\]]ro zhes gsungs kyis/_ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas des shing gshag par brtsams pa las ji tsam na shing rul pa zhig gi ser ka nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la zin pa dang /_de dug gi shugs kyis brgya la nas sa la 'gyel te dbu bar 
[\[48b.7\]]skyug cing bzhin yang gyur/_mig kyang gyur te/_de de ltar sdug bsngal ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di khyim bdag su zhig gi bu yin/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_che ge mo zhig gi'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_dge sbyong shAkya'i sras mgon 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung gi gal te rab tu ma byung bar gyur na nye du rnams kyis 'di la dpyad byas pa zhig ces bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman pa la dris la dpyad byos shig_/dge slong 
[\[49a.2\]]dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman pas bstan na sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin pa ma 
[\[49a.3\]]shes nas/_de rnams kyis sman pa la dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed nyid kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa kho na nyid yin te/_de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[49a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag zas sbyar ba ni lci ba dang /_gcin dang /_thal ba dang sa'o/_/de la lci ba ni byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i be'u rnams kyi'o/_/gcin yang de dag kho na'o/_/thal ba ni shing lnga po kan tsa na'i dang /_ka pi d+ha ka'i dang /_a shwat+tha'i dang /_u dum bA ra'i dang /_
[\[49a.5\]]n+ya gro d+ha'i'o/_/sa ni sa las sor bzhi'i 'og nas phyung ba'o/_/'di ni sbyar ba'i zas yin no/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pas ril zas sbyar ba byin na/_'on kyang sos par ma gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[49a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga las rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kun chub par byas te/_dge slong sa ri la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams 
[\[49a.7\]]gcad pa dang /_sa bcing bar nus sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol mnyan te bgyi'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug bcu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]lo/_chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di lta ste/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_nir ma le/_mang+ga l+ye/_hi ra N+ye/_hi ra N+ye/_gar+b+he/_b+ha dre/_su b+ha dre/_sa man+ta/_b+ha dre/_shrI b+ha dre/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_pa ra mAr tha sA d+ha ni/_sarba a nar tha pra sha ma ni/_sarba mang ga la sA d+ha ni/_mA na 
[\[49b.2\]]si/_mA na si/_ma hA mA na si/_a ts+yu te/_ad b+hu te/_ad d+yan b+hu te/_mug te/_mo tsa ni/_mok+Sha ni/_a ra dze/_bi ra dze/_a ma re/_a mr-i te/_a ma ra Ni/_brah+me/_bra h+mA swa re/_sU ra Ni/_sU ra Na ma nor the/_mug te/_dzI ban te/_sa ri'i gnod pa dang /_'jigs pa dang /_nad thams cad las 
[\[49b.3\]]srungs shig swA hA/_btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags blangs nas/_dge slong sa ri la bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas dug med nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom 
[\[49b.4\]]skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags sman pa dang /_gces spras bgyid pa ngo mtshar che lags so/_/dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma yin te/_ji ltar 'das 
[\[49b.5\]]pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi khom par gyur pa na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos phan pa dang gces spras byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de nang par 
[\[49b.6\]]rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te nyin mo bde legs su gnas/_nub kar bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te mtshan mo bde legs su gnas so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par chags/_'dod pa rnams la zhe na/_'chums/_brgyal 
[\[49b.7\]]myos/_rab tu rmongs/_rab tu brgyal te/_bag med pas nags kyi rma bya chen mo rab tu mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang /_ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu ba las ji tsam na ri'i ser ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang /_de 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]der yun ring du phyir rgol ba/_dgrar gyur pa/_'tshe bar gyur pa/_glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya'i rnyis bzung ste/_de mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang /_rab tu rmongs pa las dran pa rnyed nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di kho na yid la byas so/_/'di lta ste/_a ma le/_
[\[50a.2\]]bi ma le/_nir ma le/_mang ga l+ye/_hi ra N+ye/_hi ra N+ye/_gar+b+he/_b+ha dre/_su b+ha dre/_sa man+ta b+ha dre/_shrI b+ha dre/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_pa ra mAr tha sA d+ha ni/_sarba a nar tha pra sha ma Ni/_sarba mang ga la sA d+ha ni/_mA na si mA na si/_ma hA mA na si/_a ts+yu te/_ad b+hu te/_ad d+yan b+hu te/_mug te 
[\[50a.3\]]mo tsa ni/_mo k+Sha Ni/_a ra dze/_bi ra dze/_a ma re/_a mr-i te/_a mar Ni/_bra h+me/_brah+mA swa re/_sU ra Ne/_sU ra Na ma no ra the/_mug te/_dzI ban ti/_bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/_des rma bya'i rnyi chad nas bros so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma 
[\[50a.4\]]bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_de na yang nga la rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang gces spras byas so/_/da ltar na yang nga'i rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang gces spras byas so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyis 
[\[50a.5\]]dge slong sa ri la ji tsam pa bde legs su byas par gyur pa la gzigs/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi ji ltar 'das pa'i de yang nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na sbrul sngags mkhan zhig yod do/_/rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sbrul gyis zin nas 
[\[50a.6\]]de shi ba dang /_sbrul sngags mkhan gyis rig sngags kyis de sos par byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sbrul sngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni dge slong sa ri yin no/_/sman gyi gzhi rdzogs 
[\[50a.7\]]so//_//[{D1-7}]gos kyi gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_/'tsho byed dang ni gso ras dang /_/de bzhin kha tshar ring po dang /_/dbyar ral bar ni rig bya dang /_/shi ba'i dus dang nye dga' dang /_/tha ma dag ni nad pa yin/_/bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_'tsho byed dang ni gsum 'dral dang /_/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]dbyar gyi ras chen gding ba dang /_/g.yan pa bde gshegs mon dar dang /_/bal dang sha na zar ma'i ras/_/sdom la/_dum bu sa skyong seng ge dang /_de bzhin yangs par song ba dang /_/sems 'phrog drang srong sa 'tsho dang /_/a mra skyong dang 'jigs med dang /_/tshong dpon chung ma 
[\[50b.2\]]rigs skyes dang /_/sman pa yi ni lung dang ni/_/rdo 'jog dang ni bzang byed dang /_/u dum bA ra gzhal ba dang /_/bskyed dang rgyal rigs skyed mos tshal/_/bcom brlag gyad dang bud med sbrul/_/ya mu na dang dur khrod dang /_/yangs pa mig dang srin gyi med/_/rgyal po'i khab 
[\[50b.3\]]bdun bzhi lnga dang /_/'tsho byed sde tshan bsdus pa yin/_/lus 'phags na rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de'i blon po dum bu la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa 
[\[50b.4\]]las blon po'i mchog dum bus chos dang mthun par rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_tha snyad du bya ba yang rigs pas lta bar byed do/_/des na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad de'i ngor bltas shing 'dug go/_/des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' 
[\[50b.5\]]bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu zhes bya ba nas sa skyong zhes bya bar btags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de yang 
[\[50b.6\]]rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/_de ni seng ge zhes bya bar btags so/_/sa skyong dang seng ge rim gyis gzhon nur gyur na yang blon po'i mchog tu dum bu ni thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol 
[\[50b.7\]]gnon pa gnas lnga la byang ba yin te/_des na blon po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bu'i mthu skyes pa de'i tshe/_lhag par yang blon po thams cad zil gyis mnan te 'dug go/_/de nas blon po de rnams zil gyis non pas mi bzod pa skyes nas phan tshun du gros byas te rgyal 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]po'i drung du dong ngo /_/de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha rgyal po su lags/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gis brtag tu ci yod rgyal po lha nga yin mod/_gzhan su zhig yin/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po ni dum bu lags kyis 
[\[51a.2\]]lha ma lags so/_/gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te/_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_des 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan pas des na dbyen byed do snyam mo/_/re zhig dus gzhan 
[\[51a.3\]]zhig na rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug pa dang /_blon po'i mchog dum bu rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs te/_rgyal po'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi bya ba byas nas phyir 
[\[51a.4\]]byung ba de'i tshe yang rgyal po'i pho brang de stong par 'dug go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phyir byung bar gyur tam/_blon po rnams kyis glags rnyed nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gang gi slad du snyan du gsol pa spyan sngar bab lags mod/_gal 
[\[51a.5\]]te dum bu 'tshal bar gyur na lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po rnams khwa ltar khum 'phrig za ba yin pas des bsams pa/_'di rnams kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du gdon mi za'o snyam nas de de la 
[\[51a.6\]]klan ka tshol bar gyur to/_/'jig rten na mdza' ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dang /_bar ma yod pas ji tsam na gzhan dag gis dum bu la smras pa/_khyod la rgyal po klan ka tshol zhing 'dug gis thabs legs par soms shig_/de rtog pa skyes shing de dpyod pa la zhugs pa gang du 'gro/_
[\[51a.7\]]gal te mnyan yod du song na ni mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i mnga' ris yin pas nyen 'di nyid yod do/_/de bzhin du bA rA Na sI dang /_rgyal po'i khab dang /_tsam pa yang gcig gi dbang du gyur pas nyen 'di nyid yod do/_/yangs pa can ni tshogs kyi dbang yin te/_bcu dga' ba gang 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]yin pa de la ni nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur ba yin pas ye yangs pa can du 'gro'o snyam nas des yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la bdag ni khyed cag gi dpung gi phag na 'dug par 'dod do zhes pho nya btang ngo /_/de rnams kyis gus pa'i tshul gyis lan spring ba/_yangs pa can 'dir 
[\[51b.2\]]byon pa legs kyis spyon cig_/de nas blon po'i mchog dum bus nye du rnams bos te smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag ni yangs pa can du chas kyis khyed cag las gang dag 'dir dga' ba de dag ni 'dug shig_/gang dag mi 'dod pa de dag ni sta gon gyis shig dang 'dong ngo /_/
[\[51b.3\]]ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi rnams la bsgo ba/_khyed cag gis ba lang dang ma he yangs pa can gang na ba der skyongs shig_/zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba yangs pa can du 'dong gis go gyon cig_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs de ltar sta gon byed du bcug nas/_rgyal po'i drung du song ste 
[\[51b.4\]]rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha bgyi ba cung zhig mchis te/_skyed mos tshal du mchi na gzigs su gsol/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin byas song shig_/des skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas nor gces pas shing rta bkang ste/_steng bza' ba dang bca' bas g.yogs 
[\[51b.5\]]nas song ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis dum bu bros so zhes thos nas/_de rnams rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/_lha dum bu ni bros so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_deng la slar khug shig_/de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas bsnyags 
[\[51b.6\]]te smras pa/_dum bu lhas bka' stsal gyis slar log shig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma'o dum bu shi'am bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de tshegs chung dus grub kyis deng shig_/kho bo ni bros pa yin no/_/de rnams kyis 
[\[51b.7\]]rgyal po'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas log ste rgyal po la smras pa/_lha blon po'i mchog dum bu ni bros so/_/rgyal pos ma legs so snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/dum bu yang rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin to/_/de'i tshe yangs 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]pa can na ris gsum du gnas te/_ris dang po na ni khang pa rtseg ma bdun stong ba gam gser las byas pa'o/_/ris bar ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma khri bzhi stong ba gam dngul las byas pa'o/_/ris tha ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma nyi khri chig stong ba gam zangs las byas pa ste/_de 
[\[52a.2\]]rnams na mi dam pa dang /_bar ma dang /_phal pa rnams ci rigs par gnas so/_/yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis khrims su bcas te bzhag pa ni ris dang por bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de ni ris dang po nyid du gtong bar byed kyi bar mar ma yin/_tha mar ma yin no/_/bar ma'i gang 
[\[52a.3\]]yin pa de ni ris dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do/_/tha ma'i gang yin pa de ni ris gsum char du gtong bar byed do/_/bud med rnams ni yangs pa can ma gtogs par gzhan du mi gtong zhing mi 'byin to/_/bud med rin po che ni su la yang mi gtong bar tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs 
[\[52a.4\]]spyad pa kho nar byed do/_/dum bu ni skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te ris dang por khang pa byin nas/_de na gnas par brtsams pa las gang gi tshe tshogs 'dus pa de'i tshe de bos kyang 'dur ma btub nas/_de la yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis smras pa/_dum bu khyod ci'i phyir mi 'du/_
[\[52a.5\]]des smras pa/_'du ba kho na las bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas bdag mi 'du'o/_/yangs pa can pa rnams kyis smras pa/_dum bu 'dus shig_/'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung des 'du bar brtsams nas blo gros ma byin no/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_dum bu blo gros byin 
[\[52a.6\]]cig_/des smras pa/_gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas na blo gros ni mi sbyin no/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_blo gros byin cig 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung /_de tshogs dang lhan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin no/_/sngon yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bi+A 
[\[52a.7\]]rnams gang su la yang rung yi ge spring bar byed na rtsub po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe dum bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do/_/gang dag la 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/_
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]shes ldan dag gang gis na yangs pa can gyi tshogs sngon rtsub pa dang bcas par spring bar byed pa las/_de 'jam po dang bcas par gyur pa la rgyu ci zhig yod/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_khyad par yod de lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchog dum bu der 'ongs nas/_
[\[52b.2\]]de dag de'i blo gros bzhin byed de/_des na da ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed do/_/dum bus sa skyong dang seng ge khyim phub nas seng ge rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gos 
[\[52b.3\]]can zhes bya bar btags so/_/de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas khye'u zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/_des pha srog dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de yang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par 
[\[52b.4\]]byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas nye gos can zhes bya bar btags so/_/de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas bu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha 
[\[52b.5\]]bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang /_skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras pa/_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis de dag gi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma bya shig ces des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams 
[\[52b.6\]]kyis dum bu la smras pa/_khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/_lits+tsha bI 'di dag rnams gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas 'di la gnod pa byas su 'ong gis 'di slar zlog cig_/des de bkug nas smras pa/_bu yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha 
[\[52b.7\]]bI rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis 'di dag gi skyed mos tshal ma rung bar ma bya zhig_/de dag gis gnod par byas sa re/_des smras pa/_yab 'di dag la ni skyed mos tshal mchis na bdag cag la ni ma mchis so/_/des smras pa/_bu skyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]gsol ba gdab bo/_/des tshogs la gsol ba btab pa/_shes ldan dag bdag gi bu gnyis la skyed mos tshal ma mchis kyis bdag la skyed mos tshal zhig thugs dpag mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/de rnams kyis de dag la skyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig byin pa las/_de na 
[\[53a.2\]]shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/_de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed du bcug go/_/cig shos kyis ni zhal sros byas so/_/de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na sa skyong dang seng ge'i shing sA 
[\[53a.3\]]la'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes brjod do/_/sa skyong gis bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas lits+tsha bI rnams smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/de nas dum bus bkug ste bsgo ba/_bu khyod tshogs 'khrug par ma byed par ri 'or che ge mo zhig tu song la der 
[\[53a.4\]]rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug shig_/de der song nas rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed par brtsams so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas de rnams kyis blon po'i mchog dum bu sde dpon du bcug pa las 
[\[53a.5\]]des kyang dus thung ngu zhig tu chos dang mthun pas sde dpon byas nas shi'o/_/yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces byas pa dang /_de nas kha cig gis smras pa/_blon po'i mchog dum bus tshogs yongs su bskyangs pas na de nyid kyi bu gzhag go/_/kha cig 
[\[53a.6\]]gis smras pa/_de'i bu sa skyong ni gdug pa rtsal po che zhig ste/_gal te de sde dpon du bcug na gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i nu bo seng ge gang yin pa de ni des pa 'grogs na bde ba tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa zhig pas/_gal te tshogs 'dod na de sde 
[\[53a.7\]]dpon du gzhug go/_/thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/_seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_sa skyong ni bdag gi phu bo yin pas de sde dpon du chug shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_seng ge sde dpon khyod kyi rigs brgyud kyis rim 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci tshogs gang la 'drang ba des sde dpon bya bar zad mod/_gal te khyod mi 'dod na kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du gzhug go/_/des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na de ni ma 'os pas ye bkur ro snyam nas des khas 
[\[53b.2\]]blangs pa dang /_de rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go/_/yangs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar byed pa las/_gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe seng ge la sogs pa tshogs 
[\[53b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri 'or na sa skyong rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri 'or ba gang yin pa der spring ba 'ongs pa dang /_sa skyong gis phye ste bklags nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag sngon ni yangs pa can gyi 
[\[53b.4\]]tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/_da ni seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/_ci kho bo'i pha shi'am/_de rnams kyis smras pa shi'o/_/de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/_phu bo nga 'dug 
[\[53b.5\]]bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba ci ga rigs sam/_seng ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang /_de yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsams pa/_bdag la yangs pa can pa rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas kyis rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o snyam nas/_des 
[\[53b.6\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lha'i btsan phag na mchis par 'tshal lo zhes pho nya btang ngo /_/des de la spring pa 'ong ba legs kyis shog shig ces spring ngo /_/de rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang /_de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcug go/_/ji tsam 
[\[53b.7\]]dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de sa skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad de thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_nga'i btsun mo dam 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug_/lha thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/_de la gcig la ni pha 'gums pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/_cig shos la 
[\[54a.2\]]ni mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na lha'i ched du de gang khrid de mchi/_bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'o/_/de nas sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas 
[\[54a.3\]]khyod kyi nye gos can tshur bkri zhig dang btsun mo dam par 'gyur ro/_/des de la yi ge lan spring ba/_gar bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri bar zad de/_khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid shes so/_/ji ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa yangs 
[\[54a.4\]]pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtong ngo zhes bcas mod kyi/_'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang /_kho bos de skyed mos tshal du phyung ba dang khyod kyis khrid de song shig_/de nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la mchi phyag byas nas shing rtar zhugs te yangs pa can du song 
[\[54a.5\]]ba las rim gyis phyin nas skyed mos tshal du bsdad do/_/de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srung zhig shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pa des yangs pa can pa rnams la bstan pa/_bdag ni mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyis bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la mgul pa la dril dpyangs 
[\[54a.6\]]shig dang gal te yangs pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na bdag gis ji tsam du zin pa'am/_'bros par gyur pa de srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o/_/de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dril btags te/_gar dang /_glu 
[\[54a.7\]]dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_gtor ma dang /_me tog phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag go/_/sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba/_kho bo skyed mos tshal na sdod kyis byung shig_/des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste nye gos can la smras pa/_khyod rgyal 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis rgyan rnams thogs la skyed mos tshal du byung shig_/des rgyan rnams thogs par brtsams pa dang /_gos can gyis mthong nas des smras pa/_ci zhig gi phyir rgyan thogs/_kho mo bag mar btang ngo /_/su zhig la/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po 
[\[54b.2\]]la'o/_/des smras pa/_kho mo phu mo yin na khyod ci ste bag mar gtang /_gal te de lta na khyod rgyan thogs shig_/de yang smra ba las dril gyi sgra byung ngo /_/yangs pa can gyi tshogs rod rod por gyur te/_bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs so/_/seng ge sngangs pas 
[\[54b.3\]]nye gos can yin no snyam nas gos can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang /_sa skyong yang sngangs pas gos can shing rtar bcug ste song ngo /_/yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin bsnyags nas/_de dang de rnams su lhan cig 'thab par brtsams pa dang /_de gnas lnga rnams la byang 
[\[54b.4\]]ba yin pas des lits+tsha bI lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag las lnga brgya gnad du bsnun zin gyis lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar deng shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_nged cag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do/_/go phud cig 
[\[54b.5\]]de rnams kyis go phud pa dang lnga brgya sa la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to/_/de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yin no snyam nas skrag ste bros so/_/yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la gzugs can snying po'i bu 
[\[54b.6\]]rnams lan glon du gzhug gis glegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas gzhag go zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go/_/sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/_nye gos can bobs shig_/des smras pa/_khu 
[\[54b.7\]]gu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te/_bdag ni gos can lags so/_/khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/_sa skyong 'ongs sam 'ongs pa legs so/_/
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]lha bdag mchis lags so/_/nye gos can khrid de 'ongs sam/_lha khrid de mchis kyang mchis la khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so/_/ci zhig zer/_nye gos can lags snyam nas gos can khrid de mchis so/_/bltas khrid de shog shig_/de nang du khrid pa dang rgyal 
[\[55a.2\]]pos lhag par gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas mthong ma thag kho nar rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag bu pha gsod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas gal te nga la bu yod par gyur na de btsas ma thag 
[\[55a.3\]]tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o/_/de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/_yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pas na lus 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so/_/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/re zhig dus gzhan 
[\[55a.4\]]zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phyir byung ba na bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/_/ji tsam na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mda'i long la btags pas skrag pa zhig drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing byung ba rgyal po'i mdas gnad du bsnun to/_/de 
[\[55a.5\]]nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/_'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan gzan gdug pas kyang gzem par bya bar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsod dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de skad du kha zer ba dang /_dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/_lha 'di su la g.yar mchi 
[\[55a.6\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_nga la yin na/_shes ldan dag rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/_lha de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so/_/gal te de lta na ngas drang srong 'di yongs su spangs so/_/de gsad par brtsams te de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/_rgyal po 
[\[55a.7\]]'thab krol can 'dis bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa gsad par bkris/_gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig_/yang bsams pa/_rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu sbas pa/_shin tu bsrungs pa/_shin tu btsas pa yin pas gal te gzhan du skye ba blangs 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyis/_rnam pa thams cad du bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skye bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de smon lam log par btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyes so/_/gang gi tshe nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la 
[\[55b.2\]]khrag gi char bab bo/_/gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/_e ma'o bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang /_rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa las/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di ni btsun mo'i 
[\[55b.3\]]rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so/_/rgyal po sems khong du chud cing 'dug nas/_'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/_lha ras kyi bar stsang shas bltams par bgyis te 
[\[55b.4\]]gsol la nyid btsun mo la stobs mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas pa bgos nas bdag nyid gos can la bstabs pa dang /_des rgyab kyi sha yin no snyam nas zos so/_/de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/_
[\[55b.5\]]kye ma'o bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtswa gtar nas khrag blud pas de 'dod pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig 
[\[55b.6\]]btsas so/_/btsas te gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la yang khrag gi char bab bo/_/rgyal pos yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas rmas pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bstan bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na gdon mi 'tshal bar khye'u 'dis lha sku tshe dang phral nas rang nyid cod 
[\[55b.7\]]pan bcings te rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyis 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo de'i tshe yangs pa can na lits+tsha bI ming chen zhes bya ba 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]zhig gnas te/_de'i skyed mos tshal na a mra'i tshal yod pa las der glo bur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa kun dga'i ra ba srung bas mthong ngo /_/de ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang /_de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang /_des ltas mkhan rnams bkug 
[\[56a.2\]]nas dris pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha de srung du gsol cig dang dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/_de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/_skyed mos tshal der kun nas srung ma'i mi 
[\[56a.3\]]rnams bkod nas nyi ma bgrang ba la zhugs so/_/ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang skyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag bshams/_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/_me tog sil 
[\[56a.4\]]mas bkram/_glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag dang /_mdza' bo dang /_gnyen bshes kyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas skyed mos tshal de na de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las chu shing gi sdong po gas 
[\[56a.5\]]nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/_ming chen gyis smras pa/_bu mo 'di ni a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa 
[\[56a.6\]]yin pas 'di'i ming a mra skyong ma zhes bya'o/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag ming chen skyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste bu mo a mra skyong ma bskyed bsrings te zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de slong ba'i phyir yul krung krung pa rnams dang /_shAkya 
[\[56a.7\]]rnams dang /_gzhan yang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bu dang /_blon po'i bu dang /_tshong pa dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon du ma dag 'ongs pa dang /_khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsams pa gang kho na la ma byin pa de dag kho na sdang bar 'gyur na 'on kyang tshogs kyis khrims 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]su bcas pas re zhig tshogs la brtag go snyam nas/_des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/_shes ldan bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig_/bdag gis skyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig rnyed pa de bdag gis bsnun bsnyod de bskyed nas/_de bdag gis rang gi rigs rgyud dang 'tsham par 
[\[56b.2\]]'ga' zhig la chung mar byin na tshogs kyis ltos shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/_bud med rin po che ni mi gtang ste tshogs kyis spyad do/_/zhes bcas pa yin gyis re zhig bu mo de ci 'dra ba zhig bltas khrid de shog shig_/des de tshogs 
[\[56b.3\]]kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang /_gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrad de kun tu brtags par brtsams nas smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di ni bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis su la yang mi sbyin no/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[56b.4\]]ming chen yid mi bde zhing rang gi khyim du song nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/_yab ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/_bu mo khyod bud med rin po che yin no zhes tshogs kyis spyad par gyur te/_bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs 
[\[56b.5\]]so/_/yab ci khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam/_bu mo sngon tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa bud med rin po che ni tshogs kyis spyad do zhes bcas la/_khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do/_/des smras pa/_dam zhig bca' ste gal te bdag la tshogs 
[\[56b.6\]]kyi dam pa lnga zhig stsal na/_bdag tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/_ris dang po'i khang pa stsal ba dang /_skyes pa gcig nang du zhugs pa na cig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang /_nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang /_gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe bdag 
[\[56b.7\]]gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang /_bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang /_nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag pa'o/_/ming chen gyis a mra skyong ma'i spring ba bzlas pa dang /_tshogs kyis smras pa/_de bzhin du byas te/_ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la ris dang po'i khang 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]pa ni bud med rin po che 'di kho na la 'os so/_/gcig nang du zhugs pa na cig shos nang du mi 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smra ba de yang bden te sha kho na rnams las ni 'di lta ste/_bud med kyi sha kho na tha chad yin pas gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa na cig shos kyang nang du zhugs na 
[\[57a.2\]]gdon ma zos par gcig la gcig gsod par 'gyur ro/_/nang du 'jug pa des kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya thogs te nang du 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/_gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang rgyan du dgos so/_/zhag bdun lon pa na khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang 
[\[57a.3\]]bden te/_sngar ram phyis byas kyang rung de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/_skyes pa rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/_'di smad 'tshong ma yin pas gal te mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa brtags na su zhig de'i khyim du 
[\[57a.4\]]'jug_/de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to/_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa las/_de na kha cig ni yul la chags ches pa'i phyir mthong ma thag kho nar 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[57a.5\]]bar gyur to/_/kha cig gis ni reg pa kho nas te/_de la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya ba ma byas so/_/des bsams pa/_'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyis thabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/_des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[57a.6\]]gang na rgyal po'am blon po'am phyug po'am/_tshong dpon nam/_tshong pa'am/_ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la bris shig_/de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bris pa dang /_de nas a mra skyong ma rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas ri mo'i las rnams la so sor brtags 
[\[57a.7\]]te dris pa/_shes ldan dag 'di gang zhig 'di ni rgyal po rab snang ngo /_/gzhan 'di gang zhig_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lo/_/gzhan 'di gang zhig bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed do/_/gzhan 'di gang zhig_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'o/_/des de 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]bzhin du dris pa dang de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smras so/_/de nas des thams cad la brtags pa dang gzugs can snying po la mig chags nas des bsams pa/_skyes bu 'di ltar chu zheng gab pas ni bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par nus so snyam mo/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig 
[\[57b.2\]]na ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir song nas blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/_shes ldan dag sus smad 'tshong ma ji lta bu mthong /_sa skyong gis smras pa/_lha re zhig gzhan lta zhog_/yangs pa 
[\[57b.3\]]can na smad 'tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba shin tu gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'tshal ba lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so/_/des smras pa/_sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dong /_de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do/_/des smras 
[\[57b.4\]]pa/_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams ni yun ring po nas gnod pa bgyid pa slar rgol ba dgra bo lags pas khyod la gnod pa bgyid du mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag mi rnams ni skyes bu'i dpa' snying can yin pas 'dong ngo /_/des smras pa/_lha gal te don ma mchis 
[\[57b.5\]]pa la gtsigs che bar mdzad na gshegs mod/_de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan cig yangs pa can du chas te/_rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas sa skyong ni skyed mos tshal na sdod do/_/rgyal po ni a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo /_/yangs 
[\[57b.6\]]pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams rod rod por gyur nas shes ldan dag bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra gsal ba dang /_sgra chen po byung ba dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos a mra skyong ma la dris pa/_bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/_lha sdum pa nyul bar bgyid do/_/
[\[57b.7\]]ci zhig gi phyir/_lha'i slad du'o/_/ji ltar bya/_ci 'bros sam/_lha mi dgyes pa ma mdzad cig_/lha dgung bdun lon pa dang bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas re zhig dgung bdun du rol pas dgyes par mdzod/_dgyes dgur mdzod la dgung bdun lags dang dus mkhyen par bgyi'o/_/
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa/_lha bdag la sems can zhugs lags so/_/des de la seng ras shig dang sor gdub 
[\[58a.2\]]rgya byin nas smras pa/_gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyod nyid kyi yin no/_/'on te khye'u yin na seng ras 'di skon la sor gdub kyi rgya mgul tu thogs te nga'i drung du bkri shig_/de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang dril bu 'khrol bar 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[58a.3\]]shes ldan dag dgra bo byung gis rjes bzhin du btsal lo zhes lits+tsha bI skyin gor gyi mda' rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa dang sa skyong gis mthong nas des smras pa/_lha yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams mchi na/_lha ci 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi'am/_
[\[58a.4\]]'on te shing rta bda'/_des smras pa/_nga ni dub pas shing rta ded kyis khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo khyes shig_/des de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las yangs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di 
[\[58a.5\]]yin gyis slar ldog go/_/de rnams slar log nas yangs pa can du 'ongs te 'dus nas yang khrims su bcas pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la yang gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha glon du gzhug go zhes bcas so/_/ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang a mra skyong ma la khye'u 
[\[58a.6\]]gzugs bzang la mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so/_/btsas nas zhes bya ba nas bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de yangs pa can pa'i lits+tsha bI'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/_de rnams kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig gis smras pa/_bran mo'i 
[\[58a.7\]]bu khyod brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni skyes na pha su yin/_de ngus nas ma'i drung du song ba dang des smras pa/_bu ci'i phyir du ngu /_des thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu gal te yang 'dri ba dang nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do zhes smros shig_/gal te 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]su yin zhes smra dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no zhes smros shig_/ji tsam na de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do/_/su yin/_rgyal po gzugs can snying 
[\[58b.2\]]po yin no/_/de rnams kyis shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra gang yin pa de ni 'di'i pha yin no zhes lhag par yang brdegs so/_/des ngus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang /_des bsams pa/_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/_gal te 
[\[58b.3\]]'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam mo/_/de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang tshong pa rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba de dag des mthong nas smras pa/_sor gdub kyi rgya 'dis snod rgyas thob la deng shig dang sho gam mi gcod par 'gyur ro/_/khye'u 'di yang 
[\[58b.4\]]rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la sor gdub kyi rgya 'di 'di'i mgul du thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor zhog cig_/de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so/_/bu la yang mu tig gi do shal cig byin nas smras pa/_bu rgyal po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus dang mu tig gi do shal rkang 
[\[58b.5\]]pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs te pang du 'dug shig_/gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go zhes smra dang de la yang bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes smros shig_/de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/_de rnams kyis khrus 
[\[58b.6\]]byas te sor gdub kyi rgya btags nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag pa dang /_de rgyal po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu tig gi do shal rkang pa la bzhag nas 'dzegs te pang du 'dug go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go/_/des 
[\[58b.7\]]smras pa/_yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/_de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun tu smras pas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bcu gcig pa/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi bud med la lhag par chags pas glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnams su song nas mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba 
[\[59a.2\]]zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas zhes bya ba nas dga' mgur spyod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig_/
[\[59a.3\]]de zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo /_/de yang kha zas zhim po dang gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che la zhon nas de'i khyim drung nas song ba dang /_des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba bor ro/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[59a.4\]]pos mthong nas smras pa/_mar shog_/des smras pa/_lha g.yar tsha lags kyis khyod nyid nang du gshegs shig_/de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/_de yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can chags par gyur nas des 
[\[59a.5\]]rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras khra bo byin nas smras pa/_gal te re zhig khye'ur gyur na seng ras 'di skon la sor gdub kyi rgya yang mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du bkri shig_/'on te bu mo yin 
[\[59a.6\]]na ni khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras nas rgyal po song ngo /_/ji tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste rgyal po'i khab dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas/_des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig_/kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te/_zhag 'di tsam kho na na phyin par 'ong ngo /_/spring ba des thos 
[\[59a.7\]]nas bdag gis ni bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/_de yang 'ong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du phongs par gyur nas/_des de ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos slar spring ba/_bag ma tsha bar 'dug shig ci nas kyang myur du mi 'ong ba de ltar 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]ngas bya'o/_/rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba/_ded dpon nga la rin po che che ge mo dang che ge mo dag cig dgos kyis de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig_/de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo /_/de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas btsas pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/_blta 
[\[59b.2\]]na sdug pa zhig btsas so/_/ma bslabs kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pas des mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'grangs par bsnyod nas sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du btags te seng ras kyis bkris nas sgrom bu'i nang du bcug ste bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bsgo ba/_song la sgrom bu 'di khyer te 
[\[59b.3\]]rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byos la me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdod cig_/des de bzhin byas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir song nas rgyal po gzhon nu 'jigs med dang lhan cig 'dug pa las/_
[\[59b.4\]]des rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me mthong ngo /_/de nas zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me 'bar ba'o ni ci yin ltos shig_/de dag gis bltas nas smras pa/_lha sgrom bu zhig mchis so/_/des smras pa/_long shig_/rgyal bu 
[\[59b.5\]]gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis smras pa/_lha sgrom bu de na ci mchis pa de bdag la stsal bar ci gnang /_rgyal pos de bzhin bya'o zhes khas blangs so/_/ji tsam na sgrom bu blangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_kha phye shig_/kha phye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo /_/rgyal 
[\[59b.6\]]pos smras pa/_'di ci gson nam/_'on te shi ba zhig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gson lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras ngo shes nas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang /_des de bsnun bsnyod bskyed de rgyal pos gson nam zhes tshig 
[\[59b.7\]]tu byung ba dang /_rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis gsos pas/_'tsho byed gzhon nus gsol zhes bya bar grags so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos chen por gyur to/_/de 'jigs med dang lhan cig bre mo gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/_'jigs med 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ni ma btsas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan gyis bdag cag gis bzo cung zad bslabs te/_des na bdag cag gi phyi dus kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/_shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po 
[\[60a.2\]]gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa dang /_de rgyal bu 'jigs med gzhon nus mthong nas/_des rgyal po'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/_'di su zhig yin/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_shing rta mkhan lags so/_/'dis ci 'thob/_'tsho ba'o/_/des bsams 
[\[60a.3\]]pa/_bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas shing rta mkhan bslab bo snyam nas/_de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/_lha bdag kyang shing rta mkhan bslab bo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu khyod ci 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/_yab rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags 
[\[60a.4\]]so/_bu gal te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan slobs shig_/des bslab par brtsams so/_/'tsho byed kyis kyang sman pa gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa mthong nas/_des gzhan dag la dris pa/_'di su zhig 
[\[60a.5\]]yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_sman pa lags so/_/'di ci zhig byed/_dpyad bgyid do/_/ci thob/_gal te nad pa zhig sos na rngan pa thob bo/_/'on te gum na mi 'tshol mi 'dri'o/_/des bsams pa/_sman dpyad bslab bo snyam nas/_de pha'i gan du song ste smras pa/_lha gnang bar 
[\[60a.6\]]mdzod cig_/sman dpyad bslab lags so/_/bu khyod rgyal po'i sras yin no/_/khyod la sman dpyad kyis ci bya/_lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so/_/bu gal te de lta na slobs shig_/des sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang /_des sman dpyad 
[\[60a.7\]]ni lobs na des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/_des rdo 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod de/_des klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad shes so zhes thos nas/_de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/_lha rdo 'jog tu mchi'o/_/ci zhig gi phyir de na 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_de klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bas de slob tu mchi'o/_/bu khyod 'dis mtsho'am/_lha yang na ni dpyad mi bslab/_yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o/_/bu gal te de lta na song shig_/des rgyal po pad ma'i 
[\[60b.2\]]snying po la spring ba/_bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gis/_'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig_/de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang /_pad ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig bklags te rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du 
[\[60b.3\]]ched du 'ongs kyis 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig_/rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa na/_des nyung zad bstan pa dang 'tsho byed kyis khyad par dang bcas pa lobs so/_/rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe nad pa la ltar 'gro ba'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u zhig khrid de 'gro ba 
[\[60b.4\]]yin pas de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas des nad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang 'di dag ni byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo /_/'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_'di ni mkhan pos nyes te/_gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/_mkhan pos bstan pa 
[\[60b.5\]]ni legs pa ma yin gyis thabs shig bya'o snyam nas de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung nas slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/_mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung ngo /_/kho bos sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma sbyin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig ces zer ro/_/des de bzhin du byas pas sos 
[\[60b.6\]]par gyur to/_/ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun shes kyi bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/_na ba ji lta sos par gyur to/_/sang yang de nyid byin cig_/ci snga ma lags sam/_'on te slad kyis bstan pa lags/_ci bdag gis sngar bstan tam/_'on te phyis bstan/_de 
[\[60b.7\]]dag gis smras pa/_'di dag ni khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to/_/'di ni 'tsho byed la phrin du spring ba yin no/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gis nyes kyis 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin no snyam bsams nas smras pa/_'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byin cig_/rgyun 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]shes kyi bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba skyes pas de gang du 'gro bar der 'tsho byed 'khrid do/_/bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni spro bas ston par mdzad kyi/_bdag cag la ni mi mdzad do/_/des smras pa/_'tsho byed 
[\[61a.2\]]ni shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi khyed kyis ni de lta ma yin no/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/_gal te de lta na ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o/_/des bram ze'i khye'u rnams la khyod kyis ni rdzas che ge 
[\[61a.3\]]mo zhig gi rin dris shig_/khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes thams cad tshong dus su btang ngo /_/'tsho byed kyang khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes bsgo'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin byas so/_/'tsho byed kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin 
[\[61a.4\]]byas nas bsams pa/_gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na bdag gis ji skad brjod par byas/_thams cad du rdzas thams cad kyi rin dri'o snyam mo/_/de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song nas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin smras so/_/rgyun shes kyi bus ma bstan 
[\[61a.5\]]pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri bar brtsams te/_bram ze'i khye'u rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/_des smras pa/_ma 'tshal to/_/gzhan dag la dris pa dang /_smras pa/_ma 'tshal lags so/_/'tsho byed la dris pa dang des rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so/_/rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/_
[\[61a.6\]]bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/_thos lags so/_/ngas 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin te/_cung zad bstan na yang de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nus so zhes smras pa ni don de yin no/_/gzhan yang mngon sum du bya'o zhes de rnams la smras pa/_thang shing can gyi ri la deng 
[\[61a.7\]]la sman ma yin pa dag khyer te shog shig_/de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis gang sman ma yin par shes pa de de dag gis blangs so/_/'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/_des 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang /_rdo ba'i dum bu zhig 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]blangs so/_/ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na phyugs rdzi mo zhig zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las de shin tu mig na ba des mthong nas des dris pa gang du 'gro/_des smras pa/_des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa las 
[\[61b.2\]]des byas pa dang mod la sos par gyur to/_/de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/_zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud 'di khyod snoms shig_/des phrum tshud blangs te/_zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la byin nas de phrum tshud khyer te song ba las/_ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis lam gyi dbus na glang po 
[\[61b.3\]]che'i rjes zhig mthong nas/_de rnams kyis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/_'di ci yin/_glang po che'i rjes so/_/'di ni glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyi/_'di ni bal glang mo'i rjes yin te/_de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba de ring kho nar glang po che'i phrug 
[\[61b.4\]]gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/_de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la/_de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no/_/ji tsam na rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs nas gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to/_/rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/_
[\[61b.5\]]bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/_re zhig 'di ni che ge mo zhig gis nad che ge mo zhig yin la de bzhin du gzhan yang gzhan dag kyang yin no/_/'tsho byed la dris pa khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/_des smras pa/_mkhan po thams cad sman lags te/_sman ma 
[\[61b.6\]]lags pa ni ci yang ma mchis so/_/'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang /_rdo'i dum bu dang /_phrum tshud cig 'tshal te mchis so/_/'di dag ci dgos sdig pas zin pa las 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go/_/phrum tshud kyis ni glan par bgyi'o/_/rdo'i 
[\[61b.7\]]dum bus ni ston ka'i dus na zho'i bum pa 'chag par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun shes kyi bus 'dzum phyung ba dang /_bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bsams pa/_mkhan po ni 'di la khros so snyam nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan po 'di gcig pur bas snyam mam/_bdag cag mchi ba na lam gyi dbus 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas 'di ni bal glang mo'i rjes yin te/_de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring kho nar glang po che phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/_de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring nyid 
[\[62a.2\]]du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/_/rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa/_'tsho byed bden nam/_mkhan po mad do/_/de glang po che'i rjes sam/_bal glang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/_des smras pa/_mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na ci ste ma 'tshal/_
[\[62a.3\]]glang po che'i rjes ni zlum mo/_/bal glang mo'i rjes ni chur ring ngo /_/mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/_g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa las so/_/sbrum par ji ltar shes/_rkang pa gnyis gnon cing mchi ba las so/_/deng kho nar 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/_gcin 
[\[62a.4\]]be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so/_/glang po che'i phrug gu phor 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/_rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchi bas so/_/de la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/_babs nas rkang pa'i bar du gcis pa las so/_/de yang mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji 
[\[62a.5\]]ltar shes/_g.yon phyogs su me tog thu zhing mchi bas so/_/de yang sbrum par ji ltar shes/_de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so/_/deng kho nar btsa' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/_gcin ljan ljin dang bcas te 'byung ba las so/_/de lta lags kyis kyang 
[\[62a.6\]]gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na 'gron pa gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mngag tu gsol/_des bram ze'i khye'u zhig btang ba dang /_'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to/_/rgyun shes kyi bus bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i 
[\[62a.7\]]khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/_'tsho byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can no/_/'tsho byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bslabs so/_/ji tsam na mi zhig klad nad kyis thebs nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/_rgyun shes kyi bu bdag la dpyad 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]mdzod cig_/des smras pa/_kye nang rje re zhig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon gyis shig dang sang bdag gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o/_/'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/_kye nang rje bdag gis cung zad bslabs pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i 
[\[62b.2\]]phyir yin na/_bdag gis klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslabs kyis/_khyod kyis bdag dben par zhog zhig dang /_khyed kyi las ji ltar byed pa blta'o/_/des smras pa/_de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/des de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag go/_/de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas mi de dong du 
[\[62b.3\]]bcug ste thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phye nas de skam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams pa dang 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_mkhan po gzu lums su ma blangs shig_/rigs kyi bu 'di deng nyid 'gum par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_'tsho byed 'ongs sam/_smras pa/_mkhan 
[\[62b.4\]]po bdag mchis so/_/kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/_mkhan po skam pa tsha bar mdzod de rgyab tu reg nas rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang de nas 'or cig_/des de bzhin du byas nas sos par gyur to/_/rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/_'tsho byed kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur 
[\[62b.5\]]gyis khyod khrus byos la shog shig dang klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad sbyin no/_/des khrus byas nas/_'ongs pa dang des de la klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad byin nas smras pa/_'tsho byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyis/_yul 'dir khyod kyis ma bya zhig_/mkhan po de 
[\[62b.6\]]bzhin bgyi'o zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas nas rgyal po pad ma'i snying po'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas/_bdag gis sman dpyad bslabs lags kyis mchi'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal po pad ma'i snying po dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng zhes bya ba dag cig yod de/_des 
[\[62b.7\]]smras pa/_'tsho byed bdag dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyis 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas re zhig de phob la phyis song shig dang /_de lta na bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro/_/des de la khas blangs pa dang de 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las des mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng de rnams phab nas gte'u bzung dpya blangs te slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang /_de shin tu dga' nas de nyid la rjes su yi rangs 
[\[63a.2\]]nas des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la byin no/_/de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas de nyid du dbyar gnas te/_de nas des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas grong khyer bzang byed nas chas pa dang mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer 
[\[63a.3\]]du 'jug pa/_rus pa dang pags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/_lus kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/_de la smras pa/_kye nang rje ci zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/_des smras pa/_bdag gis kyang mi shes na 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'di khyer 
[\[63a.4\]]nas bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur to/_/de shing brtag pa la byang ba yin pas smras pa/_kye nang rje ci shing khur 'di 'tshong ngam/_'tshong ngo /_/rin ji tsam/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya'o/_/des de nyos nas de nas bltas na 'byung po thams cad dad par byed pa zhes bya 
[\[63a.5\]]ba'i nor bu mthong nas de'i mthu ni 'di 'dra ste/_gang gi tshe nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe mar mes khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du nad ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo /_/de rim gyis yul u dum bA rar phyin pa dang /_de na mi bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bos gzhal nas bre mgo 
[\[63a.6\]]la snun pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/_kye nang rje ci'i phyir de ltar byed/_bdag gi klad pa lhag par g.ya'o/_/tshur shog blta'o zhes des de bsnyal nas klad pa bltas te/_de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dad par byed pa'i nor bu de'i klad pa'i steng du gzhag pa dang /_
[\[63a.7\]]ji tsam na srin gyi med cig snang ngo /_/de nas des smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod kyi klad pa la srin gyi med yod do/_/des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_bdag la dpyad mdzod cig_/des khas blangs so/_/'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_mkhan pos ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]'di'i dpyad bya'o snyam nas/_des de la smras pa/_kye nang rje re zhig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon byos shig dang sang dpyad bya'o/_/des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo /_/'tsho byed kyis de'i phyi de nyin 'ongs nas de dong du bcug ste klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad kyis 
[\[63b.2\]]klad pa'i thod pa phye nas skam pa tsha bas srin gyi med kyi rgyab la reg pa byas te des rkang lag 'khums pa dang /_de nas des skam pas blangs te bor bas sos par gyur to/_/des de la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/_/de nas 'tsho byed yul ro hi ta ka
