[\[63b.3\]]zhes bya bar phyin pa dang /_yul ro hi ta ka na khyim bdag cig la skyed mos tshal me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/_de de la lhag par chags pa las shi nas de nyid du mi ma yin rnams su skyes so/_/de'i bu ni khyim gyi dpon por gyur nas des skyed 
[\[63b.4\]]mos tshal der srung ma'i mi bzhag pa dang /_de mi ma yin pa des bsad do/_/gnyis pa bzhag pa dang /_de yang bsad nas khyim bdag gi bu des skyed mos tshal de bor ro/_/ji tsam na mi dmu chus gang ba sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig skyed mos tshal der song nas nub 
[\[63b.5\]]mo 'brang btab ste 'dug nas/_kye ma'o bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nyid du 'tsho byed kyang nub mo 'brang btab ste 'dug go/_/ji tsam na mi ma yin pa des dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang /_dmu chu'i nad de byung nas smras pa/_'di 
[\[63b.6\]]bdag gis sngar bzung na ci'i phyir 'di bsdigs/_khyod la ra spu'i dud pas bdug pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/_des ni khyod dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/des kyang smras pa/_khyod la yang la phug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags te sbyin pa 'ga' yang 
[\[63b.7\]]med pa lta/_des ni khyod dum bu dum bur 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de nang par sngar langs te khyim bdag de'i drung du song nas des smras pa/_khyim bdag skyed mos tshal me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/_khyim 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyim bdag ra spu'i dud pas bdugs shig dang /_mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gis ra spu'i dud pas bdugs pa dang mi ma yin pa de dpag 
[\[64a.2\]]tshad bcu gnyis su bros par gyur to/_/khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang /_des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis dmu chu can la dris pa/_nang rje khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i skyed mos tshal du 'dug_/des 
[\[64a.3\]]de la ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa dang /_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_la phug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags pa 'thung shig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/des 'thungs nas sos par gyur te/_mi des kyang 'tsho byed la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang /_des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la 
[\[64a.4\]]bskur ro/_/de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom brlag tu phyin nas bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig gi drung du ngal so zhing 'dug go/_/ji tsam na gyad kyis gyad gcig brdabs pas de'i nang grol rnams 'khrugs nas de shi'o zhes phyi rol tu phyung ngo /_/shing de la yang bya rgod mo phrug gu 
[\[64a.5\]]dang bcas pa zhig 'dug pa las de la phrug gu de rnams kyis smras pa/_ma sha byin cig_/des smras pa/_bu sha ga la yod/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_ma gyad kyis gyad 'di brdabs te shi nas phyung ba yin no/_/bu 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs nas des 'di sos par byed 
[\[64a.6\]]pa'i gnas de yod do/_/ma 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/_gal te de'i nang grol rnams phye mas reg par byas na'o/_/de thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos so/_/de nas de langs te ro'i drung du song nas dris pa shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_gyad kyis gyad 
[\[64a.7\]]brdabs pas shi ba yin no/_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_zhog zhig dang blta'o/_/de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa'i nor bu klad par bzhag nas brtags na/_ji tsam na nang grol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas des smyug 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]ma'i sbubs su phye ma blugs te khas bus pa dang phye mas nang grol rnams la reg nas sos par gyur to/_/des kyang 'tsho byed la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang /_des kyang de rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/_/bcom brlag na khyim bdag cig yod pa de'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tsho phun 
[\[64b.2\]]sum tshogs pa yin pas de de la lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las shi nas de nyid kyi mo mtshan gyi srin bur skyes par gyur te/_de gang dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa de shi bar byed do/_/de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed do/_/des sman pa 'tsho 
[\[64b.3\]]byed der 'ongs so zhes thos nas de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_'tsho byed bdag la bro nad mchis kyis dpyad mdzod cig_/'tsho byed kyis de mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas chags pas smras pa/_dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa lta na dpyad 
[\[64b.4\]]bya'o/_/des smras pa/_g.yar tsha lags so/_/des smras pa/_khyod kyis dpyad gzhan ni med do/_/bdag las phangs pa gzhan med pas des khas blangs so/_/de nas des sgren mor phyung ste bzo bcos byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgor sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa las/_de nas 
[\[64b.5\]]srin bu de de la chags pa dang des de blangs nas bor te sos par gyur to/_de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhen pas brda zhig byas pa dang des rna ba gnyis bkag ste smras pa/_khyod kho bo'i sring mo dang 'dra ste khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas kho bos de ltar byas par zad do/_/des 
[\[64b.6\]]kyang de la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang /_des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/_/de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis chu bo ya mu na'i 'gram du phyin pa dang /_des de na mi ro zhig yod pa de'i bting ba'i phyogs na rgyus pa'i breng yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las de'i mig 'byed pa 
[\[64b.7\]]dang 'dzums pa mthong nas/_'tsho byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/_ji ltar rgyus pa dang long mo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs ni de kho na ltar 'dug go snyam nas/_de rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin pa dang /_ji tsam na gyad kyis gyad gcig thal mos bsnun pas 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]mig gi 'bras bu 'phags pa dang /_'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/_des rting ba'i rgyus pa'i breng nas drangs pa dang slar tshud par gyur to/_/des de la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang /_des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no/_/yangs pa can na mi zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi 
[\[65a.2\]]med zhugs te/_der de las phrug gu bdun brgya byung bas de rna ba'i nad kyis nyen par gyur nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/_dpyad mdzod cig_/'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_sngar ni bdag gis mkhan pos bstan pas las byas kyis da ni rang gi blos las bya'o snyam nas/_des mi 
[\[65a.3\]]de la bsgo ba/_kye nang rje song la lo ma'i spyil bo byos te ras sngon pos g.yogs la de'i 'og tu rnga zhig zhog ste sa yang dron por gyis shig_/des ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad byas so/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi de sa la bsnyal nas sa de chus chag chag btab nas de nas rnga brdungs pa dang srin 
[\[65a.4\]]gyi med kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab bo snyam nas phyir byung ngo /_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis rna ba'i drung du sha'i dum bu cig bzhag pa dang /_de yang slar zhugs te phrug gu rnams khrid de byung nas phrug gu rnams dang lhan cig sha'i dum bu la chags pa dang /_de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la sha'i 
[\[65a.5\]]dum bu bor ba dang mi de sos par gyur to/_/des kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no/_/de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed ji ltar 'ongs pa thos nas/_des gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/_bu khyod kyi phu 
[\[65a.6\]]bo 'ongs kyis bsur song shig_/de bsur song ba dang 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ji ltar bsur 'ong ba thos nas des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis des bsu ba rang gir byas pa ni nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de slar log ste 
[\[65a.7\]]sgo gzhan zhig nas zhugs so/_/dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te sems g.yeng zhing song ba dang /_ji tsam na bram ze zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste bdag la sman ston cig_/tshig pa zos nas smras pa/_thal bas thob cig_/
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]de drang po zhig pas thal bas btab pa dang sos par gyur to/_/mig nad kyis thebs pa gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ba de bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/_kye nang rje gang du 'gro/_/des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang des smras pa/_khyod la 'tsho byed ci dgos/_des 
[\[65b.2\]]kho bo la gang bstan pa de byos shig_/de yid ches par gyur nas des thal bas btab pa dang long bar gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i spyi bor phol mig byung ngo /_/des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag sman pa rnams khug shig_/blon po 
[\[65b.3\]]rnams kyis sman pa rnams bkug pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i spyi bor phol mig byung gis dpyad byos shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha sman pa chen po 'tsho byed mchis na bdag cag gis bgyi ba ci 'tshal/_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'tsho 
[\[65b.4\]]byed khug shig_/de rnams kyis bkug pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_'tsho byed dpyad byos shig_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_lha dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te lha la bdag nyid kyis khrus bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gyis shig_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis skyu ru ras 
[\[65b.5\]]bskus shing smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nas smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang /_gang gi tshe smin pa de'i tshe na ma tshor bar spu gris reg par byas pa dang rdol to/_/de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste 'tsho bar 'gyur 
[\[65b.6\]]ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang /_rma de sos shing pags pa dang 'dra ba dang skra yang mnyam par gyur to/_/rgyal pos khrus byas ma thag tu smras pa/_'tsho byed dpyad byos shig_/des smras pa/_lha re zhig bshos gsol cig_/rgyal pos 
[\[65b.7\]]zan zos nas 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig lha bgyis lags so/_/de yid ma ches nas lag pas byugs na phyogs gang na rma yod par ma shes so/_/me long blangs te bltas na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo /_/btsun mo la dris na des kyang phyogs gang na rma yod par ma shes so/_/
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur cig_/mi long ba des smras pa/_lha ci sras la byams pas sam/_'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad/_rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[66a.2\]]sman mkhas pas so/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta lags na 'dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis so/_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_kye nang rje bdag gis khyod mthong yang ma mthong na sos par lta ga la byas/_des smras pa/_de ni mad na 'on kyang khyod kyis gang la bstan pa des 
[\[66a.3\]]bdag la bstan to/_/ci zhig bstan/_che ge mo zhig go/_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_de'i khams kyang gzhan la khyod kyi khams kyang gzhan yin gyis/_da 'di dang 'di dag byos shig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/des byas nas sos par gyur pa dang smras pa/_lha 'di 
[\[66a.4\]]sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/_de glang po che la bskyon nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to/_/rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa skran nad kyis thebs nas/_sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang /_des bsams pa/_
[\[66a.5\]]'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o/_/gal te dpyad cig byas na ni de lta na legs/_gal te ma byas na bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/_de 'tsho byed kyi drung du song nas 'tsho byed bdag gi dpyad mdzod cig_/des smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod kyi sman 'di ni rnyed par dka'o/_/des 
[\[66a.6\]]bsams pa/_'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs na 'di la ci byar yod/_dus la bab kyis bdag ni 'chi'o snyam nas de dur khrod du song ngo /_/de na ro sreg pa'i me 'bar bar ne'u le gdug pa zhig dang srog chags go d+hA tsan dan zhes bya ba 'thabs te lhung ba dang de bkres pas 
[\[66a.7\]]nyen pas de gnyis ka zos te/_lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs nas dur khrod dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na gnag lhas yod pa der song ste/_ko dra'i chan dang mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs pas skran rdol te yar slon mar 'khrus nas sngon ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags mo'i mdoms kyi phyogs su phol mig byung ngo /_/des rgyal po la smras pa dang rgyal pos 'tsho byed la bsgo ba/_ma yar mo'i dpyad byos shig_/des khas blangs so/_/de nas zan byas te ma ma la byin nas khyod kyis 'di'i steng du 
[\[66b.2\]]'dug tu chug cig_/des de 'dug tu bcug pa'i zan 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsams pa/_phyogs che ge mo zhig na'o snyam mo/_/de nas smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste/_smin par shes nas zan gyi nang du gtsags bu sbas te ma ma la bsgo ba/_khyod kyis de 'di la 
[\[66b.3\]]'dug tu chug la btsun mo 'dug nas slar slong shig_/des de bzhin byas pa las gtsags bus reg ma thag tu phol mig rdol bar gyur to/_/de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dang bsres pa bska ba'i chus bkrus te 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams btab pas sos par gyur 
[\[66b.4\]]to/_/'tsho byed rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang rgyal pos smras pa/_'tsho byed khyod kyis ma yar mo'i dpyad byas sam/_lha bgyis so/_/khyod kyis sgren mor phud de ma bltas grang /_lham bltas so/_/ji ltar byas/_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang rgyal po mchog tu ngo 
[\[66b.5\]]mtshar skyes nas/_des blon po rnams la smras pa/_'tsho byed la lan gnyis su sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur cig_/mi skran can la 'tsho byed kyis sman rnyed par dka'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa des smras pa/_lha ci sras la sdug pas sam/_'on te sman mkhas pas 
[\[66b.6\]]dbang bskur bar mdzad/_rgyal pos smras pa/_sman mkhas pas so/_/gal te de lta lags na 'dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis so/_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_kye nang rje ngas khyod la dpyad ni ma byas kyi/_'on kyang ngas khyod kyi sman ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so/_/
[\[66b.7\]]des smras pa/_bdag gi sman ji lta bu dag yin/_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_gal te zla ba mar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la mi ser skya zhig shi nas de dur khrod du sreg pa na ne'u le gdug pa dang srog chags go d+hA tsan dan 'thabs nas mer lhung ba dang de gnyis khyod kyis zos la/_
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]dbang phyug chen po'i lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs la/_ko dra'i chan zos shing mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs na de lta na khyod sos par 'gyur te/_bdag gis de las bsams nas sman rnyed par dka'o zhes smras pa yin no/_/des smras pa/_shin 
[\[67a.2\]]tu legs par shes te/_de bzhin du bdag gis zos so/_/de nas dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/_lha 'dis sman pa'i rgyal po'i rngo thog gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur du gsol/_lan gnyis su yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to/_/gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i grogs po lhas 
[\[67a.3\]]byin gyis ma skyes dgra bslus nas pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral ba de'i tshe de la skran gyi nad kyis thebs par gyur to/_/des sman pa rnams la smras pa/_nga la dpyad gyis shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha lha'i gcen sman pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa 'tsho byed 'di na mchis 
[\[67a.4\]]bzhin du bdag cag gis dpyad bgyid rngo ga la thog_/des blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khug shig_/de rnams kyis bkug pa dang /_'tsho byed nga la skran nad byung gis dpyad byos shig_/lha bgyi'o/_/des bsams pa/_rgyu gnyis kyis skran rdol bar 'gyur te/_
[\[67a.5\]]lhag par dga' ba'am/_lhag par khros pas yin na sems can sdig pa byed pa 'di lhag par dga' bar ga la 'gyur gyis/_rnam pa thams cad du khros par bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_lha dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po'i sha gsol blta na 
[\[67a.6\]]dpyad bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos thos nas khros te smras pa/_legs so ngas ni pha srog dang phral/_khyod kyis kyang 'char byed bzang po srog dang phrol/_nga yang rang nyid nad kyis shi nas khyod ni rgyal por 'gyur mod des smras pa/_lha dpyad ni 'di lags te/_gzhan gyis sos par rngo mi 
[\[67a.7\]]thog lags so/_/bdag dang 'dra ba'i phangs pa med pas des khas blangs so/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rgyal po la phul te/_lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po la legs par gzigs pa de ltar mdzad du gsol/_/phyis 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]gzigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas des bstan nas khyim du khrid nas bzhag go/_/de nas 'tsho byed sha'i don du bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba las bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod ni shi ba'i ros stong pa ma yin pas de nas ro'i sha blangs te yo byad kyi khyad par dag dang g.yos byas nas 
[\[67b.2\]]rgyal po'i dro la bab pa'i dus su bstabs so/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras sha khu'i phor ba blangs nas za bar gzas pa dang 'tsho byed kyis phrogs nas klad du bsnun te sdig pa byed pa khyod kyis pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po srog dang phral la bu'i sha yang za bar byed dam/_des 
[\[67b.3\]]rngams nas smras pa/_gal te de lta na ci'i phyir gsad ces mi bzod pa skyes pas de'i skran rdol nas yar slon mar 'khrus te/_kha nas khrag dang bcas par byung ba de mthong nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/_/de nas chu gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang khrus byas te 'phrod pa'i 
[\[67b.4\]]zas byin pas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin gyur to/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po 'di lags te/_bdag srog chags 
[\[67b.5\]]grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar bgyid mi phod na gzhon nu lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_'on kyang thabs 'dis lha 'tsho bar 'gyur bas bdag gis thabs bshams par bgyis par bas so/_/rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_'tsho byed sman pa'i 
[\[67b.6\]]rgyal por dbang skur cig_/blon po rnams kyis glang po che la bskyon nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan gsum du yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/_/de nas 'tsho byed dregs pa skyes nas bdag dang mnyam pa'i sman pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/_bdag 
[\[67b.7\]]ni lus kyi dpyad byed pa rnams kyi mchog yin la/_bcom ldan 'das ni sems kyi dpyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no snyam mo/_/des dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba las de dregs pa'i snyems pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na ci'i phyir bden pa rnams ma mthong bar gyur snyam na/_dregs pa'i snyems pa las gyur par gzigs nas de'i dregs pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i 
[\[68a.2\]]rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po gangs can mthong ngam/_btsun pa ma mthong lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung shig_/des bzung ba dang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed khrid nas 
[\[68a.3\]]ri'i rgyal po gangs can gang na ba der gshegs pa dang de na sman rnam pa sna tshogs sgron ma bzhin 'bar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'tsho byed sman ji tsam 'dod pa long shig_/bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lags so/_/de nas 
[\[68a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje song la 'tsho byed la bsrung ba byos shig_/de dang song nas sman rnam pa sna tshogs dag blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed sman 'di'i ming ci yin/_des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[68a.5\]]'das che ge mo lags te/_cho ga 'dis nad che ge mo zhig zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni che ge mo zhig lags te nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan rnams kyi ni ming yang mi shes so/_/ma shes pa gang yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed 'di 
[\[68a.6\]]ni che ge mo ste cho ga che ge mos nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'di yang che ge mo zhig ces bya'o/_/'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sman dpyad kyang mkhyen pa lta/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/_'tsho 
[\[68a.7\]]byed sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni rgyal po la 'os pa/_rgyal po la mkho ba/_rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug bcu gnyis pa/_bzhi gang dag ce na/_'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad la mkhas pa 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]yin/_nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin/_nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa yin/_spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/_nad la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing nad 'di ni 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu yin no zhes de ltar nad la 
[\[68b.2\]]mkhas pa yin no/_/nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing nad 'di ni rlung gis kun nas bslang ba'am/_mkhris pas kun nas bslang ba'am/_bad kan gyis kun nas bslang ba'am/_bdag las gyur pa'am/_gzhan las 
[\[68b.3\]]gyur pa'am/_'dus pa las gyur pa'o zhes de ltar nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing nad 'di ni mig sman nam/_sku mnye'am/_skyug sman nam/_bkru sman nam/_snar blugs 
[\[68b.4\]]pa'am/_du bas bdug pa'am/_nan rtsi'i las kyis spang bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing nad 'di ni 'phrod pa'i cho ga 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu 
[\[68b.5\]]dag byas te spangs na phyis mi 'byung ngo zhes de ltar nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/_de ltar na sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa rgyal po la 'os pa yin/_rgyal po la mkho ba yin/_rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro ba yin no/_/de bzhin 
[\[68b.6\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa yang sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o/_/'tsho byed bzhi gang dag ce na/_'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 
[\[68b.7\]]'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'tsho byed sman pa zug rngu 'byin pas ni skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so/_/rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug 
[\[69a.2\]]pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so/_/'tsho byed de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen to/_/rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi 
[\[69a.3\]]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen to/_/de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na 'tsho byed gzhon 
[\[69a.4\]]nus bskyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi 
[\[69a.5\]]dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[69a.6\]]to/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi na/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar 
[\[69a.7\]]mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/ri'i rgyal po gangs can kha bas yog ste rtag tu lhags pa che bas bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyi snyun 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]gyis thebs pa dang sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba bzhin bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis me tog ut+pa la sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang bkru sman gyi rdzas dang sbyar 
[\[69b.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phul te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams shangs kyis bsnam du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnams pa las thang sum bcu rtsa gnyis kho na 'khrus par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci ga legs 
[\[69b.3\]]par 'khrus lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed skyon gang dag g.yos la ma 'khrus pa de dag kyang yod/_'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod/_'khrus la g.yos pa yang yod/_ma 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod do/_/'tsho byed kyis 
[\[69b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na bu ram dang a ru ra gsol la khu ba'i rim pa yang mdzod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad nas snyun gdangs par gyur to/_/'tsho byed kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po'am/_blon po gang su'i dpyad byas kyang rung ste/_des 
[\[69b.5\]]de la grong ngam/_grong mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed kyis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la dpyad byas pa las des de la brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che zhig byin pa dang /_des de blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na der song ste phyin 
[\[69b.6\]]pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po'am/_blon po gang su'i 
[\[69b.7\]]dpyad bgyis kyang rung ste/_des bdag la grong ngam/_grong mchog stsol ba lags pas bdag gis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la dpyad bgyis pa dang des bdag la brgya stong ri ba'i ras zhig stsal ba 'di bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'bul zhing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed las brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che bzhes so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te 
[\[70a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che long la nga'i ched du gris dros shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te sa phyogs gsal la 
[\[70a.3\]]yangs par song nas gzhal bar brtsams pa las chos gos mang du ldang bar mthong ngo /_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' chos gos gsum dang bdag nyid kyi bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyi ral chung dpung chad cig byas so/_/bcom 
[\[70a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis dbyar gyi gnas der ras lnga brgya brnyes shing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang du ma zhig rnyed na dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ma shes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i 
[\[70a.5\]]phyir rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos gris dras te kha dog ngan par byas pa bcang bar bya'o/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las babs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa yin no/_/de dus gzhan 
[\[70a.6\]]zhig na glang po che la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu song ba las/_ji tsam na lam gyi dbus nas 'tsho ba pa zhig mthong nas de de la gus pa bskyed de glang po che la babs nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/_/de na ma dad 
[\[70a.7\]]pa gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa/_lha ni dge slong 'ba' zhig la mngon par dad pa ma yin no/_/dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa ni gdon mi za bar lhas dge slong yin snyam ste/_de gus pas glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]snyam nas de rnams yid gnyis su gyur te rgyal po la smras pa/_lha su la phyag bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la'o/_/lha de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma lags te/_'tsho ba pa lags so/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 
[\[70b.2\]]gi don 'di kho na gsol lo snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos 
[\[70b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam dge slong ma mthong na glang po che la babs nas de'i rkang pa la phyag bgyid pa lags pas/_de ring bdag gus pa skyes nas glang po che las babs te dge slong lags snyam nas 'tsho ba 
[\[70b.4\]]pa'i rkang pa la gtugs lags kyis/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_'phags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan ma cung zad cig gdab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de 
[\[70b.5\]]nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo /_/de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'tsho ba pa gang gis bden pa mthong ba 
[\[70b.6\]]las phyag bdag gir byas pa ni nyams te ma rung ngo /_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[70b.7\]]dga' bo khyod kyis lus 'phags kyi ri bo mthong ngam/_btsun pa ma mthong lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung shig_/des bzung ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar mdzad pas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs nas lus 'phags kyi ri bo la bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyi zhing mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam pa rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang sgal gyis 'brel cing mdzes pa dag gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[71a.2\]]bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis zhing mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam la rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs pa dag rnang sgal gyis 'brel bar mdzes pa de dag mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos 
[\[71a.3\]]dag dras te drub par bya'o/_/gnas brtan kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/_khyed kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dros la drubs shig_/dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dras te drub par brtsams pa na snam bu rnams kha phyogs gcig tu bstan pas mi mdzes nas tshe 
[\[71a.4\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal mod kyi/_'di kho nas rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam nas des snam bu rnams kha phyogs gnyis kar bstan na 'on kyang mtha' skor med pas mdzes par ma gyur nas mtha' 
[\[71a.5\]]skor byas so/_/de nas byas shing zin pa dang bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo legs so legs so/_/ngas gang gi phyir bka' stsal pa/_de khyod kyis shes te/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos 
[\[71a.6\]]rnams dras la drub par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dras shing drubs pa re re bcangs nas lhag ma ni ma dras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_'brog gnas su byon nas 'brog gnas na 'brog gnas kyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/
[\[71a.7\]]'brog gnas 'bab chu dang nye bar grang zhing rlung ldang bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thun dang po la mthang gos gsol to/_/thun par pa la bla gos gsol to/_/thun tha ma la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga la snam sbyar gyis g.yogs shig_/
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lag pa gnyis bkrus nas snam sbyar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du g.yogs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos gsum gyis mtshan mo de 'das par mdzad do/_/de nas nam nangs nas dgongs pa 'jig rten na shin tu skyid pa 
[\[71b.2\]]bde ba 'dod pa gang yin pa su yang rung de rnams kyi mchog ni nga yin te/_nga yang chos gos gsum gyis 'tsho bar spyad na nga'i nyan thos rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i 
[\[71b.3\]]chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_dge slong zhig la chos gos gsum pa med nas des phying ba zhig rnyed nas des de dra bar brtsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs nas 
[\[71b.4\]]smras pa/_dge slong 'di ci yin/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_bdag la chos gos gsum pa ma mchis nas btsal ba las/_bdag gis phying ba 'di rnyed de dras nas chos gos bgyi'o/_/
[\[71b.5\]]dge slong 'di ni dra ba'i 'os ma yin no/_/'on kyang lhan thabs kyis glan pa'i 'os yin pas lhan thabs kyis glan nas bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas gshegs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs 
[\[71b.6\]]so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la chos gos med nas phying ba la 'dra bar byed kyis/_dge slong dag de lta bas na mi dra ba ni lnga ste/_phying pa thams cad dang /_snam bu thams 
[\[71b.7\]]cad dang /_be'u ras thams cad dang /_seng ras thams cad dang /_klam thams cad de/_lhan thabs kyis glan nas bcang bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po'i mchog [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin ces bya ba des rigs 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du khye'u bdun btsas te/_de la drug gi 
[\[72a.2\]]ming ni ci dga' bar btags so/_/tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]gang yin pa de'i ming ni sa ga zhes bya bar btags so/_/ji tsam na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi chung ma shi nas/_des bu drug gi khyim phub pa dang de rnams rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig byi dor lhur len cing khyim gyi 'tsho nam mi sems 
[\[72a.3\]]par 'dug go/_/khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin 'gram pa la lag pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de'i grogs bshes bram ze zhig yod pa de 'ongs nas des de sems khong du chud pa mthong nas smras pa/_khyim bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud/_bdag gi 
[\[72a.4\]]bu 'di dag rang rang gi chung ma dang lhan cig byi dor lhur len cing khyim gyi 'tsho nam mi sems par 'dug pas khyim zhig par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_ci'i phyir sa ga la khyim mi dbub gal te na yang lhag par phung krol byed kyang sus shes/_gal te na 'di lhag par legs par 
[\[72a.5\]]byed kyang sus shes/_gal te khyod dad na bu mo zhig btsal lo/_/de bzhin du gyis shig_/de tshol zhing rim gyis yul tsam par phyin to/_/tsam pa na khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i bu mo sa ga ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_dar la bab pa/_
[\[72a.6\]]tshul dang dul ba dang ldan pa/_mkhas pa/_g.yer ba zhig yod pa de bu mo yid 'phrog ma gang 'dod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir chas pa dang bram ze de yang phyogs der phyin te/_des bu mo rnams mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di rnams kho na la re zhig 
[\[72a.7\]]brtag par bya'o snyam nas de brtag pa lhur len cing dal bus 'dab cing de rnams kyi phyi bzhin du song ngo /_/bud med ni phal cher yang ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas de rnams las kha cig ni bang rgyug_/kha cig ni mchong bar byed/_kha cig ni 'gre/_kha cig ni dgod/_kha cig 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]ni lus sgyur bar byed/_kha cig ni glu len par byed/_'di dag dang gzhan yang spyod tshul ngan pa dag byed do/_/dul ba phun sum tshogs pa de ni gom pa dal gyis de dag dang lhan cig 'gro'o/_/ji tsam na skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang bu mo de rnams ni rdzing gi 'gram du gos 
[\[72b.2\]]rnams bzhag nas mod la zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/_/de ni ji tsam ji tsam chur nub pa de tsam de tsam du gos dag rje zhing 'jug la/_ji tsam ji tsam ldang ba de tsam de tsam du gos dag 'bebs shing ldang ste/_de lta bur spyod lam zhi ba yin no/_/de nas khrus kyi brtson pa 
[\[72b.3\]]byas nas gnas gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bu mo de rnams ni thog mar rang zas zos nas de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skye bo la sbyin par rtsom mo/_/de ni 'khor gyi skye bo la sngar byin nas de'i 'og tu rang za bar rtsom mo/_/de nas zos shing 'thungs nas skyed mos tshal gyi bde ba nyams 
[\[72b.4\]]su myong bar byas nas dong ngo /_/ji tsam na lam kar chu rgal bar byed pa na bu mo de rnams ni mchil lham phud nas rgal lo/_/de ni mchil lham dang bcas pas dong ngo /_/yang dong ste/_de dag kun dga'i ra bar zhugs pa dang des ni gdugs thogs te a mra'i tshal nas 
[\[72b.5\]]byung ngo /_/gzhan dag gis gdugs rnams bor ro/_/de nas rlung dang char pa bab nas de'i tshe bu mo rnams lha khang du zhugs nas 'dug go/_/de ni bla gab med pa na'o/_/bram ze de yang de'i rjes bzhin du song ba las des de'i mtshan nyid dang spyod tshul de lta bu mthong nas/_de 
[\[72b.6\]]nas ngo mtshar skyes te bu mo de la dri bar brtsams pa/_bu mo khyod su'i stobs kyi bshes gnyen gyi bu mo'o/_/bu mo khyod la cung zad cig dris ma khro zhig_/des 'dzum pa sngon du btang nas smras pa/_khu gu 'di la khror ci mchis dris shig_/bu mo 'di dag thams 
[\[72b.7\]]cad ni rgyug pa dang /_mchong ba dang /_'gre ba dang /_lus sgyur bar byed pa dang /_glu len par byed cing 'di dag dang gzhan yang spyod tshul ngan pa byed cing 'gro na/_khyod ni tshul dang dul ba phun sum tshogs pas dal bus rgyu zhing de rnams dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal du 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]'gro bar byed do/_/des smras pa bu mo thams cad ni pha dang mas btsong ba'i rdzas yin na/_gal te bdag gis mchongs sam 'gres nas rkang pa'am lag pa chag par gyur na/_bdag la su zhig slong bar 'gyur te/_nges par bdag ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du pha 
[\[73a.2\]]dang ma kho na'i gson mar 'gyur ro/_/bu mo legs te/_de ni khong du chud do/_/gzhan yang 'di dri ste/_bu mo 'di dag ni gos rnams mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas gos gcig kyang med par mod la zhugs nas rtse bar rtsom la/_khyod ni ji tsam ji tsam du chur nub pa de tsam de 
[\[73a.3\]]de tsam de tsam du gos rdze bar byed do/_/khu gu bud med ni ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang ldan par bya dgos pas gal te bdag gi gos phud pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong na/_mi rigs par 'gyur ro/_/bu mo khyod la de na su zhig lta/_khu gu re zhig khyod kho nas kyang bdag mthong 
[\[73a.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bu mo legs te/_de yang khong du chud do/_/gzhan yang 'di dri ste/_bu mo 'di dag ni rang sngar zos nas de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skye bo la zan sbyin par byed la/_khyod ni 'khor gyi skye bo la sngar zan byin nas de'i 'og tu rang za bar byed do/_/khu gu bdag cag ni 
[\[73a.5\]]bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho bas bdag cag la rtag tu dus ston mchis la/_'di dag ni tshegs 'byung ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags/_brgya lam na lan 'ga' rgya chen por 'thob pa'i phyir ro/_/bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do/_/gzhan yang 'di dri ste/_'jig 
[\[73a.6\]]rten thams cad ni skam la mchil lham gyon la khyod ni chu la gyon pa de ci/_khu gu 'jig rten blun mod/_chu kho na la mchil lham bgo 'tshal te/_ci'i slad du zhe na/_thang la ni sdong dum dang /_tsher ma dang /_rdo ba dang /_zug rdo dang /_nya phyis kyi dum bu dang /_srin kog gi 
[\[73a.7\]]dum bu rnams mngon la/_chu la ni de dag mi mngon pas des na chu kho na la mchil lham bgo bar bgyi'i thang la ni ma lags so/_/bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do/_/gzhan yang 'di dri ste/_bu mo de dag ni nyi ma la gdugs thogs na/_khyod ni kun dga'i ra ba'i shing gi 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]grib ma la thogs par byed na/_'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod/_khu gu 'jig rten blun mod kun dga' ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang 'tshal te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_kun dga' ra ba ni rtag tu spre'u dang bya rnams kyis gang bas bya rnams ni gcin rtug 'thor zhing rus pa'i 
[\[73b.2\]]dum bu dag 'thor ro/_/spre'u rnams kyang bshang ba dang gci ba byed cing 'bras bu'i za 'phro dag 'thor bar byed la/_rang bzhin gyis rgod bag can yin pas phan tshun yal ga gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa na shing dum dag lhung bar byed do/_/bla gab ma mchis pa la ni de dag 
[\[73b.3\]]ma mchis so/_/brgya la mchis na yang de res 'ga' zhig 'bab par bas te/_des na kun dga' ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang bar bgyi'i/_bla gab ma mchis par ni ma lags so/_/bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do/_/gzhan yang 'di dri ste bu mo 'di dag ni rlung 
[\[73b.4\]]dang char pa byung na lha khang du 'jug na khyod ni bla gab med par 'dug go/_/khu gu bla gab ma mchis pa kho nar gnas par bgyi'i/_lha khang du 'jug par ni ma lags so/_/bu mo 'di la rigs pa ci yod/_khu gu lha khang stong pa 'di dag ni rtag tu dwa dang /_nal phrug dang /_
[\[73b.5\]]g.yon can rnams kyis mi stong lags te/_gal te bdag zhugs pa'i yan lag dang nying lag dag la 'ga' zhig gis reg na/_de lta na bdag gi pha ma dag la mi snyan par mi 'gyur ram/_nyis na bla gab med par srog dang phral ba ni bla'i/_lha khang stong par ni mi 'jug 
[\[73b.6\]]go/_/de nas bram ze de de'i spyod tshul gyis rangs shing yid bde ba skyes nas khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen gyi khyim du zhugs te bu mo thob par 'dod pa'i spro ba dang bcas pas bde legs su gyur cig_/bde legs su gyur cig ces smras pa dang /_khyim 'khor gyi skye 
[\[73b.7\]]bos smras pa/_bram ze re zhig bslang ba'i dus ni ma yin na/_ci zhig slong /_bu mo slong ngo /_/su zhig gi ched du/_mnyan yod na blon po'i mchog [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin ces bya ba de'i bu sa ga zhes bya ba'i 'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_de dang bdag cag ni rigs mnyam 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]pa yin na/_'on kyang yul ha cang yang thag ring ches so/_/des smras pa/_ring po kho na la bu mo sbyin par bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_nye na re zhig gal te bde bar gyur pa thos na dga' ba skyed par zad/_nye na sdug bsngal bar gyur na sbyin pa dang mchod pa dang /_
[\[74a.2\]]bkur sti bya bas dub par 'gyur zhing nor 'ged par yang 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_gal te de lta na sbyin no/_/de nas bram ze de bde legs su gyur cig ces smras nas song ste rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa bsal te blon po'i mchog [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin 
[\[74a.3\]]gyi drung du song nas/_de nas bu mo'i za ba dang /_gnas pa'i spyod tshul dang /_gzugs bzang zhing dar la bab pa dang /_mdzes pa dang mkhas pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du bsnyad nas smras pa/_bdag gi nyon mongs pa chen pos yul dang tshong rdal sna tshogs su brgyus pas sdug bsngal 
[\[74a.4\]]gyis de rnyed kyis da ni song la long shig_/de nas blon po'i mchog [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis nyi ma dang tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam dang rgyu skar dag bstun nas tsam par 'ongs te/_dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos sa ga'i chung ma blangs so/_/de mi yul du 'gro ba'i tshe mas bslabs pa/_
[\[74a.5\]]bu mo khyod kyis nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la rtag tu phyag bya/_me la bsnyen bkur bya/_me long dri ma phyi bar bya/_gos dkar po bgo bar bya/_blang bar bya'i sbyin par mi bya/_tshig bsrung bar bya/_langs nas su la yang stan bstab par mi bya/_zhim po bza' bar bya/_bde bar 
[\[74a.6\]]nyal bar bya/_them skas gzugs par bya'o/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis thos nas des bsams pa/_bu mo 'di lta ba log par 'dzin du bcug ste/_bdag gis 'di lta ba log pa dang phral la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dzin du gzhug go snyam du bsams nas de blangs te chas 
[\[74a.7\]]so/_/de nas de'i ma sdug pas snying dkrugs shing mig mchi mas gang bas mgul nas 'khyud nas ngu bzhin gyi nga ros smras pa/_bu mo khyod mthong ba'i tha ma ni 'di yin no/_/des de la shes par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/_yum re zhig khyod 'dir 'khrungs sam/_'on te nye du'i 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]khyim du bu mo nye du'i khyim du'o/_/khyod kyis khang pa de yin nam/_'on te 'di yin 'di yin no/_/bdag kyang 'dir skyes la der bdag gnas par bsal 'du ba mchis na gdon mi za bar mthar 'bral bar 'gyur na/_bshums su ci mchis cang ma gsung shig_/de nas ri 
[\[74b.2\]]dgas 'dzin ni thang la song ngo /_/sa ga ma ni khyim thab dang /_rang gi khyim nas thob pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig tu grur dong ba las de na rta rgod ma rte'u smad byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhig grur gzhug par byas pa dang /_rte'u thang la mi dga'o snyam nas bsgrims kyang 'jug tu ma 
[\[74b.3\]]btub pa dang ku co byung bas sa ga mas thos nas des smras pa/_ci'i phyir ku co 'di byung de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /_sa ga mas smras pa rte'u sngar chug cig dang rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis de bzhin byas pa dang zhugs so/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[74b.4\]]'dzin gyis de rnams la dris pa/_ci'i phyir khyed cag ring zhig lon nas 'ongs/_rta rgod ma grur mchong du ma btub lags so/_/'o na ji ltar mchongs/_tsam pa mos thabs bshams pa zhig bstan te/_rte'u sngar bcug pas so/_/tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin no/_/ji tsam na 
[\[74b.5\]]'gron pa rnams lam kar nub mo 'brang btab ste gnas pa las [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi mal bya skyibs shig tu bcas pa sa ga mas mthong nas dris pa/_'di su'i mal/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi'o/_/spos shig_/ci'i phyir gal te gnyid kyis log pa la bya skyibs steng du rdib na gdon mi 
[\[74b.6\]]za bar non pas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_bdag la gang zhig blangs na gyos po khyim du ma phyin par lam kar shi ba 'di lta bu'i bu mo bag mar blangs zhes ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du mi snyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mal de yang spos pa las gad pa zhig pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 
[\[74b.7\]]khyim bdag non to zhes kun brgyugs pa dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag 'di na 'dug gis ma skrag par mal rtogs shig_/mal spos so/_/sus/_sa ga mas so/_/tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin no/_/yang skyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig tu nub mo 'brang 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]btab ste 'khod pa las [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi mal lha khang stong pa zhig tu bcas pa dang sa ga mas mthong nas dris pa/_'di su'i mal/_dpon po'i'o/_/spos shig_/ci'i phyir gal te lha khang rdib ste/_des non na shi bar 'gyur te/_bdag la zhes bya ba nas mi snyan 
[\[75a.2\]]pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/mal de yang spos pa las lha khang zhig pa dang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos brgyugs pa dang zhes bya ba nas tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/ji tsam na rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas lam 
[\[75a.3\]]gyis dub pa bsal te mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bo spras nas sa ga ma rang gi rigs dang 'tsham pa'i khyim gyi las dag byed do/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi mna' ma drug gis re mo re mos khyim mi'i zan sbyor ba las sa ga ma la yang de bzhin du bsgo ste/_khyod kyis res 
[\[75a.4\]]kyang zhag bdun pa la sbyor cig_/de'i res la bab tu nye ba dang /_gyos po dang /_sgyug mo dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi dri'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag ril bur byas nas nyi ma re re zhing skems so/_/nyi ma re re zhing nod pa'i phye gang yin pa de las kyang bre kha phri ste bzhag la/_
[\[75a.5\]]lhag ma mar dang bsres pas de dang tshad mnyam par gyur to/_/sang lta bu res bab pa na chang btung la rag par bya ba dang /_khyim thab dang rang gi me tog gi phreng ba rnying pa gang yin pa de dag bsil bar bzhag nas/_ji tsam na nam nangs pa dang /_las byed pa rnams la skyur rtsi 
[\[75a.6\]]dang /_dri dang /_me tog dang /_zas dang /_chang dag byin no/_/de rnams shin tu mgu nas bdag cag ring zhig lon nas khyim bdag gi chung ma rnying pas bzhin bltas so zhes de rnams kyis de'i nyin par las nyis 'gyur du byas so/_/ji tsam na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis phyi dro'i 
[\[75a.7\]]dus su las kyi mtha' la bltas pa na las mang du zin pa mthong nas des dris pa/_ci khyed cag gis gla mi gzhan dag cig bkug gam/_sus kyang ma bkug go/_/gang gis na las nyis 'gyur du byas pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_dpon po 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]zas ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i las bgyid do/_/de ji lta bu yin/_de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rgya cher smras pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu rnams kyis rang rang gi chung ma la smras pa las de rnams kyis smras pa/_sa ga mas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin du gal te bdag cag 
[\[75b.2\]]gis kyang khyim nas brkus la gla mi rnams dga' bar bgyis pa dang /_bdag la yang jo bo dang khyed gla mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis sa ga ma la dris pa/_bu mo khyod kyis kha zas rnams ji ltar bshams/_des rgyas par smras pa dang ri 
[\[75b.3\]]dgas 'dzin mgu nas des de kho na khyim gyi bya ba rnams byed du bcug ste/_nang mi thams cad la smras pa/_khyed cag las gang zhig sa ga mas byin pas mgu ba ni des gnas par bgyis la de dang rjes su mthun par yang gyis shig_/ji tsam na de khyim gyi dpon mor gyur nas 
[\[75b.4\]]spyod tshul dang /_gnas pa dang /_des pas nang mi thams cad dga' bar gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na sa ga ma'i khyim steng nas ngang pa rnams kyis byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu dag khyer nas dong ba las rgyal po'i khab na 'dug pa'i 
[\[75b.5\]]ngang pa des de dag mthong nas skad phyung ba dang de rnams kyis kyang skye gnas mthun pa'i gcugs pas mnags ma thub ste skad phyung ba dang rgyal po'i khab kyi khang thog tu 'bras kyi snye ma rnams lhung bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la re re byin pa dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin 
[\[75b.6\]]gyis rang gi skal ba sa ga ma la byin no/_/des za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste zhing pa rnams la bsgo ba dang /_de rnams kyang shin tu mgu ste/_de rnams kyis zhing chung ngu zhig legs par bstan nas dus shes par byas te btab pa las lhas dus bzhin du char phab pas sa bon 
[\[75b.7\]]dang mthun par phun sum tshogs par skyes so/_/phyi de lo la ni rab tu mang por skyes par gyur to/_/yang phyi de lo la ni de bas kyang mang por gyur te/_de bzhin du ji tsam na bang ba thams cad ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras sA lus gang bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na ko 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nad kyis thebs nas des sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gal te ngang pas 'tshal te mchis pa'i sA lu brnyes na de la/_'jams bsgral nas gsol cig dang /_sos par 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[76a.2\]]rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed la ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sA lu'i snye ma byin pa de dag khyed kyis cir byas/_de nas kha cig gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis ni lha khang du phul lo/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis me'i 
[\[76a.3\]]nang du stsal to/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_bdag gis sgo khang du btags so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis smras pa/_lha bdag gis sa ga ma la stsal na re zhig des cir bgyis rma bar 'tshal lo/_/des sa ga ma la dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_jo bo ci ngang pas 'tshal te mchis 
[\[76a.4\]]pa'i sA lu 'tshal ba zhig mchis sam/_rgyal po snyun gyis thebs pa la sman pa rnams kyis ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sA lu bstan to/_/de nas sa ga mas gser snod kyi nang du ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras kyis bkang nas rgyal po la bskur ba las rgyal pos zos nas sos 
[\[76a.5\]]par gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po la ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis rta rgod ma smad gnyis shig phul ba las de la ma ni gang yin/_rte'u ni gang yin pa 'gas kyang ma shes nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag legs par rtogs la nga la gsol cig_/
[\[76a.6\]]blon po rnams kyis nyin thog thag tu dpyad na dub ste gtan la ma phebs so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin phyi dro khyim du song ba dang sa ga mas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_jo bo ji ste de ring ring zhig lon nas gshegs/_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyas par smras pa dang sa ga 
[\[76a.7\]]mas smras pa/_jo bo 'di la dpyad du ci zhig mchis/_de gnyis chas mnyam par stsal dang bu gang lags pa de ni myur du 'tshal nas ma'i skal ba la 'tshal lo/_/ma gang lags pa de ni mi 'tshal bar mgo ste ga ge mchis te/_rtags ni de lags so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis blon po 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]rnams la smras nas de rnams kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin brtags nas de nas nam nangs pa dang rgyal po la smras pa/_lha 'di ni ma lags so/_/'di ni bu lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyed cag gis ji ltar shes/_lha 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu lags so/_/khar rtsang ci 
[\[76b.2\]]ste ma shes/_lha bdag cag gis 'tshal bar rngo ga la thog_/sa ga mas de skad bstan lags mod/_rgyal pos smras pa/_tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin no/_/mi zhig chu 'gram du lham bzhag nas khrus byed pa dang /_mi gzhan zhig 'ongs nas des lham des mgo la dkris nas de nyid 
[\[76b.3\]]na khrus bya bar brtsams so/_/mi de khrus byas nas langs nas lham de ma mthong ngo /_/mi des smras pa/_kye nang rje ci tshol lham mo/_/khyod kyi lham ga la yod/_gal te khyod la lham yod par gyur na/_ji ltar ngas mgo la dkris nas zhugs pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang lham 
[\[76b.4\]]gyis mgo la dkris nas zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_'o ni nyid kho bo'i lham yin no/_/de gnyis khyod kyi nga'i zhes rtsod par gyur nas/_de gnyis rgyal po'i drung du song ngo /_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag legs par rtogs la gang gi 
[\[76b.5\]]yin pa de la byin cig_/de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams nas gcig la dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag gi lags so/_/cig shos la yang dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag gi lags so/_/zhes khyod kyi dang nga'i zhes pa la nyi ma 'das te blon po rnams dub 
[\[76b.6\]]nas dgongs ka gtan la ma phebs pa bzhin du khyim du dong ngo /_/sa ga mas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi zhes bya ba nas dris te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /_sa ga mas smras pa/_jo bo 'di la dpyad du ci zhig mchis/_de gnyis la 
[\[76b.7\]]gcig kyang phyed khyer cig_/cig shos kyang phyed khyer cig ces gsung shig dang /_gang gi lags pa de'i mchid nas ni ci'i phyir bdag gi lham dral zhes mchi'o/_/gang ma lags pa de'i glo ba ni re zhig bdag gis phyed thob na yang der zad 'dir bdag la ci zhig 'ged 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]snyam ste de ltar brtag par bgyi'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin song nas blon po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/_tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/rgyal po la tshong pa gru pas tsan+dan gyi sdong dum zhig skyes 
[\[77a.2\]]su phul ba dang /_de'i mgo gang yin mjug gang yin pa ma shes nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba ji lta bu yin rtogs shig_/de rnams kyis nyin thog thag dpyad na ma shes nas dgongs ka khyim du dong ngo /_/sa ga mas zhes bya ba nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis dris pa zhes bya 
[\[77a.3\]]ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgya cher smras pa dang /_sa ga mas smras pa/_jo bo 'di la dpyad du ci mchis chab tu 'or cig dang rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni 'bying bar 'gyur ro/_/thor to gang lags pa ni steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la brtag pa ni 
[\[77a.4\]]de lags so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis blon po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/_tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/ri 'or na khyim bdag cig yod pa des de dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa las de la bu pho 
[\[77a.5\]]yang med/_bu mo yang med/_de bu mngon par 'dod pas chun ma zhig blangs pa dang /_de la chung ma chen mo shos rang bzhin gyis phrag dog can zhig pas de'i mngal ma rung bar bya ba'i sbyor ba zhig byas pa las de'i mngal shin tu rnam par dag pas sems can dang ldan par 
[\[77a.6\]]gyur nas ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang /_khye'u zhig btsas so/_/des bsams pa/_sha khon rnams la ni 'di lta ste/_chen chun 'di tha chad yin pas gdon mi za bar ma yar mos thabs gang yang rung ba zhig gis gsod par 'gyur na/_bdag gi khyim thab 
[\[77a.7\]]bam/_bdag gis ci byar yod/_bdag gis nam du ni srung ye de kho na la sbyin par bya'o snyam nas de dang khyim thab lhan cig gros byas te rung nas chen ma shos la smras pa/_che zhe bdag gi bu 'di khyod la byin gyis gsos shig_/des bsams pa khyim ni gang la bu yod 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]pa de kho na'i yin par zad pas khyim gyi bdag mor gyur pas gso'o snyam nas/_des de gsos pa las de'i pha yang shi bar gyur to/_/de gnyis khyim gyi phyir rtsod par gyur nas gcig gis smras pa/_'di kho mo'i bu yin no/_/cig shos kyis smras pa/_'di ni kho mo'i bu 
[\[77b.2\]]yin no/_/rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /_rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag deng la gang yin pa rtogs shig_/de rnams kyis dpyad pa las nyi ma 'das kyang gtan la ma phebs nas/_dgongs ka khyim du dong ba dang /_sa ga mas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin la dris te zhes 
[\[77b.3\]]bya ba nas 'di la dpyad du ci mchis zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de gnyis la kho bo cag gis gang gi bu yin pa mi shes kyis/_khyed cag gnyis las gang stobs che ba de khyer la song shig ces gsung shig dang /_lag pa gnyis nas bzung nas 'dren par bgyid de/_
[\[77b.4\]]de sdug bsngal gyis ngu bar gyur pa dang de'i ma gang lags pa de ni brtse ba mchis pas 'di gson na nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur grang snyam nas gtong bar bgyid do/_/cig shos ni brtse ba ma mchis pas gang gi tshe mi gtong ba de'i tshe de la lcag gis gzhus shig dang ji ltar 
[\[77b.5\]]gyur pa smra bar 'gyur te/_'di la brtag pa ni 'di lags so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/_tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dus gzhan zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin nad kyis thebs 
[\[77b.6\]]nas de la sman pas nyi ma gcig sman byin pa las theg gi bar gyur to/_/phyi de nyin par sman ma yin pa byin pas nad la bab par gyur to/_/sa ga mas bsams pa/_jo bo ji'i slad du nyin gcig ni theg gi bar gyur la/_nyin gcig ni na bar gyur snyam nas des sman gang dag gis 
[\[77b.7\]]theg gi bar gyur pa'i rtags de dag bzung nas/_de nas des sman pa rnams sgo nas slar bzlog nas rang nyid kyis dpyad pa las sos par gyur to/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis bsams pa/_gang gis na bdag nyin gcig ni theg gi nyin gcig ni na ba las gang gi tshe sman pa mi 'ong ba de'i 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]theg gi ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam ste/_des sa ga ma la dris pa zhes bya ba nas tsam pa mo ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che'i bla dpal skyed ces bya ba de la dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gshe bar gyur to/_/
[\[78a.2\]]zhes sa ga mas thos nas des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin la smras pa/_jo bo blon po thams cad la mthar gyis bka' bab par 'gyur gyis/_dpal skyed la lha bzod pa mdzad du stsal ba'i rigs so/_/des smras pa/_bu mo bzod pa byed du gzhug go/_/de nas des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha dpal 
[\[78a.3\]]skyed ni lha la glo ba nye ba lags na de la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bzod par bya'o/_/lha gal te bzod par mdzad na de'i dbang thang de dag stsal du gsol/_/de bzhin du sbyin no/_/dpal skyed kyis ji ltar sa ga mas bdag la rgyal po bzod pa byed du bcug 
[\[78a.4\]]pa shes nas de de la lan glan pa'i bsam pas gnas so/_/dus gzhan zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin pho mtshan la nad byung ste/_de'i rim gro sa ga ma byed pa las de 'dzem par gyur to/_/des smras pa/_jo bo 'di la 'dzem du ci mchis/_ci pha'i rim gro bu mo mi bgyid dam/_'on kyang de 
[\[78a.5\]]'dzem par gyur to/_/des bsams pa 'di bdag gis rim gro byar ni mi btub pas de'i chung ma zhig blang ngo snyam pa nas de dpal skyed kyi khyim du song ba dang /_des 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig smras nas stan bstabs te 'dug go/_/dpal skyed la bu mo zhig yod pa de des de 
[\[78a.6\]]la smras pa/_bu mo sa ga ma'i rkang pa gnyis la zung shig_/sa ga mas smras pa/_bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa la gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang lags pa de ni mchis so zhes smras nas yang smras pa/_bkra shis par gyur cig_/bkra shis par gyur cig_/dpal skyed kyis 
[\[78a.7\]]smras pa/_ci zhig slong /_bu mo slong ngo /_/su zhig gi ched du/_des smras pa/_gyos po'i ched du'o/_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/dpal skyed kyi chung mas smras pa/_dgog cig na de la ci ste sbyin/_sa ga mas smras pa/_mi rnams kyi lang tsho ni nor yin pas dpyad du ci yod 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]byin cig_/dpal skyed kyis smras pa/_bzang mo bdag cag la sa ga mas phan btags kyis byin cig_/gal te de lta na sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs nas/_de de'i rim gro byed par gyur te sa ga ma ni de ltar mi byed do/_/
[\[78b.2\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis smras pa/_bu mo bdag la tshig byin cig_/des smras pa/_jo bo cung zad nyams par ma gyur tam/_bu mo khyod la mas bslabs pa gang yin pa de cung zad blangs te mi gnas sam/_jo bo thams cad blangs lags te/_nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la phyag byos shig 
[\[78b.3\]]ces mchi ba gang lags pa ni mna' ma'i nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu ni gyos sgyug lags pas re zhig bdag gis phyag bgyis lags so/_/me la bkur sti bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni bud med kyi khyim thab ni me lta bu lags te/_khyim thab la ha cang bsnyen par mi bgyi/_ha cang bsring 
[\[78b.4\]]bar yang mi bgyi ste bdag ni khyim thab la me lta bur bsnyen bkur bgyid do/_/me long phyi bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni sdum pa ni me long lta bu lags pas rtag tu zhal zhal bgyi zhing phyag dar bgyi ba lags te/_sdum pa de la bdag gdugs gcig bzhin du byi dor 
[\[78b.5\]]bgyid lags so/_/gos dkar po bgo bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni khyim gyi las bgyid pa na gos gzhan dag kho nas so/_/lha mchod pa dang khyim thab kyi drung du mchi ba na ni gos dkar po rnams bgo bar bgyi ba ste/_de yang bdag bgyid lags so/_/blang bar 
[\[78b.6\]]bya'i sbyin par mi bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa la ci zhig blang bar bgyi zhe na/_'jig rten las tshig ngan pa smras pa'o/_/tshig ngan pa ni su la yang smra bar mi bgyi ba ste/_de yang bdag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas lags so/_/tshig bsrung bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang 
[\[78b.7\]]lags pa ni gsang ba'i tshig mi 'phel bar bgyi pa ste/_bdag la ngag bsdam pa mchis lags so/_/langs nas su la yang stan bstab par mi bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni de 'di skad ces khyod rigs kyi mna' ma yin pas khyod gnas dben pa na 'dug par bya'o zhes 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mchi ba lags te/_bdag dben pa kho na na mchis lags so/_/zhim po bza' bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni shin tu bkres nas bza' bar bgyi ba ste/_bdag ni rtag tu khyim gyi skye bo zas 'tshal ba'i 'og tu 'tshal lo/_/bde bar nyal bar bya zhes mchi ba 
[\[79a.2\]]gang lags pa ni mtshan mo khyim gyi dgos pa thams cad bgyis nas snod brtul te ci nas kyang ldang mi dgos par khyod nyal bar bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags te/_'di ni legs par bzhag pa'o/_/'di ni nyes par bzhag pa'o zhes bdag de kho na bzhin du bgyid do/_/them skas bca' 
[\[79a.3\]]bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni 'di skad ces khyod sngon dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa des lha'i 'gro ba thob nas 'dir mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa 'di ni las kyis yin pas 'dir yang khyod kyis sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas te sdig pa mi bya'o/_/'di ni 
[\[79a.4\]]dbyig gi ya gad mtho ris kyi them skas lta bu yin no zhes bgyi ba lags te de yang bdag rngo ci thog gis bgyid do/_/sa ga ma legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi ma mkhas pa yin na/_gang gi phyir mas ldem por smras pa rtogs pas na/_khyod ni lhag par yang mkhas pa 
[\[79a.5\]]yin no//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug bcu gsum pa/_de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na sa ga ma la bdag gis ma zhes bod do snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_
[\[79a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mna' ma la ma zhes bod du rung lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te chos lnga dang ldan na ste/_lnga gang zhe na nad g.yog 
[\[79a.7\]]byed pa dang /_thab rir bab pa'i chung ma len pa dang /_srog gi skyabs byed pa dang /_nor srung ba dang /_shes rab kyi bgo bsha' byed pa'o//_//bar sdom la/_nad g.yog dang ni chung ma dang /_/srog dang nor ni sbyin pa dang /_/shes rab sgrub par byed pa dang /_/lnga po 'di 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]dag mar bshad do/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag ni sa ga ma la ma zhes bod par 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa ga mas nga la yang rim 
[\[79b.2\]]gro byas pas/_phyi mo la dris la ngas kyang de la sring mo zhes bod do/_/des phyi mo la dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod kyis bos kyang rung ma bos kyang rung /_de ni khyod kyi sring mo kho na yin no/_/ring du 'phur tshangs sbyin mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo dang 'dus pa las de las bu pho zhig 
[\[79b.3\]]btsas te de'i ming stobs kyi bshes gnyen du btags pa las de rgyal po mes kyis nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir spyugs pa las tsam par song nas gnas pa de'i bu mo ni 'di yin pas des na khyod kyi sring mor 'ong ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos glang po che la zhon nas dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_sa ga 
[\[79b.4\]]ma 'di [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ni ma rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ni sring mo yin no/_/des sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang /_de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan 
[\[79b.5\]]yod na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/_/dus gzhan zhig na sa ga ma las sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ngo /_/zhes [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis thos nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud 
[\[79b.6\]]cing 'dug ste/_yul gyi bzang mo la phung ba ci 'dra ba dag byung bar gyur snyam nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis dor bar brtsams pa dang /_sa ga mas smras pa/_jo bo ma dor bar bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[79b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_ma dor bar gzeb sum bcu rtsa gnyis gyis la shing bal gyis khong ste/_gzeb bu rnams kyi nang du sgo nga re re zhog la sa ga mas dus gsum du lag pas byugs shig ces sgo zhig dang /_de nas nyi ma bdun pa lags nas gzhon nu sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'byung bar 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/des de bzhin du byas pa las nyi ma bdun pa lags pa dang /_gzhon nu sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung nas bsrings bskyed de nar son pa dang rtsal po che thub rlag pa sha stag tu gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na de rnams shing rtar zhugs te phyir byung nas slar 'jug 
[\[80a.2\]]pa dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu shing rtar zhugs nas phyir 'byung ba dang ji tsam na phan tshun shing rta'i mda' gnyis thug pa dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bus smras pa/_zur cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod nyid zur cig_/mdun na 'don gyi bus mjal to zhes byas nas tshig 
[\[80a.3\]]rtsub po smra bar brtsams pa dang /_de nas sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis shing rta'i mda' nas bzung ste 'phangs pas phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng du brdab bsnun to/_/de de nas gos kyis mgo bsgyur te pha'i drung du song nas mig mchi mas gang bas smras pa/_yab sa ga ma'i bu rnams 
[\[80a.4\]]kyis bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su bgyis so/_/bu ci'i phyir/_des rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na thabs shig bsham par byas la de rnams mthar gyis kha gdag gis mya ngan ma byed cig_/de de rnams la klan ka tshol ba lhur len cing gnas 
[\[80a.5\]]so/_/dus gzhan zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ri 'or ba log par gyur nas/_rgyal pos de la dmag kha chen cig bkye ba las rdugs rab tu rdugs nas slar log go/_/de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du dmag kha chen po bkye ba las rdugs rab tu rdugs te slar log 
[\[80a.6\]]nas rgyal po rang nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang byung ba dang sa ga ma'i bu nang du 'jug pa de rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa/_lha gang du gshegs ri 'or ba rnams 'bebs su'o/_/lha bzhugs shig bdag cag mchi'o/_/de bzhin du gyis shig_/des de rnams 
[\[80a.7\]]la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gtad nas de rnams dong ste ri 'or ba rnams phab nas gte'u bzung dpya blangs te/_slar 'ongs pa dang mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/_lha 'di dag ni 'phags par rtsal po che dag cig ste/_re zhig lha'i dka' bas bsgrub pa gang lags pa 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]de ni 'di dag gis 'bring gis bsgrubs kyis lhas 'di la dgongs shig_/rgyal po rnams ni khu ma phrig can yin pas snying la bzhag ste slar mdun na 'don la dris pa de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_des smras pa/_lha de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_gal te de dag 'tshal bar 
[\[80b.2\]]gyur na/_lha rgyal srid nas phyung nas rang nyid rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po je mi dga' nas bsams pa/_de ltar 'gyur srid kyis ji ltar gsad par bya zhe na/_thabs bsham pa sems shing gsang 'phel du dogs pas su la yang mi 'dri bar de bdag nyid kyis 
[\[80b.3\]]dpyad pa las blo skyes pa 'di kho nar mgron du bos la bstungs te gtang ngo snyam nas des sa ga ma la spring ba/_che zhe'i bu rnams sang 'dir zan zo shig_/des bsams pa/_sang ni bu rnams zhang po'i der za bar 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 
[\[80b.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol lo snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis ri 
[\[80b.5\]]dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 
[\[80b.6\]]thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[80b.7\]]'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la gnang ngo zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/rgyal po'i pho nya de rnams kyis drung du 'ongs nas khye'u shog shig ces bos so/_/de nas rgyal pos dug ha la ha la dang 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]zas su sbyar bas rmongs par byas nas mgo rnams bcad de/_de nas gzeb bkang nas steng du phu bo shos kyi mgo bzhag ste rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas sa ga ma la bskur ba dang sa ga mas bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar lhas sring mo'i bu rnams la bgo ba zhig bskur 
[\[81a.2\]]ba yin gyis/_bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bgo bar dbul lo snyam nas/_de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba 
[\[81a.3\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gzeb kha dbye bar brtsams pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te sa ga mas bden pa ma mthong bar bu bsad pa mthong na 
[\[81a.4\]]bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do snyam du dgongs nas sa ga ma la bka' stsal pa/_re zhig 'dug la chos nyon la phyis ci dga' ba gyis shig_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug 
[\[81a.5\]]go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong bar mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bden pa mthong nas gzeb kha phye ba dang bu'i mgo rnams mthong nas/_de nas 
[\[81a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad ni 'di ltar mi rtag pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sa ga ma'i bu rnams bstungs pa ni nyes so/_/gal te ma bstungs par 
[\[81a.7\]]gyur na 'di rnams kho nas grogs byas pas de'i lag mthil du sa mtha' dag 'jog par 'gyur ba zhig_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lus rdul gyis yog cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod lus rdul gyis yog cing gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_btsun pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang 
[\[81b.2\]]bskur ba yul gyi dbang phyug dang mthu dang /_brtson 'grus thob pa/_sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs par phab ste gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po'i bgyi ba dang /_rgyal po'i sgrub pa tha dad pa gang dag lags pa de dag bdag gis bgyis te/_yongs su rdzogs nas 
[\[81b.3\]]lus rdul gyis yog cing nga mchis pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri bar byas/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de lan thob cig_/rgyal po chen po dper na khyod la 'dir shar phyogs nas mi yid ches pa yid brtan du rung ba/_brtan pa/_'jig rten la mi slu 
[\[81b.4\]]ba zhig 'ongs nas/_de 'di skad ces lha bdag da gzod 'di nas shar phyogs su mchi mchi na/_de nas bdag gis ri brag chen po ma chag pa/_ser ka ma mchis pa/_phrag ma mchis pa/_shin tu mkhregs pa/_gcig tu sdug pa zhig sa'i bar dang nam mkha'i bar 
[\[81b.5\]]gyi sems can thams cad dang /_srog chags thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad dang /_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma ji snyed pa thams cad phye mar rlog cing mchi ba mthong gis lha khyod kyi bgyi ba'am/_bsgrub pa gang lags pa de mdzod 
[\[81b.6\]]cig ces zer la de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs nas mi zhig 'ongs te zhes bya ba nas bgyi ba'am bsgrub pa de mdzod cig ces zer te/_rgyal po chen po 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po mi bzad par byed pa mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na mi 
[\[81b.7\]]nyid thob pa ni rnyed par dka' na/_khyod kyis ci zhig bya/_btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po mi bas par bgyid pa mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba lags pas don spyod pa dang /_chos spyad pa dang /_bsod nams spyad pa dang /_
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]dge ba spyad pa dang /_bzang po spyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi ba ma lags par gzhan ci zhig bgyir mchis/_rgyal po chen po khyod ci'i phyir 'di skad ces btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu zhes bya ba nas sangs 
[\[82a.2\]]rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/btsun pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs par phab ste gnas pa de rnams kyis glang po che rnams dang glang po cher 
[\[82a.3\]]'gyed pa dang /_rta pa rnams dang rta par 'gyed pa dang /_shing rta ba rnams dang shing rta par 'gyed pa dang /_dpung bu chung rnams dang dpung bu chung du 'gyed pa dang /_gsang tshig mkhan rnams dang gsang tshig mkhan du 'gyed pa dang /_nor rnams kyis nor du rgyal ba tha dad pa gang dag lags pa de dag 
[\[82a.4\]]thams cad de'i tshe 'gyed pa'i mthu ma mchis pa dang stobs ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol gnon pa ma mchis pa lags pas de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu nye bar gnas na zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson 
[\[82a.5\]]par bgyi ba ma lags par gzhan ci zhig bgyir mchis zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du srog chags 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rga ba dang /_'chi bas 'joms pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar rga ba dang 'chi bas 'joms pa na 
[\[82a.6\]]skyes pa gang dag gis don spyad pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bya ba ma yin par gzhan ci zhig byar yod ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar che zhing rgya che 
[\[82a.7\]]ba'i/_/ri bo nam mkha' las 'ong ba/_/kun nas yang dag 'ong ba yis/_/sa ni phye mar rlog pa na/_/de la glang po ches mi rdzi/_/dpung bu chung dang shing rta dang /_/rtas min gsang tshig mkhan dang ni/_/nor gyis 'gyed pas rgyal mi 'thob/_/de bzhin rga dang 'chi ba yis/_/
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]mi rnams 'joms par byed pa na/_/rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po dang /_/tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims ldan/_/khyim pa de bzhin brtul zhugs can/_/lang tsho nyid dang rgan po dang /_/de bzhin bar ma'i mi rnams la/_/cung zad 
[\[82b.2\]]kyang ni 'dzem med par/_/thams cad mngon du 'joms par byed/_/de lta bas na mkhas pa'i mi/_/bdag gi don la blta ba yis/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/_/bla med dag la dad bya zhing /_/lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis/_/dam pa'i chos ni spyad byas na/_/'di 
[\[82b.3\]]na smad par mi 'gyur zhing /_/mtho ris song nas dga' bar 'gyur/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas 
[\[82b.4\]]song ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ba de rnams las kyang bu pho sum bcu 
[\[82b.5\]]rtsa gnyis byung ste rtsal po che thub rlag pa sha stag tu gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang gis so/_/gang du smon lam btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du khyim bdag cig gi bu shi nas de'i chung ma de rtag 
[\[82b.6\]]tu bu mngon par 'dod par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe bA rA Na 
[\[82b.7\]]sIr rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba byung ste/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las brtsigs so/_/de nas bud med bu med pa bu mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang rgas par gyur nas mchod rten de la byi dor byas nas 'dug go/_/
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]des 'dun pa'i slong mo byas nas mchod rten de la mchod par byas te smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag bu mang por gyur cig ces byas te song nas grong 
[\[83a.2\]]khyer du zhugs so/_/de na bud med cig bu nad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas ngu ba dang des gzhan zhig la dris pa/_ci'i phyir 'di ngu bar gyur des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang des bsams pa/_gal te bdag kyang bu byung bar gyur na/_bdag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu 
[\[83a.3\]]nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro snyam pa las/_ci tsam na sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dga' 'dun gyis mchod rten de la mchod pa byed pa na bud med de yang de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 
[\[83a.4\]]cag tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so/_/des de rnams la dris pa bu dag khyed kyis smon lam ci zhig btab/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_yum 'di dang 'di dag go/_/des smras pa/_bu dag gal te de ltar na khyed cag gi mar bdag kho na gyur 
[\[83a.5\]]cig_/yum de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas de rnams dong ngo /_/des bsams pa/_re zhig bud med de lan gcig btsa' na yang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas de ltar ngu na/_bdag la lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis btsa' na ji ltar bya zhes de de ltar rnam par rtog pa na/_
[\[83a.6\]]mchod rten dang nye ba na bya gag mo zhig yod pa sgo nga 'byung bar de de thang cig tsam gyis sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung la smre sngags kyang mi 'don to/_/des bsams pa/_'byung ba'i thabs 'di ni rung ba yin no snyam du rig nas mchod rten de la dad pa drag pos smon lam gdab par brtsams 
[\[83a.7\]]pa/_ji ltar bya gag mo 'di thang cig tsam gyis sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ba de bzhin du bdag gi bu sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang cig car sgo ngar 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma 'di nyid 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]yin no/_/sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dga' 'dun gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di rnams kho na yin te/_'dis de na smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ngo /_/btsun pa/_sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na las 
[\[83b.2\]]de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa ma bgyis shing skyon ma mchis par rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bkum nas de rnams kyi mgos gzeb bkang ste sa ga ma la bskur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag kho nas las rnams byas shing bsags 
[\[83b.3\]]pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na chang 'tshong zhig gnas so/_/chom rkun pa rab tu mang po chang tshol zhing de'i drung du 'ongs nas dris pa/_chang yod dam/_chang 'tshong gi 
[\[83b.4\]]chung mas smras pa/_yod do zhes de rnams la chang blud na 'dzar ba med nas des glang zhig bstan de 'di sod cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_mtshon cha med do/_/des gta' blangs nas mtshon cha byin pa dang /_de rnams kyis de bsad par brtsams so/_/de gsod pa na sems 
[\[83b.5\]]la bdag gsod pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ni chang 'tshong gi chung ma 'di yin gyis/_bdag gang du 'di rnams kyi mgo bcad nas gzeb bkang ste 'di la bskur bar 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces bsams so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i
