[\[83b.6\]]dus kyi glang gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin no/_/chom rkun pa gang yin pa de rnams ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di dag nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chang 'tshong gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma 'di nyid yin no zhes rgyas par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[83b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bsti gnas shig yod de/_de de na 'chag pa las bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa rdzab can gyi phyogs shig tu gcin khu 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]chu dang bcas pa zhig gcis so/_/glo bur du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo skom pas nyen pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/_de skom pas nyen pas de 'thungs nas mo'i dbang po la bsnams so/_/sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas sems 
[\[84a.2\]]can dang ldan par gyur to/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na phyogs de nyid du 'ongs nas khye'u zhig byung ba dang /_des de bsnams na skal ba mi mthun pa'i sems can yin nas bor te song ngo /_/ji tsam na drang srong de bsti gnas de na 'chag pa las khye'u de mthong nas/_'di 
[\[84a.3\]]su'i bu yin zhes de bsam pa la zhugs pa las/_ji tsam na bdag gi yin par mthong nas des de bsti gnas su bzhag ste bsnun bsnyod bskyed nas de'i mgo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 'dra bas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo zhes bya bar grags so/_/dus gzhan zhig na drang srong shi 
[\[84a.4\]]nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgos klad pa'i thod pa rdob pa'i rig pa bslabs te/_des thod pa brdabs nas thams cad lung ston par byed do/_/gal te re zhig sgra drag por gyur na gyen du 'gro ba lhar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/_/'on te 'bring du gyur na gyen du 'gro ba mir skye 
[\[84a.5\]]bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed de/_de ni bde 'gro'i rtags so/_/ngan 'gro'i rtags ni gal te re zhig sgra mi gsal bar gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/_/'on te sgra 'bring du gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur 
[\[84a.6\]]bar lung ston par byed do/_/'on te sgra chung bar gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan 
[\[84a.7\]]gcig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i mgo bzhi khyer cig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas mgo bzhi khyer te drang srong de'i drung du song nas khyod kyis lung ston cig_/des rgyun du 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]zhugs pa'i thod pa la brdabs nas smras pa/_'di ni lha rnams su skyes so/_/lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yang de bzhin no/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no/_/dgra bcom pa'i thod pa la brdabs na ma shes rnam par ma shes nas ngo tsha bas de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang phyir 
[\[84b.2\]]'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/_/bdag ci bstan pa de las nyams gyur tam/_/'on te slob dpon rigs las ma skyes sam/_/'on te rtags rnams de 'dra ma yin nam/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/_/khyod kyis rig pa kun legs 
[\[84b.3\]]goms ma byas/_/re zhig rig pa mtha' dag rtogs byos la/_/khyod kyis phyi nas 'jig rten lung ston cig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgos smras pa/_khyod kyis rig pa thams cad la byang ba 'ga' mthong ngam mthong ba yod dam/_des smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[84b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dmyal ba lha mi skye bo'i 'gro 'tshal na/_/
[\[84b.5\]]rig pa'i skyon gyis sems can spyod pa drug pa ma 'tshal gyis/_/gtso bo srid pa gsum gyi mtsho chen pha rol byon pa po/_/pha rol smra kun las rgyal drug pa ma 'tshal de ci gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mer bsregs pa yi lcags kyi me/_/lcags 
[\[84b.6\]]kyi tho bas brdungs byas nas/_/rim gyis nye bar zhi ba yi/_/'gro ba ji ltar mi mngon pa/_/de bzhin 'dod pa'i 'dam tshogs las/_/gal te yang dag rnam grol ba/_/mi g.yo go 'phang thob rnams kyi/_/'gro ba gdags su yod ma yin/_/de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[84b.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ma gos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/_de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas rgyal po'i khab tu ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_
[\[85a.2\]]rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bla gab med pa na 'chag cing rgyu skar rnams gyur pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[85a.3\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo la bka' stsal pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo ji srid cig na lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur soms shig_/des bsams nas btsun pa 'jig rten 'di ma rung 'di rab tu ma rung lags te/_rgyu skar rnams ji ltar gnas pa dang sbyar na lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab 
[\[85a.4\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu skar rnams mthun par byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/_yang shes par gyis shig_/des gsol pa/_lo drug tu lags so/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis yang smras pa dang /_gsol pa/_lo lngar lags so/_/
[\[85a.5\]]de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par spos shig_/de ring kho nar lhas phye ma'i tshogs lta bu'i char 'bebs par 'gyur te/_de la khrus byed pa gang 
[\[85a.6\]]yin pa de rnams la 'bras dang phol mig 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo de ltar na rgyu skar rnams ni 'gyur ba g.yo ba mi brtan pa yin te/_srog kyang g.yo ba mi brtan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo 
[\[85a.7\]]mngon par dad par gyur to/_/de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba rab tu myong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams ni nags khrod rten/_/'dab chags rnams ni mkha' la 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]rten/_/rnam par sgom pa chos la rten/_/dgra bcom mya ngan 'das la rten/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas/_bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na bdag kho na'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas 
[\[85b.2\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis 
[\[85b.3\]]yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[85b.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sa ga ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo zhes bya ba nas nor bu'i chu snod 
[\[85b.5\]]bzhag ste/_bcom ldan 'das la bu mo mngag gzhug ma dus tshod gsol ba dus tshod gsol du bcug go/_/ji tsam na bu mo mngag gzhug ma de sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas sgo gseb nas bltas na dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[85b.6\]]kyang bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la/_'tsho ba ba nal phrug 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab bo snyam nas/_de rings pa rings pas 'ongs te smras pa/_jo mo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tsho ba pa nal 
[\[85b.7\]]phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab lags so/_/sa ga mas bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/_gdugs tshod ma gsol bar bzhud par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/_gdon mi za bar 'dis dge slong sgren mo 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]rnams mthong ngo snyam nas/_des dus tshod gsol ba'i skyes pa gzhan zhig btang ste/_des btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[86a.2\]]kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni sbyin pa chen po brgyad bca' bar 'tshal te/_glo bur pa la stsal ba dang /_
[\[86a.3\]]'chi bar chas pa la stsal ba dang /_bro 'tshal ba la stsal ba dang /_bro g.yog la stsal pa dang /_stsang nas kyi 'jams nar ma dang /_sman nar ma dang /_dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang /_dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[86a.4\]]stsal pa/_sa ga ma khyod kyis yon tan ci zhig mthong na glo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa sbyin/_btsun pa glo bur du mchis pa'i dge slong ni spyod yul mi mkhas pa dang /_lam srang mi mkhas pa lags pas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na spyod yul la mkhas 
[\[86a.5\]]pa dang /_lam srang la mkhas par 'gyur lags so/_/sa ga ma de thugs su chud de legs so legs so/_/don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin/_btsun pa dge slong mchi bar chas pa bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na 'gron pa rnams dang bral 
[\[86a.6\]]bar 'gyur zhing tshogs dang bral na phongs par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na tshogs dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so/_/don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na nad pa la sbyin pa sbyin/_btsun 
[\[86a.7\]]pa dge slong bro 'tshal ba bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na nyon mongs pa'am 'gum par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyod na bro nad las ldang ba dang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so/_/sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]so/_/don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin/_btsun pa dge slong bro g.yog bgyid pa rang gi ched du bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na bro 'tshal ba'i bgyi ba nyams par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/sa 
[\[86b.2\]]ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so/_/don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na dge 'dun la nas thug nar ma sbyin/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la drod chung ba yang mchis/_drod che ba yang mchis te/_de la re zhig drod chung ba gang lags pa de rnams 
[\[86b.3\]]ni nas thug 'tshal na drod skye bar 'gyur la/_drod che ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nyam skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so/_/don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan 
[\[86b.4\]]thos rnams las bro nad mang ba dang bro nad nyung ba mchis te/_de la bro nad mang po gang lags pa de rnams la ni re zhig 'tshal ches/_bro nad nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na lhag par yang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so/_/sa ga ma de yang 
[\[86b.5\]]thugs su chud de legs so legs so/_/don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/_dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbyin/_btsun pa de ring kho na bdag gis bu mo mngag gzhug bgyid pa dus tshod gsol bar btang ba las/_des dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus 
[\[86b.6\]]byas pa mthong nas/_de slar mchis te bdag la 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tsho ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang du btab bo zhes mchi bas de rnams dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyis bkab par 'gyur lags so/_/sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs 
[\[86b.7\]]so legs so/_/don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras sbyin/_btsun pa dus 'di gcig na khyim pa mo rab tu mang po dag dge slong ma rab tu mang po rnams chu bo gnas ldan la sgren mor khrus bgyid pa las khyim pa mo de rnams kyis bgad cing 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bgad nas mdzub ker gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi mdoms nye bar ston te/_de dag gis nye bar bstan pa rnams bag 'khums par gyur pas de rnams bdag gi khrus ras kyis bkab nas khrus bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/sa ga ma legs so legs 
[\[87a.2\]]so/_/khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po brgyad smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun rnams la yang dag par snang zhing 'di dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang dag la bsod nams 
[\[87a.3\]]sam/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes tshad gzung bar mi nus kyi 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba rnams kyi nang du 'dus so/_/btsun pa 
[\[87a.4\]]bdag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de snga nas dge slong 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba/_re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par 'gyur te/_
[\[87a.5\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thos te/_de mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar yang mchi bar 'gyur la/_des bdag gi glo bur du mchi ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/_dbyar 
[\[87a.6\]]gyi gos ras chen dang /_dge slong mas khrus ras longs spyod par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba'i bar de thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 
[\[87a.7\]]'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten 'dir lan gcig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang mnyan yod du res 'ga' 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]mchi zhing slar mchi la/_des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang /_dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags 
[\[87b.2\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar mchi la/_des 
[\[87b.3\]]bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang /_dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[87b.4\]]'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar yang 
[\[87b.5\]]mchi la/_des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang /_dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags 
[\[87b.6\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/
[\[87b.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas yangs pa can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang /_skems 
[\[88a.2\]]pa dang /_'dings par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang /_skems pa dang /_'dings par byed pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_
[\[88a.3\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag zad zad du sbyin pa btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms spyad de/_zhal 
[\[88a.4\]]zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos mkhos su phab nas zhabs bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge 
[\[88a.5\]]slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'dir nga snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la 
[\[88a.6\]]zhugs pa las ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang /_skems pa dang /_'dings par byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag pags 
[\[88a.7\]]pa dang /_sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin pa btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do/_/dge slong dag dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyod pa dang /_dus su spyod pa dang /_skabs skabs su spyod 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]pa dang /_brtags te spyod pa dang /_cung zad spyod pa ni legs so legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyad par bya ba'i bsngags pa gsungs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gding 
[\[88b.2\]]ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos na de'i mod kho na la bkru bar bya ste/_gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i 
[\[88b.3\]]dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgyab nag por gyur pa zhig rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[88b.4\]]khyod kyis mi rgyab nag po pha bi mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo mi pha bi ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/_de nas 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang /_dri ma can gyi 
[\[88b.5\]]gding ba dang /_shur bu dang /_rgya cang dang /_lcug gu'i gding bas bting nas longs spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag por gyur to/_/da dung yang rgyab nag por gyur to zhes rig par mdzad nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba 
[\[88b.6\]]nas nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de ring nga snga dro sham 
[\[88b.7\]]thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/_de na ngas mi rgyab nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/_de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong du gyur pa las de na des dge 'dun gyi 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad ming tsam gyi gding ba dang /_dri ma can gyi gding bas dge 
[\[89a.2\]]'dun gyi gnas mal la longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis longs spyad par bya ste/_stug na ni rim gcig gis so/_/seng ba zhig na rim gnyis kyis so/_/dge slong rnams gding ba bkra zhing bkra ba kha 
[\[89a.3\]]tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon po'am/_'dam ka'am/_kha bsgyur ba'i gding ba gris dras pa bcang bar bya ste/_
[\[89a.4\]]gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas de'i chos gos rnams rnag dang khrag gis reg nas dri mi zhim la sbrang ma rnams 'du zhing de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed gzhogs 
[\[89a.5\]]'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste g.yan pa dgab pa bcang bar bya ste/_zhag lnga'am/_drug lon nas bkru bar bya'o/_/gzhan 
[\[89a.6\]]du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mdze'i nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang /_khyams dang /_rdzing dang /_sgo khang dang /_bang rim dang /_'chag sa rnams dang /_shing drung gi gnas rnams na dri mi zhim pa dang /_sbrang ma rnams 'khor bas 
[\[89a.7\]]gnas shing longs spyad par byed pa de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]slong dag dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang /_gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya/_khyams rnams dang /_ji skad du bsgrags pa'i khyams la 
[\[89b.2\]]sogs par gnas par mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi chab khung dang /_snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya ste/_dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben pa byin nas rim gro bya'o/_/dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 
[\[89b.3\]]'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug bcu bzhi pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos lhag par bcang du rung 
[\[89b.4\]]lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa mon dar gyi chos gos la chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs nas chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te bcang du rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ci dgar zad de/_de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal dang sha na'i ras la yang 
[\[89b.5\]]rung ngo //_//sdom la/_gso ma skra yi chos gos dang /_/gcer bu skra 'bal lo ma'i gos/_/mthang gos can dang g.yang gzhi dang /_/gso ras seng ras pa char sngo/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang 
[\[89b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[89b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/_gso ma'i chos gos 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis gso ma'i chos gos bcang bar mi bya'o/_/bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas bcom ldan 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag skra'i chos gos bcang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags so zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[90a.2\]]gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gcer bu bgyid par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/_gcer bu 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags 
[\[90a.3\]]yin no/_/gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod gcer bu byed/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o/_/byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong de gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams 
[\[90a.4\]]par gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong 'di gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams par gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[90a.5\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i bu mo rang khyim thab tshol lo zhes 
[\[90a.6\]]yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur te so so nas bsams pa/_de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/des rma bya zhig mthong nas des smras pa/_'di ni bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro/_/de la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyod 
[\[90a.7\]]khyim thab tu bdams so zhes smras pa dang /_des mjug ma bsgrengs nas gar byed par brtsams pa de yul 'khor skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/_'di ci zhig gi phyir gar byed/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_khyod kyi bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas so/_/des smras pa/_ngo tsha dang 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]khrel dang mi ldan pas 'di la bdag gi bu mo mi sbyin no zhes pa rma bya des thos nas yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song ste tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang /_/'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/_/nor bu bai DUr+ya dang 'dra gyur na/_/ci slad khyod kyi 
[\[90b.2\]]sras mo bdag mi stsal/_/yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/_dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang /_/'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/_/nor bu bai DUr+ya dang 'dra gyur kyang /_/'dzem med skyon gyis khyod la mi sbyin no/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[90b.3\]]kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid de/_de na yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas bya'i tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo /_/da ltar yang 'dis gcer bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung 
[\[90b.4\]]ngo /_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas 'dreg par rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod skra 'bal/_skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/_skra 'bal ba 'di 
[\[90b.5\]]ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis skra 'bal bar mi bya'o/_/'bal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/
[\[90b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[90b.7\]]pa bdag bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed/_de lta bas na dge slong gis bla gos mthang 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o/_/'tsho bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag g.yang gzhi 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[91a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gso ma'i seng ras kyi 
[\[91a.3\]]chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[91a.4\]]btsun pa bdag pa char 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/_pa char 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig 
[\[91a.5\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni khyim pa 'chang bar byed do/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang 
[\[91a.6\]]bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de bzhin du thams cad ser ba'am/_thams cad dmar ba'am/_dkar ba ni rung ba ma yin pa nyid do//_//sdom la/_kha tshar ring dang gdengs ka dang /_/ral ka gtsug 
[\[91a.7\]]tor thod dang ni/_/ra bal gos dang rnga bal klam/_/mchin nad kun dga' mthang gos bcas/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/_/zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag kha tshar gdengs ka lta bu'i 
[\[91b.2\]]chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[91b.3\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ral ka 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong 
[\[91b.4\]]zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[91b.5\]]gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag thod 'ching bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[91b.6\]]'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ra bal gyi gos bcang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin 
[\[91b.7\]]no/_/zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag rnga bal gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te snam sbyar med par 
[\[92a.2\]]de phyi rol du byung ba dang /_de'i snam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca' zhing snam sbyar med par gar du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[92a.3\]]song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mchin nad can na ba de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las char bab pa dang de snam sbyar gyon te 'gro ba'i spro ba med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthang gos dang bla gos su 
[\[92a.4\]]bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang snam sbyar gzhag tu rung ba ni lnga ste/_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa dang /_char bab pa dang /_char 'bab tu dogs pa dang /_'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /_sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas 
[\[92a.5\]]dang /_dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o//_//bar sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa/_dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi/_/byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni/_/rnyed pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang /_/dge 'dun rnyed dang de de'i yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[92a.6\]]kyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/_dge slong rnams kyis dag gi dbye byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur dang ba dang de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir dge slong la 
[\[92a.7\]]bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o/_/ma bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang /_dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o/_/blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ro/_/bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rnams kyis thams cad mnod par bya'o/_/dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rnams kyi mkhan 
[\[92b.2\]]po dang slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag rnyed pa chung ngu dag 'gyed par byed pa na rnyed pa chung ngu yin no snyam nas/_dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la bcol ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag 
[\[92b.3\]]gis ma bcol bar dong ba dang de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/_dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/rnyed pa chung ngu gzhan dag bgor mchog nas/_bcom 
[\[92b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcol bas rnyed pa chung ngu ma blangs na ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni nges par bda' bar bya'o/_/ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag 
[\[92b.5\]]cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/_de na gal te dge slong brgya gnas na ras yug brgya 'bul lo/_/de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gtsug lag khang de 
[\[92b.6\]]nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa las khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur ba de gnyis kyis blangs nas phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/_rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro/_/cig shos kyis smras pa/_bdag cag kho na yir 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[92b.7\]]te de lta na long shig_/des smras pa/_phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang /_ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs nas de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/_de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_gcig gis smras pa/_dge slong rnams bos la de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o/_/cig 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]shos kyis smras pa/_de bzhin du bya na su 'gro/_/gang gzhon pa'o/_/gos rnams sus bsrung gang gzhon pas so/_/de ltar mi nus kyis gang gzhon pa ni 'gro'o/_/gang rgan pa des ni gos rnams bsrung ngo /_/de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon 
[\[93a.2\]]pa shos dge slong rnams bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo /_/drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo re mos re mos mi stong par byed pa yin pas nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'dug pa des rgyang ring po kho na 
[\[93a.3\]]nas mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skye ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/_dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas gnas brtan byon pa legs so byon pa legs so/_/slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/des bsams pa/_'di 
[\[93a.4\]]ni slob dpon yang mi shes/_mkhan po yang mi shes te/_'di ni rgan zhugs zhig yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod gang nas 'ongs/_ri 'or che ge mo zhig nas so/_/ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/_gtsug lag khang yod do/_/ci de gtsug lag 
[\[93a.5\]]khang yin nam/_'on te phongs pa yin/_des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /_khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs/_dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te de lta na nga kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/_/slob dpon legs so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]
[\[93a.6\]]bsams pa/_gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan du song na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/_legs par bdag gis bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas/_des de ngal sor bcug ste/_dus ma yin pa'i btung ba dag blud nas ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis 
[\[93a.7\]]nam sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te rkang pa bkru ba dang /_rkang pa bsku ba byin nas ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do/_/de nas nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das par byas so/_/de nas 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]de nang par sngar langs te/_rgan zhugs de khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/_rim gyis ri 'or du phyin pa dang /_de nas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i rgan zhugs cig shos des 'ongs pa legs so zhes kun dga' bar gyur pa'i tshig smras nas de gnyis ngal sos pa 
[\[93b.2\]]dang khong gsum char yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_rnyed pa bgos shig_/gnas brtan bgo'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]rgan zhugs gcig la smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig_/gnas brtan bdag ni mi 'gyed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[93b.3\]]bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo /_/cig shos la yang smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig_/des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyed ni nyes pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/_nye dga' ni spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[93b.4\]]bar 'dod dam ci/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_rgan zhugs 'di gnyis bsdong gis dbyen bya'o snyam nas de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/_gnas brtan 
[\[93b.5\]]bdag gis gtsug lag khang du rtag par chag chag dang /_phyag dar dang /_ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so/_/rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag dar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob pa na lta nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag dar bya'o/_/
[\[93b.6\]]'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs cig shos de'i mthu yin te/_de gtsug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/_des na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis/_'dis ci byin pa 
[\[93b.7\]]de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi bya'o/_/des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/_gnas brtan bdag gis 'dir dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]pa byas so/_/rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed pa thob na lta nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]'greng ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal bas dus thams cad du chos bshad do/_/rnyed pa gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs cig shos de'i mthus 
[\[94a.2\]]yin te/_des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang /_phyag dar dang /_ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas pas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi sems 
[\[94a.3\]]dang bar 'gyur ba dang /_lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang /_lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/de lta bas na gtsug lag khang 
[\[94a.4\]]phyag dar byas pas yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/_lha yid dga' bar gyur te/_des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to/_/de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi bya'o/_/de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang 
[\[94a.5\]]mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas smras pa/_rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o/_/de gnyis kyis sngar sma phab pas smras pa gnas 
[\[94a.6\]]brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig_/de nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]cha gsum du byas te/_cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug go/_/de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha gcig bzhag nas gsol bar bya bar brtsams pa/_rgan zhugs khyed nyon cig_/khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig_/
[\[94a.7\]]'di gnyis dang kho bo gcig ste/_de ltar na gsum gsum mo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de nas cha gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangs so/_/cha gcig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang de gnyis kyis smras pa/_gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]gyis/_khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig_/des bgo bar brtsams nas de nas ras yug gcig kha khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo /_/de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras 
[\[94b.2\]]pa/_btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong /_des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/_mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[94b.3\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o/_/thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[94b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[94b.5\]]da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyid nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na sram gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la thon par 'gyur zhing gang 
[\[94b.6\]]gi tshe skam la dong ba de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad kyang ma rnyed do/_/de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/_bdag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o/_/cig shos kyis ni skam la ste/_rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bya'o/_/de na gcig ni chur song ngo /_/cig shos 
[\[94b.7\]]kyis ni skam la ste/_de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bskrogs te skam la bton nas de rnams skam la gnas pas bsad do/_/chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so/_/ji tsam na nya'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang gcig gis smras pa/_khyod kyis bgos 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]shig_/cig shos kyis smras pa/_bdag mi bgod do/_/ci'i phyir bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo /_/des kyang smras pa/_gal te de lta na bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no/_/de gnyis sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/_ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas 
[\[95a.2\]]zhes bya ba de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras pa tsha bo dag ci ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/zhang po bdag cag ni nya rnyed pas so/_/ci ste mi 'gyed/_zhang po nyes pas 'jigs so/_/khyod ni nyes pas 'jigs pa bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal 
[\[95a.3\]]bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/_bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/_'di gnyis bsdong gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa rus sbal zhig mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/_tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/_zhang po bdag 
[\[95a.4\]]chur zhugs te/_bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams bskrogs te skam la 'thon pa dang 'dis bsad do/_/tsha bo gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad thob na lta bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu'i nang du 'gro'o/_/skam la 'gro ba de ni sdong dum gyis 'jigs pa dang /_tsher mas 'jigs pa 
[\[95a.5\]]dang /_gcan gzan gyis 'jigs pa dang /_me'i 'jigs pa dang /_ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do/_/gzhan yang gal te des ma bsad na/_khyod kyis bskrogs kyang ci phan/_mdor na 'dis nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya 
[\[95a.6\]]ste 'khang bar mi bya'o/_/de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/_tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/_zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste bdag gis skam la thon pa'i nya rnams bsad do/_/tsha bo gal 
[\[95a.7\]]te skam la song bas cung zad thob na lta bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o/_/chur 'gro ba de ni dba' glong gis 'jigs pa dang /_rus sbal gyis 'jigs pa dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod kyis 'jigs pa dang /_chu srin ku ma bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang /_chu'i 'jigs pa yod 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]do/_/gzhan yang gal te des ma bskrogs na khyod kyis ji ltar gsad/_mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi bya'o/_/de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/bzhin rgyas 
[\[95b.2\]]kyis smras pa/_tsha bo dag 'di la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do/_/de sngar sma phab pas smras pa/_zhang po ci dgyes pa bzhin du mdzod cig_/bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos te/_nya'i mjug ma rnams gcig tu byas/_
[\[95b.3\]]mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/_bar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_thang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste/_gting du rgyu bas mgo bo'o/_/bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/_/de ni chos la gnas pas bkur/_/bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/_
[\[95b.4\]]'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan no snyam nas/_des nya chen po zhig gi rked pa khyer te ma'i drung du song ba dang /_de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/_bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/_/mgo yang med cing mjug med 
[\[95b.5\]]pa'i/_/nya bo che zhig thogs nas ni/_/shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs/_/des smras pa/_gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing /_/chos dang chos min mi shes pa'i/_/rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar/_/des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_
[\[95b.6\]]rgyas pa blta na sdug pa khyod/_/pha rol mnan pa shin tu legs/_/de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la/_/khyod kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin no/_/sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni 
[\[95b.7\]]rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/_de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la da ltar yang de gnyis bslus so/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/_ras yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/_dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo/_/ji tsam na nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/_re re 
[\[96a.2\]]la yang ras yug re re bskon no zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bsams pa/_gal te de las ras yug gcig ma grub na bdag nye dga' ma yin no snyam nas de mgron du ma bos bzhin du song ngo /_/khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas ras rnams 
[\[96a.3\]]'brim pa na/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ras yug gcig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo /_/ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te 'tshal te mchis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis 
[\[96a.4\]]bsnams par ma gyur grang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag de lta su zhig byed/_'on kyang btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/_'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan ma drangs so/_/des ras de khyer nas song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams 
[\[96a.5\]]pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong dag mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis mgron du ma 
[\[96a.6\]]bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o/_/thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi 
[\[96a.7\]]rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]byung ba ri 'or zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod de/_des bram ze'i khye'u brgya zla ba gsum mgron du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/_bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo/_/de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze rgan po zhig yod 
[\[96b.2\]]pa des thos nas de rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/_thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo /_/bram zes ras rnams 'brim par byed pa na/_ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gi ras chad nas des dris pa/_shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs 
[\[96b.3\]]te 'ongs na bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_de ltar su zhig bgyid/_'on kyang khyod kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bos sam/_bdag gis mgron du ma bos so/_/des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song 
[\[96b.4\]]ngo /_/bram ze des smad par brtsams so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang de mgron du ma bos so/_/da lta na yang ngo /_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag 
[\[96b.5\]]cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las de ldang ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/_des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag dar byed do/_/gtsug lag khang de ni sa phyogs dben zhing 
[\[96b.6\]]bzang ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/_shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa/_me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/ji tsam 
[\[96b.7\]]na ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/_des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang /_nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bskur nas de nang par sngar langs te song ngo /_/dge slong de 'dzem bag can zhig pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[97a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te dge slong gis ba'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang /_der gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung ngu'am phal mo cher phul na/_de na gnas pa gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_
[\[97a.3\]]rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o//_//sdom la/_bye ba rnams la skal ba ni/_/sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las/_/dge 'dun gyi ni chos gos kyi/_/rnyed pa brgyad du bya ba'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[97a.4\]]la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am mi stsal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no/_/kha cig la ni mi sbyin no/_/gang la stsal bar bgyi/_
[\[97a.5\]]chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_mi stsal bar bgyi/_nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no/_/kha cig la ni mi sbyin no/_/gang la stsal bar bgyi/_
[\[97a.6\]]gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi/_nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no/_/kha cig la ni mi sbyin no/_/gang la stsal bar bgyi/_gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o/_/
[\[97a.7\]]ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang khyim bdag des zas byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin pa dang /_des ras 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo /_/ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang /_drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las ri 'or de nyid du phyin nas khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin no/_/dge slong 
[\[97b.2\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi mkhan pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyis de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_mkhan po ni bsod nams 
[\[97b.3\]]che ba shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/_des lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do/_/de rnams kyis slar lan glan par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rnyed pa 
[\[97b.4\]]brgyad po 'di dag ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang /_khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang /_rten gyis thob pa dang /_dge 'dun gyir brtags pa dang /_dge slong gir brtags pa dang /_dbyar gyi dang /_mngon sum dang /_so sor bstan pa'o/_/
[\[97b.5\]]mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnas gnyis la gso sbyong gcig pa ste/_gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no/_/de la gnyug mar gnas 
[\[97b.6\]]pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin no/_/gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya ste/_'di ni 
[\[97b.7\]]mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/_/khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/_/kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/_/lam chen po dang /_tshong dus dang /_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo ni spyi'i yin no/_/zhes bya ba nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas 
[\[98a.2\]]pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/_rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/_
[\[98a.3\]]dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug bcu lnga pa/_dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam 
[\[98a.4\]]bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_dam ma bcas pa nyid la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul 
[\[98a.5\]]la/_dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_rgan pa'i mthar 
[\[98a.6\]]chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/_dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang 
[\[98a.7\]]bar 'gyur zhe na/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la/_dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_dam bcas 
[\[98b.2\]]pa rnams kho na'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/_rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/_/ji ltar dam bcas 
[\[98b.3\]]pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o/_/gal te bram ze dang 
[\[98b.4\]]khyim bdag de rnams kyis lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 
[\[98b.5\]]'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang 
[\[98b.6\]]bar 'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang 
[\[98b.7\]]bar 'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]bar 'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/_dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang 
[\[99a.2\]]dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 
[\[99a.3\]]'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rnyed pa phul la/_dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang 
[\[99a.4\]]bar 'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/_dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/_rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang 
[\[99a.5\]]dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su khas dam bcas pa dang /_dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/_rgan pa'i mtha' nyid du chu drangs na rnyed pa gang 
[\[99a.6\]]dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'o/_/ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/_'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/_/rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/_dge slong skyes pa'am/_bud med 
[\[99a.7\]]dam/_ma ning gang la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na'i yin te/_'di ni rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/_rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/_'di ni 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/_rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i'o/_/yang thog pa'i'o/_/khang pa brtsegs pa'i'o zhes brtags pa ni de na dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de 
[\[99b.2\]]kho na'i ste/_'di ni dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/_/dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/_rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste/_'di ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o/_/mngon sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/_rnyed pa gang 
[\[99b.3\]]zhig ma nges la dmigs kyis ma phye ba ste/_'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o/_/so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/_rnyed pa gang zhig bltams pa dang /_byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la phul ba ste/_gal te mchod rten 
[\[99b.4\]]chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na mchod rten gcig kho na la dbul gyi gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/_'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o//_//sdom la/_gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang /_/bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang /_/gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang /_/dbyung ba gsol dang 
[\[99b.5\]]shi ba'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang /_rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/_de rnams las gnas nas phyung 
[\[99b.6\]]ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/_nye ba 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so/_/btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/_gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/_rang 
[\[99b.7\]]bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o/_/gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/_rang bzhin du gnas pa ni nyung ba las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/_rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o/_/btsun pa 'di ltar gnas 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/_de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/_rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so/_/gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang 
[\[100a.2\]]po zhig mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pa las/_rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/_rang bzhin du gnas pa cig shos so/_/gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni gcig mchis pa 
[\[100a.3\]]gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/_gnas nas phyung ba rnams las thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams 
[\[100a.4\]]la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/_/bsres 
[\[100a.5\]]nas 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo ba byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du 
[\[100a.6\]]gsol/_dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi nas dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/_/dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa 
[\[100a.7\]]nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/_/bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/_/
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/_/khas blangs pa rnams 
[\[100b.2\]]'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/_/bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed 
[\[100b.3\]]na legs par bsngos pa yin no/_/dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/_dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid du shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma 
[\[100b.4\]]bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/_/khas blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos 
[\[100b.5\]]pa legs par bgos pa yin no/_/bsres nas 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na 
[\[100b.6\]]dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na 
[\[100b.7\]]bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/_/bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/_dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi na dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/_/
[\[101a.2\]]dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/_/bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[101a.3\]]sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas shin dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang 
[\[101a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/_/bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong 
[\[101a.5\]]gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/_dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma phyung bar shin dam ma bcas pa 
[\[101a.6\]]rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/_/dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed 
[\[101a.7\]]na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/_/bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no//_//sdom ni/_nye dga' dang ni byin gyis brlabs/_/bar ma sbyin dang blang bya dang /_/
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang /_/spang ba dang ni mi gsum mo/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/nye dga'i spyi bor phol mig cig byung nas de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa mar khu gsol cig dang sos par 
[\[101b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_gal te de ring kho na 'thungs na de ring nyid du sos par 'gyur na/_sang mar dang gos bslang bar ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/_re zhig bslangs la phyi nas btung bar bya'o snyam du shes nas/_bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan 
[\[101b.3\]]cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kun tu mngags pa dang /_de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang rma g.yogs pa'i gos phal mo che bslangs so/_/phyi de nyin par sman pas dris pa/_'phags pa khyod snyun gdangs sam/_khyod kyis mar gsol tam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[101b.4\]]ma 'thungs so/_/'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis deng nyis 'gyur du gsol cig_/des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/_sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/_mkhan po thos lags so/_/kho bo'i nad 'di ni cher skyes par gyur te/_
[\[101b.5\]]mar dang rma g.yogs pa'i gos mang du dgos kyis slongs shig_/de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal mo che bslangs so/_/de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas nyi ma de la yang ma 'thungs pas de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to/_/ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris 
[\[101b.6\]]pa/_'phags pa mar gsol tam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma 'thungs so/_/'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ring ni sum 'gyur tu btung ngo /_/sman pas smras pa/_'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang du nub par 
[\[101b.7\]]gyur kyang da ni khyod la srog ma mchis so/_/des smras pa/_gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul pa rdog pas mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/sman pa des mjal to zhes byas nas khros te song ngo /_/de nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mar khus lhung bzed bkang 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]ste 'thungs pa las ma zhu nas shi'o/_/de la gser mang du yod de/_cha gcig ni chos gos las so/_/cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman las so/_/cha gsum pa ni rdungs su byas pa dang ma byas pa las te/_gser srang sum khri byung ngo zhes blon po rnams kyis 
[\[102a.2\]]thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha 'phags pa nye dga' gum pa las de la gser mang du byung ste/_gser srang sum khri mchis kyis de la bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob shig_/dge slong rnams de khyer te 
[\[102a.3\]]sreg tu dong ngo /_/de rnams kyang lhags nas gnas khang rgyas btab bo/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[102a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/_'di skad ces rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe khyod kyis dge slong nye dga' 
[\[102a.5\]]la bltas sam/_'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag ma gtong ba'am bag ma len pa de'i tshe nye dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/_'on te na ba la rim gro byas 
[\[102a.6\]]sam zhes gyis shig gal te ma bgyis so zhes smra na/_de la rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang /_rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig_/rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas 
[\[102a.7\]]gtogs 'dod thong shig ces smros shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi ste/_bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[102b.2\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig_/dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyung ste bsgyur nas bgos so/_/gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas de la gser mang du byung ste/_gser srang sum khri 
[\[102b.3\]]dge slong rnams kyis bgos so zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/_bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan 
[\[102b.4\]]cig yang bgos so/_/yangs pa can pa dang /_bA rA Na sI ba dang /_rgyal po'i khab pa dang /_tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/_de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so/_/dge slong rnams sdud cing 'ged pa 
[\[102b.5\]]na lung nod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_gaN+DI dang /_rgyud chags gsum 
[\[102b.6\]]dang /_mchod rten dang /_tshul shing dang /_lnga pa ni gsol ba'o/_/shi ba'i gaN+DI rdung ba na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/_rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang /_mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang /_tshul shing 'brim pa dang /_gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[102b.7\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol bar byas te bgos na mi 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/shi 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/_dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol ba bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/_gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dang mi gda' ba mchis pa 
[\[103a.2\]]'di lags te/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad kyi rdzas gda' ba dang mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab bo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 
[\[103a.3\]]slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/_'di lta ste gsol ba'o/_/gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gang na dge 'dun mi mthun 
[\[103a.4\]]pas gsol ba bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi'am/_bgo bar mi bgyi lags/_nye ba 'khor thog ma dang tha ma byas nas bgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yo 
[\[103a.5\]]byad gcig bsgyur te de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gsol ba'am thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur 
[\[103a.6\]]ro/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig 
[\[103a.7\]]tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os par chags pas shi ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du bsnun pa dang /_de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes bzhin du song nas rngon pas 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]de srog dang phral lo/_/ji tsam na ma stes te chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri 'or zhig bcom nas phyogs der phyin pa dang /_de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo /_/mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag sha 'di rnyed kyis nyis brgya lnga bcus ni glang po che'i 
[\[103b.2\]]sha bcad la btso'o/_/nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu blang ngo /_/de na glang po che'i sha gcod cing 'tshed pa gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/_sha las ci 
[\[103b.3\]]yog pa zos la lhag ma dug gis gdab bo/_/de dag gis sha dug can zos pa dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas lhag ma dug gis btab bo/_/gang dag chu la dong pa de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du dpyad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs 
[\[103b.4\]]nas lhag ma dug blugs te 'ongs nas gang dag gis ni sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs la/_gang dag chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas phyogs der 'ongs nas des ro de dag thams 
[\[103b.5\]]cad mthong ngo /_/de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/_bdag la rnyed pa phal mo che yod kyis rim bzhin du bya'o snyam nas/_des gzhu mchog khar bcug ste gzhu rgyud kyi rtod pa rgyus pa bca' bar brtsams te/_de nas rgyus pa chod pa dang mchog mas 
[\[103b.6\]]rkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to/_/lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_bsags par yang ni bya ba ste/_/lhag par bsags par mi bya'o/_/sogs la chags pa'i wa long ba/_/gzhu yis bsad par gyur la ltos/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[103b.7\]]dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi'o/_/da ltar yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]dge slong gis rim gro byas na 'on kyang shi bar gyur nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang /_de nas chos gos gcig bshang gci dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to/_/de nas gos 'ged pas rim gro byed pa de la smras pa/_
[\[104a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyud ngan pa byas te chos gos ma bkrus kyis khrus shig_/des smras pa/_yo byad ni khyod 'ged na kho bo 'khru'am/_khyod nyid kyis khrus shig_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[104a.3\]]nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o/_/gal te nad g.yog mang bar gyur na thams cad kyi spyir yo byad drug bgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong shes nyen dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi nas de rnams kyi yo byad dang /_dge tshul gyi yo 
[\[104a.4\]]byad dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nad g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes des bdams shing bdams shing bzang po rnams blangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzang po rnams 
[\[104a.5\]]las sbyin par mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngan pa rnams las sbyin par mi bya ste/_'on kyang bar ma rnams las sbyin par bya'o/_/nad pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas bcom ldan 
[\[104a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/_myur ba myur bar brtag par bya'o/_/de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/_lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bsnyal bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong 
[\[104a.7\]]nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas dge slong zhig la smras pa/_re zhig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig_/kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig_/des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las ji tsam na dge 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]slong de shi'o/_/de nas gos 'ged pas de la smras pa/_dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo dgos kyis phul cig_/des smras pa/_des kho bo la ci bder byed du bcug go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[104b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de gson pa'i tshe nyid na ma byin na shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bdag shi nas 'di'i yin no zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang gi skal ba sbyin par bya'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs
