[\[104b.3\]]pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de shes pa chung bas de'i sman med nas des lus kyi gnas la brtags te rim gro byed pa la smras pa/_bdag la ci yang med kyis bdag gi ched du mchod pa gyis shig_/des khas blangs pa las de shi nas ngan song rnams su skyes so/_/
[\[104b.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim gro byed pa la ji skad smras/_de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang /_dge slong dag dge slong de log par ltung ngo /_/gal te tshangs pa mtshungs 
[\[104b.5\]]par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog gsum la mchod par byas par gyur dang dad pa skyes pas log par lhung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig_/de lta bas na dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba yal bar mi bzhag ste/_nad g.yog sbyin par bya'o/_/des de la 
[\[104b.6\]]dris te/_gal te de la sman med na yon bdag la bslang bar bya'o/_/gal te grub na de lta na legs/_ji ste ma grub na dge 'dun gyi las sbyin no/_/ji ste de yang ma grub na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/_dri gtsang khang gi gdugs sam/_rgyal mtshan nam/_
[\[104b.7\]]rgyan gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyis phog la sbyin par bya zhing rim gro byed pas bsgyur nas rim gro dang ston pa mchod par bya'o/_/sos par gyur na de la 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te khyod kyi yo byad du spyad do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te de la 'byor pa yod na des 'bad de 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]bsab par bya'o/_/gal te med na de ni spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/_pha'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba tshor bas nyen pa zhig 
[\[105a.2\]]yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/_de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la smras pa/_kho bo'i lhung bzed 'on cig_/des ma byin pa dang de de la ngan sems skyes shing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pas shi nas de lhung bzed de nyid du sbrul zhig tu skyes so/_/
[\[105a.3\]]dge slong rnams kyis de sreg tu khyer nas bsregs te gtsug lag khang du lhags nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so/_/gos 'ged pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar spungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[105a.4\]]bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong sus kyang de'i lhung bzed gzhag pa'i snod ma dbye zhig_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes sgo zhig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis phye ba dang sbrul 
[\[105a.5\]]zhig mgo'i gdengs ka cher byas nas 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis se gol gyi sgras bslang nas bka' stsal pa/_mi gti mug can lhung bzed 'di spongs la song shig_/dge slong rnams kyis 'ged par 'gyur ro/_/de 'khrugs nas ci dga' ba'i spyod lam 
[\[105a.6\]]gyis song ste nags stug po zhig tu zhugs nas/_des der khros pa'i me sbar bas nags de rab tu 'bar te de nyid du tshig nas dge slong rnams la ngan sems skyes pas dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[105a.7\]]slong dag srid pa thams cad la skrag par gyis shig_/srid pa'i yo byad gang gi phyir sems can gcig gi lus de gnas gsum po nags stug por bros pa'i me dang /_dmyal bar sems can dmyal ba'i dang /_dur khrod du me phal pas sreg par 'gyur ba thams 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]cad las yid byung bar bya'o/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis yo byad la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing gang la skye ba de yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/ma spangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gal te nad pa rang gi yo byad slong na rim gro byed pas myur ba myur bar 
[\[105b.2\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/ma byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/gos 'ged pas lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo'o zhes dge slong de'i gnas khang du 'jug 
[\[105b.3\]]par brtsams pa las/_de kun nas dkris pa drag pos dbyug pa blangs te langs nas des smras pa/_re zhig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar lhung bzed dang chos gos 'ged par byed dam/_de sngangs nas bros pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[105b.4\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_re zhig thog mar dge slong gi ro phyung nas phyi nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong zhig shi nas dge slong rnams kyis de phyung ste/_dur khrod du de bzhin du bor nas gtsug 
[\[105b.5\]]lag khang du lhags te/_gos 'ged pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bgo'o zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang de mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pas dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/_des smras pa/_re zhig kho bo'i rol mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'ged 
[\[105b.6\]]par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i rol mchod pa byas la de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos dang nyes dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[105b.7\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer te ro la mchod pa byas bsregs nas de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang /_gos 'ged pas de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa las des dbyug pa blangs 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]te langs nas re zhig bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags pa ma byas par chos gos rnams 'ged par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa 
[\[106a.2\]]dang /_de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o//_//sdom la/_nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang /_/dngos po'i skyin pa lag gi bla/_/mtshams bzhi dag tu bya ba dang /_/pho nya brgyad du bya ba'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag 
[\[106a.3\]]cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa las dge slong gi dge 'dun ni lhags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[106a.4\]]rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes te lnga po gang gis zhe na/_nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang /_lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa dang /_gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang /_nad pa la gzigs 
[\[106a.5\]]par bzhed pa dang /_nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/_skabs 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku 
[\[106a.6\]]skal bzhes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang /_gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang /_spyil bo nas spyil bo dang /_'chag sa nas 'chag sa 
[\[106a.7\]]rnams su 'chag cing gshegs pa na gtsug lag khang chen po gang na ba der byon pa dang /_de na dge slong nad tshabs che ba shes pa chung ba rang gi gcin dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so/_/
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so/_/zhes skad ngan bton pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong nga khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjes su khyod rab tu byung na ci'i phyir de skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so/_/bde bar 
[\[106b.2\]]gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so zhes ngu skad 'don/_btsun pa bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa'am lta ba ma mchis so/_/dge slong khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang lta ba byas pa yod dam/_btsun pa ma 
[\[106b.3\]]mchis lags so/_/de bas na khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'ong zhing ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad 
[\[106b.4\]]do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros 
[\[106b.5\]]pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril ba bkang ste ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o/_/
[\[106b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/_'on kyang nga'i phyir yin no/_/gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la lha rnams ni gtsang sbra la dga' ba yin pas 'dug cig_/ngas ni 'di'i rim gro bya'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[106b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos brdzes nas phyag 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/_skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas dge slong de bzung ste gcin dang ngan skyugs nas phyung nas 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_smyug gi tshal pas bzhar nas sa dkar pos dril phyis byas te bkrus so/_/de nas skyil mo krung 'char bcug ste/_de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te/_phyogs de yang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do/_/de nas phyag dang zhabs 
[\[107a.2\]]bsil nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nad pa la rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod snyoms khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[107a.3\]]spyan sngar song ngo /_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms nod nas khyer te 'ong ba'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_dge slong ci ga dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par 
[\[107a.4\]]tshim par byas sam zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ci ga dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/_btsun pa de bzhin du zhal zas 
[\[107a.5\]]bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par tshim par bgyis lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhes te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig na dge slong nad tshabs che ba 
[\[107a.6\]]zhig yod pa de la bsod snyoms phyed po 'di khyer la zos nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de/_bsod snyoms phyed kyi bgo bsha' yang mdzad do zhes gyis shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[107a.7\]]kyi ltar mnyan nas bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/_de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa yang smras so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug bcu drug pa/_de nas dge slong de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni khams gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis rim gro 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]mdzad de/_bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyang gnang gis bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas le los dus 'das par byed pa ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin pas/_ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/_des nam gyi cha 
[\[107b.2\]]stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas nyon 
[\[107b.3\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur to/_/dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 
[\[107b.4\]]dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /_dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba 
[\[107b.5\]]dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nad pa 'di dag la ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma med/_pha med/_rtsa lag gzhan med do/_/de lta bas na tshangs 
[\[107b.6\]]pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis phan tshun du rim gro bya ste/_mkhan pos ni lhan cig gnas pa'i'o/_/lhan cig gnas pas ni mkhan po'i'o/_/slob dpon gyis ni nye gnas kyi'o/_/nye gnas kyis ni slob dpon gyi'o/_/mkhan po gcig pas ni mkhan po gcig 
[\[107b.7\]]pa'i'o/_/slob dpon gcig pas ni slob dpon gcig pa'i'o/_/gtam 'dres pas ni gtam 'dres pa'i'o/_/phebs par smra bas ni phebs par smra ba'i'o/_/smos 'drin gyis ni smos 'drin gyi'o/_/'khor dang bral ba shes pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]gyis nad kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas rim gro ba gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_mang po sbyin te mthar na dge 'dun kun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun 
[\[108a.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas des dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas des 
[\[108a.3\]]mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bsti gnas me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa/_shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/_/des slob ma'i 
[\[108a.4\]]rim gro byas nas sos pa dang /_de nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang ngas de'i rim 
[\[108a.5\]]gro byas so/_/da ltar yang byas so/_/gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par yang nad pa rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma 
[\[108a.6\]]zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga lhag par nad pa rnams la byams par byed pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal 
[\[108a.7\]]srid byed du 'jug ste/_de slong ba pa rnams la mi gtong ba cung zad kyang med de/_nad pa rnams la ni khyad par du byed do/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag nad pa sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha bdag la dpyad mdzod cig_/rgyal pos sman pa rnams 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag dpyad byos shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di'i sman ni dkon lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin/_lha gang zhig btsas tshun chad sngon lan 'ga' yang su la yang khro ma myong ba de'i khrag las nas 
[\[108b.2\]]thug bgyis te zla ba drug tu stsal na de lta na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyi gzhan gyis ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de'i sman dkon pa ni bden no/_/de nas bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par brtsams na bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par dka' bar gyur nas des ma 
[\[108b.3\]]ma la dri bar brtsams pa/_ma ma nga dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon lan 'ga' yang khros pa yod dam gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi pang du byon pa de nas bdag kyang sngon su la yang lan 'ga' yang khro ma myong na/_khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras 
[\[108b.4\]]pa/_yum bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon su la yang 'ga' la khros pa mchis sam/_gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang su la yang khro ma myong na khyod lta smos kyang ci dgos/_des bsams pa/_sman rnyed do snyam du rig nas des sman pa 
[\[108b.5\]]rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag ngas rang la brtags na nga sngon su la yang khro ma myong bas nga'i yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtor cig_/lha bdag cag ni mi phal pa zhig gi don du lha'i sku la mtshon mi 'debs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas 
[\[108b.6\]]de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtsa gtar te/_khrag des zla ba drug tu nyi ma re re zhing de la nas thug blud pas sos par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de na yang nga nad pa 
[\[108b.7\]]rnams la byams par byed na/_da lta lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/_gzhan yang shi bi'i bu gzhogs phyed skams par gyur nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag gzhon nu'i dpyad gyis shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bcud thams cad mar dang sgrol 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]cig_/lo bcu gnyis su bcud thams cad bsogs na 'di'i yang shang shang te'u'i sham rnyed do/_/sman pa rnams kyis bya ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag me long dang bya gag khyer te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du deng la der rnyi tshugs te bya gag gi mdun du me long 
[\[109a.2\]]zhog cig dang /_bya gag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di bya gag yin no snyam ste/_skad phyung ba dang /_shang shang te'u yis bya gag gi skad thos nas ngo mtshar che bas bya gag gi drung du 'ong bar 'gyur te/_de bzung ba'i thabs ni 'di yin no/_/de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas 
[\[109a.3\]]pa las ji tsam na las kyi zhags pas zin pa'i srog chags shang shang te'u thogs nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo /_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe dud 'gro rnams kyang smra shes pas srog chags shang shang te'u yis smras pa/_bdag 
[\[109a.4\]]gar bkri/_de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_thong shig_/thong shig_/sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang rin po che rnams smra'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_re zhig khyod kyis sman de dag ci 'dra ba bltas ston cig_/des smras pa/_
[\[109a.5\]]bdag gi khrus byas pa'i chu ni sha'i mthu yod pa yin gyis de khyer la dengs shig rin po che 'di dag yin no/_/de dag rgyal pos 'jigs pas rin po che rnams bor te shang shang te'u de nyid khyer te dong ba las rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de rnams kyis srog 
[\[109a.6\]]chags shang shang te'u rgyal po la phul te/_des bstan pa'i sman gang yin pa de yang smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos shang shang te'u la dris pa dang smras pa/_lha bdag bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs can du bgyid pa lags so/_/rgyal pos chu snod bdun chu bzang pos bkang bar 
[\[109a.7\]]bzhag go/_/ji tsam na de de dag tu ji srid legs par ngal sos pas de srid du khrus byas nas/_de nas lus kyi stobs shes pa dang mod la 'phur te khang pa'i steng du 'dug nas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_re zhig thog ma bdag blun te/_/
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go/_/de nas rgyal po blun pa ste/_/blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs/_/zhes smras nas song ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa/_shes ldan dag shang shang te'u'i khrus byas pa'i chu de sha'i mthu yod par byed pa bden nam/_de 
[\[109b.2\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mad lags kyis mar dang sgrol cig_/de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos te rgyal po'i bu la blud par zhugs so/_/ji tsam na gangs ri'i sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas pa las de na gcig gzhogs phyed skams par gyur te/_de la rang 
[\[109b.3\]]sangs rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ljongs su song la sman pa la smos te sman sten cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/_skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/_skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/_skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 
[\[109b.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi chos 'di lta ste/_'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ong ste/_bdag nad dang bcas te khyer bar gyur na ci'i phyir grong khyer gyi mthar 'gro de rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan 
[\[109b.5\]]pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po sogs so/_/ji tsam du bsod nams mang po bsags pa de tsam du mtho ris su yun ring du dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes de de rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongs su babs te/_rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du 
[\[109b.6\]]phyin to/_/de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyi snyun nad 'di ci 'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras kyi yang de kho na 'dra nas lo bcu gnyis kyis bcud 
[\[109b.7\]]thams cad mar dang btsos pa mchis kyis bzhud la slongs shig dang /_gal te skal ba'i khyad par can gyis bcud de thob na des na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas sgo kar bsdad de/_rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni slong ba po'i skye bo sbron du gzhug pa'i 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]phyir sgor rgyun du dril 'dogs te/_gang gi tshe slong ba po sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe de dkrol bar byed do/_/ci tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dril te dkrol to/_/de nas rgyal po'i bus pha dang ma la smras pa/_yab yum slong ba po zhig mchis kyis ci zhig slong smros 
[\[110a.2\]]shig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bu bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis su rdzas rnams bsogs te btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re zhig 'thung shig dang /_phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba smra'o/_/de ngo mtshar dang bkra shis dang bde legs su gyur pa dag byas nas 
[\[110a.3\]]mar 'thung bar 'dod na slong ba po'i skye bo'i re bas lus kyi gnad du phog nas mar de ma 'thungs par smras pa/_yab yum re zhig slong ba po nang du ma bkug gi bar du mi 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos sgo ba la bsgo ba/_slong ba po nang du thong shig_/de nang du zhugs pa dang rgyal po'i 
[\[110a.4\]]bus lus mdzes pa dang /_sems dad pa dang /_spyod lam zhi bas zhugs pa mthong nas des smras pa/_'phags pa ci zhig bzhed/_des rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa bcud ni khyod kho na la 'os kyi bdag la ma lags kyi dbul gyis bzhes shig_/
[\[110a.5\]]des lhung bzed bzed pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu bsam pa drag pos lhung bzed der bcud blugs so/_/bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyal po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni 'grub par 'gyur la/_de 
[\[110a.6\]]yang tshul khrims rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis ka yang sos par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal bu gzhon nu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na da lta lta smos kyang ci dgos/_btsun pa rgyal 
[\[110a.7\]]bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las ci zhig bgyis na/_des na gnyis ka mnyam du bros thebs la mnyam du sos par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar gnas pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas 'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam 
[\[110b.2\]]par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams 
[\[110b.3\]]bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba byung ste/_de la bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de rgyal srid 
[\[110b.4\]]la dga' bar gyur to/_/mdun na 'don la yang bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de mdun na 'don 'dod par gyur te/_sems can rnams ni khams kyi sgo nas shed 'phrod pa yin pas de gnyis phan tshun du yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal bus smras pa/_thabs ci zhig byas na 
[\[110b.5\]]des na nga rgyal por 'gyur/_des smras pa/_khyod kyis gal te bdag mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni thabs mchis kyis snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_de ltar bya ste gzhug gis smros shig_/des smras pa/_bdag gis khyod kyi gcen zha bor bgyis dang khyod rgyal 
[\[110b.6\]]por 'gyur ro/_/des rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas des rgyal bu phu bo shos de sman ma yin pa byin nas zha bor gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shi nas blon po rnams kyis de ni zha bor gyur to snyam nas nu bo shos rgyal por dbang bskur to/_/des kyang mdun na 'don gyi nu bo shos 
[\[110b.7\]]gang yin pa de mdun na 'don du bcug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po mdun na 'don dang lhan cig tu bre mo gtam smra zhing 'dug pa las rgyal pos phu bo zha ba de mthong ngo /_/des de mthong nas 'gyod par gyur te/_bdag gis rgyal po'i srid kyi phyir phu bo zha bar byas 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/_/lha bdag kyang 'gyod par gyur gyis/_gal te lha dgyes na 'di phyir sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_gnang gis byos shig_/des de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to/_/de nas de gnyis 
[\[111a.2\]]kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la bya ba byas nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_gang yang bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing zha bor byas pa'i sdig pa'i las 'di'i 
[\[111a.3\]]rnam par smin pa nyams su mi myong bar gyur cig byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/mdun na 'don gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas de nyid yin no/_/de gnyis kyis gros byas nas rgyal bu gzhon nu 
[\[111a.4\]]la sman ma yin pa byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du zha bor gyur to/_/yang 'gyod par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te slar sman byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du sos par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni 
[\[111a.5\]]gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba dang 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma ste/_dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsam par bya ste/_dge 
[\[111a.6\]]slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag tshong dpon zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 
[\[111a.7\]]'gran pa zhig gnas so/_/des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]dang /_tshal gyi lha dag dang /_bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /_sum mdo'i lha dag dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos mthun pa'i lha dag dang /_rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs 
[\[111b.2\]]pa'i rgyu las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/_de ni de lta ma yin te/_gal te de ltar gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon sum du gyur pa 
[\[111b.3\]]las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag gang zhe na/_pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/_gnas gsum po de dag mngon sum du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo 
[\[111b.4\]]dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/des gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol ba byas kyang bu pho dang bu mo med pa de'i tshe lha thams cad spangs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to/_/ji tsam na dge slong zhig gi drung du song ste/_'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 
[\[111b.5\]]bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de bzhin du gyis shig ces des de rim gyis skra bregs nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams sbyin par brtsams pa las rims chen pos thebs nas rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[111b.6\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_re zhig sos kyi bar du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi sbyin zhing de'i rim gro bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_dge slong rnams kyis sus bya ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[111b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams dang sman pas so/_/sman pa rnams kyis nyin par sman byas na mtshan mo nad la phan par gyur to/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa 'di'i dpyad bdag gis gdugs la bgyis na mtshan mo bro la phan par gyur gyis/_gal te 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]'di khyim du bskyal na bdag cag gis nyin mtshan du 'di'i dpyad bgyi'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim du skyol la der yang de'i rim gro byed pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de'i nad de yun ring 
[\[112a.2\]]por gyur nas de'i skra ring po ring por skyes pas khyim bdag de khyim bdag mgo reg ces par grags so/_/de gang gi tshe rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las/_slar lan bar gyur pa de'i tshe des bdag ni 'chi'o zhes bya bar rang 
[\[112a.3\]]gi cha chod nas/_de na des 'chi ka'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad glegs bu la bris te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro/_/de ni shi'o/_/blon po rnams kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/_lha khyim bdag mgo reg bu ma mchis par gum ste/_de la dbyig dang /_gser 
[\[112a.4\]]dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_go cha la sogs te phal mo che zhig mchis pa de thams cad glegs bu la bris nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa nye dga' dbang ba glegs bu la ma bris pa 
[\[112a.5\]]yang ngas ma thob na glegs bu la bris pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba gang yin pa de long shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de la ci dag 
[\[112a.6\]]yod//_//bar sdom la/_gzhi dang gnas mal gos dang ni/_/lcags nag lcags dang lham mkhan dang /_/rdza mkhan 'dreg mkhan shing mkhan sogs/_/tshon rtsi mdung shing bar bur dang /_/rkang gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi dang /_/zas dang btung ba sman dang ni/_/bran 
[\[112a.7\]]dang gding ba dpang rgya dag_/ci rigs par ni bgo bar bya/_/dbyig rnams dang ni gser rnams dang /_/gzhan yang rdungs byas rdungs ma byas/_/dge 'dun 'dus nas bgo'o zhes/_/drang srong chen pos bka' stsal to/_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci rigs par bgo bar bya ste/_de la zhing gi gzhi dang /_khyim gyi gzhi dang /_tshong khang gi gzhi dang /_gnas mal dang /_lcags nag gi mgar ba'i lag spyad dang /_lcags mgar gyi lag spyad dang /_rdza mkhan gyi lag spyad dang /_shing 
[\[112b.2\]]mkhan gyi lag spyad dang /_smyug ma mkhan gyi lag spyad dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_kha zas dang /_btung ba dang /_'bru rnams ni mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag par bya'o/_/ras 
[\[112b.3\]]yug dang /_ras yug chen dang /_ko sgro dang /_mchil lham dang /_'bru mar gyi snod dang /_ril ba dang /_bya ma bum rnams ni dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o/_/mdung shing ring po gang yin pa de dag ni 'dzam bu lta bu'i sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi shing bya'o/_/
[\[112b.4\]]thung ngu gang yin pa de dag ni khar gsil gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o/_/khye'u dang bu mo ni dge 'dun gyis mi bsgyur te ci rigs pa zhig blangs nas ci bde bar gtang bar bya'o/_/rkang bzhi pa rnams las glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_dre'u 
[\[112b.5\]]rnams ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o/_/ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug rnams ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag ste mi bgo'o/_/'thab stan dang /_go cha dang /_gzhan yang rgyal po la 'os pa gang yin pa thams cad ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o/_/
[\[112b.6\]]mtshon cha rnams bzhag la de rnams gre'u dang /_khab dang /_khar gsil du brdungs te dge 'dun la brim par bya'o/_/tshon rnams las tshon rtsi chen po gang kus dang /_mtshal dang /_mthing shing la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi phyir dri gtsang khang du gzhag 
[\[112b.7\]]par bya'o/_/thod lo kor dang /_btsag dang /_rams ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/_/chang ni yongs blugs las dong du gzhug par bya ste/_tshwar gyur na longs spyad par bya'o/_/tshwar ma gyur na dor bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag nga ston pa yin par khas len pa rnams kyis chang mi sbyin 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]zhing tha na rtswa mchog gis kyang mi btung ngo /_/sman rnams ni nad khang rung bar gzhag par bya zhing de nas dge slong nad pa rnams kyis longs spyad par bya'o/_/rin po che rnams las mu tig ma gtogs par nor bu dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung g.yas su 'khyil pa la sogs pa ni cha 
[\[113a.2\]]gnyis su byas te/_gcig ni chos la'o/_/cig shos ni dge 'dun la'o/_/chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o/_/seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/_/glegs bam rnams las sangs rgyas 
[\[113a.3\]]kyi gsung rab kyi glegs bam rnams ni mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du gzhug par bya'o/_/phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos kyi glegs bam rnams ni btsongs la bgo bar bya'o/_/chags rgya ni myur du 'grub par nus pa gang yin pa de ni rdzas 'ged pa'i tshe 
[\[113a.4\]]dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/_/mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du gzhug par bya'o/_/gser dang /_dbyig dang /_gzhan yang rdungs su byas pa dang /_rdungs su ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni cha gsum du byas te/_gcig 
[\[113a.5\]]ni sangs rgyas la'o/_/gnyis pa ni chos la'o/_/gsum pa ni dge 'dun la'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi gang yin pa des ni dri gtsang khang dang dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi ral ba dang 'drums pa slar bcos par bya'o/_/chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[113a.6\]]seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis chu [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]dus ston btsugs pa de'i tshe de na/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[113a.7\]]dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams mang du tshogs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe dge slong khrums stod dge slong mas bkur ba yin pas chu [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]dus ston btsugs pa'i dge slong ma rab tu mang pos tshe dang ldan pa khrums stod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa chu [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]dus ston 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]la spyan 'dren gyis gshegs so/_/des smras pa/_bdag gi chos gos dang lhung bzed phyir su la bcol/_dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang /_bdag cag gis gzhag par bgyi'o/_/des de rnams la gzhag 
[\[113b.2\]]pa dang de rnams kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang gtsug lag khang zhig tu gzhag go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa khrums stod chu [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]dus ston la 'ongs 
[\[113b.3\]]pa dang /_de na de dge slong ma rnams kyis mgron du bos pa yin pas gcig gis smras pa/_'phags pa deng bdag gis zhal tshus bgyi'o/_/gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang g.yar tshus la bos so/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol 
[\[113b.4\]]cig_/de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras so/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi dus ma lags pa'i btung ba gsol cig_/de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras nas des de rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir g.yar tshus rnams 
[\[113b.5\]]las cung zad cung zad blangs de bzhin du dro yang zos/_dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud pa yang 'thungs pa dang de tseg tseg pa yor langs nas/_de yang lam gyis dub pa des mang por zos pa des ma zhu bar gyur te gsud de shi'o/_/de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du bsregs 
[\[113b.6\]]nas chos bsgrags pa byas nas rim gyis gtsug lag khang du lhags so/_/gos 'ged pas nad g.yog la smras pa/_de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'on cig_/des smras pa/_des bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi lag tu bzhag go/_/de rnams la dris pa dang /_smras pa 
[\[113b.7\]]bdag cag gis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i lag tu bzhag go/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos smras pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la gtad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_bdag gis gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu bzhag go zhes pa'i skabs 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shi ba'i yo byad kyi skyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/byin gyis brlab pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/_gaN+DI brdungs la dge 'dun thams cad 
[\[114a.2\]]tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham par byas la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur ba dang dge slong gcig 
[\[114a.3\]]gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas 'dir dge slong khrums stod gum na de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos/_gos dang gos kyi rin dang bcas pa kun dga' bo'i sug pa na mchis kyis gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na 
[\[114a.4\]]dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong khrums stod gum pa'i yo byad lhung bzed dang chos gos dang gos kyi rin du bcas pa'i dngos po'i skyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[114a.5\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong yang gzhan du gum/_lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan na mchis/_dngos po'i skyin pa yang gzhan na mchis na de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/_nye ba 'khor dngos po'i skyin 
[\[114a.6\]]pa'i dge slong ngam khyim gang na yod pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong lag gi bla zhig shi'o/_/dge slong rnams de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pas ma bgos pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[114a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun thams cad bsogs la ci 'dres sam ma 'dres par gyur pa de brtag par bya'o/_/gal te 'dres te dge 'dun gyi ni mchod rten gyir byas la/_mchod rten gyi ni dge 'dun gyir gyur na/_de lta bu chos dang mi mthun pa yin pas de'i lhung bzed dang 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]chos gos dang gos kyi rin dang bcas pa la cha gsum du byas te/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun no/_/dge 'dun gyi ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /_dri gtsang khang dang mchod rten gyi lag gi bla'i sar spyad par bya'o/_/
[\[114b.2\]]dam pa'i chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o/_/seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/_/gal te 'dres par ma gyur na thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu 
[\[114b.3\]]zhing dong ba las rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong cig shi'o/_/de rnams kyis bsams pa/_gtsug lag khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang skal ba 'dod par 'gyur du 'ong gis/_/gtsug lag 
[\[114b.4\]]khang gi phyi rol tu bgo bar bya'o snyam pa las/_mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i ba lang rdzi dang /_phyugs rdzi dang /_rtswa thun dang /_shing thun dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing de rnams gang dang gang du 'dug nas 'ged par byed 
[\[114b.5\]]pa de dang der skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor bar gyur nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/_gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo'o snyam nas/_de rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo bar brtsams pa dang dge skos kyis mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[114b.6\]]dag ci zhig byed/_de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa bzhin smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag kyang mtshams su 'ongs pa yin na zhes des 'khangs kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[114b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes te shi ba'i yo byad 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/_slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/_gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]mtshams kyi nang la yid gnyis kyis 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/_slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/_gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang gi 'du shes 
[\[115a.2\]]kyis 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/_slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/_gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/mtshams kyi phyi rol la yid gnyis kyis 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/_slar yang mtshams na 
[\[115a.3\]]'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/_gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na dge slong des gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad pa'i skabs de 
[\[115a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong des yid gcugs par bya ba ma yin pa la yid gcugs par bskyed de/_'di ltar gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad do/_/'on kyang dge slong 
[\[115a.5\]]gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no/_/gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed na 
[\[115a.6\]]gang la bskur ba de ni shi la gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/_/gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa 
[\[115a.7\]]na gang gis bskur ba de ni shi la gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/_gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la/_gang gis bskur ba de la yid 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]gcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no/_/gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur ba na gang la bskur ba de ni shi la gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na 
[\[115b.2\]]legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la gang gis bskur ba de yang shi nas gang 
[\[115b.3\]]la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/_/gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog nas 
[\[115b.4\]]de shi la/_gang gis skur bar byed pa de yang shi na/_de shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/gos kyi gzhi rdzogs 
[\[115b.5\]]so//_//[{D1-8}]sra brkyang gi gzhi'i sdom ni/_gnas bcas pa dang kha cig dang /_/rdol ba dang ni blings pa dang /_/dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi/_/nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang /_/dgos pa dag ni bcu gnyis te/_/gnas bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa/_/ston pa lta bar 
[\[115b.6\]]'dod pa na/_/'dam rdzab kyis ni ngal gyur pa/_/de la der ni chos gos gnang /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su 
[\[115b.7\]]dbyar gnas par dam bcas te dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing rdul gyis lus yog bzhin mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]ste/_rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba dang mnyan yod du phyin to/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab nas rkang pa bkrus te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 
[\[116a.2\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_dge slong dag khyed da gzod gnas 
[\[116a.3\]]'ongs/_gnas gang du dbyar gnas gnas/_btsun pa bdag cag ni gnas bcas nas da gzod mchis lags te/_bdag cag gnas bcas na dbyar mchis lags so/_/dge slong dag khyed cag gnas bcas su ci ga bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas sam/_bsod snyoms 
[\[116a.4\]]kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/_btsun pa mad par gsol te/_bdag cag gnas bcas su bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas shing bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis lags so/_/'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen 
[\[116a.5\]]por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing rdul gyis lus yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing mchi ba na tshegs chen pos 'dir mchis pa lags so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug bcu bdun pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams 
[\[116a.6\]]lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing /_lus rdul gyis yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni nyon mongs kyis/_ma la ngas dge slong rnams reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya 
[\[116a.7\]]ba'i phyir dge slong rnams la sra brkyang gnang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar sra brkyang bting na phan yon lnga yod de zhag bcu las thal na ma yin pa dang /_zla ba las thal na ma yin pa dang /_nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang /_bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]ba dang /_chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang phan yon lnga yod de/_tshogs shing zan ma yin pa dang /_yang yang zan ma yin pa dang /_khyim rnams su mgron du ma bos par 'gro na ma yin pa dang /_ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos btsal 
[\[116b.2\]]ba dang /_ston zla 'bring po nas dpyid zla ra ba'i bar gyi nang der sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sbyin 
[\[116b.3\]]pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o/_/'di ltar sra brkyang la phan yon lnga yod de/_zhag bcu thal na ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[116b.4\]]bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang ji ltar gding ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding bar 
[\[116b.5\]]bya'o/_/gding ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_re zhig thog mar mthun pa'i go bar bya ste/_chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/_gal te dge 'dun bzhed na chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bgyi'o/_/de nas phyi de nyin 
[\[116b.6\]]gnas mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_chos 
[\[116b.7\]]gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/_dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'dis sra brkyang bgyis nas sra brkyang gding par bzhed na/_des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/_
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad de/_chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings so/_/des na 
[\[117a.2\]]sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/_gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas 
[\[117a.3\]]pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa byung ba lags la/_dge 'dun yang sra brkyang bgyi bar bzhed de/_dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad pas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings so/_/des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams 
[\[117a.4\]]dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/_gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyi zhing chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ste/_des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa 
[\[117a.5\]]rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/_gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad nas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 
[\[117a.6\]]'dings te/_des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/_gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de'i 'og tu sra brkyang 
[\[117a.7\]]'dings pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/_chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya zhing bskos ba ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang /_dbyar ral ba dang /_dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang /_dbyar tha 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]dad par gnas pa dang /_bslab pa byin pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko bar mi bya ste/_spo ba pa dang /_gzhi nas spo ba pa dang /_mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang /_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko bar mi bya 
[\[117b.2\]]ste/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba mi shes pa'o/_/yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya zhing bskos pa ni dbyung 
[\[117b.3\]]bar mi bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o/_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams te zhes bya ba nas/_dge 
[\[117b.4\]]'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro'am/_gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol 
[\[117b.5\]]bar byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar 
[\[117b.6\]]dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/_sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_sra brkyang 
[\[117b.7\]]'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/_sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur na/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra 
[\[118a.2\]]brkyang 'dings par bskos te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de nas gsol bas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong la sra brkyang sbyin par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad lags la/_
[\[118a.3\]]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos lags te/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi slad du stsal to/_/'di 
[\[118a.4\]]ni gsol ba'o/_/ngas dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pas sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/_bkru'o/_/brkyang ngo /_/dra'o/_/drub bo//_/kha bsgyur ro/_/chung ngu na khab kyis srubs 
[\[118a.5\]]gnyis sam/_gsum yang btsem par bya'o/_/lan gnyis sam gsum du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la go bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'dings kyis khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung shig_/de 
[\[118a.6\]]nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang dri dang me tog gis gtor zhing dri zhim po'i bdug pas bdugs nas gnas mal bshams te gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang 
[\[118a.7\]]rgan pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/_sra brkyang 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]'dings pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro/_/gding ngo /_/bting ngo /_/de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces gnas brtan 
[\[118b.2\]]dgongs su gsol/_chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du mdzad la/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos pa lags te/_bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting lags so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/des legs par 
[\[118b.3\]]bting ngo /_/shin tu bting ste/_'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par bting ngo /_/shin tu bting ste/_'di la rnyed 
[\[118b.4\]]pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang thogs te chab khung sar ma yin/_snams phyi sar ma yin te/_tshang bang du 'jug par mi bya'o/_/mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[118b.5\]]gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o/_/sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis dpyid zla ra ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes 
[\[118b.6\]]bco lnga la yang go bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'byin gyis khyed cag so so'i chos gos rnams byin gyis rlobs shig_/de la rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor 
[\[118b.7\]]gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa du zhig gi sra brkyang ma  bting lags/_nye ba 'khor lnga'i ste/_dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang /_dbyar ral ba dang /_dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang /_dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang /_sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]du ma gyur pa'i'o/_/gzhan yang 'di lnga'i ma bting ba yin te/_spo ba pa dang /_spo ba spyad zin pa dang /_mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang /_mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang /_bslab pa byin pa'i'o/_/btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa mchis la phan yon ma mchis 
[\[119a.2\]]lags/_nye ba 'khor lnga'i ste/_dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang /_dbyar ral ba dang /_dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang /_dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang /_sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i'o/_/gzhan yang lnga po 'di dag gi ste/_
[\[119a.3\]]spo ba pa dang /_spo ba spyad zin pa dang /_mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang /_mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang /_bslab pa byin pa'i'o/_/btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa yang ma mchis la phan yon yang ma mchis lags/_nye ba 'khor lnga'i ste/_ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang /_phyir 
[\[119a.4\]]mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba dang /_sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang /_dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang /_dge 'dun bye na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs pa'i'o/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom 
[\[119a.5\]]nas de dag rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji ga bde bar spyad dam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar spyad pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig_/bdag cag ni chom rkun pa rnams kyis 
[\[119a.6\]]bcom mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/_gal te sra brkyang phyung na khyed la chos gos kyi bgo bsha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na ngas rjes 
[\[119a.7\]]su gnang ste/_chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o/_/dbyung ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]gyur pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/_dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags na/_gal te dge 'dun 
[\[119b.2\]]gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[119b.3\]]gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/_dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags te/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag las 
[\[119b.4\]]gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa 
[\[119b.5\]]rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad de/_gang gi slad du mi gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de bgo bar bya ste/_bgos nas gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal ba las chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' 
[\[119b.6\]]bya'o//_//sdom la/_rdol ba dang ni sril zos dang /_/mtha' skor lhan rlo lhan [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_/gso ma'i seng ras zegs pa dang /_/rnyings dang spangs dang dengs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa chos gos 
[\[119b.7\]]rdol bas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal ba dang /_chos gos chag btab pa dang /_chos gos lhan pa rlo bos btab pa dang /_chos gos lhan [{]rings [,]ring [}]can dang /_gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]gos dang /_chos gos zegs pa dang /_chos gos rnyings pa dang /_chos gos spangs pa dang /_chos gos dengs pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo //_//sdom la/_blings dang dus ma yin pa dang /_/gang zag gi ni chos gos 
[\[120a.2\]]gsum/_/mi rung ba dang ma dras dang /_/khru lngar ma chog mi bya dang /_/blo mthun min dang mi gding dang /_/mtshams kyi phyi rol mi skye'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa blings pa'i chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du 
[\[120a.3\]]rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa dus ma lags pa'i chos gos dang /_gang zag gi snam sbyar dang /_bla gos dang mthang gos dang /_mi rung ba'i chos gos dang /_ma dras pa dang /_khru lngar ma mchis pa dang /_blo mthun par ma bgyis pa'i chos gos 
[\[120a.4\]]dang /_sra brkyang 'dings pa ma bskos pa dang /_mtshams kyi slad rol tu blo mthun par bgyis pa'i chos gos kyi sra brkyang dang /_mtshams kyi slad rol tu bskos pa'i sra brkyang 'dings pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo //_//sdom la/_dus 
[\[120a.5\]]kyi nang ni zla ba gsum/_/gsar pa dang ni brtags pa nyid/_/phongs pa dang ni gso ma'i ras/_/gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/_/btsun pa dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor rung ngo /_/btsun pa dgung zla gsum 'das nas dge 
[\[120a.6\]]'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa gang lags pa des sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor rung ngo /_/chos gos sar pa rung ngo /_/sar pa brtags pa rung ngo /_/phongs pa'i chos gos rung ngo /_/gso ma'i seng ras snam sbyar mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa gang zag gi snam sbyar gyis sra brkyang 
[\[120a.7\]]gding du rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo /_/bla gos dang mthang gos kyang de bzhin no//_//sdom la/_gang zag gi dang khyim pa'i dang /_/khru lnga pa dang khru lnga'i lhag_/blo mthun byas pa'i gding ba dang /_/mtshams kyi nang nyid skye ba'o/_/btsun pa gang 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]zag gi chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/_mi rung ngo /_/gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na'o/_/khyim pa'i gos kyis mi rung ngo /_/gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo /_/khru lnga pas rung ngo /_/khru lnga las lhag pa rung ngo /_/blo mthun par byas pa'i sra 
[\[120b.2\]]brkyang gi chos gos dang /_sra brkyang 'dings pas rung ngo /_/mtshams kyi nang du blo mthun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos kyis rung ngo /_/mtshams kyi nang du sra brkyang 'dings pa bskos pas rung ngo /_/ma mo brgyad kyi gzhis sra brkyang phyung bar gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_song 
[\[120b.3\]]ba dang /_rdzogs pa dang /_nges pa dang /_nyams pa dang /_thos pa dang /_mtshams 'das pa dang /_re thag chad pa dang /_brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung ba nyid de/_song ba'i mtha' can gyis sra brkyang phyung ba dang /_rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang /_nges pa'i mtha' can dang /_
[\[120b.4\]]nyams pa'i mtha' can dang /_thos pa'i mtha' can dang /_mtshams 'das pa dang /_re thag chad pa dang /_brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung zin pa nyid yin no/_/song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas 
[\[120b.5\]]chos gos ma zin par chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs te/_phyir mi 'ong bar mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba de'i ni song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma 
[\[120b.6\]]byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas phyir 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung 
[\[120b.7\]]ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du 
[\[121a.2\]]sems te slar yang mi 'ong la chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam nas/_des de rtsom zhing brtsams pa dang /_nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma 
[\[121a.3\]]byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ongs te chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/_dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo /_/shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas 
[\[121a.4\]]pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par phyir 'ong ngam mi 'ong snyam pa las/_mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba 
[\[121a.5\]]de'i ni mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/_de'i chos 
[\[121a.6\]]gos re ba gang yin pa de thams cad du chad pa de'i ni re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las de yang slar 'ongs shing sra 
[\[121a.7\]]brkyang phyung ba nyams su myong ba de'i ni brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid yin no//_//sdom la/_ma byas pa ni nyi shu dang /_/brtsams pa dag ni nyi shu dang /_/re ba yod pa nyi shu dang /_/re ba med pa nyi shu yin/_/'di lta ste/_dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong mod kyi 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas 
[\[121b.2\]]chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos 
[\[121b.3\]]ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos 
[\[121b.4\]]ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/_des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo /_/shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos 
[\[121b.5\]]pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/_de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang 
[\[121b.6\]]chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de der song nas de 'di snyam 
[\[121b.7\]]du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]pa las/_de der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos 
[\[122a.2\]]gos bya'o snyam pa las/_dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo /_/shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong 
[\[122a.3\]]sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba 
[\[122a.4\]]yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/_de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o 
[\[122a.5\]]snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa 
[\[122a.6\]]nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/_dge 'dun mthun pas 
[\[122a.7\]]sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo /_/shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang bar byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/_de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di 
[\[122b.2\]]lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/_de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can 
[\[122b.3\]]gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/_de der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i 
[\[122b.4\]]mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/_dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 
[\[122b.5\]]'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo /_/zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo /_/shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos 
[\[122b.6\]]gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/_/snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dge 
[\[122b.7\]]slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/_des de rtsom zhing de'i 
[\[123a.2\]]brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/_dge 
[\[123a.3\]]'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo /_/zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo /_/shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas 
[\[123a.4\]]nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas zhes bya ba thams cad brjod par bya'o/_/'on kyang snga ma'i nyi shu la ni chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par zhes bya'o/_/'dir ni chos gos ma zin pa zhes bya ba bor te/_chos gos brtsams pa zhes bya ba 
[\[123a.5\]]bcug ste rnam pa 'dis nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa'i re ba yod pa las de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni 
[\[123a.6\]]bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/_re ba yod pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa'i re 
[\[123a.7\]]ba med par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/_/snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/_re ba med pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o//_//sdom la/_
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]bya ba dag ni bcu gnyis dang /_/btsal ba dang ni de bzhin gzhan/_/yul la lngar ni bya ba ste/_/gnas la yang ni lnga yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos 
[\[123b.2\]]gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol 
[\[123b.3\]]du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba 
[\[123b.4\]]zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/_des de rtsom zhing de brtsams pa las nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par 
[\[123b.5\]]bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo /_/shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni 
[\[123b.6\]]thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/_de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong ste 
[\[123b.7\]]'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/der song nas zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa'i mtha' can dang /_nyams pa'i mtha' can dang /_thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig gi ched la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za ba las/_de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong ste 'on 
[\[124a.2\]]kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/sems la the tshom za bas rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa ji lta bar nges pa'i mtha' can dang /_nyams pa'i mtha' can dang /_thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang 
[\[124a.3\]]bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par btsal ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/
[\[124a.4\]]btsal ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du bcu gnyis pa gzhan no/_/'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par slar mi 'ong bar yul ltar mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba de'i ni song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/_/'di 
[\[124a.5\]]lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par yul ltar mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za ba las de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/_/snyam pa de'i ni 
[\[124a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/_nges pa'i mtha' can dang /_nyams pa'i mtha' can dang /_thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no/_/yul lta ba'i lnga ji lta bar gnas lta ba'i lnga yang de bzhin no/_/sra brkyang gi gzhi rdzogs so//_//[{D1-9}]'dul ba gzhi/_bam 
[\[124a.7\]]po drug bcu brgyad pa/_kau shAm+bI'i gzhi'i sdom ni/_kau shAm+bIr ni 'thab krol gyi/_/dge slong rtsod pa sna tshogs dang /_/khre'u dang rtsod par byed pa dang /_/ring po len gyi spyod pa dang /_/ngan spong lan tshwa khang pa dang /_/srung dang tshal stug glang chen dang /_/ma 'gags pas ni nges byas dang /_/mnyan 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]yod du ni zhi bar byas/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bI'i dbyangs ldan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe kau shAm+bI'i dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/_de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par
