[\[124b.2\]]gnon pa/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa yin no/_/yangs pa can na yangs pa can gyi dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/_de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/_
[\[124b.3\]]mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa yin no/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang kau shAm+bIr phyin te/_de lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas kau shAm+bI'i dge slong gi drung du song ste phyin pa dang /_phan tshun so so yang dag par dga' 
[\[124b.4\]]bar byas nas mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa rnams gtan la dbab par brtsams te/_de nas gcig gis smras pa/_mdo sde 'di ni 'di skad du gdon par bya ste/_mdo sde 'di'i don ni 'di yin no/_/cig shos kyis smras pa/_mdo sde 'di ni de skad du gdon par mi bya ste/_
[\[124b.5\]]mdo sde 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin no/_/kho bo'i ni rigs so/_/khyod kyi ni mi rigs so/_/kho bo'i ni 'brel ba yin no/_/khyod kyi ni 'brel ba ma yin no zhes de gnyis phan tshun du ma mthun par gyur nas kau shAm+bI'i dge slong gis yangs pa can gyi dge slong la klan ka btsal ba lhur len cing 'dug 
[\[124b.6\]]go/_/dge 'dun gyis kyang 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba byas te/_gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'gribs pa dang /_nyung ba dang /_chu med par mthong ba des chus bkang ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba'am/_dge skos la khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes 
[\[124b.7\]]bsgo bar bya'o/_/gal te bdag nyid kyis ma bkang ngam dge skos la ma bsgos par gyur na de ni ma gus pa yin te/_ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'chags su gzhug go zhes byas so/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/de na dge slong kha cig ni zas la dong ngo /_/kha cig ni 'gro bar chas so/_/yangs pa can gyi dge slong khrus kyi bum pa blangs nas snam phyi sar zhugs pa dang /_de'i lhan cig gnas pas [{]rings [,]ring [}{]rings [,]ring [}]ltar 'ongs 
[\[125a.2\]]nas sgra phyung ba/_mkhan po dge slong kha cig ni zas la dong lags so/_/kha cig ni 'dong bar chas kyis tshur spyon bzhud do/_/de de dang lhan cig khrus kyi bum pa gnas gcig tu bzhag ste chas so/_/kau shAm+bI'i dge slong de yang phyogs de nyid du phyin pa dang /_de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong 
[\[125a.3\]]des khrus kyi bum pa blangs te gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bsams pa dang lhan cig gnas pas smras pa/_mkhan po gar bzhud/_des smras pa/_bu kho bo la kau shAm+bI'i dge slong 'di klan ka tshol bas khrus kyi bum pa 'gengs su 'gro'o/_/ci 'di thams cad kyi thams cad du stong ngam/_thams 
[\[125a.4\]]cad kyi thams cad du stong pa ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang chu 'dis chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so/_/mkhan po thams cad kyi thams cad du stong par ma gyur pas 'tshal te/_bdag cag ni mkhan po'i phyogs dang /_dpung dang /_grogs bgyid pa lags kyis tshur spyon bzhud do/_/des de nyid du 
[\[125a.5\]]bzhag nas de dang lhan cig tu dong ngo /_/kau shAm+bI'i dge slong gis mthong nas khrus kyi bum pa de la mnams so/_/de nas mi bzod pa skyes te mjal to zhes byas nas khrus kyi bum pa bkang ste chu'i bya ba byas nas song ngo /_/de nas zan zos nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du lhags pa 
[\[125a.6\]]dang /_dge slong rnams la bsgrags pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag yangs pa can gyi dge slong des dge 'dun gyi nang khrims dral to/_/de nas rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas nas rim gyis de'i drung du son pa dang /_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa skabs phye shig_/ltung ba rigs lnga la skabs 
[\[125a.7\]]phye'o/_/khyod la de ring ltung ba byung gis ltung ba yang slar chos bzhin du gyis shig_/ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/dge 'dun gyis khrims su bca' ba gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'gribs pa dang /_chu nyung ba dang /_chu med pa mthong na bdag nyid kyis chus bkang ste/_gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]par bya ba'am/_dge skos la tshe dang ldan pa khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bkang la dge skos la yang ma bsgo na de ni ma gus pa yin te/_ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'chags su gzhug go zhes bcas pa ma 
[\[125b.2\]]yin nam/_des smras pa/_de ha cang stong pa ma yin no/_/stong par ma gyur kyang rung ste/_chu des chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so/_/des cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/kau shAm+bI'i dge slong ni kau shAm+bI na gnyug ma pa dang 'khor mang po yin pas des de la nan gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dang /_
[\[125b.3\]]yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas/_de na kau shAm+bI'i dge slong rnams dang 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bar gyur te/_'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/_ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/_gnas nas phyung ba yin no zhe'am/_gnas nas phyung ba ma yin no 
[\[125b.4\]]zhes/_gang yang ltung ba byung ba dang /_ltung ba med pa dang /_gnas nas dbyung ba dang /_gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin pa la gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin pa las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas phyung ngo zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[125b.5\]]dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag khyed 'thab krol 
[\[125b.6\]]dang mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas/_'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste bden nam/_btsun pa mad lags so/_/dge slong dag 'thab krol ma byed cig_/mtshang ma 'dru zhig_/
[\[125b.7\]]ma rtsod cig_/ma 'gyed cig_/gzhan yang ngas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong gnas nas phyung bas 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/_mdo sde 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/_de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa pha rol gnon pa/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa yin te/_gal te bdag gis ltung ba chos bzhin du slar ma byas na des na dge 'dun 'thab krol 
[\[126a.2\]]dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis ltung ba phyir chos bzhin bya'o/_/gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[126a.3\]]ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gzengs bstod nas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas 'byin 
[\[126a.4\]]pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag khyed 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas/_
[\[126a.5\]]'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste bden nam btsun pa mad lags so/_/dge slong dag 'thab krol ma byed cig_/mtshang ma 'dru zhig_/ma rtsod cig_/ma 'gyed cig_/gzhan yang ngas gnas 
[\[126a.6\]]nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong gnas nas 'byin pa 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa yin la 'di'i 
[\[126a.7\]]grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa yin te/_gal te bdag gis de la mi 'dod pa glengs sam/_dran par byas na des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di la mi 'dod pa gleng bar mi bya dran par mi bya'o/_/gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[126b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal na/_'on kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing /_da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa'i skabs de/_dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[126b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces 
[\[126b.4\]]bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag khyed la ngas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing /_da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad lags so/_/dge slong 
[\[126b.5\]]dag 'thab krol ma byed cig_/mtshang ma 'dru zhig_/ma rtsod cig_/ma 'gyed cig_/dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa 'byung zhing gnas nas las su bya ba gang dag yin pa gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_
[\[126b.6\]]gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byas pa rnams ma byas pa dang 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /_dge slong dag khyed dang dge slong de rnams su de rnams dang khyed du tha dad du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag gnyis 
[\[126b.7\]]po 'di dag ni tha dad par gnas pa yin te/_gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa dang /_gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong dge 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]slong rnams 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na ched du bsams te chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba ste/_de lta bu ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas 
[\[127a.2\]]su bzhag pa yin no/_/dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang /_phyir mi byed pa dang /_sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba gnas nas phyung ba ste/_'di ni dge 'dun gyis chos kyis yin 
[\[127a.3\]]no/_/dge slong dag gnyis po 'di dag ni mthun par gnas pa yin te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa dang /_gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas 
[\[127a.4\]]su bzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na ched du bsams te/_chos ma yin pa'i phyogs nas chos kyi phyogs su 'gro ba ste/_'di 
[\[127a.5\]]ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no/_/dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa dang /_phyir mi byed pa dang /_sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba gnas 
[\[127a.6\]]nas phyung ba 'byin pa ni dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams 
[\[127a.7\]]gzengs bstod nas/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]ngas de skad ces bka' stsal na/_'on kyang khyed 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing /_da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad lags so zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad 
[\[127b.2\]]ces gsungs kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa las 
[\[127b.3\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs te bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad pa yin zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[127b.4\]]skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku skal la nod par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/de na rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams zas kyi phyir 
[\[127b.5\]]khyim gyi nang du zhugs pa dang 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas par gyur te/_'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am ltung ba ma byung ngo zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de ni phan tshun rdeg pa la zhugs 
[\[127b.6\]]so/_/de nas dge slong bsod snyoms nod pas bsod snyoms khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bsod snyoms mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug go/_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[127b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_dge slong cig dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod pa'i kha zas kyis tshim par byas sam zhes gsung pa yin pas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]kyis bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_dge slong ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun la kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas sam/_btsun pa mad par dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas bsod pas 
[\[128a.2\]]tshim par bgyis na/_'on kyang rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams sdum pa'i nang du 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/_ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/da ni phan tshun du rdeg 
[\[128a.3\]]pa la zhugs lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 
[\[128a.4\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kha zas la khyim du zhugs pa na/_'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bar 
[\[128a.5\]]gyur nas 'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas da ni phan tshun du rdeg pa la zhugs so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du bden nam/_btsun pa mad lags so/_/dge slong dag 'thab krol ma byed cig_/mtshang ma 'dru zhig_/ma rtsod cig_/ma 'gyed cig_/gzhan yang ngas rgol ba dang phyir 
[\[128a.6\]]rgol ba'i dge slong rnams khang pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas gang du lus kyi kun du spyod pa rung ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i skabs mi 'byung bar bstan par chad yod par 'dug par 
[\[128a.7\]]bya'o/_/rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs na/_'on kyang dge 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]slong rnams 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'thab krol ma byed cig_/
[\[128b.2\]]mtshang ma 'dru zhig_/ma rtsod cig_/ma 'gyed cig_/dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas na rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang /_zhi bar bya ba dang /_nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i 
[\[128b.3\]]gnas 'di med do/_/dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab krol med pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang /_'gyed pa med par gyur cing gnas na rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang /_zhi bar bya ba dang /_nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i 
[\[128b.4\]]gnas 'di yod do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba dang /_yul ko sa la'i rgyal po ring po len gnyis phan tshun du rtsod par gyur te/_rgyas par ni lung bar ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i le'u las ring po len gyi mdo 'byung ba bzhin no/_/de rnams 
[\[128b.5\]]kyis 'di skad ces smras te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces/_/tshangs byin rga ba sdug bsngal te/_/nor rnams yongs su gtugs pa dang /_/gnyen rnams kyang ni ma mthong dang /_/yul gzhan shi ba sdug bsngal lo/_/zhes bka' stsal pa zhig kyang mchis so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[128b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_tshig mi mthun la phyogs nyams yang /_/'di gtso min zhes sems byed pa/_/dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur na go/_/mthu chung cung zad cis mi bsam/_/srog chags rus pa gcog pa dang /_/rta dang ba lang nor phrogs 
[\[128b.7\]]dang /_/yul 'khor phung bar byas rnams kyang /_/'dum par 'gyur ba nyid yod na/_/chos 'di rnam par shes gyur pa/_/khyed cag ci yi phyir mi 'gyur/_/spyod yul ston par byed pa'i gsung /_/chags las zlog pa lhur len pa/_/brtags nas mkhas par snang 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]ba ni/_/gang la rtsod pa des mi shes/_/gzhan yang bdag cag 'di la ni/_/brtson zhes bya bar mi shes kyi/_/gang dag gis ni 'di shes pa/_/de la gzu bo mi dgos so/_/bdag spyos bdag la kha byas dang /_/bdag rgyal bdag ni pham gyur pa/_/de la gang dag khon 
[\[129a.2\]]'dzin pa/_/de dag sha khon zhi mi 'gyur/_/bdag spyos bdag la kha byas dang /_/bdag rgyal bdag ni pham gyur pa/_/de la gang dag khon mi 'dzin/_/de dag sha khon rab zhir 'gyur/_/'khon du 'dzin pas sha khon dag_/'dir ni gzhar yang zhi mi 'gyur/_/bzod pas sha khon 
[\[129a.3\]]zhi 'gyur ba/_/'di ni g.yung drung chos yin no/_/'khon du 'dzin pas sha khon nam yang zhi mi 'gyur/_/'khon du 'dzin med rnams kyis sha khon zhi bar 'gyur/_/'khon la chags pa lus can rnams la phan mi 'gyur/_/de lta bas na mkhas pa khon du 'dzin mi byed/_/gal te 
[\[129a.4\]]grogs po 'grus skyong lhan cig spyod pa dang /_/legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par gyur na ni/_/zag par 'gyur ba thams cad zil gyis mnan byas nas/_/de dang yid dga' dran dang ldan bzhin spyad par bya/_/gal te grogs po 'grus skyong lhan cig spyod pa dang /_/legs 
[\[129a.5\]]par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par ma gyur na/_/rgyal pos yul 'khor rgya chen spangs par gyur pa bzhin/_/gcig pu 'dug par bya zhing sdig pa rnams mi bya/_/gal te btsal te bdag 'dra ba'am/_/lhag par rnyed par ma gyur na/_/byis pa stongs mor 'gyur med pas/_/gcig 
[\[129a.6\]]pur spyad pa brtan par spyad/_/gcig pur spyod pa legs 'gyur gyi/_/byis pa bstangs pa legs min pas/_/ma tang dgon pa'i glang chen ltar/_/sems las bsnyungs te gcig pus spyad/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_kau shAm+bI'i dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[129a.7\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rje lags/_bde bar gshegs pa ni chos kyi rje lags na/_'di rnams bdag cag la tshig ngan pa dang mi snyan pa mchi na/_bdag cag gis de rnams la ci'i slad du bzod par bgyi lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]rnams kyi spyod tshul dang /_log par sgrub pa des thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab pas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las gshegs te/_mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal 
[\[129b.2\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das der gshegs pa dang /_kau shAm+bI'i dge slong rnams dang /_yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'di lta bu'i spyod lam du gyur te/_snga dro ni zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la 'jug_/zas kyi 'og tu ni sgo bcad nas 
[\[129b.3\]]'thab mo 'gyed par gyur to/_/de rnams tshul dang spyod pa dang log par sgrub pa des lo bcu gnyis 'das so/_/kau shAm+bI'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'dun khang du 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la na bza' chos gos dang /_
[\[129b.4\]]bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams dbul bar shin tu dad na/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod yul 'di lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du spangs te da dung yang ma byon no/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das 'dir 
[\[129b.5\]]gshegs par ga la 'gyur/_'di na da ltar kau shAm+bI'i dge slong rnams kyi tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_log par sgrub pa 'di lta bur byed de/_snga dro zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la zhugs la zas kyi 'og tu sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyed do/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag de rnams la 
[\[129b.6\]]nyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi/_'on kyang bdag cag gis lan te bdag cag gis de rnams la bsod snyoms byin pa'am tshig smras pas so/_/tshur bdag cag gis khrims shig bcas la bzhag ste/_sus kyang de rnams la bsod snyoms mi sbyin zhing tshig kyang mi smra'o zhes de rnams kyis 
[\[129b.7\]]khrims su bcas nas bzhag go/_/de nas phyi de nyin kau shAm+bI'i dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_sus kyang ma smras la bsod snyoms kyang ma byin te/_de rnams ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de ltar bkrus pa nyid kyis sgor byung ste bsod 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]snyoms gcig kyang ma rnyed do/_/de nas de rnams 'dus nas kau shAm+bI'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag re zhig nor zad par gyur pas bsod snyoms mi ster ba ni rigs na/_bdag cag gis ni nyes pa ci byas na tshig kyang mi ster/_de rnams kyis 
[\[130a.2\]]smras pa/_gang dag gis tshul dang spyod pa dang log par sgrub pas ston pa thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab nas/_steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te/_lo bcu gnyis 'das nas da dung yang slar ma gshegs par khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin par bdag nyid 
[\[130a.3\]]khas 'che'am/_de rnams cang mi smra bar 'khod nas/_de rnams kyi drung nas dong ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag de rnams kyis bdag cag brgyad pa ni thog tu bab ste/_gang zhig sa la 'gyel ba de nyid las brten te ldang bas ma dor na mnyan yod du dong la/_bcom ldan 
[\[130a.4\]]'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol lo/_/de nas kau shAm+bI'i dge slong rnams de nyid kyi nub mo 'das nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/_kau shAm+bIr ma zhugs par mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kau shAm+bI'i dge 
[\[130a.5\]]slong 'thab krol byed pa/_mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/_rtsod par byed pa/_'gyed par byed pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos nas gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs phyung bar bgyis te/_'dir gshegs pa de dag ngo tsha med pas tho btsam pa'i phyir bdag 
[\[130a.6\]]cag la gleng bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[130a.7\]]gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis kau shAm+bI'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams 'dir 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]mchi'o zhes thos lags te/_gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs phyung bar bgyis te/_'dir byon pa de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas tho btsam pa nyid du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid/_dran par bgyid na/_de rnams la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_kun dga' 
[\[130b.2\]]bo de dag la dge slong rnams kyis lag brdas gnas mal tha ma zhig bstan pa ma gtogs par gtam 'dre bar mi bya/_phebs par smra bar mi bya/_blta bar mi bya/_rnam par blta bar mi bya'o/_/gal te bdag cag ni rgan na/_ci'i phyir na gnas mal gyi tha ma sbyin zhes smra 
[\[130b.3\]]na/_gang dag gi tshul dang spyod pa dang /_log par sgrub pas ston pa thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab nas 'dir gshegs pa khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin par bdag nyid khas 'che'am/_ston pa thugs rje can des 'di gnang ba nyid kyang khyed dbang bar mi 
[\[130b.4\]]'gyur ro zhes smros shig_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs kau shAm+bI'i dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/_mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/_rtsod par byed pa/_'gyed par byed pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_song la de rnams 
[\[130b.5\]]la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la skye 
[\[130b.6\]]dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis kau shAm+bI'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o zhes thos lags na/_bdag gis 
[\[130b.7\]]de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_gau ta mI khyod kyis kau shAm+bI'i dge slong rnams la 'khor gyi gtso bo yin pas mthong ma thag tu stan dor ba ma gtogs par gtam 'dre bar mi bya/_phebs par smra bar mi bya/_blta bar mi bya/_rnam par blta bar mi bya'o/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]sbyin gyis kau shAm+bI'i dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/_mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/_rtsod par byed pa/_'gyed par byed pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_song la de rnams la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya bcom ldan 
[\[131a.2\]]'das la zhu'o snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[131a.3\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis kau shAm+bI'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o zhes thos lags na/_bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_khyim bdag khyod kyis 
[\[131a.4\]]kau shAm+bI'i dge slong rnams la sbyin pa dang mi mthun pa med pas bsod snyoms ni sbyin gyi/_gtam 'dre bar mi bya/_phebs par smra bar mi bya/_blta bar mi bya/_rnam par blta bar mi bya'o/_/de nas kau shAm+bI'i dge slong rnams rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas/_der lhung bzed dang chos gos 
[\[131a.5\]]mkhos su phab ste rkang pa bkrus nas dris pa/_gnas mal 'ged pa su yin/_phyag tshang dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bo lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe 
[\[131a.6\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag la gnas mal byin cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de rnams la lag brdas gnas mal tha ma zhig bstan par brtsams pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag rgan pa yin na ci'i phyir bdag cag 
[\[131a.7\]]la gnas mal tha ma dag sbyin/_des smras pa/_khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin par zhes bya ba nas de yang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de rnams yi chad cing sdug bsngal bas mtshan mo 'da' bar byed do/_/de nas gnas 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su rang gi rgyud la brtags na de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/_ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba yin no 
[\[131b.2\]]zhe'am gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma yin te ltung ba byung ba yin zhing /_gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma yin te gnas nas dbyung ba yin la/_gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung gis/_ma 
[\[131b.3\]]la bdag gis mthun pa'i sdums bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_nang par sngar langs te gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der song ste/_son nas gnas 
[\[131b.4\]]nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtags nas 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[131b.5\]]gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/_ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma yin 
[\[131b.6\]]te ltung ba byung ba yin zhing gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma yin te gnas nas dbyung ba yin la/_gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung gis/_ma la bdag gis mthun par sdums bya'o snyam na khyed cag 
[\[131b.7\]]ci smra/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]dge slong rnams gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong 
[\[132a.2\]]dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtags 
[\[132a.3\]]na 'di snyam du sems te/_gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba byung nas zhes bya ba nas/_mthun par sdums bya bar sems na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_khyed cag ci smra/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas gnas 
[\[132a.4\]]nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang /_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gnas 
[\[132a.5\]]nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis bcom 
[\[132a.6\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtags na 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba nas mthun par sdums bgyi bar zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_bdag gis dge slong 'di dag thams cad la mthun 
[\[132a.7\]]par bgyi bar spro bar bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag legs so legs so/_/gang zhig dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing /_phyogs dang phyogs gzhan la gnas pa 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]rnams kyi sdums byed pa de ni bsod nams mang po tshad med pa grangs med pa gzhal du med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'ga' zhig gis skra dum bu brgyar gtubs pa thog ma dang tha mar sbyor bar byed pa de bzhin du/_gang zhig dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang zhes bya ba nas mthun par 
[\[132b.2\]]sdums byed pa de ni bsod nams mang po tshad med pa grangs med pa gzhal du med pa skyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag 'on kyang ngas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis dge 
[\[132b.3\]]'dun la dbyung ba gsol bar bya'o/_/gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa dang 
[\[132b.4\]]bcas pas gdud par byas la/_rgan rims kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te tsog tsog por 'dug la 'di skad ces/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag gi gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/_
[\[132b.5\]]ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/_ltung ba ma byung ngo zhes bgyi ba'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba lags so zhe'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba ma lags so zhes bgyi ba bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te ltung ba byung ba lags shing /_gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma lags te/_gnas nas dbyung 
[\[132b.6\]]ba lags la gnas nas phyung ba gang lags pa yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/_gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dbyung bar gsol na/_dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye 
[\[132b.7\]]bar bzung ste bdag dbyung du gsol/_chos ji lta ba bzhin dang 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin phyir bgyi'o zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/_ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/_ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba lags so zhe'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba ma lags so zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 
[\[133a.2\]]ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te ltung ba byung ba lags shing /_gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma lags te gnas nas dbyung ba lags la/_gnas nas phyung ba gang lags pa yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/_gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong 
[\[133a.3\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las bya ba ni/_dge 'dun 
[\[133a.4\]]btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol byung ba zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong gnas nas phyung ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par mdzad na/_
[\[133a.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par 
[\[133a.6\]]bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba phyung lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong dag ngas dge slong dbyung ba'i las byas pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dbyung 
[\[133a.7\]]ba'i las byas pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun las mthun pa gsol ba bya'o/_/gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba nas 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]thugs brtse ba can zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas so/_/de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba 
[\[133b.2\]]dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/_ltung pa byung ngo zhe'am/_ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba lags so zhe'am/_gnas nas dbyung ba ma lags so zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te ltung ba byung ba lags shing /_gnas nas mi 
[\[133b.3\]]dbyung ba ma lags te gnas nas dbyung ba lags la/_gnas nas phyung ba gang lags pa de yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/_gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol nas dge 'dun gyis 'di dbyung 
[\[133b.4\]]ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las mthun pa gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge 
[\[133b.5\]]slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa stsol bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las bya ba ni/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/_ltung ba 
[\[133b.6\]]byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge 'dun 
[\[133b.7\]]gyis dbyung ba'i las byas zin pa gang yin pa de la dge 'dun gyis mthun pa sbyin par bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/ngas dge 'dun gyis mthun pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge 'dun gyis mthun pa byin pa'i dge slong gis gso sbyong 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]gsol ba bya'o/_/gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/_dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar 
[\[134a.2\]]bzung ste mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal du gsol/_de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan 
[\[134a.3\]]du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/_ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_dge 'dun 
[\[134a.4\]]las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dge 'dun gyis mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsol bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las 
[\[134a.5\]]bya ba ni/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/_ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/_ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas/_mthun pa stsal ba ming 'di zhes 
[\[134a.6\]]bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsol bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i 
[\[134a.7\]]gso sbyong stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mthun ba stsal 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis mthun pa byin pa'i dge slong gang la mthun pa'i gso sbyong byin pa de dang /_dge 'dun lhan cig gcig tu 'dug la gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang 
[\[134b.2\]]gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byas te/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bkra shis kyi gso sbyong dang /_mthun pa'i gso sbyong dang /_mi bde ba la gso sbyong bya ba ma gtogs par 
[\[134b.3\]]gso sbyong ma yin par gso sbyong mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shAm+bI'i gzhi rdzogs so//_//[{D1-10}]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po drug bcu dgu pa/_las kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/_ka shi'i gnas pa'i grong khyer na/_/sde 'joms kyis ni dngos po dang /_/tsam par 
[\[134b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/las ma yin dang slar log pa'o/_/yul ka shi'i gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na dge slong sde 'joms zhes bya ba gnas te/_de la brten nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[134b.5\]]la bya ba byed de/_/dge slong glo bur ba gang dag gnas pa'i grong khyer du lhags na de rnams des ngal sor bcug ste/_yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos pa dang dge slong rnams la bsod snyoms sbyor ba'i khyim gang yin pa de rnams su zas la gtong bar 
[\[134b.6\]]byed do/_/ji tsam na rgan zhugs shig gnas pa'i grong khyer du dbyar gnas nas dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das pa dang chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong ste/_rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba dang 
[\[134b.7\]]mnyan yod du phyin to/_/drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo drug sde gang yang rung bas stong par mi 'jog pa yin pas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na nye dga' 'dug pa des rgyang ring po khon nas mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]des bsams pa/_'di ni dge slong gnas brtan zhig yin te 'ong gis bsur 'gro'o zhes des bsu nas gnas brtan byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so/_/des smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/des bsams pa/_kye ma 'di ni rgan zhugs shig yin te/_slob dpon 
[\[135a.2\]]yang mi shes mkhan po yang mi shes so snyam nas rgan zhugs ji srid cig nas 'ongs/_gnas pa'i grong khyer nas so/_/ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/_gtsug lag khang yod do/_/de ci gtsug lag khang yin nam 'on te phongs pa zhig yin/_gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/_phongs 
[\[135a.3\]]pa ni ji lta bu/_gang na yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa de ni gtsug lag khang yin no/_/gang na yo byad med pa de ni phongs pa yin no/_/gal te de lta na de ni gtsug lag khang yin te/_de na dge slong sde 'joms zhes bya ba zhig gnas so/_/de la brten nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi 
[\[135a.4\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la bya ba byed de/_dge slong glo bur ba gang dag der lhags pa de rnams des ngal sor bcug ste/_yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos pa dang dge slong rnams la bsod snyoms sbyor ba'i 
[\[135a.5\]]khyim gang yin pa de rnams su zas la gtong bar byed do/_/drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni nyin par cung zad ci thos pa de dag dgongs ka 'dus nas phan tshun du smra bar byed pa yin pas dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis ji srid du sdug bsngal phog snya bya/_khyed las 'ga' zhig gis gdan 
[\[135a.6\]]rgya che ba snang ba yod pa lta cung zad ci thos/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_yul ka shi'i gnas pa'i grong khyer na dge slong sde 'joms zhes bya ba gnas te/_de la brten nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams zhes bya ba nas/_zas la gtong bar byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[135a.7\]]bzhin du'o/_/gal te 'dod na der 'dong ngo zhes de rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong ste/_rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba las gnas pa'i grong khyer du phyin pa dang /_de rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas sde 'joms kyis mthong nas des bsams 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]pa/_gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa 'di dag 'ong gis ngal sor bcug ste/_mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bstab par bya'i khyim rnams su zas la ni gtang bar mi bya'o snyam nas/_des de rnams ngal sor bcug nas yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs kyi khyim rnams su zas la ni ma btang 
[\[135b.2\]]ngo /_/de rnams las kha cig gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag la rgan zhugs 'dis yo byad thams cad kyis ni bstabs kyis/_khyim rnams su zas la ni ma btang ngo /_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_re zhig gcig grub zin pas khyim rnams su yang gtong bar byed 
[\[135b.3\]]grang /_ji tsam na dge slong gsar bu zhig 'ongs pa dang des de ngal sor bcug ste/_yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos pa dang khyim rnams su zas la btang ngo /_/drug sde rnams khros nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di'i 'dun pa dang zhe sdang 
[\[135b.4\]]ci 'dra ba ltos/_re zhig gal te sngar 'ongs pa zhig yin na yang bdag cag yin la/_yang na rgan pa yin na yang bdag cag yin la/_'on te mang du thos pa zhig yin na yang bdag cag yin na/_dge slong 'di ni 'ongs nas ring po ma lon par gsar bu shes pa dang mi ldan pa yin na/_'dis 
[\[135b.5\]]de la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs nas khyim rnams su zas la btang la bdag cag la ni ma yin no zhes de rnams kyis de la spyos pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyi 'dun pa dang zhe sdang ni de 'dra'o/_/re zhig gal te sngar 'ongs pa zhig yin na yang bdag cag yin la zhes bya ba nas khyod kyis 
[\[135b.6\]]de la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs nas khyim rnams su zas la btang la/_kho bo cag la ni ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gnas brtan dag cung zad nyams par ma gyur tam/_drug sde rnams kyis mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_cang mi smra bar 'dug par 
[\[135b.7\]]bya ba gang yin pa des slar smra'am zhes de rnams kyis de thag bcug nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis de la gleng ba ma byas/_dran bar ma byas shing khas blangs pa med par nan gyis gzhi med pa'i gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/des bsams pa/_bram ze dang 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]khyim bdag rnams dad par bya ba ni dka' la/_ma dad par 'gyur ba ni bla la/_gal te 'dug na gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dad pa ma yin pa skye bar 'gyur bas bdag ni rnam pa thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/_des lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te 
[\[136a.2\]]mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ste/_rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba las mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sde 'joms 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod ngo mthong ba ni bdag cag dga' na 'ongs pa ni ma yin no/_/ci'i phyir 
[\[136a.3\]]khyod la brten nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la bya ba byed la/_dge slong glo bur ba gang dag lhags pa de rnams kyang gnas pa'i grong khyer du rten to/_/de ni bden na bdag la drug sde rnams kyis gleng ba ma byas/_dran 
[\[136a.4\]]par ma byas shing khas blangs pa med par nan gyis gzhi med pa'i gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/ci'i phyir des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang de rnams smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol 
[\[136a.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na deng phyin chad dge slong gis gleng ba ma byas/_/dran par ma byas shing khas blangs pa med par nan gyis gzhi med pa'i gnas nas dbyung ba'i las mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[136a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das tsam pa'i drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi 'gram na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong drug sde rnams chos ma yin pa'i las 'di lta bu dag byed de/_'di lta ste chos ma yin pas mi mthun par byed pa dang /_chos ma yin pas mthun par byed pa dang /_chos kyis mi mthun 
[\[136a.7\]]par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis chos ma yin pa'i las 'di lta bu byed pa 'di lta ste/_chos ma yin pas mthun pa dang /_chos ma yin pas mi mthun pa 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]dang /_chos kyis mi mthun pa mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_gcig gis gcig min gnyis min te/_/mang po rnams kyi bya ba min/_/tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las min te/_/dge 'dun lnga ni las la dbang /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tsam 
[\[136b.2\]]pa'i drang srong gar ga'i rdzing 'gram na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong drug sde rnams chos ma yin pa'i las 'di lta bu dag byed de/_'di lta ste/_gcig gis gcig gi dang /_gcig gis gnyis kyi dang /_gcig gis mang po'i dang /_gnyis kyis gnyis kyi dang /_gnyis kyis 
[\[136b.3\]]gcig gi dang /_gnyis kyis mang po'i dang /_mang pos gcig gi dang /_mang pos gnyis kyi dang /_tshogs kyis tshogs kyi byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gcig gis gcig gi las mi 
[\[136b.4\]]bya ste/_gcig gis gnyis kyi ma yin/_gcig gis mang po'i ma yin/_gnyis kyis gnyis kyi ma yin/_gnyis kyis gcig gi ma yin/_gnyis kyis mang po'i ma yin/_mang pos mang po'i ma yin/_mang pos gcig gi ma yin/_mang pos gnyis kyi ma yin te/_tshogs kyis 
[\[136b.5\]]tshogs kyi mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'on kyang las la dbang ba'i dge 'dun lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong bzhi'i dge 'dun dang /_dge slong lnga'i dge 'dun dang /_dge slong bcu'i dge 'dun dang /_dge slong nyi shu'i dge 'dun dang /_lhag pa'i 
[\[136b.6\]]dge 'dun no/_/gang na dge slong bzhi gnas pa de na dge 'dun gyis chos kyi las bya ba thams cad rung ste/_lnga'i dgag dbye dang /_bcu'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_nyi shu'i dbyung ba ni ma gtogs so/_/gang na dge slong lnga gnas pa de na dge 'dun gyis las bya ba thams cad rung ste/_
[\[136b.7\]]bcu'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_nyi shu'i dbyung ba ni ma gtogs so/_/gang na dge slong bcu gnas pa de na dge 'dun gyi las bya ba thams cad rung ste/_nyi shu'i dbyung ba ni ma gtogs so/_/gang na dge slong nyi shu'am lhag par gnas pa de na dge 'dun gyis chos kyi las bya ba thams cad rung 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]ngo //_//sdom la/_bzhi yi tshogs kyi bya ba la/_/gang zag so sos byed pa dang /_/spo ba dag dang bzhi yis ni/_/las bzhi rnam gnyis dran par bya/_/bzhi'i tshogs kyi bya ba dge slong so so nas byed na/_de ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin 
[\[137a.2\]]no/_/de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba bzhi pa khyim pa dang byed na/_de ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[137a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bzhi pa dge tshul dang /_za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_ma gsod pa dang /_pha gsod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /_mu 
[\[137a.4\]]stegs can dang /_mu stegs can zhugs pa dang /_rku thabs su gnas pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_gnas par mi bya ba dang /_spo ba dang las byed na de ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs 
[\[137a.5\]]can du 'gyur ro/_/bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba bzhi tshang bas chos kyi las byed na/_de ni chos kyi las dang 'dul ba'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las bzhi pa khyim pa ma yin/_dge tshul ma 
[\[137a.6\]]yin zhes bya ba nas bzhi pa gnas par mi bya ba ma yin pa dang /_spo ba ma yin pas byed na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de ni chos kyi las dang 'dul ba'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba 
[\[137a.7\]]lngar ma tshang bas las byed na de ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las lnga pa khyim pa dang zhes bya ba nas lnga pa spo bas byed na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]bzhin du ste/_da ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las lngar tshang bar byed na de ni chos kyi las dang /_'dul ba'i las ni yin no/_/de ni de 
[\[137b.2\]]lta bur bya ste/_des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las lnga pa khyim pa ma yin pa dang /_dge tshul ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_lnga pa spo ba ma yin pas byed na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_chos kyis byed na de ni chos kyi las 
[\[137b.3\]]dang 'dul ba'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur bya ste/_des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las bcur ma tshang bas byed na de ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin te/_de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun 
[\[137b.4\]]yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las bcu pa khyim pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_bcu pa spo bas byed na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 
[\[137b.5\]]'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las tshogs bcur tshang bas las byed na de ni chos kyi las dang 'dul ba'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur bya ste/_des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las bcu pa khyim pa ma yin pa 
[\[137b.6\]]dang zhes bya ba nas bcu pa spo ba ma yin pas chos kyi las byed na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de ni chos kyi las dang 'dul ba'i las yin no/_/de ni de ltar bya ste/_des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las nyi shur ma tshang bas byed na 
[\[137b.7\]]de ni chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las nyi shu pa khyim pa dang dge tshul dang zhes bya ba nas/_/nyi shu pa spo bas byed na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]du ste/_de ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur mi bya ste/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu'i tshogs kyis bya ba nyi shur tshang bas tshogs kyi las byed na/_de ni chos kyi las dang 'dul ba'i las yin 
[\[138a.2\]]no/_/de ni de lta bur bya ste/_/des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las nyi shu pa khyim pa ma yin pa dang dge tshul ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_nyi shu pa spo ba ma yin pas chos kyi las byed na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de ni 
[\[138a.3\]]chos kyi las dang 'dul ba'i las yin no/_/de ni de lta bur bya ste/_des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_chos dang chos min las gang dang /_/gsol ba gang yin des byas dang /_/mngon sum dang ni khas blangs dang /_/'khor lo lta bur bsgre bas 'brel/_/
[\[138a.4\]]chos ma yin pa'i las dang chos kyi las te/_chos ma yin pa'i las gang zhe na/_mi 'os pa la bslang ba la ma thug par slong zhing bslang bar bya ba la ji ltar rjes su bsgrags pa yin pa de bzhin du mi slong ba ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/'os pa la bslang ba la thug pa'i tshe slong zhing bslang 
[\[138a.5\]]bar bya ba la ji ltar bsgrags pa yin pa de bzhin du slong ba ni chos kyi las so/_/mi 'os pa bslang ba la ma thug par slong zhing bslang bar bya ba la ji ltar bsgrags pa yin pa de bzhin du mi slong ba ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/'os pa la bslang ba la thug pa'i tshe slong zhing bslang bar 
[\[138a.6\]]bya ba la ji ltar rjes su bsgrags pa yin pa de bzhin du bslang ba ni chos kyi las so/_/gsol ba ma byas par byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/gsol ba byas nas byed pa ni chos kyi las so/_/gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las la gsol ba ma byas par lan gcig rjes su sgrogs par 
[\[138a.7\]]byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las la gsol ba byas nas lan gcig rjes su sgrogs par byed pa ni chos kyi las so/_/gsol ba dang bzhi'i las la gsol ba ma byas par lan gsum du rjes su sgrogs par byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/gsol 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]ba dang bzhi'i las la gsol ba byas nas lan gsum du rjes su sgrogs par byed pa ni chos kyi las so/_/las gzhan gyis gsol ba byas la gzhan gyis rdzogs par byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/las de nyid kyis gsol ba byas nas rdzogs par byed pa ni chos kyi las so/_/mngon 
[\[138b.2\]]sum du bya ba'i las mngon sum pa ma yin pa la byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/mngon sum du bya ba'i las mngon sum pa la byed pa ni chos kyi las so/_/khas blang bar bya ba'i las khas mi len par byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/khas blang bar bya ba'i las khas len 
[\[138b.3\]]par byed pa ni chos kyi las so/_/mngon sum gyis 'dul bar 'os pa la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/ma myos pas 'dul ba dang /_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa dang /_gang tshul shing mang po brim pa dang /_khas blang bar 'os pa dang /_rtswa bkram pa lta bu 
[\[138b.4\]]dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bskrad pa dang /_spang ba dang /_ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang /_phyir mi byed pas gnas nas dbyung ba dang /_sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma spangs pas gnas nas dbyung pa'i las dang /_spo ba dang /_gzhi nas spo ba dang /_yang gzhi nas bslang 
[\[138b.5\]]ste spo ba dang /_mgu bar bya ba dang /_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang /_yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba dang 'byin par byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/mngon sum gyis 'dul bar 'os pa la mngon sum gyis 'dul ba nyid sbyin gyi dran pas 'dul ba ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[138b.6\]]'byin par byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du chos kyi las so/_/dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa la ma myos pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa dang zhes bya ba nas 'byin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_mngon sum gyis 
[\[138b.7\]]'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa la dran pas 'dul ba nyid sbyin gyi ma myos pas 'dul ba ma yin/_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas/_mngon sum gyis 'dul ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ni chos kyi las so/_/ma myos pas 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]'dul bar 'os pa la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/de bzhin du gang tshul shing mang po sbyin pa zhes bya ba nas/_mngon sum gyis 'dul ba dang dran pas 'dul ba'i bar sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa la ma 
[\[139a.2\]]myos pas 'dul ba nyid sbyin gyi de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas/_dran pas 'dul ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar chos kyi las so/_/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa la gang tshul shing mang po sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/bsdigs pa zhes bya ba nas ma myos 
[\[139a.3\]]pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa nyid sbyin gyi gang tshul shing mang po sbyin pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas/_ma myos pas 'dul ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ni 
[\[139a.4\]]chos kyi las so/_/gang tshul shing mang po sbyin par 'os pa la bsdigs pa'i las byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/smad pa zhes bya ba nas de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa ni zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/gang tshul shing mang po sbyin par 'os pa 
[\[139a.5\]]la gang tshul shing mang po nyid sbyin gyi bsdigs pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas/_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar ni chos kyi las so/_/bsdigs par 'os pa'i las la smad pa'i las byed pa dang spang ba'i las song zhes bya ba nas/_gang tshul shing mang po sbyin par byed pa ni 
[\[139a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_chos ma yin pa'i las so/_/bsdigs par 'os pa'i las la bsdigs pa nyid kyi las byed kyi lhag ma gzhan ma yin pa ste/_bsgre ba 'dis 'khor lo bzhin du bsgre ba ni chos kyi las so/_/smad par 'os pa'i las la spang ba'i las byed pa ni chos ma 
[\[139a.7\]]yin pa'i las so zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin no/_/smad par 'os pa'i las la smad pa'i las nyid byed pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/bskrad par 'os pa'i las la spang ba'i las byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/bskrad par 'os pa'i las la bskrad pa'i las nyid 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]byed pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/spang bar 'os pa'i las la ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/spang bar 'os pa'i las la spang ba nyid kyi las byed pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung 
[\[139b.2\]]bar 'os pa'i las la phyir mi byed pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung bar 'os pa'i las la ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid kyi las byed pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/phyir mi byed pas gnas 
[\[139b.3\]]nas dbyung bar 'os pa'i las la sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba ma spangs pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/phyir mi byed pas gnas nas dbyung bar 'os pa'i las la phyir mi byed pas gnas nas dbyung ba nyid kyi las byed pa ni chos kyi las te 
[\[139b.4\]]gong ma bzhin no/_/sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma spangs pas gnas nas dbyung bar 'os pa'i las la spo ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma spangs pas gnas nas dbyung bar 'os pa'i las la sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma spangs pas gnas 
[\[139b.5\]]nas dbyung ba nyid kyi las byed pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/spo bar 'os pa'i las la gzhi nas spo ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/spo bar 'os pa'i las la spo ba nyid sbyin pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/gzhi nas spo bar 'os pa'i las la 
[\[139b.6\]]gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/gzhi nas spo bar 'os pa'i las la gzhi nas spo ba nyid sbyin pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/spo ba ma spyad pa la mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/spo ba spyad pa la 
[\[139b.7\]]mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/mgu bar bya ba ma spyad pa la 'byin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/mgu bar bya ba spyad pa la 'byin pa ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/dbyung bar 'os pa la mngon sum gyis 'dul ba sbyin pa ni zhes bya ba nas 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]mgu bar bya ba dang mi 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ni chos ma yin pa'i las te gong ma bzhin no/_/dbyung bar 'os pa la dbyung ba nyid byed kyi mngon sum gyis 'dul ba sbyin pa ma yin zhes bya ba nas/_mgu bar bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar ni chos kyi las te gong ma bzhin no/_/
[\[140a.2\]]de bzhin du re res mgo bzung nas 'khor lo bzhin du bsgre ba rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o//_//sdom la/_mi mthun mthun dang 'os pa dang /_/chos dang chos min gnas nas 'byin/_/bslang ba nyid de 'di dag ni/_/las kyi gzhir ni bsdus pa yin/_/mi mthun pa'i las dang mthun pa'i 
[\[140a.3\]]las so/_/mi mthun pa'i las gang zhe na/_mtshams na gnas pa'i dge slong bya bar 'os pa ji snyed pa thams cad ma 'dus shing mngon sum du ma gyur pa dang /_'dun pa blang bar 'os pa rnams las 'dun pa ma blangs par gyur pa dang /_dge slong rnams 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur kyang mi 
[\[140a.4\]]btub cing phyir 'dong ba gang dag gi gshe ba 'os pa rnams mi btub cing phyir dong ba las dag byed na 'di ni mi mthun pa'i las zhes bya'o/_/mthun pa'i las gang zhe na/_mtshams na gnas pa'i dge slong bya bar 'os pa ji snyed pa thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_'dun 
[\[140a.5\]]pa blang bar 'os pa rnams las 'dun pa blang bar gyur pa dang /_dge slong rnams 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur kyang mi btub cing phyir 'dong ba gang dag gshe ba 'os pa rnams btub cing mi gshe ba las dag byed pa 'di ni mthun pa'i las zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[140a.6\]]dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa du zhig gi gshe ba mi 'os pa lags/_nye ba 'khor bcu ste/_ngo tsha med pa dang /_klan ka tshol ba dang /_bus pa dang /_blun po dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa dang /_mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa dang /_bar snang la gnas 
[\[140a.7\]]pa dang /_spyod lam las ldang ba dang /_tshig ma bsdams pa'i'o/_/btsun pa du zhig gi gshe ba 'os pa lags/_nye ba 'khor bzhi ste rang bzhin du gnas pa dang /_mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dang /_spyod lam las ma langs pa dang /_tshig bsdams pa'i 'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa gnas nas dbyung ba'i las du zhig mchis lags/_nye ba 'khor bzhi ste/_mi mthun pa dag gis chos ma yin pas gnas nas 'byin pa dang /_mthun pa dag gis chos ma yin pas dang /_mi mthun pa dag 
[\[140b.2\]]gis chos kyis dang /_mthun pa dag gis chos kyis 'byin pa'o/_/de la gnas nas 'byin pa'i las ni gcig yin te/_'di lta ste/_mthun pa dag gis chos kyis gnas nas 'byin pa'o/_/btsun pa bslang ba'i las du mchis lags nye ba 'khor bzhi ste/_mi mthun pa dag gis 
[\[140b.3\]]chos ma yin pas slong ba dang /_mthun pa dag gis chos ma yin pas dang /_mi mthun pa dag gis chos kyis dang /_mthun pa dag gis chos kyis slong ba'o/_/de la slong ba'i las ni gcig yin te/_'di lta ste/_mthun pa dag gis chos kyis slong bar byed pa'o/_/las kyi 
[\[140b.4\]]gzhi rdzogs so//_//[{D1-11}]phyir bcos pa'i gzhi'i sdom ni/_/dmar ser can gyi gzhi dang ni/_/de bzhin gang zag dag dang ni/_/de nas spo ba bya ba dang /_/gso sbyong gzhag par bya ba dang /_/gnas mal dang ni rtsod pa dang /_/dge 'dun 'byed pa phyi ma yin/_/dmar ser can gyi gzhi'i 
[\[140b.5\]]sdom ni/_dmar ser can dag bsdigs pa dang /_legs ldan smad par bya ba dang /_/'gro mgyogs dang ni nab so gnyis/_/bskrad dang chu stod phyir 'gyed dang /_/'dun pa yi ni ma mthong dang /_/de bzhin slar ni mi 'chos dang /_/'chi ltas sdig pa'i lta ba can/_/'char ka dang ni 
[\[140b.6\]]las lnga'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol byed pa mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/_rtsod par byed pa/_'gyed par byed pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa 
[\[140b.7\]]rnams gnas te/_de rnams dge 'dun la yang dang yang du rtsod pa'i gzhi skyed pas des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung zhing gnas so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dmar ser can gyi dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/_mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/_rtsod par byed pa/_'gyed par byed pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la bsdigs pa'i las byos shig_/
[\[141a.2\]]rgyu lngas bsdigs pa'i las byas na de ni chos ma yin pa'i las dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin te/_des ni dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang gis zhe na/_gleng ba ma byas pa dang /_dran par ma byas pa dang /_gzhi med pa dang /_khas ma blangs pa dang /_
[\[141a.3\]]mngon sum du ma gyur par byed pa'o/_/yang rgyu lngas bsdigs pa'i las byas na de ni chos kyi las dang 'dul ba'i las yin te/_des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang gis zhe na/_gleng ba byas pa dang /_dran par byas pa dang /_gzhi dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[141a.4\]]khas blangs pa dang /_mngon sum du gyur par byed pa'o/_/'di ltar yang bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol 
[\[141a.5\]]ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_/dge slong dmar ser can 'di dag ni 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa dag lags te/_'di dag gis dge 'dun la yang dang 
[\[141a.6\]]yang du rtsod pa'i gzhi skyed par bgyid de/_des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung zhing gnas na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can 'thab 
[\[141a.7\]]krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dmar ser can 'di 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]dag ni 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags te/_'di dag gis dge 'dun la yang dang yang du rtsod pa'i gzhi skyed par bgyid de des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod 
[\[141b.2\]]pa dang /_'gyed pa byung zhing gnas pas/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang 
[\[141b.3\]]dag dge slong dmar ser can rnams la zhes bya ba nas/_bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad par zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po yin te/_de bzhin du las 
[\[141b.4\]]brjod pa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can zhes bya ba nas bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gong 
[\[141b.5\]]ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag ngas bsngags pa'i las byas pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_bsdigs pa'i las byas pa'i dge slong gis rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_gnas mi sbyin dge tshul gzhag par mi bya/_dge slong 
[\[141b.6\]]ma rnams la gdams par mi bya/_dge slong ma rnams kyi gdams ngag dbog par bsko bar mi bya/_sngar bskos na yang dge slong ma rnams la gdams par mi bya'o/_/dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pas 
[\[141b.7\]]gleng ba dang /_dran par mi bya/_gdams ngag sbyin par mi bya ste/_gso sbyong ma yin/_dgag dbye ma yin/_gsol ba dang gnyis pa ma yin/_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las ma yin no/_/bsdigs pa'i las byas pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bsdigs pa'i las byas pa de rnams skra gyen du 'greng ba lta bu dang skra zhig pa lta bu dge 'dun la spu sa la ltung ba lta bur byed/_'byung bar bskyod mtshungs par nye bar ston 
[\[142a.2\]]la mtshams kyi nang du 'dug nas bslang ba gsol te/_'thab krol byed pa nyid spong ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol byed pa 
[\[142a.3\]]bsdigs pa'i las byas pa rnams dang gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la bslang bar gyis shig_/bsdigs pa'i las byas pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni bslang bar mi bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_skra gyen du 'greng ba lta bu dang /_skra zhig pa lta bu dang /_dge 'dun la spu 
[\[142a.4\]]sa la ltung ba lta bur mi byed pa dang /_'byung bar mi bskyod pa dang /_mtshungs par nye bar mi ston pa dang /_mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bslang ba mi gsol ba dang /_'thab krol byed pa de mi spong ba ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[142a.5\]]bsdigs pa'i las byas pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni bslang bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_pho brang 'khor du rton pa dang /_bskos pa 'dus pa'i sar rton pa dang /_mu stegs can la rton pa dang /_gang zag la rton pa dang /_dge 'dun la mi rton pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni zhes 
[\[142a.6\]]bya ba gong ma bzhin no/_/gzhan yang bsdigs pa'i las byas pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni bslang bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_khyim pa'i rtags 'chang ba dang /_mu stegs can gyi rtags 'chang ba dang /_mu stegs can la sten cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_spyod par 
[\[142a.7\]]bya ba ma yin pa spyod pa dang /_dge slong gi bslab pa la mi slob pa ste/_chos 'di lnga zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gzhan yang bsdigs pa'i las byas pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni bslang bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong rnams la gshe bar byed pa dang /_khro bar byed pa 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]dang /_kha zer bar byed pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa med par byed pa dang /_gnas med par brtson par byed pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/yang bsdigs pa'i las byas pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni bslang bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_skra gyen du 
[\[142b.2\]]'greng ba lta bu dang /_skra zhig pa lta bu dang /_dge 'dun la spu sa la ltung ba lta bur byed pa dang /_'byung bar bskyod pa dang /_mtshungs par nye bar ston pa dang /_mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bslang ba gsol ba dang /_'thab krol byed pa nyid spong ba ste chos 'di lnga dang zhes bya ba 
[\[142b.3\]]gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gzhan yang bsdigs pa'i las byas pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni bslang bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_pho brang 'khor du mi rton pa dang /_bskos pa 'dus pa'i sar mi rton pa dang /_mu stegs can la mi rton pa dang /_gang zag la mi rton pa dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[142b.4\]]la rton pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gzhan yang bsdigs pa'i las byas pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni bslang bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_khyim pa'i rtags mi 'chang ba dang /_mu stegs can gyi rtags mi 'chang ba dang /_mu stegs can 
[\[142b.5\]]la mi sten cing mi bsnyen la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa dang /_spyad par bya ba spyod pa dang /_dge slong gi bslab pa la slob pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gzhan yang bsdigs pa'i las byas pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni bslang bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dge 
[\[142b.6\]]slong rnams la mi gshe ba dang /_mi khro ba dang /_kha mi zer ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'i phyir dang /_gnas kyi phyir brtson pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o/_/bslang ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig 
[\[142b.7\]]gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong dmar ser can rnams kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la/_rgan rims kyi mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]'di skad ces/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag cag dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags pas/_bdag cag gis 
[\[143a.2\]]dge 'dun la yang dang yang du rtsod pa'i gzhi bskyed de/_des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung zhing gnas pas/_dge 'dun gyis bdag cag dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par 
[\[143a.3\]]bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bdag cag bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa rnams skra gyen du 'greng ba lta bu dang /_skra zhig pa lta bur dge 'dun la spu sa la ltung bar lta bur bgyid/_
[\[143a.4\]]'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis nas bslang ba gsol te/_'thab krol bgyid pa nyid kyang spong na dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/_bdag cag dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 
[\[143a.5\]]'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa lags pa bslang bar gsol/_de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas so/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 
[\[143a.6\]]'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dmar ser can 'di dag ni 'thab krol bgyid pa nas rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa'i bar du ste/_de dag gis dge 'dun la yang dang yang du rtsod pa'i gzhi skyed de/_des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa 
[\[143a.7\]]dang /_'gyed pa byung zhing gnas pas/_dge 'dun gyis 'thab krol bgyid pa 'di rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'di rnams skra gyen du 'greng ba lta bu dang /_skra zhig pa lta bur dge 'dun la spu sa la ltung ba 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]lta bur bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis nas bslang ba gsol te/_'thab krol bgyid pa nyid kyang spong ngo zhes mchi na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 
[\[143b.2\]]'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can rnams bslang bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dmar ser can 'di dag ni 'thab krol bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa'i bar du ste/_de dag 
[\[143b.3\]]gis dge 'dun la rtsod pa'i gzhi skyed de/_des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung zhing gnas pas/_dge 'dun gyis 'thab krol bgyid pa 'di rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bsdigs pa'i phrin las 
[\[143b.4\]]mdzad lags pa 'di rnams skra gyen du 'greng ba lta bu dang /_skra zhig pa lta bur dge 'dun la spu sa la ltung ba lta bur bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis nas bslang ba gsol te/_'thab krol bgyid pa nyid kyang spong ngo 
[\[143b.5\]]zhes mchi nas/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa rnams bslang bar mdzad na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 
[\[143b.6\]]rnams bslang bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge 
[\[143b.7\]]slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa rnams bslang bar mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bdun bcu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong legs ldan yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin pa zhig ste/_dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin pas de la dge slong rnams kyis spo ba dang /_gzhi nas spo ba dang /_mgu 
[\[144a.2\]]bar bya ba sbyin pa dang /_'byin pas bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang por gyur pas lung nod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems zhi gnas su bya ba shor bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[144a.3\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong legs ldan yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin pa dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la smad pa'i las byos shig_/rgyu lngas smad pa'i las byas na de ni chos ma yin pa'i 
[\[144a.4\]]las dang 'dul ba ma yin pa'i las yin te/_des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang gis zhe na/_gleng ba ma byas pa dang /_dran par ma byas pa dang /_gzhi med pa dang /_khas ma blangs pa dang /_mngon sum du ma gyur par byed pa'o/_/yang rgyu lngas 
[\[144a.5\]]smad pa'i las byas na de ni chos kyi las dang 'dul ba'i las yin te/_des na dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang gis zhe na/_gleng ba byas pa dang /_dran par byas pa dang /_gzhi dang bcas pa dang /_khas blangs pa dang /_mngon sum du gyur pa'i'o/_/
[\[144a.6\]]'di ltar yang bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan 
[\[144a.7\]]du gsol/_dge slong legs ldan 'di ltung ba yang dang yang du bgyid de/_yang dang yang du dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin pas dge slong rnams 'di la spo ba dang /_gzhi nas spo ba dang /_mgu ba stsol ba dang /_'byin pa mdzad pas bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa [{]mangs [,]mang [}]pas lung nod pa dang 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bgyi ba dang /_nang du sems zhi gnas su bgyi ba shor bar gyur lags na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong legs ldan yang dang
