[\[191a.7\]]ba'i srog chags ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig la gcig gnod pa mi byed cing shes bzhin gyi gnas pas ci dga' bar gnas pas lhas dus su char phab pas sa rtag tu me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing dang /_lo tog dang ldan par gyur pa dang bdag ni 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis chos 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]bzhin gyis rgyal srid byas pas 'di ni bdag gi mthu yin no snyam du sems so/_/btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu rnams dang /_blon po rnams dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_yul mi dang /_grong gi mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu yin no snyam du sems te bdag kyang ngo mtshar chen po 
[\[191b.2\]]skyes na/_de'i phyir 'di su'i mthu lags pa the tshom gcad pa'i rigs so/_/des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ni khyod kyi mthu ma lags te/_btsun mo'i ma lags/_gzhon nu rnams kyi ma lags/_blon po rnams kyi ma lags/_khrom gyi ru pa'i ma lags/_grong mi'i ma lags/_
[\[191b.3\]]yul gyi mi'i ma lags te/_'on kyang khyod kyi yul na srog chags bzhi gnas te/_'di ni de dag gi mthu yin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na re zhig bltas mchi'o/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de rnams blta ci 'tshal/_'on kyang de rnams kyis yang dag 
[\[191b.4\]]par blangs te spyad pa gang lags pa de yang dag par blangs te spyad mdzod cig_/de rnams kyis ci zhig yang dag par blangs te spyad/_brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga'o/_/drang srong chen po brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_rgyal po chen po de rnams ni srog chags rnams kyi srog 
[\[191b.5\]]mi gcod/_gzhan gyi bdog pa mi 'phrog_/bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa bgrod par mi byed/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig mi smra/_myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba mi 'thung ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_drang srong chen po gal te de lta na bdag gis kyang brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga po 'di dag yang dag par 
[\[191b.6\]]blangs te spyad par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po des brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te spyad par brtsams so/_/rgyal pos brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te spyad pa dang /_btsun mo rnams kyis kyang brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te spyad par brtsams 
[\[191b.7\]]so/_/gzhon nu rnams dang /_blon po rnams dang /_khrom gyi ru ba dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyis kyang brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te spyad par brtsams so/_/khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs byin btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu rnams 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]dang /_blon po rnams dang /_khrom gyi ru pa rnams dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mir bcas pa'i brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te spyod do zhes thos so/_/thos nas de rnams kyang btsun mo rnams dang /_gzhon nu rnams dang /_blon po rnams 
[\[192a.2\]]dang /_khrom gyi ru pa rnams dang /_grong mi rnams dang /_yul mi rnams dang /_lhan cig tu brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te spyad par brtsams so/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad las phal cher brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te spyad par 
[\[192a.3\]]brtsams so/_/de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling pa 'chi ba'i dus byed na/_de lus zhig nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gya nom pa rnams su skyes so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i 'khor rgyas par mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gus bcas zhe sar bcas pa dag_/
[\[192a.4\]]dka' thub tshal na gnas pa yi/_/gong ma sreg gi tshangs spyod dag_/'jig rten so sor rab tu bstan/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gong ma sreg gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/ri bong ni dge slong shA ri'i bu yin 
[\[192a.5\]]no/_/spre'u ni maud gal gyi bu yin no/_/glang po che ni kun dga' bo yin no/_/de'i tshe yang ngas rgan pa ji lta bu'i bca' ba mdzad de/_rgan pa ji lta ba de la brten nas 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs phal cher sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris rnams su skyes so/_/da ltar 
[\[192a.6\]]yang ngas rgan pa ji lta ba'i bca' ba mdzad de/_rgan pa ji lta ba de la brten nas dge slong rnams gcig la gcig bsnyen bkur byed/_bla mar byed/_rjed par byed/_mchod par byed pas chu'i nang gi ut+pal ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos kyis 'phel bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas 
[\[192a.7\]]na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i gnas brtan dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu rnams la bkur sti dang bcas/_zhe sa dang bcas/_'jigs pa'i dbang du 'gro ba dang bcas pas gnas par bya'o/_/dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/_re zhig dge slong de gnas brtan dang /_bar 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]ma dang /_gsar bu rnams la bkur sti med/_zhe sa med cing 'jigs pa'i dbang du mi 'gro bas gnas na kun du spyod pa'i chos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di med do/_/kun du spyod pa'i chos yongs su ma rgyas par slob pa'i chos rnams yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[192b.2\]]gnas 'di med do/_/slob pa'i chos rnams yongs su ma rgyas par tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di med do/_/rnam par 
[\[192b.3\]]grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su ma rgyas par len ba med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di med do/_/dge slong dag re zhig dge slong de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i gnas brtan dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu rnams la bkur sti dang bcas/_zhe sa 
[\[192b.4\]]dang bcas/_'jigs pa'i dbang du 'gro ba dang bcas pas gnas na kun du spyod pa'i chos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do/_/kun du spyod pa'i chos yongs su rgyas na slob pa'i chos rnams yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do/_/slob pa'i chos rnams yongs su rgyas na 
[\[192b.5\]]tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su rgyas na len pa 
[\[192b.6\]]med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_gnas brtan dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu rnams la bkur sti dang bcas/_zhe sa dang bcas/_'jigs pa'i dbang du 'gro ba dang bcas pas gnas par bya ste/_
[\[192b.7\]]dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde btul ba de rnams dgon pa na gnas te/_de rnams dgon pa na gnas pa na seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gung dang /_chom rkun pa rnams kyi bgrod par gyur to/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]pa/_gang du sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos rnams kyis gnas rung bar gyur snyam na/_gtsug lag khang yin par gzigs so/_/lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag dge 
[\[193a.2\]]bzang zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de dge ba'i rtsa bas sems kyi rgyud bskul nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/_de nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom 
[\[193a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dge bzang la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag 
[\[193a.4\]]par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas 
[\[193a.5\]]khyim bdag dge bzang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te gnang na/_'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi 
[\[193a.6\]]gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis rtsigs shig_/des ci 'dra ba rtsig pa ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te gnas khang gsum brtsig na dbus su dri gtsang khang 
[\[193a.7\]]brtsig par bya zhing /_g.yas g.yon du gnas khang gnyis te/_de ltar na ngos gsum pa la ni gnas khang dgu'o/_/ngos bzhi pa la ni dri gtsang khang gi thad ka dbus su sgo gsum gdod par bya zhing g.yas g.yon du gnas khang gnyis so/_/du rtseg tu bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams kyi gtsug lag khang ni lnga rtseg tu bya'o/_/dri gtsang khang ni bdun rtseg tu bya'o/_/sgo khang steng gi bsil khang yang bdun rtseg tu bya'o/_/dge slong ma rnams kyi gtsug lag khang ni sum rtseg tu bya'o/_/dri gtsang khang ni lnga rtseg tu bya'o/_/sgo 
[\[193b.2\]]khang steng gi bsil khang yang lnga rtseg tu bya'o/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag sbyin pa zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam 
[\[193b.3\]]ba las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas 
[\[193b.4\]]khye'u zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u ming cir gdags/_nye du dag gis smras pa/_khye'u 'di khyim bdag sbyin pa'i bu yin pas/_de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ni bzang sbyin du gdags 
[\[193b.5\]]so zhes de'i ming ni bzang sbyin zhes bya bar btags te/_khye'u bzang sbyin ma ma brgyad po pang na thogs pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs byed pa'i ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o 
[\[193b.6\]]ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying po dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas ma ma'i pang na 
[\[193b.7\]]'dug ste phyir byung ba dang /_slong bas rgyan bslangs pa/_gzhon nu bdag la rgyan dgos kyis bdag la rgyan byin cig_/de dga' ba dang mgu bas de la rgyan byin no/_/de khyim du zhugs pa dang de'i phas ma ma la dris pa/_gzhon nu'i rgyan ga re/_des smras pa/_gzhon nus slong ba po la stsal 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]to/_/de rgyan gzhan dag gis brgyan na de yang byin no/_/de yang brgyan na de yang des byin nas khyim bdag des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo bdag cag gi bu ni bzang po zhig btsas te rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras gal te de lta na 
[\[194a.2\]]slan chad rgyan de lta bu ni mi bgyid do/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo bdag cag la gser dang rin po che tshad med pa yod mod kyi/_rgyan brdung ba med pas 'di mdor na phyi rol du gtang bar mi bya'o zhes de nang kho na na rtsen du 'jug go/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag sbyin pa gla mi'i skye bos yongs 
[\[194a.3\]]su bskor nas 'bab chu a dzir ba til khrus byed du chas pa dang khye'u bzang byin gyis smras pa/_yab bdag kyang mchi'o/_/des de la brid par brtsams te bu 'di nyid na chu bzang po yod do/_/'bab chu ni chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yin pas khyod 'dir ma mas khrus byos shig_/des 
[\[194a.4\]]dus so/_/de'i mas smras pa/_rje'i sras khye'u 'di ci'i slad du du/_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod kyis lhag par bsrungs par gyur na lhan cig bzhud pa la nongs pa ci mchis/_des de khrid de 'bab chu'i ngogs su song nas khrus byas te chu 'gram 
[\[194a.5\]]du bzhag go/_/des smras pa/_yab ci'i slad du bdag bsrung bar mdzad/_bu khyod la nyes pa yod do/_/yab bdag la nongs pa ci 'dra ba zhig mchis/_rgyan byin zhing byin pa dag slong ba rnams la byin pas so/_/yab ci nor don du gnyer ba lags sam/_bu su zhig don du mi gnyer/_yab gal te 
[\[194a.6\]]de lta na bdag cag chab tu 'jug tu stsol cig_/des de chur bcug pa dang /_de nas de'i lag pa gnyis chu nang du bcug nas/_lcags kyi bum pa gser gyis gang ba zhig phyung nas smras pa/_yab 'di las khyod ji tsam bzhed pa'i nor gyis nor gyi bya ba mdzod la lhag ma 'di nyid du chug cig_/bu khyod kyis 
[\[194a.7\]]ci chu nang na yod pa'i gter mthong ngam/_yab chu na mchis pa 'ba' zhig tu ma bas kyi/_thang la mchis pa dang /_bdag po mchis pa dang /_bdag po ma mchis pa dang /_gang dag ring po na mchis pa dang /_gang dag nye ba ma mchis pa yang mthong ngo /_/khyim bdag sbyin pa ngo mtshar 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]skyes pa'i mig bgrad de bsams pa/_nor gyi bdag po 'di lta bus ni sbyin pa btang bar nus so snyam du rig nas smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na ci dga' bar sbyin pa byin cig_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_ji tsam pha gson pa de'i bar du bu'i grags pa mi 'byung ba yin no/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag 
[\[194b.2\]]sbyin pa shi nas bzang sbyin khyim gyi rje bor gyur nas/_de rtag tu mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin pas kun du khyim bdag sbyin pa'i bu bzang sbyin khyim gyi rje bor gyur te/_de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin no zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes 
[\[194b.3\]]bya bar grags so/_/de nas des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba nas khye'u bdun btsas 
[\[194b.4\]]so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_des drug la khyim phub bo/_/bdun pa legs skyes zhes bya ba de'i chung ma rigs mnyam pa las chung ma btsal na ma rnyed nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de'i ne'u zla bram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i phung po zhes bya ba des de de ltar sems khong du chud pa 
[\[194b.5\]]mthong nas des smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_bdag gis bu drug ni khyim phubs na bdun pa legs skyes kyi chung ma rigs mnyam pa gang las 'di khyim dbub pa gang yin pa de sems mod/_des smras pa/_sems 
[\[194b.6\]]las chung ngur 'dug shig dang /_'di'i chung ma kho bos rigs mnyam pa las btsal lo/_/yul gang du/_des smras pa/_re zhig yul ma ga d+hAr 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du byos shig_/de rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba khyim bdag mgon 
[\[194b.7\]]med zas sbyin dang mtshungs pa gzhan zhig gnas pa de'i khyim du zhugs nas sgo khang du 'dug ste smras pa/_bkra shis par gyur cig_/khyim de'i skye bos smras pa/_bram ze ci zhig slong /_bu mo slong ngo /_/su'i phyir/_mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu legs skyes zhes bya ba de'i'o/_/
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag rigs ni mnyam na/_'on kyang kho bo cag la gnyod mang du dgos so/_/mang khyad ji snyed/_gangs can ri'i glang po che brgya/_rta brgya/_gser gyi rgyan brgya/_dre'u'i shing rta brgya/_tho gar yul gyi bu mo brgya/_bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[195a.2\]]sbrang rtsi'i phung pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la don de'i phyir yi ge spring ba dang /_des kyang bklags nas thams cad sbyar gyis longs shig ces yi ge'i lan spring ngo /_/des nyin zhag dang /_tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam dag bstun nas blangs pa dang /_de nas des gtsang zhing 
[\[195a.3\]]bsod pa'i kha zas mang pos tshim par byas nas bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi khyim du song ste gnas btab pa dang /_'khru bas thebs nas bram ze rnams dang ngo shes pa ma yin pas de rnams mi gtsang bas skrag pas phyir phyung ste bor ba dang stes te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis 
[\[195a.4\]]phyogs der phyin pa de gnyis kyis de mthong ngo /_/de nas de gnyis kyis smyug ma'i tshal bas bzhar nas sa dkar pos bskus te bkrus nas de la chos bshad nas dong ngo /_/de 'khru ba 'chad du ma btub nas des de gnyis la sems dad pa skyed nas shi ba dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes 
[\[195a.5\]]nas/_de rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i drung du song ste gnas bslangs pa dang des smras pa/_khyod song la de nyid du lho sgor gnas thob shig_/des der song ste gnyug mar gnas par gyur to/_/lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gangs can ri'i glang po che brgya skyes 
[\[195a.6\]]su bskur ba dang /_des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kho bo la lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos gangs can gyi ri'i glang po che brgya skyes su bskur gyis/_gal te dgongs par gyur na len pa thong shig ces spring ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na 
[\[195a.7\]]ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag rgyal po'i khab tu bgyi ba cung zad cig la der mchi ste slar mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_legs kyis song la de nas nga'i glang po che brgya zhig blang dgos pa de dag kyang ded de shog shig_/
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]des smras pa/_lha gal te der bdag la 'tshal ba ma mchis na blangs la 'dir mchis nas lha'i thugs mnyes par bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du byos shig_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gnyod mang du khyer nas rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/_/
[\[195b.2\]]de khyim bdag gang gi khyim du gnas btab pa'i khyim bdag de de nyid kyi mtshan mo langs te nang mi rnams la bsgo ba/_nang rje dag longs shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag longs shig_/shing rnams gshegs shig_/me dag bus shig_/'bras chan tshos shig_/tshod ma tshos shig_/
[\[195b.3\]]bca' ba dag bzang du gyis shig_/bkad sa'i zhal ta dag gyis shig_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_ci khyim bdag 'di bag ma len tam/_bag ma gtong ngam/_yul mi rnams 'dis zas la mgron du bos sam/_tshong pa'am/_tshogs 
[\[195b.4\]]sam/_'khor tam/_'dis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po zas la spyan drangs sam snyam du bsams nas/_khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag ci khyod bag ma len tam/_bag ma gtong ngam/_yul mi rnams khyod kyis zas la mgron 
[\[195b.5\]]du bos sam/_tshong pa'am/_tshogs sam/_'khor tam/_khyod kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po zas la spyan drangs sam/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bo bag ma len pa'am/_bag ma gtong ba yang med/_kho bos yul mi yang zas la ma 
[\[195b.6\]]bos/_tshong pa ma yin/_tshogs ma yin/_'khor ma yin/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang zas la spyan drangs pa ma yin te/_'on kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya 
[\[195b.7\]]ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos pa dang /_ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/_ba spu zing zhes byed pas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di su yin/_khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te gos 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/_khyim bdag de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/khyim bdag dge 
[\[196a.2\]]'dun zhes bya ba 'di su yin/_khyim bdag rgyal rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod/_bram ze'i rigs dang /_rje'u 
[\[196a.3\]]rigs dang /_dmangs rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod de/_khyim bdag 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin te/_sang kho 
[\[196a.4\]]bo'i khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da lta gang na bzhugs/_rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi dur khrod kyi bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis bltar rung 
[\[196a.5\]]ngam/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod re zhig sdod cig dang /_gal te 'di nyid du gshegs nas sang mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de'i nub mo sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas gnyid log ste/_de nam ma langs 
[\[196a.6\]]par nam langs pa'i 'du shes kyis lho sgo gang na ba der song ba dang /_de'i tshe pho nya glo bur du 'ong ba dang 'gro ba rnams kyis mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir mtshan mo'i thun dang po dang tha ma gnyis la lho sgo phye ste 'jog go/_/ji tsam na lho sgo phye ba dang snang bas gsal bar gyur pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du 
[\[196a.7\]]sems te/_'di ltar lho sgo phye ste 'dug pas gdon mi za bar nam langs so snyam du rig nas snang ba de nyid du grong khyer nas byung ba dang /_de byung ma thag tu snang ba gang yin pa de med nas slar nam sros par gyur to/_/de yang 'jigs par gyur bag tsha bar gyur zhing spu zing zhes byed par gyur 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]nas bdag mi'am mi ma yin pa'am/_g.yon can 'ga' zhig gis gtses te gnyod mang po yang ma son par phrogs par mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams te slar ldog par 'dod pas lha'i bu sbrang rtsi'i phung po'i 'dug gnas la bskor ba byed cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas lha'i bu sbrang rtsi phung po 
[\[196b.2\]]'di snyam du sems te/_deng nyid du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bden pa mthong bar 'gyur na/_deng nyid 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spangs te lha gzhan la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba snyam du bsams nas/_gang yang lho sgo nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod kyi bar 
[\[196b.3\]]snang brgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog shig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/rta brgya dang ni gser rgyan brgya/_/dre'u'i 
[\[196b.4\]]shing rta brgya dang ni/_/sna tshogs nor gyis sbyar ba yi/_/rta rgod ma yi shing rta brgya/_/gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog shig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[196b.5\]]zhe na/_gangs can ri yi glang chen brgya/_/gser dang nor bus brgyan byas la/_/lus che gshol mda'i mche bar ldan/_/ma tang gar skyes stobs po che/_/gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog shig_/
[\[196b.6\]]khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyis slar log na ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tho gar yul gyi bu mo brgya/_/nor bu'i rna cha gdub kor thogs/_/gser gyi dpung rgyan thogs pa yi/_/mgrin pa rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa/_/gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi/_/bcu 
[\[196b.7\]]drug char yang mi phod do/_/khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog cig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig_/khyim bdag 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]kho bo ni khyod kyi grogs po rnying pa bram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i phung po yin te/_kho bos dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis la sems dad pa bskyed nas shi ba dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes te/_lho sgo 'di nyid na gnyug mar gnas so/_/
[\[197a.2\]]de'i phyir kho bo ni khyod nyid la 'di skad ces/_khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog cig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no zhes smra'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bdun bcu lnga pa/_de nas khyim bdag 
[\[197a.3\]]mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_de la da ltar lha yang brtson par byed kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de blta bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur 
[\[197a.4\]]khrod gang na ba der song ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag cing lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'ong ba la gzhes pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[197a.5\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gis yang dag par dgyes par 'gyur bas yang dag par dgyes par byed de/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ga bde bar mnal tam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal 
[\[197a.6\]]pa/_gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos la/_/zag med rab tu rnam grol ba/_/mya ngan yongs 'das bram ze ni/_/thams cad du ni bde bar mnal/_/'dir ni re ba kun bcang nas/_/thugs kyi rims nad rnams bsal zhing /_/zhi ba thob pa'i thugs kyis ni/_/nye bar zhi ba bde bar mnal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[197a.7\]]kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khrid nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]dang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[197b.2\]]rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam mdzad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams ni mnog chung ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges 
[\[197b.3\]]par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i phan yon gyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_
[\[197b.4\]]skal ba dang ldan zhing yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa kun shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam 
[\[197b.5\]]rgyas par rab tu bstan to/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs te/_dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog 
[\[197b.6\]]med pa tshon du gzhug par 'os pa tshon gyi nang du bcug na legs par tshon rtsi 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam 
[\[197b.7\]]mngon par rtogs so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]gyis mi bkri ba dang /_chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[198a.2\]]pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag skyabs su mchi lags kyi dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon 
[\[198a.3\]]par dad lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag khyod kyi ming ci/_btsun pa bdag gi ming ni bzang sbyin lags mod kyi/_mgon ma mchis pa rnams la 'tshal ma stsol bas des na bdag la skye bo 
[\[198a.4\]]rnams kyis mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to/_/khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/_btsun pa yul phra tsi na zhes bgyi ba na ko sa la rnams kyi grong rdal mnyan yod ces bgyi ba de na bdag mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs shig dang /_
[\[198a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi lags so/_/khyim bdag mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod 
[\[198a.6\]]dam/_btsun pa ma mchis lags so/_/khyim bdag gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_gnas par sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig dang /_bdag gis ci nas kyang mnyan yod du dge slong rnams mchi ba dang gzhan 
[\[198a.7\]]du mchis pa dang /_mchis par sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas des rgyal po'i khab tu bsgrub pa dang /_bya ba gang yin pa de thams cad byas te grub nas slar bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[198b.2\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong zhig stsal du gsol/_bdag de dang lhan cig mnyan yod du bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[198b.3\]]dgongs pa dge slong su zhig gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur snyam na/_dge slong shA ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA 
[\[198b.4\]]ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan to/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 
[\[198b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de nyid kyi nub mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang 
[\[198b.6\]]lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas nas/_zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te gnas mal ji ltar longs spyad pa mkhos su phab nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na 
[\[198b.7\]]ba der rgyu zhing song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam rgyags mang po khyer nas nub mo nub mo zhing mnyan yod du song ste phyin pa dang /_de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang /_nags tshal nas nags tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]tshal dang /_'chag sa nas 'chag sa na dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras so/_/mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la ha cang yang mi nye ba dang /_nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang /_mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang /_sgra chung ba dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_
[\[199a.2\]]rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs de gang na yod pa der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go zhes pa las/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring ha cang 
[\[199a.3\]]yang mi nye la nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang /_mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang /_sgra chung ba dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[199a.4\]]phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/_de rang gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba stsol cig_/der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug 
[\[199a.5\]]lag khang brtsig lags so/_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ma yin te/_skyed mos tshal yin mod kyi de nga'i yin no/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu bdag la skyed 
[\[199a.6\]]mos tshal stsol cig_/bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/_/khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gser bye ba gshibs kyang mi gtang ngo /_/yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[199a.7\]]gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin bcad zin gyis gser dang dbyig long shig_/kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lags so/_/sus rin bcad/_khyod kyis rin bcad mod/_de gnyis rin bcad do/_/ma bcad do zhes rtsod par gyur nas zhal che gcod pa'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]mi gang na ba der dong ba dang /_de'i bar du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par rtsom gyis de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/_de nas zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs 
[\[199b.2\]]pa'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas dgos pa'i phyir 'dus so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /_gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i mi'i drung du song nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal che gcod pa'i sna 
[\[199b.3\]]chen po la gtogs pa rnams la don de rgyas par smras pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nus kun dga'i ra ba rin bcad zin gyis gser dang dbyig long shig_/kun dga' ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yin no/_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 
[\[199b.4\]]shing rta dang /_khur dang /_sgye dang /_gzeb dang /_rnga mo dang /_glang dang /_bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad bye bas gshib par brtsams pa dang /_sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[199b.5\]]mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/_gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/_ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam pa dang /_gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis 
[\[199b.6\]]bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po yongs su btang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod gal te 'gyod pa skyes 
[\[199b.7\]]na gser dang dbyig khyer cig_/kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyi yin no/_/gzhon nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te/_'on kyang don 'di sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug pa ni gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'dir bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]yang ma yin/_ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo/_/de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/_chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_de la da ltar khyim 
[\[200a.2\]]bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po chen po yongs su gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di kho bo la byin cig_/der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par 
[\[200a.3\]]bya'o/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed lam bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin nas der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang rtsig tu bcug go/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par 
[\[200a.4\]]brtsams pa dang /_mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas glongs pa'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsig shig_/ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer 
[\[200a.5\]]rnams bgos te dge sbyong gau ta ma'i ni rgyal po'i khab yin no/_/kho bo cag gi ni mnyan yod yin no/_/des smras pa/_khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi/_bdag gi nor ma bgos pas bdag gang la mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyi phung po brtsig go/_/de rnams rgyal po'i 
[\[200a.6\]]drung du dong ba dang /_de yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang /_mu stegs spyi rdol can mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod 'dod dgur byed du mi gzhug ste/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/_gal te nga'i shags 
[\[200a.7\]]kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig_/des smras pa/_rung gis re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu kho na la brtag go/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces/_khyim bdag khyod 'dod dgur byed du mi 
[\[200b.2\]]gzhug ste/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchi na/_de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_ci 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 
[\[200b.3\]]'on te med ces bsams pa las yod par mthong ngo /_/su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na/_bdag kho na la rag las par mthong ngo /_/yang bsams pa/_ci 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/_'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba 
[\[200b.4\]]yod snyam pa las yod par mthong ngo /_/dus ji srid cig na tshogs par 'gyur snyam na/_zhag bdun lon nas so snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/_'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes 
[\[200b.5\]]te/_mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag shA ri'i bu na re rung gis de bzhin du bya'o/_/'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de rnams kyis bsams pa/_'di la ni rgyu gnyis yod 
[\[200b.6\]]par gyur te/_yang na ni de ni 'bros 'dod do/_/yang na ni de phyogs tshol 'dod do/_/de ma yin na dus der gdab ci dgos bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal lo zhes de rnams kyis phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/_de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang kun du rgyu mig dmar mthong nas 
[\[200b.7\]]de rnams kyis de la smras pa/_khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol gyis khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig_/dus ji tsam zhig na 'di nas 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]zhag bdun pa'i nyin bar ro/_/rung gis de bzhin du bya ste/_gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig_/mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang sems khral skyes nas nyin re zhing phyogs tshol ba dang nyi ma bgrang bar byed do/_/ji tsam na zhag bdun 
[\[201a.2\]]lon pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du bcug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng ge'i khri bshams so/_/yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyang 'dus so/_/mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[201a.3\]]tshogs dang de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mtshar skyes so/_/kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas rtsod pa'i 
[\[201a.4\]]dkyil 'khor du zhugs te 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas dran pa sngon du btang ste/_spyod lam zhi bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug pa dang /_'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng bar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mu stegs can 
[\[201a.5\]]rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag re zhig byed dam/_'on te 'jig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis byas khyod kyis shig shig_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis byas na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'jig mi nus na kun du rgyu mig 
[\[201a.6\]]dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsams nas/_kun du rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis byos shig ngas bshig go/_/de mig 'phrul la byang ba yin pas/_des shing sa ha ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang char 
[\[201a.7\]]drag po phab ste/_des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas phan tshun du rnam par gtor te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to/_/de nas des pad ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas/_des de kun du brnal nas ming gi lhag ma zhig bzhag 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]go/_/des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nam mkha' lding zhig sprul te/_des de blangs so/_/des ro langs shig sprul pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa btab pa las nyes par spyad pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid la gsod par 
[\[201b.2\]]byed pas des de nyid la bsnyags pa dang /_de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas 'phags pa skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags 
[\[201b.3\]]kyi phur ba phyung ba dang ro langs de zhi bar gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshad de/_de dad pa skyes nas smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag 
[\[201b.4\]]'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin pa dang des brtson pa dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon du byas 
[\[201b.5\]]nas dgra bcom par gyur te/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so 
[\[201b.6\]]so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_rnyed pa la chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas tshe 
[\[201b.7\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po tshar bcad do snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du blta bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang khams dang /_rang bzhin 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas so/_/de thos nas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas 
[\[202a.2\]]kyi byang chub tu'o/_/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o/_/kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[202a.3\]]bu'o/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/_/'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/_/mu stegs can 
[\[202a.4\]]rnams kyis bsams pa/_'di bdag cag gis shags kyis tshar gcad par mi nus kyis/_thabs shig bsham par bya ste/_gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du gla mi'i las byas la/_de nas glags rnyed nas 'di bgags te gsad par bya'o snyam nas thams cad 'dus te khyim bdag mgon 
[\[202a.5\]]med zas sbyin gyi drung du song nas son pa dang smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/_de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang /_khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/_/kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas pas yul bor 
[\[202a.6\]]na mi rung ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag par bya'o zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid 
[\[202a.7\]]nas/_bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/_de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang /_khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/_/kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ji 'di rnams la dge 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te med ces bsams pa la zhugs na yod par mthong ngo /_/su zhig la rag las snyam na/_bdag kho na la'o snyam nas des bsams te smras pa/_khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla 
[\[202b.2\]]mi'i las bya bar brtsams pa na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas des de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag cing 'dug pa las 
[\[202b.3\]]de rnams kyis de mthong nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/_dben pa na 'dug pas 'di gsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas/_de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong nas bskor te 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_'di rnams sems ci 'dra ba zhig gis bdag gi 
[\[202b.4\]]drung du lhags snyam na/_ji tsam na gsad pa'i sems kyis yin par mthong nas de lcag thogs te sbad nas des de rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu bskyab tu gsol/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa re zhig 
[\[202b.5\]]song la ngal sor chug cig_/de rnams kyis bsams pa/_'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/_bdag cag gis ni 'di bsad par bsams na/_'di ni bdag cag la byams par sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams 
[\[202b.6\]]kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas te/_de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du 
[\[202b.7\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ste smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/de rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin te/_de rnams kyis brtson pa dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal bar byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa 
[\[203a.2\]]g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan te/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/_dgra 
[\[203a.3\]]bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing rig pa dang /_mngon 
[\[203a.4\]]par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_rnyed pa la chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[203a.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung /_mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum par brtsams so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_'phags pa shA 
[\[203a.6\]]ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/_khyim bdag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de 
[\[203a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/_khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang ba dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/_dad pa 
[\[203b.2\]]de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa de rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /_khang 
[\[203b.3\]]phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug ste/_des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /_khang phran drug bcu brtsigs nas yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa shA 
[\[203b.4\]]ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa na shul tshad ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/_khyim bdag dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tshad tsam mo/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/_khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i 
[\[203b.5\]]lam du 'gro'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug_/sbyin gtong gi khang bdag rtsig tu bcug_/dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/_gdugs dang /_
[\[203b.6\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis brgyan/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag nye bar bkod/_rta babs dag byed du bcug_/dus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go/_/de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/_kye nang 
[\[203b.7\]]rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang /_kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces/_
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti bgyid do zhes kyang stsol cig_/
[\[204a.2\]]jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te/_rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[204a.3\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas/_reg par gnas sam zhes bya 
[\[204a.4\]]ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig_/btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la zhes bya ba nas 
[\[204a.5\]]bkur sti bgyid do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas 
[\[204a.6\]]song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/_dbugs phyin pa/_'khor dbugs phyin pa/_rnam par dul ba/_'khor rnam par dul ba dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/_dang ba 'khor dang ba/_
[\[204a.7\]]khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_glang po che glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_bram 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_dpa' bo dmag gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_
[\[204b.2\]]tshong dpon skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang /_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang /_yul 'khor 
[\[204b.3\]]skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis 
[\[204b.4\]]bskor ba lta bu dang /_brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu dang /_sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu dang /_glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams 
[\[204b.5\]]shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/_sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan zhing /_dpe byad brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/_nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/_rin po che'i 
[\[204b.6\]]ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_mnyan 
[\[204b.7\]]yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /_lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas mngon par 'du mdzad pas/_grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_sa chen po 'di g.yos/_kun du g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg ste/_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs 
[\[205a.2\]]mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur nas/_'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/bar snang la yang lha'i rnga brdung 
[\[205a.3\]]zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas ni steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_a ka ru'i phye ma dang /_rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_gur gum gyi phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag 'thor 
[\[205a.4\]]zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang gzhan yang ya mtshan 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to/_/dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to/_/mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to/_/glang po che 
[\[205a.5\]]yang skad 'byin/_rta yang skad 'byin/_khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to/_/khang pa na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to/_/long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob bo/_/'on pa rnams kyis rna bas thos so/_/lkugs pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to/_/dbang po ma 
[\[205a.6\]]tshang ba rnams ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur to/_/chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to/_/dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to/_/phan tshun khon byung ba rnams ni byams pa thob par gyur to/_/sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to/_/btson du bcings pa rnams 
[\[205a.7\]]ni bcings pa las thar to/_/nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed de/_'di dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so/_/gshegs nas dge slong gi 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu sbreng bar brtsams pa las/_de 'dzag tu ma btub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[205b.2\]]yid mi bde ste bsams pa/_bdag gi las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med de/_'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas 
[\[205b.3\]]sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di phul ba yin gyis/_phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig_/des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug ste sbrengs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[205b.4\]]brjod par mdzad de/_rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod pa mdzad pa na gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gis ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/_dge slong 
[\[205b.5\]]dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes der ming thog mar smos par mdzad do/_/gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_dga' ba dang rab tu 
[\[205b.6\]]dga' ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go/_/de bzhin du sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[205b.7\]]bzhugs so zhes gdags par byas so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las phyogs 'di sngon nam 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]phul lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla 
[\[206a.2\]]na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/_de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod 'dir khyim bdag rgyal zhes bya ba byung ste/_des sa phyogs 'di 
[\[206a.3\]]rgyang grags drug gser dang dbyig gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phul te/_de nyid kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/_/khyim bdag rgyal 
[\[206a.4\]]gyi tsha bo zhig des bsten pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la shin tu dad pa skyes nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste des bsams pa/_gang gis na bdag gis 'di nyin mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong bar 
[\[206a.5\]]'gyur ba'i thabs de ci yod snyam pa dang /_de la rten pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na 'dug pa zhig gis nor bu rin po che 'bar ba zhig skyes su bskur nas/_des de mchod rten la btags pa dang de'i mthus des dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de nyin mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong ngo /_/de nas dad pa skyes te smon lam btab 
[\[206a.6\]]pa/_ji ltar sa phyogs 'di bdag gi zhang pos rgyal bu gzhon nu las gser dang dbyig gshibs pas nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang sa phyogs 'di gser dang dbyig gshibs pas rgyal bu 
[\[206a.7\]]gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing /_de rnams kyi phyi ma shos gang yin pa de'i spyan sngar bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de tshun chad bskal pa sum bcu rtsa gcig pa la ston pa gtsug tor can zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong 
[\[206b.2\]]ma bzhin du ste/_de 'khor dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_des phyogs 'di dpag tshad phyed dang gsum nor bu gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor 
[\[206b.3\]]can nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i 'og tu bskal 
[\[206b.4\]]pa sum bcu rtsa gcig pa de nyid la ston pa thams cad skyob ces bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de 'khor dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba byung ste/_des phyogs 
[\[206b.5\]]'di rgyang grags gnyis mu tig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis 
[\[206b.6\]]de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de 'khor 
[\[206b.7\]]dge slong bzhi khri dang lhan cig phyogs 'dir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/_des phyogs 'dir ba lang gis bkang bas gzhon nu las nyos te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo sum khri thub 
[\[207a.2\]]pa na ston pa gser thub ces bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de 'khor dge slong sum khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya ba byung ste/_des phyogs 'di gos bting bas gzhon nu las 
[\[207a.3\]]nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med 
[\[207a.4\]]zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang phyogs 
[\[207a.5\]]'dir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag chu stod ces bya ba byung ste/_des sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags phyed gser gyi nas bkram pas gzhon nu las nyos te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag 
[\[207a.6\]]chu stod ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/dge slong dag da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[207a.7\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa nga yang 'jig rten du byung nas nga 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang phyogs 'dir gshegs pa na da ltar yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rmon pa dor bcu drug gis rmos pa'i 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]khyon bye ba gshib pas gshibs nas gzhon nu rgyal byed las nyos te nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor dgra bcom pa khrag khrig phrag dgu dang ther 'bum chen po phrag drug 
[\[207b.2\]]phyogs 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des phyogs 'di dpag tshad gsum gser dang dbyig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas byams pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dbul bar 'gyur zhing de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab 
[\[207b.3\]]tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid khyim 
[\[207b.4\]]bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba yin par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_thang la yod pa dang /_chu na yod pa dang /_gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /_gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong bas kun tu khyim bdag mgon med 
[\[207b.5\]]zas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_thang la yod pa dang /_chu na yod pa dang /_gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /_gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong ngo /_/zhes grags so/_/de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu 
[\[207b.6\]]sna tshogs rtog khang du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed de/_shes ldan dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_thang la yod pa dang /_chu na yod pa dang /_gang dag rgyang ring 
[\[207b.7\]]po na yod pa dang /_gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar gyur/_de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u phyugs sten zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod cig dang /_kho bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]gang dag dang ldan na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_thang la yod pa dang /_chu na yod pa dang /_gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /_gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar 'gyur ba brtags la khyed la smra bar bya'o zhes de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'gro ba dang /_
[\[208a.2\]]'dug pa la brtag pa lhur len cing rjes bzhin 'brang ngo /_/ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin chu bo a dzi ra ba tir khrus byas nas byung ba la des de'i rgyab tu thal mo brgyab pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras 
[\[208a.3\]]pa/_khyim bdag khyod ni mkhas pa yin zhing bzod pa dang des pa dang ldan pa yin pas des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_thang la yod pa dang /_chu na yod pa dang /_gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /_gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo /_/des mu 
[\[208a.4\]]stegs can rnams la go bar byas pa dang /_mu stegs can kha ngom can rnams kyis kyang kun du smras pas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni bzod pa dang des pa dang ldan pas des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_thang la yod pa dang /_chu na yod pa dang /_gang dag 
[\[208a.5\]]rgyang ring po na yod pa dang /_gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo zhes kun du sgra grags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mu stegs can brgya stong phrag bye bas kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang 
[\[208a.6\]]ldan na gter mthong bar 'gyur ba shes par bla ba ma yin no/_/'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra ba dang /_dbyig gi skad yod de/_des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_thang la yod pa dang /_chu na yod pa dang /_gang dag rgyang ring po 
[\[208a.7\]]na yod pa dang /_gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo //_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bdun bcu drug pa/_dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/_
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]las de'i rnam par smin pas mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar 
[\[208b.2\]]gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par 
[\[208b.3\]]smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal 
[\[208b.4\]]pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi 
[\[208b.5\]]bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te/_de sos ka'i dus la bab pa'i tshe me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi gzhir nang mi dang lhan cig dong ngo /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[208b.6\]]rnams byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri 'or der phyin nas de skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs zhig 
[\[208b.7\]]na 'dug go/_/skyed mos tshal bsrung ba'i mis khyim bdag de la smras pa/_dpon po phyogs 'di na rab tu byung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can zhig bzhugs so/_/des thos nas de yid dga' bar gyur zhing dad pa skyes te/_gang gi skyed mos tshal na 'di 'dra ba'i rab tu byung ba gnas pa ni bdag skal ba can yin 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]no snyam mo/_/bdag nyid chen po de yang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas khyim bdag des mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_gnyen dang /_nang mi rnams dang lhan cig tu bkur sti chen por byas 
[\[209a.2\]]nas bsregs te/_me de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa de rnams shel las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du rin po che dang bsres te blugs pa dang rus pa de rnams 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/de nas des drung du gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/_ji ltar rus pa 'di rnams rin po che dang bsres nas 
[\[209a.3\]]shin tu 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin pa de bzhin du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di 
[\[209a.4\]]nyid yin te/_'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa dang /_khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bor gyur pa na des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la nor bu 'bar ba btags pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 
[\[209a.5\]]mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba dang /_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin te/_de lta bas 
[\[209a.6\]]na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_las gnag pa dang 'dren ma gang yin pa rnams ni spangs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//_//bar sdom ni/_rgyal dang rgyas pa mchu dang ni/_/srid sbyin dang ni phur bu 
[\[209a.7\]]dang /_/chu stod dang ni zas sbyin dang /_/phyi ma pa ni nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/dbyig rnams dang ni gser dang ni/_/gsum pa nor bu mu tig yin/_/ba dang nas dang gos dang ni/_/bye ba dbyig gis bsdus pa yin/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba'i gshib pas gshibs nas gzhon nu rgyal byed las 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]nyos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dad pa can mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags nas/_de rnams las kha cig mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag gis kyang 'phags pa'i dge 
[\[209b.2\]]'dun gyi slad du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gzhi cung zad brtsig go/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_rin gyis sa nyos la rtsigs shig_/'phags pa rin ci/_ji tsam stsal lags/_dbyig 'di snyed do/_/'phags pa re zhig 'di snyed kyi 'byor pa lta bdag cag la lta ga la mchis/_de lta mod kyi 
[\[209b.3\]]gal te phyogs 'di thob na brtsig go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag la rtogs la gal te byin na rtsigs shig_/dge slong rnams kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brtags pa dang des smras 
[\[209b.4\]]pa/_gal te bdag la brten te bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge 'dun gyi phyir bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po bgyid na stsal to/_/gang zag gi phyir bgyid na mi stsal to zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[209b.5\]]stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge 'dun gyi phyir ni brtsig par bya'o/_/gang zag gi phyir ni yon bdag la brtags te gal te byin na brtsig par bya'o/_/ma byin na brtsig par mi bya'o/_/glo bur ba'i dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags pa na de rnams smos 
[\[209b.6\]]'drin ji lta ba bzhin dge slong rnams kyi drung du song ba dang /_gzhan dag la smos 'drin med pa de dag phongs par gyur nas byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glo bur ba rnams kyi phyir ma bgos pa'i gnas gzhag par bya'o/_/ri 'or zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod ba 
[\[209b.7\]]der dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/_ji tsam na ri 'or der dbyar gyi nang logs su 'jigs pa byung nas/_de na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams skrag nas dgag dbye ma byas par mnyan yod du lhags pa dang /_de nas dge slong rnams kyis lam gyis dub pa ngal sor bcug ste/_
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la gnas mal skos shig_/de rnams kyis dbyar gyi nang logs yin no snyam nas ma bskos pa dang /_glo bur ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed de/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[210a.2\]]pa dag khyed da ltar ston pa nyid bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/_gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal byin cig_/de rnams 'on kyang ma bskos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[210a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas bar dam bca' bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zla ba gsum pa'i dgag dbye bya zhing dbyar zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]la dbyar phyi mar 
[\[210a.4\]]gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_ci tsam na 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang mnyan yod du lhags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[210a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bcas kyi gsum pa ni ma yin no/_/'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams kyang smos 'drin ji lta ba 
[\[210a.6\]]bzhin du ngal sor gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de rnams las su sko bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rnams las su bsko bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de rnams la rnyed pa byin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rnams la rnyed pa mi sbyin no/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[210a.7\]]kyis kha zas kyi rnyed pa yang ma byin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rnams la kha zas kyi rnyed pa ni sbyin gyi gos kyi rnyed pa ni ma yin no/_/dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang mang du brtsigs pa las mnyan yod na dge slong nyung ngu zhig dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/_de rnams stong par 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]'dug pas sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod nams med cing nal phrug rnams kyi gnas su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad bgo bar bya ste/_re res kyang so sor gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi ci ran pa thams cad la longs spyad par 
[\[210b.2\]]bya ste/_la lar ni snga dro 'dug par bya'o/_/la lar ni nyi ma'i gung la'o/_/la lar ni phyi dro'o/_/la lar ni nub mo gnas par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis lag gi las ma byas pas de rnams 'drums par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yon bdag la spro ba bskyed par 
[\[210b.3\]]bya'o/_/gal te grub na de lta na legs/_gal te ma grub par gyur na dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'o/_/gal te mi nus par gyur na ji tsam nus pa de tsam bcos par bya ste/_gzhan ni btang snyoms su gzhag par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe dge 
[\[210b.4\]]slong mang po mnyan yod du lhags pa dang /_de rnams gnas khang gis phongs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnyis dang gsum gyis bgo bar bya ste/_chu snod gzhag pa dang /_'dag chal dang /_sman dang /_so shing gzhag pa dang /_phan tshun gyi them skas ma gtogs par 
[\[210b.5\]]chung ngu na 'dug pa'i tshad tsam yang thams cad kyis 'dra bar bgo bar bya ste/_nye 'khor ni spyi'i yin pa nyid pas bgo bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dgon pa dang /_shing drung dang /_khang stong dang /_ri sul dang /_brag phug dang /_rtswa'i stan dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_dur khrod dang /_nags 
[\[210b.6\]]mtha' dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di rnams su bsam gtan gyis shig_/phyis yid la gcags par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces dgon pa'i bsngags pa mang du gsungs pa de'i tshe dge slong kha cig dgon pa par dam bcas nas dgon pa na gnas pa las/_de rnams de na
