[\[210b.7\]]chom rkun pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to/_/gtogs nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su chos gos tshol ba'i phyir brtson par gyur pas lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_gdon pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba nyams par gyur ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_
[\[211a.2\]]dge slong rnams kyis mi gsal ba zhig tu bzhag pa dang /_dge slong dgon pa pa zhig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas sgo bcad de lde mig blangs nas song ba dang /_dge slong dgon pa pa gzhan dag_/phongs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas gsal bar dge 
[\[211a.3\]]slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug nas/_de ni de na mi gnas par dge slong glo bur ba gang zhig 'ongs pa de la gnas byin nas rnyed pa ni bdag nyid kyis khyer ro/_/ji tsam na dge slong chos gos gsum pa zhig 'ongs pa 
[\[211a.4\]]dang des gtsug lag khang stong bar mthong nas des dris pa/_'di su'i gtsug lag khang yin/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_dge slong nye dga'i yin no/_/de de'i drung du song nas brnyas pa dang des smras pa/_gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug la rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo'i yin no/_/de der gnas 
[\[211a.5\]]te des gtsug lag khang de lan 'ga' yang phyag dar ma byas/_ba'i lci ba gsar ba'i byug bas ma byugs so/_/de ji tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang de nas song ngo /_/dge slong gzhan zhig 'ongs te des kyang nye dga' las brnyas nas gtsug lag khang der gnas pa dang /_gtsug lag khang de phyag 
[\[211a.6\]]dar gyi phung pos gang bar mthong nas der phyag dar byas nas phyag dar bor te/_phyags ma zin bzhin du phyag dar gyi phung po'i drung na 'greng ba dang /_ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod phyags ma lag na thogs bzhin du de nyid na 'greng ngam ci/_phyags ma de 
[\[211a.7\]]mi bzhag gam/_des smras pa/_'di na lag pa srung ba 'ga' zhig gnas pa lta ste/_des na phyags ma'i rjes kyang med do/_/des smras pa/_'di na dge slong chos gos gsum pa che ge mo zhig gnas gnas so/_/ji tsam na des de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas ma nongs so/_/des smras pa/_
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]rnyed pa ni nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyer la de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag dar bya'am zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnyed pa su 'khyer ba des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag shi ba 
[\[211b.2\]]rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'don pa na/_khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na/_des de yon bsngo ba thos te de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa gal te bdag gis kyang gtsug 
[\[211b.3\]]lag khang brtsig na/_bdag gi ming gis kyang yon bshad pa mdzad dam/_des smras pa/_rtsigs shig dang /_legs par bsngo'o/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig tu bcug nas des der ci yang ma bzhag go/_/de stong pa nyid du 'dug pa ji tsam na khyim bdag des mthong nas 
[\[211b.4\]]des gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang stong par mchis na de na su yang mi bzhugs sam/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mi snum pas so/_/khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa tshwa sgo can dgon dung la brtsigs pa la ga la snum 
[\[211b.5\]]par 'gyur/_khyim bdag de la bsams nas kho bo smra ba ma yin te/_'on kyang de na rnyed pa med do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa da ni bdag gi gtsug lag khang du su bzhugs pa la ras yug chen po bskon no/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]rnyed pa thob bo snyam nas gral rim gyis bab pa na rang gi skal ba blangs nas 
[\[211b.6\]]de ni gzhan nyid na gnas te/_de ni stong par 'dug go/_/ji tsam na bsod snyoms pa mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs pa des gtsug lag khang stong pa de mthong nas/_des dge slong dag la dris pa/_gtsug lag khang 'di su'i yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug 
[\[211b.7\]]lag khang yin mod kyi/_dge slong nye dga'i skal bar dbang ngo /_/de nye dga'i drung du song nas khyod kyi skal ba'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_de bzhin du byos shig_/de de na gnas pa na bsod snyoms pa de mkhas pa snyom las mi byed pa zhig yin pas des de nyi ma 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]re rer byug pa dang /_phyag dar byas so/_/phyag dar byed pa la ni phan yon lnga yod de/_'di lta ste/_bdag nyid sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang /_lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i 
[\[212a.2\]]rtsa ba sogs pa dang /_lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gis gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gis khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste smras pa des thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/_/ji tsam 
[\[212a.3\]]dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der song na gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byug pa dang /_phyag dar byed pa mthong nas de dad pa skyes te/_des bsod snyoms pa la ras yug chen bskon pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thos nas de rings pa rings par song ste smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa gtsug lag khang 'di kho bo'i skal 
[\[212a.4\]]ba yin gyis/_ras yug chen po kho bo la byin cig_/bsod snyoms pas bsams pa/_chags pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin yang 'on kyang 'dis mthus khyer nas bdag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyur ro snyam nas des de la byin pa'i skabs de dge 
[\[212a.5\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la dad pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par bya ba byas pa ni de kho na'i yin no/_/dbyar gyi rnyed pa ni nye dga'i yin no/_/'jig rten ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas bdag nyid dang bu dang 
[\[212a.6\]]chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la mgron du 'bod par byed do/_/dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la khyim rnams su dong ba dang ma byin par len pa rnams kyis 
[\[212a.7\]]gtsug lag khang nas brkus par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo bcad la lde mig blangs la dong bar bya'o/_/ma byin par len pa rnams kyis kyang lde mig byas te brkus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srung ma'i dge slong bzhag la dong bar 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]bya ste/_de la bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par bya'o/_/ma byin par len pa rnams kyis dge slong gzhan khrid de 'ongs nas/_des sgo phye zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rims dang bcas sam/_rims med ces brda bya'o/_/gal te rims 
[\[212b.2\]]dang bcas so zhes zer na mi dbye'o/_/'on te rims med ces smra na dbye bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams 
[\[212b.3\]]kyis lo ma ltar mnyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lo ma ltar mnyen ba ni khyi yin te/_de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang /_gtsug lag 
[\[212b.4\]]khang sder mos brud cing bshang ba dang gci bas ma rung bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas dge slong khyi srel ba'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong khyi srel bas nang par sngar langs la mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang /_gtsug lag khang 
[\[212b.5\]]byul bar bya ste/_sder mos brud pa gang yin pa de snyoms par bya'o/_/bshang ba dang gcis pa yang phyag par bya'o/_/dge slong khyi srel bas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[212b.6\]]nye dga' gtsug lag khang zhig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pa dang /_ji tsam na der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gzhan zhig 'ongs nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_bdag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed byed pa las gnas brtan gnyis par bya ba'am/_
[\[212b.7\]]bdag gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro'o snyam pa las/_gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/_de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba dang /_dge 'dun de'i gnas brtan gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi yin nas des bsams pa/_bdag 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la bdag gi rnyed pa de na yang der zad na spogs med par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ci zhig bya zhes de slar rings pa rings pas gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang /_gnas mal phyed bskos tsam na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas des smras pa/_rgan 
[\[213a.2\]]rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig_/dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to zhes te ma bskos pa dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/_rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig ces pa'i skabs 
[\[213a.3\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la song ba zhig yin na de'i gnas mal rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o/_/gzhan gyi ni gar bab pa bzhin du'o/_/nye dga' lhag 
[\[213a.4\]]par chags pas gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_gtsug lag khang gnyis su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/_des dbyar 'das nas rnyed pa mnos pa dang /_gcig nas kyang ma thob cig shos nas kyang ma thob nas/_gnas mal 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams la kha 
[\[213a.5\]]zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_des dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas de la rnyed pa byin cig_/dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[213a.6\]]gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o/_/gcig nas byin pa dang dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed de gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas na ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang 
[\[213a.7\]]gnyis ka nas phyed phyed sbyin par bya ste/_dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnyis su gnas par dam mi bca'o/_/dam 'cha' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag cig gis gtsug lag khang gnyis rtsig tu bcug ste/_gcig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyi yin no/_/cig shos ni grong mtha' 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]pa rnams kyi yin no/_/khyim bdag de'i kun du spyod pa ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong re re la ras yug chen re re bskon pa yin pas de ras yug chen rnams khyer te dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed 
[\[213b.2\]]pa 'bul lo zhes thos nas des dga' bo la spring ba/_gal te 'di rnyed pa 'bul na skal ba nos shig ces smras nas/_de rings pa rings par dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa/_'o ni gom stangs dang sbyar na dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag 
[\[213b.3\]]khang der song gis/_da ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa las re zhig grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du phul la phyis 'dir dbul lo snyam nas/_de phyir log nas ras yug po che brim par brtsams pa na/_dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang khyim bdag des ras yug po che zhig byin no/_/yang bzed 
[\[213b.4\]]pa dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyod la ras yug po che phul lags na ci yang bzhed dam/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dbyar gnas pas de'i skal ba nod do/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag 
[\[213b.5\]]nas sbyin pa la bsngags pa mdzad pas rang gi lag kho na nas 'bul lo/_/de skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_khyim bdag de ring zhig thogs na grong gi mthar ma song grang snyam du bsams nas/_grong mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du song nas dga' bo la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[213b.6\]]bdag gi ras yug po che rnams mnos sam/_des ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/khyim bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du song ste ras yug po che brims nas song ngo /_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]yang slar dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du brgyugs na ji tsam ras yug po che rnams brims 
[\[213b.7\]]zin pa dang /_de gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa la lhag par chags pa las rnyed pa las nyams nas mya ngan byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags 'don to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa nye dga' lhag 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang lhag par chags pas zas chad par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge 
[\[214a.2\]]slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngos gnyis na gtsug lag khang gnyis shig yod de/_/gcig na ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'o/_/cig shos na ni bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi'o/_/ji tsam na khyi gaN+DI'i sgra shes pa zhig yod de/_de gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yod pa'i 
[\[214a.3\]]gtsug lag khang du song na/_de la dge slong kha cig gis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin pa dang des de zos nas bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/_de yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos na dga' mgur 'gro'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa rnams 
[\[214a.4\]]la glo bur gyi rnyed pa zhig byung nas de rnams kyis sngar gaN+DI'i brdungs pa dang /_khyi des gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas chu rgal bar brtsams te de dbus su phyin pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa can gyi gtsug lag khang gi gaN+DI'i yang brdungs nas de spro ba med nas slar log par brtsams pa las de chu'i 
[\[214a.5\]]rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyi gaN+DI'i sgra shes pa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/_/da ltar yang lhag 
[\[214a.6\]]par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lhag par chags par mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_'thab dang nad pa rdzogs pa dang /_/nub mo'i dus dang ka shi dang /_/shing dang 
[\[214a.7\]]gsing ma 'dug gnas dang /_/cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi zhing /_de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas tho btsam pa'i slad du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid dran par bgyid do zhes thos na/_de rnams kyis de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_nye ba 'khor dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis 
[\[214b.2\]]dge slong 'thab krol byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos na/_gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang /_gnas mal gzung ba drug bya'o/_/gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/_dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi'o/_/gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/_gtsug 
[\[214b.3\]]lag khang thams cad dang /_gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang /_khang phran thams cad dang /_khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang /_kun dga'i ra ba thams cad dang /_kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o/_/gal te gtsug lag khang 
[\[214b.4\]]skos shig ces zer na 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing /_gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig zhe na/_'di yang bskos zin no/_/khang phran skos shig ce na/_'di yang bskos zin no/_/khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/_'di yang bskos zin no/_/
[\[214b.5\]]kun dga'i ra ba skos shig ce na/_'di yang bskos zin no/_/kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na/_'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na gang la nyes pa skyed par 'gyur/_de nas sdo ba rnams med/_phyir rgol ba 
[\[214b.6\]]rnams med/_mi mdza' ba rnams med nas de'i 'og tu rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong nad pa gcig cig yod pa de bas ches 
[\[214b.7\]]rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnas khang bskos te/_de ni thams cad pas gzhon pas de'i gnas khang gzhan ni ma thob bo/_/dge slong des de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnas khang 'di kho bo'i yin par bskos kyis byung shig_/des 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]smras pa/_bdag bro 'tshal bas nam sos pa na'o/_/dge slong de gtum po zhig pas des phyung nas gang dgar bzhag go/_/ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang lta bar 'dod pa lhags pa de rnams kyis dge slong de mthong nas de rnams 
[\[215a.2\]]kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci dge slong 'di gum lags sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'di shi ba ni ma yin no/_/'o na ci'i phyir 'dir bzhag_/'di bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/_'di'i gnas khang de de'i yin par bskos pa dang des 'di phyung 
[\[215a.3\]]nas 'dir bzhag go/_/'phags pa bdag cag khyim pa lags kyang nad pa rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir khyim nas mi 'byin na khyed cag rab tu byung la ston pa yang thugs rje can yin na/_de ji ltar nad pa phyir 'byin par byed ces de rnams smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas 
[\[215a.4\]]byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pa la 
[\[215a.5\]]gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mjal to zhes byas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/ji tsam na zhag drug gam bdun na gnas mal 'gyed par gyur pa na rkang pa rma byung ba ltar byas te gos kyis dkris nas 'dug pa dang /_gnas khang 
[\[215a.6\]]'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams kyis nad pa yin no snyam nas/_de'i gnas mal bskos so/_/de gnas mal bskos zin nas rma'i g.yogs ma bor te 'dug go/_/nad pa lta ba'i dge slong rnams kyis de la dris pa/_ci gnas brtan zhabs bsnyung ba sos sam/_des 
[\[215a.7\]]smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o zhes bka' ma stsal tam/_ci kho bo'i nad rtag par 'gyur ram/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gnas brtan myur du sos par gyur pa na bar sgyu ni ma btab grang /_des smras pa/_kho bo gnas khang sgo drung du 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]gzhag par 'dod dam ci/_dge slong don nyung ba rnams smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed de/_de ltar dge slong dag min bzhin du gnas khang spang ba rang gir byed pa ci'i tha tshig ces pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[215b.2\]]dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na sgyu 'debs pa'i nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par mi bya zhing des rang gir yang mi bya'o/_/rang gir byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//lnga tshan rnams kyi bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_
[\[215b.3\]]mdun du bdar dang rang khrims dang /_/ma chags pa dang de bzhin du/_/snang ba skyes dang byung ba dang /_/bar du gcod dang de bzhin du/_/phyi mar byas pa ltung ba ste/_/bsdus pa'i sdom du bsdus pa yin//_//bar sdom ni/_mdun du bya dang gzhan dang yang /_/nang dang 
[\[215b.4\]]gzhan rnams dag dang ni/_/sems can mang po phan bya ba/_/lnga tshan dag ni dang po yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi rnams la mdo sde dang ma mo bzhag go/_/klu rnams la ni mdo sde'o/_/'dul ba ni zab pa zab par snang ba/_mthong bar dka' ba/_khong du chud 
[\[215b.5\]]par dka' ba/_dgongs pa mang ba/_'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang mthun pa yin na/_dge slong rnams kyis 'dul ba zab pa nyid dang /_dgongs pa mang ba nyid dang /_'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang mthun pa nyid yin pas 'don par mi spro'o/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[215b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bstan pa'i yan lag gang zhig yongs su nyams pa de'i bsngags pa lhag par brjod par mdzad pa yin pas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga 
[\[215b.7\]]yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_'khor bzhis mdun du bdar ba yin/_gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa yin/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi mdzod bsrung ba yin/_dge 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]sbyong dang bram ze gzhan rnams kyi spyi bo na 'dug pa yin/_dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_bslab pa'i ched kyi phyir skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde bar zhugs pa yin no//_//bar sdom ni/_bdag nyid khrims 
[\[216a.2\]]ldan mngon par bsu/_/'gyod pa dang ni bag tsha med/_/chos dang mthun pas byed pa ste/_/lnga tshan gnyis pa yin par bshad/_/gzhan yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di'i rang gi tshul khrims kyi phung pos legs 
[\[216a.3\]]par bsrung zhing legs par sbas pa yin/_'khor bzhis mngon sum du bsu bar bya ba yin/_gang zag 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams kyi ston par gyur pa yin/_dge 'dun gyi nang na bag tsha ba med pas gnas pa yin/_chos dang mthun pas phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa 
[\[216a.4\]]yin no//_//bar sdom ni/_ma 'dres don dang nges pa dang /_/bslab pa yi ni gzhi dag dang /_/snang ba dag ni gnyis po nyid/_/lnga tshan dag ni gsum pa yin/_/gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_don ma 'dres par sel ba 
[\[216a.5\]]yin/_don rnam par gtan la dbab par bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin/_de'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams legs par bzung ba yin/_sems kyi snang ba skyes pas mang du gnas pa yin/_skye bo phyi ma rnams kyi snang ba byed pa yin no//_//sdom ni/_snang ba gsal ba 'od dang ni/_
[\[216a.6\]]sems las chung dang mi stong pa'o/_/gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_phyogs gang na gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gnas pa'i phyogs de ngas snang ba skyes pa dang /_gsal ba skyes pa dang /_'od skyes par mthong /_phyogs 
[\[216a.7\]]der nga thugs khral chung ngur gnas/_phyogs de ngas bstod pa ma yin par mthong ngo //_//sdom ni/_byung dang de nas bcas pa dang /_/rjes su bcas dang de bzhin du/_/bkag dang rjes su gnang ba ni/_/lnga tshan lnga par byas pa'o/_/gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]pa la phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_byung ba shes/_bcas pa shes/_rjes su bcas pa shes/_bkag pa shes/_rjes su gnang ba shes pa yin no//_//sdom ni/_bar chad bar chad ma yin dang /_/gdams ngag dang ni rjes bstan dang /_/slob ma'i mthu ni 
[\[216b.2\]]yod pa ste/_lnga tshan drug pa dag tu bshad/_gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_bar du gcod pa rnams shes/_bar du gcod pa ma yin pa rnams shes/_'doms par byed/_rjes su ston par byed/_lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas 
[\[216b.3\]]rnams gnas 'char 'jug nus so//_//sdom ni/_ltung ba dang ni ltung ba min/_/lci dang yang dang de bzhin du/_/so sor thar pa rgyas par yang /_/gdon pa dag ni lnga tshan yin/_/gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_ltung ba byung ba shes/_ltung 
[\[216b.4\]]ba ma byung ba shes/_lci ba shes/_yang ba shes shing /_de so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa la rgyas par zhugs pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams 
[\[216b.5\]]so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor 'dul ba'i gleng gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par byed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_gus pas bstan par brtsams pas de lus skya bo bseng bseng 
[\[216b.6\]]por gyur zhing ring pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_na bas nyam dmas par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mi rmed/_dus su rmed kyi dus las yol bar mi rmed/_
[\[216b.7\]]don dang ldan pa rmed kyi don dang mi ldan par mi rmed pa ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pas sangs rgyas 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong nye ba 'khor lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur zhing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_na bas nyam dmas par gyur/_des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[217a.2\]]'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis de thos nas spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par bgyid 
[\[217a.3\]]par 'gyur ro zhes gus pas bstan par brtsams te/_des na de lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur zhing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas par gyur lags so/_/byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas 
[\[217a.4\]]lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam bzhir lung dbog par bya ste/_'chag pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba na'o/_/lung nod pa'i dge slong gi spyod lam rnam pa gsum 
[\[217a.5\]]gyis lung nod par bya ste/_gal te lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong 'chag sar lung nod pa'i dge slong 'ongs la gsar bu zhig yin na des phyag byas la/_khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas lus btud de sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o/_/
[\[217a.6\]]ji ste ches rgan pa zhig yin na des khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas lus btud de sems drang por gus pa dang bcas pas/_gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o/_/ji ste 'greng ba na 'ongs pa la gsar bu zhig yin na des phyag byas la khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas stan ches dma' ba la 
[\[217a.7\]]tsog tsog por 'dug la sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o/_/ji ste rgan pa zhig yin na des khams snyoms sam zhes dris la lus btud nas sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o/_/'greng ba la ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug pa dang /_nyal 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis shin tu goms pa dang /_legs par byang ba dang /_the tshom med par byas nas lung dbog par bya'o/_/lung nod pas kyang shin tu byang ba dang /_shin tu zin pa dang /_the tshom med par byas nas lung 
[\[217b.2\]]mnod par bya'o/_/lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong dang /_lung nod pa'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/_'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na/_gtsug lag 
[\[217b.3\]]khang zhig tu nub mo phyin nas de rnams 'grogs bshes ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong rnams kyis ngal sor bcug pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dug ste ci byed gnas mal sko ba bos shig_/de dag gis smras pa ci dgos/_gnas mal bskor gzhug 
[\[217b.4\]]mod/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gnas mal yod kyis bde bar nyol cig dang /_nam nangs nas bsko'o/_/de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pas smras pa/_ci khyed cag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam/_gal te khyed la 'gyed pa yod na rgan rims ji lta 
[\[217b.5\]]ba bzhin du gnas mal skos shig_/de rnams kha stobs can yin pas gnas mal sko ba bred nas gnas mal bskos pa dang /_drug sde de rnams kyis rgan rims bzhin du gnas mal mnos te nyal lo/_/ji tsam gzhon rims kyis bar du sko ba de'i bar du nam nangs so/_/
[\[217b.6\]]drug sde rnams myur ba myur bar langs te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal sdus shig 'dong ngo /_/dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi nub gcig gi phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dag nub mo tho btsam mam/_kye ma'o khyed cag 'di nyid du 'dug shig_/
[\[217b.7\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' mnyan yod du dong ngo /_/'di dag ni rlung nad can yin no zhes byas nas dong ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]nub mo gnas mal bsko bar mi bya'o/_/gal te nub mo lhags na 'grogs bshes ci lta ba bzhin du so sor ngal sor gzhug par bya'o/_/yul zhig nas dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs na de de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par sngar 
[\[218a.2\]]langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro bab tu nye nas de nyid du ra ba zhig gi drung du 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba 
[\[218a.3\]]byed par brtsams so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal zhing lam de nas song ba las des de mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa kun nas mdzes pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin na mi rigs pa mdzad dam ci/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[218a.4\]]dro la bab tu nye ba ma mthong ngam/_'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod/_des smras pa/_khyod ci'i slad du bdag gi khyim du mi byon/_khyod kyi ming ci/_mgon med zas sbyin no/_/kho bos mdo sde de dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi/_
[\[218a.5\]]khyod kyang mi shes la/_khyim yang mi shes so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/_dge slong 'di ni lam ring po nas 'ongs na rgyus mi shes pa zhig yin te/_gdon mi za bar bdag kyang mi shes la/_bdag gi khyim yang mi shes kyis/_'di lta bu la ji 
[\[218a.6\]]ltar byas na rung ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus la/_gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bya'o snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs 
[\[218a.7\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong glo bur ba spyod yul ma 'tshal ba zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro yol du nye nas ra ba zhig gi drung du g.yar zas kyi bgyi ba 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]bgyid de/_ma dad pa rnams yan lag 'dis 'phags pa rnams la smod par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bgyi ste/_gang zhig gang du drol bab 
[\[218b.2\]]pa de der bsod snyoms longs spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis rtsigs shig_/des gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar du bsti gnas dag brtsigs nas dge slong gang zhig 
[\[218b.3\]]gang du dro bab pa de der zas kyi bya ba byed do/_/dge slong gzhan dag chus phongs par gyur nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis der khron pa brkos nas tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum gyis shing rta bkang ste btab pas chu de ro phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes 'jig rten thams cad 
[\[218b.4\]]du grags pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas lhags pa/_dge slong rnams kyis bgags pa dang /_mnyan yod na gnas pa rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa khyed cag la bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis na/_chab 'jig rten thams cad kyi 
[\[218b.5\]]thun mong khyed 'gog par mdzad dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bgag par mi bya'o/_/bud med dge slong rnams la chu slong ba na dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas bcom 
[\[218b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med ni kun nas zhags pa ste/_bdud kyi 'ching ba yin no zhes gsungs pas dge slong rnams bud med la chu sbyin par byed pa na chags par gyur to/_/ji tsam na bud med byad bzhin dang 
[\[218b.7\]]lang tshos rgyags pa zhig dge slong gzhon nu zhig la shin tu chags pas de la chu blangs pa dang /_de yang de la chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis slar log kyang rgyun ma bcad par blugs te/_de yang de la rtog bzhin 'thungs pa la chu de glor song nas shi'o/_/don nyung 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bud med gang zhig chags pas bcings 
[\[219a.2\]]pa'i sems kyis dge slong la chu slong ba de la rang gis sbyin par mi bya'o/_/bud med la chu rgyun ma chad par sbyin par mi bya zhing snyim pa khong la 'thung shig ces bsgo la/_skabs skabs su bcad cing blugs par bya'o/_/gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//
[\[219a.3\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bdun bcu bdun pa/_de'i tshe gang dag bsod snyoms kyi thog ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbul ba de rnams kyis de nyid du dbul bar brtsams pa drug sde rnams kyis thos nas de rnams bsti gnas su dong ste 'dug nas bsod snyoms kyi thog ma khyer te 
[\[219a.4\]]'ong ba gang yin pa de la smras te/_gal te 'o thug yin na ni lhung bzed bzed par byed de/_ci ste chu thug yin na ni rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dge 'dun dang /_mthu chen po'i dge 'dun la phul cig ces smra'o/_/de bzhin du hwags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa la sbyar bar bya ste/_don nyung ba'i 
[\[219a.5\]]dge slong rnams smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o/_/kha brngam byed na 'gal 
[\[219a.6\]]tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong kha cig dgos pa zhig la gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ste/_de rnams der phyin pa na dro la bab kyang 'gyod pas longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[219a.7\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ched du bsams te 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/ma bsams par 'ong ba las gal te dro la bab par gyur na longs spyad par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/phongs pa dang bcas 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]pa'i dus byung ba na dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ba las de na dge slong de rnams longs spyod pa mthong nas yang bza' bar 'dod pa las 'gyod pas longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_byung ba 'di la bcom 
[\[219b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang snga mar de rnams la de yang gal te tshad med pa zhig tu 'brim na blang bar bya'o/_/ji ste dge slong tshad yod par byas pa zhig yin na blang bar mi bya'o/_/len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[219b.3\]]'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ri nag po la gshegs so/_/de'i tshe ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis gnas te/_de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs shing 'dir gshegs 
[\[219b.4\]]par 'gyur ro zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bsams pa/_ston pa'i spyan sngar dge slong ngo tsha med pa/_'dzem pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag la gleng bar byed/_dran par byed par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen po 
[\[219b.5\]]gcig ma gtogs pa dge slong rnams las brtsams te/_gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang /_gnas mal gzung ba yang drug bya'o/_/gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/_dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi'o/_/gnas mal gzung ba drug gang 
[\[219b.6\]]zhe na/_gtsug lag khang thams cad dang /_gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang /_khang phran thams cad dang /_khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang /_kun dga' ra ba thams cad dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[219b.7\]]gtsug lag khang skos shig ces smras pa dang 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing khang phran skos shig ce na/_'di yang bskos zin no/_/gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/_'di yang bskos zin no/_/khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/_'di 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]yang bskos zin no/_/kun dga' ra ba skos shig ce na/_'di yang bskos zin no/_/kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na/_'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya ste/_de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na ngo tsha med pa/_'dzem pa med pas 
[\[220a.2\]]bdag cag la gleng bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang /_gnas mal gzung ba drug byas so/_/ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ri nag po la gshegs pa na de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ni snga nas bsdogs zin to/_/dge slong 
[\[220a.3\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal dang gtsug lag khang skos shig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_gtsug lag khang sngar bskos zin no/_/khang phran skos shig_/de yang bskos zin no/_/gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig_/de yang bskos zin no/_/khang 
[\[220a.4\]]phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig_/de yang bskos zin no/_/kun dga' ra ba skos shig_/de yang bskos zin no/_/kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig_/de yang bskos zin no/_/gang gi phyir de gnyis kyis gnas thams cad ma bskos pa dang de nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du sgra mthon 
[\[220a.5\]]po dang sgra chen po byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mi rmed/_dus su rmed kyi dus las yol bar mi rmed/_don dang ldan par rmed kyi don dang mi ldan par mi rmed pas/_sangs 
[\[220a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa rmed pa de la dus mkhyen pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas 
[\[220a.7\]]pa/_kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen por grag pa 'di ci zhig yin/_des gsol pa/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang gnas mal gzung ba drug bgyis nas dge 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]slong rnams kyis gnas mal ma thob par gyur te/_des na kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po 'di grag lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ngas 'thab krol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la dgongs 
[\[220b.2\]]nas gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang /_gnas mal gzung ba drug mdzad kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa la ni ma yin pas/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las brtsams te gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang /_gnas 
[\[220b.3\]]mal gzung ba drug mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na grong med pa'i dgon pa zhig tu nub mo dgongs btab bo/_/drug sde rnams kyis 
[\[220b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir shing bzang po zhig bzhag nas shing bzang po gzhan ni rang rang gis bzung ngo /_/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis ni shing khong stong dag thob bo/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te 
[\[220b.5\]]bsu nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la brtags na/_ji tsam na drug sde rnams ni shing bzang po dag gi drung na gnas la/_gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi ni shing khong stong rnams mthong nas/_
[\[220b.6\]]des mjal to zhes byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[220b.7\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gtso bo lags te/_yul mtha' dag nas 'byung ba'i rin po che rnams las thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos po gang lags pa de ni bdag gi lags na/_lhag ma rnams las ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]du mchis 'brang dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa rnams kyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags/_'phags pa kauN+Di n+ya dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_
[\[221a.2\]]kun dga' bo dang /_nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams ni zhugs shing khong stong rnams kyi drung na mchis la/_drug sde rnams kyi ni zhugs shing bzang ches lags kyis/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste zhugs shing la yang rgan rims ji lta ba 
[\[221a.3\]]bzhin gyi bca' ba mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 
[\[221a.4\]]mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na shing rnams dang /_sgang bu dang /_gsing ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing 
[\[221a.5\]]dang /_sgang bu dang /_gsing ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams rang nyid sko bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas khang sko ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis phal pa las 
[\[221a.6\]]bskos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gtsug lag khang 'ged par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro 
[\[221a.7\]]ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa mi shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/yang chos lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa 
[\[221b.2\]]ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs la dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa 
[\[221b.3\]]dang re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar spro'am/_de gal te spro bar gyur na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[221b.4\]]gtsug lag khang sko ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bsko ba mdzad 
[\[221b.5\]]do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las bya ba ni/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gtsug lag khang bsko ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang sko bar spro nas 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang 
[\[221b.6\]]sko bar bskos na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 
[\[221b.7\]]'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/gtsug lag khang 'ged pa ji lta ba bzhin du zas la bsko ba dang /_thug pa 'brim pa dang /_bag chos 'brim pa dang /_phran tshegs 'brim pa dang /_snod spyad 'drub pa dang /_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]gos sbed pa dang /_gos 'ged pa dang /_dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang /_dbyar gyi ras chen 'ged pa dang /_mngag gzhug pa dang /_mdzes 'chos pa yang de bzhin te/_chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa 
[\[222a.2\]]ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa mi shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar 
[\[222a.3\]]mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba 
[\[222a.4\]]dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/gtsug lag khang dang zas 'ged dang /_/thug pa 'brim dang bag chos dang /_/
[\[222a.5\]]phran tshegs snod spyad sbed pa dang /_/chos gos gnyis dang de bzhin du/_/dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang /_/'ged pa dang ni mngag gzhug dang /_/de bzhin du ni mdzes 'chos te/_/gang zag bcu gnyis yin par bshad/_/gnas mal gyi gzhi rdzogs so//_//[{D1-16}]rtsod pa zhi 
[\[222a.6\]]bar byed pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/_'thab dang 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang /_/rtsa ba gang dang dge ba gang /_/'gyed pa yin la rtsod min dang /_/'gyed pa dus ni zhi ba dang /_/'gyed pa mngon sum zhi ba dang /_/tshul shing dag ni blang ba yis/_/gdams ngag med pa mngon sum dang /_/dran dang 
[\[222a.7\]]ma myos 'dul 'os dang /_/de yi ngo bo tshol gzhug dang /_/rtswa bkram lta bur 'os pa yis/_/dge 'dun dag ni mthun pa yis/_/de bzhin bya ba'i rtsod pa ni/_/nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes/_/drang srong chen pos rab tu gsungs/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rnams bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe de rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'dong bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de rnams la yang dang yang du chos 'chad par mdzad do/_/rgyal po zas 
[\[222b.2\]]gtsang gi kun du spyod pa ni shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'gro bar byed do/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu'i chos bshad pa na 'khor brgya phrag du 
[\[222b.3\]]ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan par byed do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/_des chos 
[\[222b.4\]]mnyan nas song ngo /_/de nas shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos mnyan te dad pa skyes nas rang gi khyim du song ste smras pa/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas/_kye ma'o chos/_kye ma'o dge 'dun/_sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa 
[\[222b.5\]]yin no/_/ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas smras pa/_rje'i sras de ci lags/_des smras pa/_deng bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po rtogs 
[\[222b.6\]]so/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de mad de/_sangs rgyas byung ba ni khyed cag kho na la 'bras bu dang bcas pa lags kyi bdag cag la ni ma lags so/_/ci'i phyir 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig 
[\[222b.7\]]rten du byung ba ni skyes pa rnams kyi phyir lags kyi bud med rnams kyi phyir ni ma lags so/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo de skad ma smra shig_/bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_thugs brtse ba yin gyis song shig dang /_khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]'das kyi spyan snga nas chos thos par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_lha shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du bzhud la/_lha'i mdun du mngon sum du bdag gis chos mnyan pa g.yar tsha lags so/_/'di ltar gal te 
[\[223a.2\]]lha snga dro bzhud na bdag gis kyang slad dro bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan par bgyi'o/_/shAkya ming chen gyis bsams pa/_lha la gsol gyis 'gro'o snyam pa las yang bsams pa/_rang gi chung ma'i ched la lha la gsol ba byed mi phod kyis/_lha ni skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[223a.3\]]mo chen mo la bkur sti mang du byed de/_de'i tshig nyan par 'gyur bas de la don 'di rig par bya'o snyam nas/_de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la don de smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bka' bzhin 
[\[223a.4\]]'tshal/_lha la gsol bar bgyi'o/_/de nas shAkya ming chen khyim du song nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma rnams la smras pa dang /_de nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma dang /_gzhan dag gi chung ma rnams skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[223a.5\]]mo chen mo gau ta mI la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gau ta mI mkhyen par mdzod cig bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas bcom 
[\[223a.6\]]ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to zhes thos nas bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos de thos par 'tshal gyis bdag cag gi phyir lha la ci nas kyang lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhud la/_bdag cag kyang slad dro mchi bar gsol cig_/des 
[\[223a.7\]]smras pa/_phu nu mo dag khyed kyis sems bskyed pa legs te/_rgyal po zas gtsang la brtag gis skad cig sdod cig_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]mdzod cig_/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to zhes thos so/_/shAkya'i 
[\[223b.2\]]mchis 'brang rnams kyis kyang de skad thos nas de rnams chos nyan par 'tshal na lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gshegs pa'i rigs so/_/bdag gis kyang shAkya'i mchis 'brang rnams ded de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar slad dro mchi bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_snga 
[\[223b.3\]]dro ni de rnams bsdum pa'i bgyi ba dag bgyid pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchi ba'i skabs ma mchis so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i kun du spyod pa ni gang gi tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs tshig smras pa de'i tshe/_lus kyi ba spu zing zhes byed nas langs te/_
[\[223b.4\]]re zhig skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i tshig gi lan ma byin pa de'i bar du mi 'dug pa yin pas des mgo bos btud de smras pa/_gau ta mI bka' bzhin 'tshal/_de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI shAkya'i chung ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan 
[\[223b.5\]]pa'i phyir n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo /_/ji tsam na shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas de dang lhan cig song ste/_gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas 'dod chags dang ma bral ba dag chags pa skye bar zhugs pa de tshe 
[\[223b.6\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas smras pa/_sring mo re zhig khyod kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs nyid kyang bzang mo blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_khyod rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dir 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas 
[\[223b.7\]]te/_bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yang ma yin no zhes de la de skad smras pa dang /_ngo tsha ba snying la phog pas spyi bo smad nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/_rgyan rnams bkrol nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/_de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bskyed ma zhes bya ba dang /_de lhan cig chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pas des de la bos te smras pa/_bskyed ma song la rgyan 'di dag khyim du zhog la shog shig_/de rings par song nas des khyim du bzhag ste slar 'ongs so/_/de nas 
[\[224a.2\]]skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos bshad pa mdzad do/_/chos bshad pa de mdzad pa de'i tshe ji 
[\[224a.3\]]tsam na shAkya'i bu mo zhig mgul pa na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar lta zhing lag pas nom par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos bshad par brtsams so/_/'on kyang de chos la mi gtod kyi 
[\[224a.4\]]mu tig gi do shal kho na la rtog par byed do/_/ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas shAkya'i bu mo mgul pa na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar rtog par byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_nyon mongs 'di 'du byed rnams 'di ltar 
[\[224a.5\]]mi rtag par bshad na mu tig gi do shal 'di la lhag par chags te myur ba myur bar brtag tu ci yod/_gal te bdag gi mu tig gi phreng ba mthong na 'di'i rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo bskyed ma la smras pa/_bskyed ma song 
[\[224a.6\]]la kho mo'i mu tig gi do shal myur du khyer te shog shig_/de chos nyan pa de la sems bsdus pas de 'di snyam du sems te/_kyi hud 'di 'dra ba'i chos 'chad na bdag jo mos mngags pas chos kyi bar chad byung bar gyur te/_mdor na bran gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni re sdug snyam 
[\[224a.7\]]du bsams nas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde bas gdungs pas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_gang yang sdig pas de ring rgyal zhal blta ba dang /_/bde gshegs zhal nas dri med chos mnyan mi 'thob pa/_/bran dngos gzhan dbang sdug bsngal mang po tha chad de/_/
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bdag gi 'tsho ba sngon byas las kyis thob pa ngan/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bu mo bskyed ma 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin mod kyi/_tshe chung zhig yod pas 'di 'khor ba'i btson ra nas dbyung bar bya'o 
[\[224b.2\]]snyam du dgongs nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyis gro ga la/_dge ma skye ba byung na ni/_/'jig pa yin par bsams nas su/_/ngas gsungs pa yi dge ba la/_/brtson 'grus bskyed nas mnyan par bya/_/zhes bris nas byin no/_/de nas bu mo bskyed ma dga' ba dang /_mgu 
[\[224b.3\]]ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas tshigs su bcad pa smras bzhin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kho nas song ba dang /_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur 
[\[224b.4\]]ba nyid/_/ces bya ba yin pas tshe chung zhig yod pa'i las tshogs pa rnyed pa de ba drus ma zhig gis bsad do/_/de sangs rgyas la sems mngon par dad par byas te shi bas sing ga la'i gling du sing ga la'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur te/_gang gi nyi 
[\[224b.5\]]ma la nying mtshams sbyar ba de kho na'i nyin par mu tig gi char ba bab bo/_/rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste smras pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di ni sems can zhig btsun mo'i lhums su zhugs pa de'i mthu lags so/_/ji tsam na mngal gyi smin par bya 
[\[224b.6\]]ba'i phyir de sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi grag cing grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang kha ba ma yin pa dang /_ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa dang /_ha cang lan tshwa can ma yin pa dang /_ha cang mngar ba ma yin 
[\[224b.7\]]pa dang /_ha cang rtsub pa ma yin pa dang /_ha cang bska ba ma yin pa dang /_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_mngar ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_bska ba rnams spangs pa'i kha zas kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas lha'i bu mo dga' 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khri nas khri dang /_khri'u nas khri'ur 'gro zhing 'og gi sa la 'babs par mi byed do/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/_gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin par yang 
[\[225a.2\]]mu tig gi char bab nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_'di ltar bu mo'i mthus mu tig gi char 'bab pa ni de nyid kyi mu tig tu 'gyur ro zhes des de nyid la byin no/_/de nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas bu mo'i ming cir 
[\[225a.3\]]gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_gang gi phyir 'di'i mthus mu tig gi char bab pas de bas na bu mo 'di'i ming mu tig can zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming mu tig can zhes bya bar btags te/_/bu mo mu tig can ma ma 
[\[225a.4\]]brgyad la gtad de/_pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/_de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying 
[\[225a.5\]]po dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa dang /_gnas pas rgyal po nang mi dang bcas 
[\[225a.6\]]pas lhag par bkur sti byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te/_rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang de rnams gru bo che phan phun med par rlung gi shugs kyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin to/_/de 
[\[225a.7\]]nas snod rnams mkhos su phab ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'brang btab bo/_/de rnams kyis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ched du brjod pa dang /_pha rol 'gro byed dang /_bden pa mthong ba dang /_gnas brtan gyi tshigs su bcad 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa dang /_gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ri gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /_thub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /_don gyi tshoms kyi mdo sde rnams rgyas par 'don pa la zhugs pa mu tig can khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas skar khung 
[\[225b.2\]]nas thos nas/_de nas des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha yul dbus kyi tshong pa rnams mchis nas mchid snyan par len to/_/rgyal pos blon po dag la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag glu mkhan rnams khug shig_/de rnams bkug pa dang mu tig can gyis smras 
[\[225b.3\]]pa/_shes ldan dag yul dbus kyi rol mo ci 'dra ba kho mos mnyan gyis long shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mo bdag cag ni rol mo mkhan ma lags te/_bdag cag ni mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rlung gi shugs kyis 'dir mchis pa lags 
[\[225b.4\]]te/_bdag cag gis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi gsung bton to/_/mu tig can gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa de thos nas snying dga' bas ba spu thams cad zing zhes byed de/_de ngo mtshar skyes nas dris pa/_sangs 
[\[225b.5\]]rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid rgyas par smra bar brtsams te/_lha mo shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba/_chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig 
[\[225b.6\]]tu byung ste/_de bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams dang /_ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i 
[\[225b.7\]]rin po che sna bdun 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che'o/_/de la 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing /_de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med 
[\[226a.2\]]cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/_chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[226a.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/_de lta bu de ni sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/mu tig can gyis smras pa/_gang gi tshe khyed cag yul du 'dod pa de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig_/
[\[226a.4\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mo bka' bzhin 'tshal/_sbran par bgyi'o/_/ji tsam na de rnams yul du 'dong ba'i dus la bab nas de rnams kyis mu tig can la sbran pa dang /_des bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gsol pa/_lha dang lha min mi yis phyag bgyis 
[\[226a.5\]]pa/_/skye dang snyun dang bsnyengs las nges byung zhing /_/gtso bo grags pa rgya chen rab grags pa/_/drang srong bdud rtsi'i cha las thugs rjes gnong /_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas yi ge de tshong pa de rnams kyis khyer nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_lam gyis dub 
[\[226a.6\]]pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[226a.7\]]sing ga la'i gling na sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo des mchid yi ge gsol ba 'di lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mu tig can gyi 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas nyid kyis blangs te bklags so/_/bklags nas bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe khyed cag slar 'dong bar gyur pa de'i tshe 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]nga'i snyan du gsol cig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo /_/de nas zong bsgyur te bsgyur ba'i zong thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[226b.2\]]cag mchi na bdag cag gis mu tig can la ji skad bgyi bka' stsal par gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu legs par byi dor byas pa'i ras dang ri mo mkhan dag khug shig_/de rnams kyis ras dang ri mo mkhan dag bkug nas phul ba dang /_bcom 
[\[226b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris shig_/ri mo mkhan rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar brtsams pa las de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa yin pas ri mo 
[\[226b.4\]]mkhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras ston cig dang 'od gtang ngo /_/de rnams kyis ras bstan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od btang ba la ri mo mkhan rnams kyis tshon rtsi sna 
[\[226b.5\]]tshogs kyis rgyas par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og tu gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang mi mthun pa dang /_
[\[226b.6\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bris so/_/gong du ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom bar bya/_/gang 
[\[226b.7\]]zhig rab tu bag yod pas/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bris nas sing ga la'i rgyal po la bka' yig spring pa/_ras la ri mor bris pa ngas mu tig can 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]la skyes su bskur ba yin gyis/_khyod kyis de la sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus la/_bkur sti chen pos ras 'di khrom shig_/tshong pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/_gal te mu tig can 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/_
[\[227a.2\]]'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te 'og ma 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na de dag ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang /_lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar 'gro bar 
[\[227a.3\]]'jug pa dang ldog pa'o/_/'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gong ma 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na spro bar bya ba yin te/_gang zhig skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/_lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs 
[\[227a.4\]]dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa de rnams kyis bcom 
[\[227a.5\]]ldan 'das las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/_zong khyer nas sing ga la'i gling du song ste/_rim gyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin nas lam gyis dub ba ngal sos te/_rgyal po'i drung du 
[\[227a.6\]]song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te yi ge byin no/_/rgyal pos yi ge bklags te bklags nas grong khyer de rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng /_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/_shin tu dri zhim po'i 
[\[227a.7\]]pog por nye bar bzhag_/me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/_sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsogs nas/_de nas bkur sti chen po byas te grong khyer gyi dbus su rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams te/_ras phye ba dang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sangs rgyas 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsang bstod de smras so/_/de nas rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can dad pa drag pos gtad pa'i snying gis ba spu zing zhes byed cing mig mchi mas gang bas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te tshong pa rnams la dris pa/_shes ldan 
[\[227b.2\]]dag 'di ci yin/_de rnams kyis smra bar brtsams pa/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan lags so/_/'og ma 'di dag ci yin/_'di ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang /_lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten 
[\[227b.3\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o/_/'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags so/_/gong ma 'di ci yin/_spro bar bgyi ba lags te/_gang zhig skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te lugs dang mthun pa 
[\[227b.4\]]dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas mu tig can gyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan 
[\[227b.5\]]lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa bsam par brtsams te/_ji srid lan gsum du ma bzlas pa de'i bar du des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des 
[\[227b.6\]]bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas/_/gang la 'di 'dra'i gsos mnga' ba/_/sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/lta ba'i ri bo drungs 
[\[227b.7\]]phyung ste/_/lta ba'i zung rngu sel mdzad pa/_/sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes tshigs su bcad pas smras nas tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag khyed cag nam 'dong ba de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig_/de nas tshong pa rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur te 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]bsgyur ba'i zong rnams khyer nas mu tig can gyi drung du song ste/_lha mo bdag cag mchi na bdag cag gis ci zhig bgyi bar bka' stsal par gsol/_/des smras pa/_kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la gnod pa 
[\[228a.2\]]chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_'tsho'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba dang /_sku nyams dang ldan nam reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces/_btsun pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bgyi ba gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad de/_bdag 
[\[228a.3\]]gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams las ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag_/'khor ba las ni rgyang bsrings/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo 
[\[228a.4\]]las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo ni bskum/_mtho ris thar pa'i sgo ni phye/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/_btsun pa bdag ni 
[\[228a.5\]]'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos de skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/
[\[228a.6\]]zhes gsol la/_mu tig bre gsum po 'di khyer la cha gcig ni sangs rgyas la/_cha gcig ni chos la/_cha gcig ni dge 'dun la phul cig_/de nas tshong pa de rnams kyis zong dang skyes bskur ba yang khyer te dong nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_lam 
[\[228a.7\]]gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas ji skad spring ba bzhin bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/btsun pa skyes su phul ba'i mu tig bre gsum po 'di lags te/_mu tig cha gcig 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]ni sangs rgyas la/_cha gcig ni chos la/_cha gcig ni dge 'dun la phul lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa skyes 'di gang nas mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis shAkya ming 
[\[228b.2\]]chen gyi mngag gzhug ma bskyed ma zhes bya ba nga las chos mnyan nas song ba las/_lam kar ba drus mas bsad pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/des nga la sems dang ba bskyed de shi bas sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can zhes bya bar gyur te/_bden pa 
[\[228b.3\]]mthong nas des skyes bskur ba 'di yin no/_/'di las sangs rgyas kyi skal ba gang yin pa des dri gtsang khang gi zhal zhal byos shig_/chos kyi gang yin pa de ni chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgos shig_/
[\[228b.4\]]dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa mu tig can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na des na bran mor gyur lags/_las ci zhig bgyis na des rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing bden pa mthong bar bgyis 
[\[228b.5\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas mu tig can 'di nyid kyis 
[\[228b.6\]]las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 
[\[228b.7\]]'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i 
[\[229a.2\]]kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/_des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du bA rA Na sIr phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 
[\[229a.3\]]su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_rgyal po kr-i kIs de'i sku dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyis spungs te/_spungs nas bkur sti chen pos bsregs te me de 'o mas bsad nas sku gdung de rnams gser gyi bum par blugs te/_lam po che'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bzhi 
[\[229a.4\]]las byung ba'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa zhig brtsigs nas dus mchod chen po btsugs so/_/bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam 
[\[229a.5\]]thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig yod pa des/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur 
[\[229a.6\]]spyod par byed kyang de la bu pho yang med bu mo yang med nas/_de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas bdag gi khyim du nor phal po che bsags kyang bdag la bu pho yang med bu mo yang med pas bdag shi nas bdog pa thams cad bu med do zhes byas te rgyal pos dbang byas par 
[\[229a.7\]]'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de la dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /_grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mnyes par byos shig dang khyod la bu yod par 'gyur ro/_/de bu med de bu mngon par 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'dod pas zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa gzhan yang lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa 'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_
[\[229b.2\]]gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang /_chos mthun pa pa dang /_rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyus bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jig rten na de skad du grags pa yod de/_de yang de 
[\[229b.3\]]lta ma yin te/_gal te de ltar 'gyur na ni re re yang dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang gnas gsum mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gnas gsum gang zhe na pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing lhan 
[\[229b.4\]]cig 'dus pa dang /_ma mngal rung bar gyur cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/_gnas de gsum mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba yin na des bu yod pa'i las ma byas pas des na de la bu pho dang bu mo med do/_/ji tsam na 
[\[229b.5\]]de nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur to/_/de nas de'i chung mas bsams pa/_bdag gi khyim na nor phal mo che bsags pa ni bdag la bu pho yang 
[\[229b.6\]]med bu mo yang med la/_bdag gi khyim thab 'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/_da ni gal te 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags ma blangs na nor zas 'di thams cad bdag la bu med do zhes byas nas rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de'i mu tig gi do shal brgya 
[\[229b.7\]]stong ri ba mgul na thogs pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten de la dri dang byug pas byugs nas mchod pa byas te btags nas dad pa drag pos drung du gtugs te smon lam btab pa/_sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba dang sems bskyed 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing yon tan 'di lta bu yang thob cing ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed kyi/_mi mnyes par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi chung ma gang 
[\[230a.2\]]yin pa de ni mu tig can 'di nyid yin te/_'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas nas/_smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing btsas pa na mu tig gi char bab bo/_/nga'i bstan 
[\[230a.3\]]pa la yang dad pa bskyed pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/gzhan yang tshong dpon nor mang du bsags pa de'i chung mar gyur ba na de na 'dis dbang phyug gi grags pas rgyags 
[\[230a.4\]]nas spyod yul na gnas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la tshig tu bran mo'i bu zhes smras pas/_de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs mang por bran mor gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin zhing /_gcig 
[\[230a.5\]]tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar la/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no/_/de bas na dge slong dag gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/_gcig tu dkar ba'i las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par 
[\[230a.6\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi cha gang yin pa de ni chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams kyi yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_de nas mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pas/_kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di 
[\[230a.7\]]ni kho bo cag dbang ngo /_/'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nang gi mdzod srung zhing kho bo cag 'dul ba mtha' dag 'dzin pas/_kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo /_/ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]kho bo cag ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas/_kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo zhes de na mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab 
[\[230b.2\]]mo dang /_'gyed pa byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma 'thab shig_/mtshang ma 'dru zhig_/'thab mo ma byed cig_/ma 'gyed cig_/dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni rtsod pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[230b.3\]]'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang /_gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang /_ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang /_bya ba'i rtsod pa'o/_/'gyed pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/_dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/_'gal bar smra ba/_rigs mi 'phrod par smra ba/_mi mthun pa kun tu mi dga' ba/_rgyud 
[\[230b.4\]]gcig tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o/_/gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/_dge 'dun gyi gdams ngag mi len pa dang /_gdams ngag 
[\[230b.5\]]mi sbyin pa dang /_gdams ngag gzhag pa gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o/_/ltung ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/_ltung ba lnga ni ltung ba'i phung po lnga 
[\[230b.6\]]zhes bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_phas pham pa dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba dang /_nyes byas gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ltung ba'i 
[\[230b.7\]]rtsod pa zhes bya'o/_/bya ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/_dge 'dun gyi bya ba gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni bya ba'i 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]rtsod pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/_'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug dang /_'gyed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi ste/_'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'di na la la 
[\[231a.2\]]khro ba yin zhing khon du 'dzin pa yin te khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni ston pa la bkur sti mi byed/_bla mar mi byed/_ri mor mi byed/_mchod par mi byed do/_/ston pa la bkur sti ma byas/_bla mar ma byas/_ri mor ma byas/_mchod par ma byas pas chos mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[231a.3\]]chos ma mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta'o/_/dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta na dge 'dun la 'di lta bu'i 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa 'byin par byed do/_/'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni skye bo 
[\[231a.4\]]mang po la phan pa ma yin pa dang /_skye bo mang po la gnod pa dang /_skye bo mang po sdug bsngal ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no/_/dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi'am phyi rol gyi yang 
[\[231a.5\]]rung ma spangs par yang dag par mthong na/_de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun du dga' ba dang /_'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_'bad pa dang /_spro ba dang /_sgrim pa dang /_mi bzlog pa'i dran pa dang /_shes bzhin gyis ji tsam 
[\[231a.6\]]'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spangs kyi bar du brtson par bya'o/_/de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang spongs par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung /_phyi'i yang rung legs par spangs par yang dag par mthong na/_de
