[\[231a.7\]]la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun du dga' ba dang /_'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_'bad pa dang /_spro ba dang /_sgrim pa dang /_mi bzlog pa'i dran pa dang /_shes bzhin gyis ji nas kyang rtsod pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyis kyang mi 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]'byung bar brtson par bya ste/_de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par legs par bsal bas phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bdun bcu brgyad pa/_khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'chab cing 'tshig pa dang /_
[\[231b.2\]]phrag dog byed cing ser sna can dang /_g.yo byed cing sgyu can dang /_ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/gzhan yang 'di na la la rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin zhing 'chal ba 'dzin pa dang /_smras pa la dang na then byed pa yin te/_rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa/_
[\[231b.3\]]'chal pa 'dzin pa/_smras pa la dang na then byed pa gang yin pa de ni ston pa la bkur sti mi byed/_bla mar mi byed/_ri mor mi byed/_mchod par mi byed do/_/de ston pa la bkur sti ma byas/_bla mar ma byas/_ri mor ma byas/_mchod par ma byas pas chos mi mthong ngo /_/chos ma mthong bas 
[\[231b.4\]]dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta'o/_/dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta na dge 'dun la de lta bu'i 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa dag 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni skye bo mang po la 
[\[231b.5\]]phan pa ma yin pa dang /_skye bo mang po la gnod pa dang /_skye bo mang po la sdug bsngal ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no/_/dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung phyi'i yang rung ma spangs 
[\[231b.6\]]par yang dag par mthong na/_de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun du dga' ba dang /_'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_'bad pa dang /_spro ba dang /_sgrim pa dang /_mi bzlog pa'i dran pa dang /_shes bzhin gyis ji tsam 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung 
[\[231b.7\]]ba de nyid spongs pa'i bar du brtson par bya ste/_de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de spongs par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung /_phyi'i yang rung /_legs par spangs par yang dag par mthong na/_de la khyed cag lhan cig 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]mthun zhing kun du dga' ba dang 'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_'bad pa dang /_spro ba dang /_sgrim pa dang /_mi bzlog pa'i dran pa dang /_shes bzhin gyis ci nas kyang 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyis kyang mi 'byung bar brtson par bya ste/_
[\[232a.2\]]de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs par bsal bas/_phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug ces bya'o/_/'gyed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos so zhe'am/_chos ma yin no zhe'am/_'dul ba'o zhe'am/_
[\[232a.3\]]'dul ba ma yin no zhe'am/_ltung ba'o zhe'am ltung ba ma yin no zhe'am/_lci ba'am/_yang ba'am/_lhag ma dang bcas pa'am/_lhag ma med pa'am/_bshags par bya ba'am/_bsdam par bya ba'am/_nyes par bshad par gtogs pa'am/_legs par bshad 
[\[232a.4\]]par gtogs pa ste/_'di dag ni 'gyed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba yin zhing 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no/_/dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing gdams ngag med 
[\[232a.5\]]pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/_dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang /_gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang /_gdams ngag gzhag pa gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa ste/_dge slong dag 
[\[232a.6\]]gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no/_/dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/_ltung ba'i ris lnga ni ltung ba'i ris dang ltung ba'i phung po zhes bya 
[\[232a.7\]]ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_phas pham pa dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba dang /_nyes byas so/_/gzhan yang lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin pa yang yod/_ngag gi yin gyi lus kyi ma yin sems kyi 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]ma yin pa yang yod/_lus kyi dang sems kyi yin gyi ngag gi ma yin pa yang yod/_lus dang ngag dang sems kyi yin pa yang yod do/_/lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi ngag gi ma yin/_sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong khyim pa'am/_
[\[232b.2\]]bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa phyir ma byung bar khyim pa'am/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa phyir byung ngo snyam nas nyal bar byed pa na/_de gnyid log pa dang /_bud med nyal ba'am/_gnyid log nas khri stan chen po'i steng du bzhag pa ste/_'di ni lus kyi ltung 
[\[232b.3\]]ba yin gyi ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin no/_/ngag gi ltung ba yin gyi lus kyi ma yin/_sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong bud med la chos tshig lnga 'chad pa las ched du ma bsams par tshig drug tu thal ba'am/_tshig drug 'chad pa na 
[\[232b.4\]]tshig bdun du thal ba ste/_'di ni ngag gi ltung ba yin gyi lus kyi ma yin sems kyi ma yin no/_/lus dang sems kyi ltung ba yin gyi ngag gi ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong gis ched du bsams te dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phral nas 'di skad ces 
[\[232b.5\]]ji ltar bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srog chags srog dang dbral bar bya ste/_de ltar bsad pa ni legs par bsad pa yin no zhes mi smra zhing ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba 'thung la 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis 
[\[232b.6\]]'thungs pa de bzhin du myos par 'gyur ba btung bar bya ste/_de ltar 'thungs pa ni legs par 'thungs pa yin no zhes mi smra ba ste/_'di ni lus dang sems kyi ltung ba yin gyi ngag gi ma yin no/_/lus dang ngag dang sems kyi ltung ba yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge 
[\[232b.7\]]slong gis ched du bsams te dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phral la 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srog chags srog dang dbral bar bya ste/_de ltar bsad pa ni legs par bsad pa yin no zhes smra zhing ma byin par len pa 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i chang 'thung la 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis 'thungs pa de bzhin du myos par 'gyur ba btung bar bya ste/_de ltar myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs pa ni legs par 'thungs pa yin no zhes smra ba 
[\[233a.2\]]ste/_'di ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi ltung ba yin te/_dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no/_/dge slong dag bya ba'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing bya ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/_dge 'dun gyi bya ba gang 
[\[233a.3\]]yin pa gsol pa dang gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa ste/_dge slong dag bya ba'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing bya ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no/_/dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni dge ba zhes brjod par bya/_mi dge ba zhes 
[\[233a.4\]]brjod par bya/_lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/_dge ba gang zhe na/_dge 'dun don sgrub cing don sems la/_dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i don sna tshogs su smra ba/_'gal bar smra ba/_rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab 
[\[233a.5\]]pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no/_/mi dge ba gang zhe na/_dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems la/_dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing dge ba mi sems pa'i don sna tshogs su smra ba/_'gal bar smra ba/_rigs 
[\[233a.6\]]mi 'thun par smra ba gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba yin no/_/lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/_don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing don sems 
[\[233a.7\]]pa yang ma yin/_don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/_dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/_mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/_mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i sna tshogs su smra ba/_'gal bar smra ba/_rigs mi 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no/_/gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni dge ba zhes brjod par bya/_mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/_lung du ma bstan pa zhes 
[\[233b.2\]]brjod par bya ste/_dge ba gang zhe na/_dge 'dun don sgrub cing don sems la/_dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba'i don sems pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang /_gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang /_gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba 
[\[233b.3\]]dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no/_/mi dge ba gang zhe na/_dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems la/_dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing dge ba mi sems pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang /_gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang /_gdams ngag 'jog pa 
[\[233b.4\]]gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no/_/lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/_don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing don sems pa yang ma yin/_
[\[233b.5\]]don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/_dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/_mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing /_dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/_mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang /_gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang /_gdams ngag 
[\[233b.6\]]'jog pa gang yin pa de la sa brten nas 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no/_/ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/_lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/_mi dge ba gang zhe na/_
[\[233b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis khrims su bcas pa las ched du bsams te 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no/_/lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis khrims su bcas pa las 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]ched du ma bsams par 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no/_/bya ba'i rtsod pa ni dge ba zhes brjod par bya/_mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/_lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/_dge ba gang zhe na/_dge 'dun don sgrub cing don sems 
[\[234a.2\]]la/_dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no/_/mi dge ba gang zhe na/_
[\[234a.3\]]dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems la/_dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing dge ba mi sems pa'i gsol pa dang gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol pa dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di

[\[234a.7\]]la rtsod pa ma yin pa ni/_dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/_'gal bar smra ba/_rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa'o/_/rtsod pa yin la 'gyed pa ma yin pa ni rtsod pa gsum po gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang /_bya ba'i rtsod pa dang /_ltung ba'i rtsod pa'o/_/rtsod 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]pa yang yin la 'gyed pa yang yin pa ni dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/_'gal bar smra ba/_rigs mi 'phrod par smra ba/_mi mthun pa kun du mi dga' ba/_rgyud gcig tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang 
[\[234b.2\]]yin pa'o/_/'gyed pa yang ma yin rtsod pa yang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/gdams ngag ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rtsod pa lags la/_rtsod pa gang lags pa de gdams ngag ma mchis pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_gdams ngag med 
[\[234b.3\]]pa yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/_rtsod pa yin la gdams ngag med pa ma yin pa yang yod/_gdams ngag med pa yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod/_gdams ngag med pa yang ma yin la rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang yod do/_/re zhig gdams ngag

[\[234b.5\]]rtsod pa'o/_/gdams ngag med pa yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa ni dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang /_gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang /_gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa'o/_/

[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba dang /_nyes byas yin no/_/rtsod pa yin la ltung ba ma yin pa ni rtsod pa gsum po 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang /_bya ba'i rtsod pa'o/_/ltung ba yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin 
[\[235a.2\]]pa ni ltung ba'i ris lnga po ni ltung ba'i ris dang /_ltung ba'i phung po zhes bya ste/_phas pham pa dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba dang /_nyes byas gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa 
[\[235a.3\]]gang yin pa'o/_/ltung ba yang ma yin la rtsod pa yang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/bya ba gang lags pa de rtsod pa lags la/_rtsod pa gang lags pa de yang bya ba lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_bya ba yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/_rtsod pa yin la bya 
[\[235a.4\]]ba ma yin pa yang yod/_bya ba yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod/_bya ba yang ma yin la rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang yod do/_/re zhig bya ba yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa ni dge 'dun gyi gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin 
[\[235a.5\]]pa'o/_/rtsod pa yin la bya ba ma yin pa ni rtsod pa gsum po 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang /_gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang /_ltung ba'i rtsod pa'o/_/bya ba yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa ni dge 'dun gyi bya ba gsol pa dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol pa dang

[\[235a.7\]]pa'i chos du zhig gis 'dul bar bya/_zhi bar bya/_nye bar zhi bar bya zhe na/_bka' stsal pa/_gnyis kyis te/_mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /_gang yang tshul shing mang po blang bas so/_/mngon sum du 'dul ba ni ji ltar rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/_ji ltar na 'di na kha 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dbyar bzhugs

[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]ba la reg par gnas pas dbyar gnas shing bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang phongs par ma gyur to/_/de lta lags mod kyi bdag cag dbyar gyi nang logs su 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa byung nas bdag cag gis

[\[236a.3\]]'dul bas rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar nus so snyam nas/_dge slong dag de lta bas na skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis skam la gnas pa dang du yin pa ma shes nas bcom

[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]byed pa yin no zhes smra zhing /_phyogs cig shos kyi drung du yang bdag nyid song nas 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag legs so/_/rtsod pa 'di ni legs par bzung ba yin gyi nyes par bzung ba ma yin/_legs par sbyar ba yin gyi nyes par sbyar ba ma yin/_legs par

[\[236b.4\]]'thab mo byung /_'gyed par gyur nas gnas shing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyis phyogs gcig tu bdag nyid mi 'gro mod kyi pho nya btang nas tshe dang ldan pa dag legs so/_/rtsod pa 'di ni legs par bzung ba yin gyi nyes par bzung ba ma yin/_legs

[\[236b.6\]]pa dag gi phyogs dang /_dpung dang /_grogs yin no/_/phyogs cig shos su yang bdag nyid mi 'gro mod kyi pho nya btang nas tshe dang ldan pa dag legs so/_/rtsod pa ni legs par bzung ba yin gyi nyes par bzung ba ma yin/_legs par sbyar ba yin gyi nyes par sbyar ba ma yin/_
[\[236b.7\]]legs par brtags pa yin gyi nyes par brtags pa ma yin pas 'di dang 'di ni smros shig_/'di dang 'di ni ma smra shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis pha rol po dag chom shig_/pha rol po dag gis choms sa re/_bdag ni tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang /_dpung dang /_
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]grogs yin no zhes zer ba ste/_'di ni skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams pa ngag gis ma yin pa yin no/_/skam la gnas pa lus dang ngag gis bsdams pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skam la gnas pa dge slong 'thab par gyur/_mtshang 'dru bar gyur/_
[\[237a.2\]]'thab mo byung /_'gyed par gyur nas gnas shing phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa rnams kyis phyogs gcig tu bdag nyid mi 'gro zhing pho nya yang gtong bar mi byed la/_phyogs cig shos su yang bdag nyid mi 'gro zhing tshig gis pho nya yang gtong bar mi byed pa'o/_/
[\[237a.3\]]de la skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams pa ma yin zhing ngag gis kyang ma yin pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa yang ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de lta bu skam la gnas pa la brten nas dge 'dun la rtsod 
[\[237a.4\]]pa ma byung ba rnams ni 'byung la/_byung ba rnams ni ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas myur du zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams la ngag gis ma yin pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa yang ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa 
[\[237a.5\]]ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa la brten nas kyang dge 'dun la rtsod pa ma byung ba rnams ni 'byung la/_byung ba rnams ni ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas myur du zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la skam la gnas pa lus dang ngag gis bsdams 
[\[237a.6\]]pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa la brten nas dge 'dun la rtsod pa ma byung ba rnams ni mi 'byung la/_byung ba rnams ni ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas 
[\[237a.7\]]myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bu'i skom la gnas pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin gyi/_gzhan dag ni ma yin no/_/de lta bu skam la gnas pa rnams kyis rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar bya ste/_de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa rnams kyis rtsod pa zhi bar byas pa ni mngon 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]sum dag pa yin no/_/de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na/_mngon sum ni gnyis te/_gang zag mngon sum dang /_chos mngon sum mo/_/gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/_gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang /_gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya ba de dag thams cad 'dus 
[\[237b.2\]]par gyur cing mngon sum du gyur pa ste/_'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/chos mngon sum gang zhe na/_ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang /_chos gang dang /_'dul ba gang dang gang gis rtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba ston pa'i bstan pa de dang /_chos de dang /_'dul ba des rtsod 
[\[237b.3\]]pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/gal te dge slong skam la gnas pa dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na de rnams kyis rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par bya zhing /_dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/_/dge 
[\[237b.4\]]'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na legs par zhi bar byas pa'o zhes brjod par bya ste/_mngon sum dag pa yin no/_/de la mngon sum ji lta bu yin zhe na/_mngon sum ni gsum ste/_dge 'dun mngon sum dang /_gang zag mngon sum dang /_chos 
[\[237b.5\]]mngon sum mo/_/dge 'dun mngon sum gang zhe na/_mtshams na gnas pa'i dge slong bya bar 'os pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_'dun pa blang bar 'os pa rnams las 'dun pa blangs pa dang /_dge slong rnams 'dus shing mngon sum du 
[\[237b.6\]]gyur kyang mi btub cing gshe ba gang dag gis gshe bar 'os pa rnams mi btub pa med cing mi gshe la las dag byed pa 'di ni dge 'dun mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/_gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang /_gang dag gi rtsod pa de zhi bar 
[\[237b.7\]]bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa ste/_'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/chos mngon sum gang zhe na/_ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang /_chos gang dang /_'dul ba gang gis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang /_chos 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]de dang /_'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya mi nus na de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba bcu'am bcu gnyis bsko bar bya'o/_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas 
[\[238a.2\]]mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs la dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang /_re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas skyong dang /_chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde khyod gsal ba yin na 
[\[238a.3\]]mtshams kyi phyi logs su dong nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar spro'am/_gal te spro bar gyur na de rnams kyis spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_sangs rgyas skyong dang /_
[\[238a.4\]]chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde 'di rnams gsal ba lags te mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas 
[\[238a.5\]]skyong dang /_chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams bskos te/_sangs rgyas skyong dang /_chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde gsal ba mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las bya ba ni/_
[\[238a.6\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_sangs rgyas skyong dang /_chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde 'di rnams gsal ba lags te mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar spro nas/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang /_
[\[238a.7\]]chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams bskos te/_sangs rgyas skyong dang /_chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag sangs rgyas skyong dang /_chos sbyin dang /_
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams bskos te/_sangs rgyas skyong dang /_chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde gsal ba mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/
[\[238b.2\]]dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang /_chos sbyin dang /_dge 'dun sde gsal ba de rnams mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun kyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin 
[\[238b.3\]]to/_/gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/_/gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/_mngon sum dag pa yin no/_/de la mngon sum dag 
[\[238b.4\]]pa ji lta bu zhe na/_mngon sum ni gnyis te/_gang zag mngon sum dang /_chos mngon sum mo/_/gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/_gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang /_gang dag gi rtsod pa de dag zhi bar bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa ste/_
[\[238b.5\]]'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/chos mngon sum gang zhe na/_ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang /_chos gang dang /_'dul ba gang gis rtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang /_chos de dang /_'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni chos 
[\[238b.6\]]mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar mi nus na de rnams kyis dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba brgyad dam dgu bsko bar bya ste/_gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyang ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de 
[\[238b.7\]]zhi bar bya'o/_/gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya mi nus na de rnams kyis rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]bya'o/_/de nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rtsod pa de sbed pa bsko bar bya'o/_/chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba 
[\[239a.2\]]dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_rtsod pa sbos pa dang ma sbos pa mi shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa 
[\[239a.3\]]ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_rtsod pa sbos pa dang ma sbos pa shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan 
[\[239a.4\]]pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur 
[\[239a.5\]]pa dang /_re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed pa spro'am/_gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_rtsod pa sbed pa'i 
[\[239a.6\]]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing /_bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/_rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong 
[\[239a.7\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las bya ba ni/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro nas/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/_rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par bgyi na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/_rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi rtsod 
[\[239b.2\]]pa sbed par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas 
[\[239b.3\]]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ngas rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gis rtsod pa de gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad par bya zhing rgan rabs ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya ste/_dge 
[\[239b.4\]]'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_rtsod pa 'di gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas dus 'di srid cig lon te/_rtsod pa de skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar bgyi bar rngo ma thog nas/_de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las dge 'dun gyis kyang ma 
[\[239b.5\]]spyod nas/_des gsal ba'i dge slong rnams bskos pa las dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis rngo ma thog nas/_de rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams bskos pa las dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba de rnams kyis kyang rngo ma thog nas/_de rnams kyis 
[\[239b.6\]]kyang dge 'dun la gtad pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis kyang bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos nas/_bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la dbul gyis/_dge 
[\[239b.7\]]'dun btsun pa rnams kyis 'di nas bzung ste rtsod pa 'di zla ba drug gi mtha'i bar gyis zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_gnas brtan dang bcas so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/_/gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/_mngon sum dag pa yin no/_/de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na/_mngon sum ni gsum ste/_dge 'dun mngon sum dang /_gang zag 
[\[240a.2\]]mngon sum dang /_chos mngon sum mo/_/dge 'dun mngon sum gang zhe na/_mtshams na gnas pa'i dge slong bya bar 'os pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_'dun pa blang bar 'os pa rnams la 'dun pa blangs pa dang /_dge slong rnams 'dus shing mngon 
[\[240a.3\]]sum du gyur kyang mi btub cing gshe ba gang dag gi gshe ba 'os pa rnams mi btub pa med cing mi gshe la/_las dag byed pa 'di ni dge 'dun mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/_gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang /_gang dag gi rtsod pa de zhi bar bya ba de dag 
[\[240a.4\]]thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa 'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/chos mngon sum gang zhe na/_ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang /_chos gang dang /_'dul ba gang gis rtsod pa de zhi bar gyur pa'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang /_chos de dang /_'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar 
[\[240a.5\]]byed pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/gal te gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na des rtsod pa de rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong nyid la gtad par bya'o/_/rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gis mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 
[\[240a.6\]]'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad par bya zhing rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin la brjod par bya ste/_shes ldan mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams gsan du gsol/_rtsod pa 'di ni gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas dus 'di srid cig lon te/_
[\[240a.7\]]rtsod pa de skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar byed ma nus nas/_de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas/_des kyang dge slong gsal ba rnams bskos ba las dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/_de rnams kyis kyang 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams bskos pa las dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/_de rnams kyis kyang dge 'dun la gtad pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/_bdag dge 
[\[240b.2\]]slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad pa las/_gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ma spyod nas/_bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes 
[\[240b.3\]]bgyi ba la gtad de/_bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad kyis/_shes ldan mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis 'di nas bzung ste/_rtsod 
[\[240b.4\]]pa 'di lo gcig gi mtha'i bar gyis zhi bar mdzod cig_/mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/_/mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar 
[\[240b.5\]]byas na legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/_mngon sum dag pa yin no/_/de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na/_mngon sum ni gnyis te/_gang zag mngon sum dang /_chos mngon sum mo/_/gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/_gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang /_
[\[240b.6\]]gang dag gi rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa 'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/chos mngon sum gang zhe na/_ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang /_chos gang dang /_'dul ba gang gis rtsod pa de zhi bar gyur pa'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang chos 
[\[240b.7\]]de dang /_'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o/_/gal te mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na de rnams kyis rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong nyid la gtad par bya'o/_/rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]slong gis gnas gang na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba'am/_shes nyen can shes nyen can gang yang rung ba'am/_gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa de la gtad par bya zhing rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin la brjod par bya ste/_gnas brtan dag gson 
[\[241a.2\]]cig_/rtsod pa 'di ni gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas dus 'di srid cig lon te/_rtsod pa de skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar byed ma nus nas/_de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas/_des kyang dge slong gsal 
[\[241a.3\]]ba rnams bskos pa las dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/_de rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba bskos pa las dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/_de rnams kyis kyang dge 'dun la gtad pa las dge 'dun 
[\[241a.4\]]gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos nas/_bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad pa las/_gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas 
[\[241a.5\]]pa'i dge 'dun gyis zhi bar ma spyod nas/_des kyang bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtad nas/_bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad pa dang /_mdo sde 
[\[241a.6\]]dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/_de rnams kyis kyang bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtad nas/_bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan la 'bul na/_gnas brtan gyis 'di 
[\[241a.7\]]nas bzung ste/_rtsod pa 'di ji tsam gyis mthar phyin gyi bar du zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/_/ngas dge slong gnas brtan gyi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong gnas brtan gyis rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams so shing stobs na bdag 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gir mi bya ste/_ba'i lci ba stobs na ma yin/_'dag 'chal stobs na ma yin zhing /_gdon pa dang 'dri ba yang byed du mi gzhug ste/_gzhan du na mdun nam rgyab tu 'dug nas tshig 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ma 'thab shig_/mtshang ma 'dru zhig_/'thab mo ma byed 
[\[241b.2\]]cig_/ma 'gyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyi/_'on kyang gcig rgyal gcig pham par 'gyur ro/_/'gyed pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyi/_'on kyang gcig rgyal gcig pham par 'gyur ro zhes bya zhing /_dge slong gnas brtan 
[\[241b.3\]]gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/_/dge slong gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di 
[\[241b.4\]]lta ste/_mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/dge slong dag gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/_ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i 
[\[241b.5\]]rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/_skam la gnas pa nas bzung ste gnas brtan gyi bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_gal te dge slong gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na rtsod pa de rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong de nyid la gtad par bya'o/_/
[\[241b.6\]]des kyang rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bas zhi bar bya'o/_/rgyu lngas gang tshul shing mang po len pa'i rtsod pa zhi ba ni rtsub pa dang /_gdug pa dang /_dam po dang /_dbye ba'i bsam pa dang /_sbyor 
[\[241b.7\]]ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin no/_/rtsub pa ji lta bu zhe na/_rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsub bo rab tu bzung ba yin te/_de ltar na rtsub po can yin no/_/gdug pa ji lta bu zhe na/_rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams gdug pa dang /_rnam 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]par gnon pa yin te/_de ltar na gdug pa can no/_/dam po ji lta bu zhe na/_rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis dam por rab tu bzung ba yin te/_de ltar na dam po can yin no/_/dbye ba'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na/_dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi 
[\[242a.2\]]las 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shin tu rab tu bzung ba yin te/_de ltar na dbye ba'i bsam pa can yin no/_/sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can ji lta bu zhe na/_skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyi bar gyis te/_de ltar na sbyor ba gzhan 
[\[242a.3\]]du mi 'gyur ba can yin te/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pas na gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i zhi ba ni rtsub pa dang /_gdug pa dang /_dam po dang /_dbye ba'i bsam pa dang /_sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin no/_/des na tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/_
[\[242a.4\]]chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'brim par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_tshul shing brims pa dang ma 
[\[242a.5\]]brims pa mi shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'brim par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'brim par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/lnga 
[\[242a.6\]]gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_tshul shing brims pa dang ma brims pa shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'brim par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/
[\[242a.7\]]bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/tshul shing brim pa ni bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sra ba dang /_mngon pa dang /_rna drung du gshub pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge 'dun thams cad pa'o/_/sba ba'i tshul shing brim pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]du sems te/_gnas 'di na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po dag ni chos ma yin pa smra la/_dge slong gsar bu nyung zad cig ni chos smra bas/_gal te bdag gis tshul shing mngon par brims na dge slong gsar bu dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyi rjes su byed pa 
[\[242b.2\]]rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rab tu mang po len par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod kyis/_ma la bdag gis tshul shing sbas te brim mo snyam nas/_de tshul shing sbas nas 'brim pa ste/_'di ni sba ba'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o/_/mngon pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa gang 
[\[242b.3\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'di na dge slong gnas brtan rab tu mang po dag ni chos smra la/_dge slong gsar bu nyung zad gcig ni chos ma yin pa smra bas/_gal te bdag gis tshul shing sbas te brims na dge slong gsar bu 
[\[242b.4\]]rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod kyis/_ma la bdag gis tshul shing mngon par brim mo/_/bdag gis tshul shing gsal bar brims na dge slong gsar bu dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyi rjes su byed pa rnams chos kyi tshul shing 
[\[242b.5\]]rab tu mang po len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do snyam nas de tshul shing mngon par 'brim pa ste/_'di ni mngon pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o/_/rna drung du gshub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong 
[\[242b.6\]]gis rna drung du gtugs te gshubs la tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan pos chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyis khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing long shig_/khyod kyi slob dpon dang /_mkhan po gcig pa dang /_slob dpon gcig pa dang /_gtam 'dres pa dang phebs par smra ba dang /_
[\[242b.7\]]smos 'drin dang /_'grogs bshes kyis chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyis/_khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing long shig ces smra ba ste/_'di ni rna drung du gshub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o/_/dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]lta ste tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'di na dge slong nad pa rab tu mang bas/_gal te bdag gis dge 'dun ma tshogs shing ma 'dus par tshul shing brims na dge slong rab tu mang pos chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur ba gang 
[\[243a.2\]]yin pa'i gnas de yod kyis/_ma la bdag gis dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang tshul shing brim par bya'o snyam nas/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang tshul shing 'brim pa de/_'di ni dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o/_/chos 
[\[243a.3\]]ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu dang /_chos kyi bcu'o/_/chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/_chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa dang /_mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa dang /_chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa dang /_dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing 
[\[243a.4\]]len pa dang /_sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa dang /_rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi stun pas tshul shing len pa dang /_tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye yang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pas tshul shing len pa dang /_tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos 
[\[243a.5\]]ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam nas tshul shing len pa dang /_tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa dang /_tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po dag chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul 
[\[243a.6\]]shing len pa'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bdun bcu dgu pa/_chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'dul ba dang mthun pa ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/mi mthun pas tshul shing 
[\[243a.7\]]len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_dge 'dun mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_bsdam par bya ba dang bshags par bya ba yin no snyam nas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ni chung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi las dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shin tu rab tu bzung ba de lta bu ni dge 'dun dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul 
[\[243b.2\]]shing len pa yin no/_/sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_skam la gnas pa ma yin pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyis ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de lta bu ni sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi 
[\[243b.3\]]stun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la rten dang kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ste/_de rnams la ma brtags par tshul shing len pa ste/_'di lta bu 
[\[243b.4\]]ni rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi stun pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes de snyam du bsams nas tshul shing len pa 
[\[243b.5\]]ste/_de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu 
[\[243b.6\]]mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas 'jug par 'gyur yang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur 
[\[243b.7\]]bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar shes shing de ltar bsams nas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa yin no/_/tshul shing blangs 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas 'jug par 'gyur bar shes shing de ltar bsams nas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni tshul 
[\[244a.2\]]shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ste/_'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu yin no/_/chos kyi tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/_chos kyis tshul shing len pa dang /_mthun pas tshul shing len pa dang /_
[\[244a.3\]]chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa dang /_mi 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa dang /_sbyor ba gzhan du 'gyur bas tshul shing len pa dang /_rten kha lo sgyur ba dang stun pas tshul shing len pa dang /_tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam 
[\[244a.4\]]pas tshul shing len pa dang /_tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang /_tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa dang /_tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po 
[\[244a.5\]]chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/chos kyi tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'dul ba dang mthun pas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni chos kyi tshul shing len pa yin no/_/mthun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_dge 'dun mthun pas 
[\[244a.6\]]tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni mthun pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_bsdam par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_bshags par bya ba ma yin no snyam du bsams nas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni chung ba bas 
[\[244a.7\]]kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/mi 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'bye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi las 'bye bar byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba legs par shin tu rab tu ma bzung ba ste/_de lta bu ni mi 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]shing len pa yin no/_/sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyi bar gyis te/_de lta bu ni sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/[(]rtan [,]rten [)]kha lo sgyur ba dang stun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu 
[\[244b.2\]]zhe na/_dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la rten dang kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ste/_de rnams la brtags nas tshul shing len pa de lta bu ni rten kha lo sgyur ba dang stun pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/
[\[244b.3\]]tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar ma gyur kyang 
[\[244b.4\]]ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs te 'jug par ma gyur kyang ci ma 
[\[244b.5\]]rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_
[\[244b.6\]]tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes shing de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa yin no/_/tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa 
[\[244b.7\]]smra par 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas spyod par mi shes shing de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/_de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ste/_'di ni chos kyi tshul shing len pa bcu yin no/_/ngas dge slong tshul shing 'brim pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong tshul shing 'brim pas tshul shing rnam pa gnyis bsham par bya ste/_
[\[245a.2\]]chos kyi tshul shing dang /_chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngo /_/chos kyi tshul shing rnams ni ya yo med pa/_kyag kyog med pa/_kyar kyor med pa/_kha dog bzang ba/_reg na bde bar bya'o/_/chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams ni ya yo dang /_kyag kyog dang /_kyar kyor dang /_
[\[245a.3\]]kha dog ngan pa dang /_reg na mi bde bar bya'o/_/de nas dge slong tshul shing 'brim pas lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi tshul shing rnams blangs la g.yon pas chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams blangs nas dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_chos kyi tshul shing rnams 
[\[245a.4\]]kyi bsngags pa dang /_chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ste/_gnas brtan 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing lags te/_ya yo ma mchis pa/_kyag kyog ma mchis pa/_kyar kyor ma mchis pa/_kha dog bzang ba/_reg na bde ba lags kyis 
[\[245a.5\]]bzhes shig_/'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lags te/_ya yo dang kyag kyog dang /_kyar kyor dang /_kha dog ngan la reg na mi bde ba lags na bzhes shig_/gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de logs su lag pa zed na tshig dang po la yang sbyin par mi bya/_gnyis 
[\[245a.6\]]pa la yang sbyin par mi bya/_gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar gyi mdun du 'dug nas chos kyi tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa dang /_chos ma yin 
[\[245a.7\]]pa'i tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ste/_'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing lags te/_ya yo ma mchis pa/_kyag kyog ma mchis pa/_kyar kyor ma mchis pa/_kha dog bzang ba/_reg na bde ba lags kyis bzhes shig_/'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]tshul shing lags te/_ya yo dang /_kyag kyog dang /_kyar kyor dang /_kha dog ngan pa/_reg na mi bde ba lags na bzhes shig_/gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de logs su lag pa zed na tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya/_gnyis pa la sbyin par mi bya/_gsum pa la 
[\[245b.2\]]sbyin par bya ste/_de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bus 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/gal te chos kyi tshul shing nyung bar gyur na kun shes kauN+Di n+ya'i tshul shing blang bar bya'o/_/gal te chos kyi tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur na yang de lta na 'di lta 
[\[245b.3\]]ste chos kyis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/de ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la gal te 'ga' zhig skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur na yang de lta na 'di lta ste chos ma yin pas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa yin no/_/
[\[245b.4\]]de ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la 'ga' zhig skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na gang tshul shing mang po blangs pas rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_
[\[245b.5\]]zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa gnyis kyis dul bar bya/_zhi bar bya/_nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /_gang tshul shing mang po blang bas so/_/dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i 
[\[245b.6\]]rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos gsum gyis dul bar bya/_zhi bar bya/_nye bar zhi bar bya'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_mngon sum du 'dul ba dang /_dran pas 'dul ba dang /_ma myos pas 'dul ba'o/_/dge slong dag ji ltar na mngon sum gyis 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed 
[\[245b.7\]]pa yin/_ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/_skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyi bar gyis gong ma bzhin du ste/_dge slong dag de ltar na mngon sum 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]du 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/dge slong dag ji ltar na dran pas 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa 
[\[246a.2\]]yin/_ji ltar na 'di na kha cig rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_dran pas 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/_dper na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur ba btab pa de la dge slong rnams gleng bar byed 
[\[246a.3\]]de/_gzhi des gleng ba na ngo tsha'o zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis gyad bu nor dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la dran pas 'dul bar 'os 
[\[246a.4\]]pa byin cig_/sbyin pa ni 'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang gyad bu nor gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_rgan rims ji 
[\[246a.5\]]lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur ba btab pas bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar 
[\[246a.6\]]bgyid de/_bdag la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/_dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_bdag gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/_de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[246a.7\]]de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur ba btab pas 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/_'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa dge 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las bya ba ni/_dge 'dun btsun 
[\[246b.2\]]pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur ba btab pas 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/_'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa na dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 
[\[246b.3\]]gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis pa dang 
[\[246b.4\]]gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin no/_/chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum dang /_chos kyi gsum mo/_/chos 
[\[246b.5\]]ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ba de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing /_de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/_dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba 
[\[246b.6\]]gsol te/_de la dge 'dun gyis dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni bsnyil bar 'os pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste dge slong dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags pa dang /_nyes 
[\[246b.7\]]byas kyi ltung ba byung ba de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing /_de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]de ni bshags par 'os pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste dge slong bye ma skyes smyos/_sems 'khrugs/_tshor bas nyen te sgren mor byung nas dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad/_smras brtsal nas kha chu zags/_mig bgrad/_
[\[247a.2\]]bzhin gyur te gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du shes/_pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du shes so/_/dus gzhan zhig na des rang gi sems slar sor chud pa dang /_de la gzhi des dge slong rnams gleng bar byed cing /_de la gzhi des gleng bar byed 
[\[247a.3\]]pa na dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste dge slong gzhi ldan dge 'dun gyi nang du 
[\[247a.4\]]ltung ba nyid shes pa las brjed nas phyis dran te shes pa las kyang brjed pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i phyir te/_'di dag ni chos 
[\[247a.5\]]ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum yin no/_/chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur ba btab pa de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing /_de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na 
[\[247a.6\]]dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong zhig la ltung ba gzhan kho na zhig byung bar gyur pa de la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi gzhan gyis gleng bar byed cing /_de la gzhi 
[\[247a.7\]]des gleng bar byed pa na dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong zhig ltung ba byung bar gyur la des de dge slong gi mdun du bshags pa byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa de la 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing /_de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/_dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/_gsum po 'di dag ni chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no/_/
[\[247b.2\]]dge slong dag de ltar na dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/dge slong dag ji ltar na ma smyos pas 'dul 
[\[247b.3\]]bar 'os pa/_rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/_ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_ma smyos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong bye ma skyes smyos/_sems 'khrugs/_tshor bas nyen 
[\[247b.4\]]nas sgren mor byung ste dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad/_smras/_brtsal nas kha chu zags/_mig gyur/_bzhin gyur te gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du shes/_pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du shes so/_/dus gzhan 
[\[247b.5\]]zhig na des rang gi sems sor chud pa dang /_de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed de/_de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na dge 'dun la ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[247b.6\]]slong dag khyed kyis dge slong bye ma skyes dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la ma smyos pas 'dul ba byin cig_/sbyin pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun 
[\[247b.7\]]thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong bye ma skyes kyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_rgan pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdung ba byas la rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad ces/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]bdag dge slong bye ma skyes smyos/_sems 'khrugs/_tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad/_smras/_brtsal nas kha chu zags/_mig gyur/_bzhin gyur te/_gnyid kyis ma log par 
[\[248a.2\]]gnyid kyis log go snyam du 'tshal/_pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du 'tshal ba las dus gzhan zhig na bdag sems sor chud pa dang bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing /_bdag la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa dge 'dun la ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol na/_
[\[248a.3\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_bdag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/_de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams 
[\[248a.4\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong bye ma skyes 'di smyos/_sems 'khrugs/_tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa mang du spyad/_smras/_brtsal nas kha chu zags/_mig gyur/_bzhin gyur te gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid 
[\[248a.5\]]kyis log go snyam du 'tshal/_pha rol kyis ma smras par smras so snyam du 'tshal ba las dus gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gi sems sor chud pa dang 'di la dge slong rnams gleng bar bgyid cing /_'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa dge 'dun la ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol na/_gal te dge 
[\[248a.6\]]'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pa'i 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las bya ba ni/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol dge slong bye ma skyes 'di 
[\[248a.7\]]smyos/_sems 'khrugs/_tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa mang du spyad/_smras/_brtsal nas kha chu zags/_mig gyur/_bzhin gyur te gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du 'tshal/_
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du 'tshal ba las dus gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gi sems sor chud pa dang 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing /_'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa dge 'dun las ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 
[\[248b.2\]]bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsal bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du las brjod 
[\[248b.3\]]pa gnyis pa dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis/_dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/chos ma yin pa'i ma smyos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa 
[\[248b.4\]]gcig de la chos kyi gcig go/_/chos ma yin pa'i gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong ma smyos par bdag ni smyos so/_/sems ma 'khrugs par sems 'khrugs so snyam du shes pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis de la ma smyos par 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i 
[\[248b.5\]]ma smyos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa yin te/_'di ni chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no/_/chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong bye ma skyes smyos/_sems 'khrugs/_tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang 
[\[248b.6\]]du spyad/_smras/_brtsal nas kha chu zags/_mig gyur/_bzhin gyur te de gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du shes/_pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du shes pa las dus gzhan zhig na des rang gi sems sor chud pa dang /_de la dge slong rnams 
[\[248b.7\]]gzhi des gleng bar byed cing /_de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na dge 'dun la ma smyos pas 'dul bar 'os pa gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis de la ma smyos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni chos kyi ma smyos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ste/_'di ni chos kyi gcig yin no/_/dge 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]slong dag de ltar na ma smyos pas 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos 'di gsum gyis 
[\[249a.2\]]dul bar bya/_zhi bar bya/_nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /_dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa dang /_ma smyos pas 'dul bar 'os pas so/_/dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhis dul bar bya/_zhi bar bya/_nye bar 
[\[249a.3\]]zhi bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_khas blang bar 'os pa dang /_mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa dang /_rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pas so/_/dge slong dag ji ltar na khas blang bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/_ji ltar na 'di na 
[\[249a.4\]]kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_khas blang bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong ltung ba byung bar gyur pa de la gzhi des glengs kyang rung ma glengs kyang rung /_dran par byas kyang rung dran par ma byas kyang 
[\[249a.5\]]rung /_dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu zhig byung ba de bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mthol zhing bshags par bgyi'o/_/bdag gis mthol zhing bshags na bde ba la reg 
[\[249a.6\]]par 'gyur gyi/_ma mthol ma bshags na ni ma lags so/_/des ltung ba mthong ngam zhes brjod par bya'o/_/des kyang ltung ba mthong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/snga ma shos kyis phyis sdom par byed dam zhes brjod par bya'o/_/phyi ma shos kyis bgyid do zhes brjod par bya ste/_
[\[249a.7\]]'di ni khas blang ba'o/_/chos ma yin pa'i khas blang ba sbyin pa bcu dang /_chos kyi bcu'o/_/chos ma yin pa'i khas blang ba sbyin pa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/_/dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags pa dang /_nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len 
[\[249b.2\]]du sbyin pa yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba ma byung ba la bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/_/dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags pa dang /_
[\[249b.3\]]nyes byas kyi ltung ba ma byung ba la bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa ste/_'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa bcu yin no/_/chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge 
[\[249b.4\]]slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung la bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/_/dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags pa dang /_nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba la bdag la byung ngo snyam 
[\[249b.5\]]du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/_/'di lta ste dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba ma byung ba la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no/_/dge 
[\[249b.6\]]'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags pa dang /_nyes byas kyi ltung ba ma byung la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa ste/_'di dag ni chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa bcu yin 
[\[249b.7\]]no/_/dge slong dag de ltar na khas blang bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_khas blang bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na 'dug go/_/de la brten nas yangs pa 
[\[250a.2\]]can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed pa dang /_yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/_tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po 'di gzhan nyid du btsas la gzhan du chen por gyur pa ste/_mnyan yod du skyes 
[\[250a.3\]]pa de la yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams lhag par dad par byed kyis/_de la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya ste/_des na de la yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas de la klan ka tshol bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag cig gis 
[\[250a.4\]]sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro khang gi khrus la spyan drangs pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis gzar thag la chos gos rnams bkal te khrus bya bar brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos kyang shes bzhin gyis mtha' gcig tu 
[\[250a.5\]]chos gos bzhag nas khrus bya bar brtsams so/_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis kyang phyogs de nyid du chos gos bzhag go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos khrus byas nas 'di nyid bdag nyid kyi chos gos yin no snyam nas dge slong de'i chos gos bgos te 
[\[250a.6\]]song ngo /_/ji tsam na dge slong de langs na rang gi chos gos mi snang nas des dge slong rnams la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i chos gos sus brkus/_ji tsam na phyogs de na tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug pa des thos nas 
[\[250a.7\]]des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mkhan pos phyogs 'dir chos gos bzhag na des nor te khyer bar ma gyur grang /_re zhig kho bos song la mkhan po la dri'o zhes des mkhan po'i drung du song ste smras pa/_mkhan po khyod kyis su zhig gi chos gos blangs/_des smras pa/_
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bu kho bo'i 'o/_/mkhan po dge slong che ge mo zhig gi chos gos phyogs de nyid du bzhag pa de kha mchis lags so/_/bu gal te de lta na chos gos de dag khyer te shog shig blta'o/_/des khyer te 'ongs nas mkhan po chos gos 'di ngo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/des ngo shes 
[\[250b.2\]]nas bu ngas nor bar khyer te 'ongs kyis/_dge slong de'i 'di dag yin gyis skyol cig_/des khyer te dge slong de'i drung du song nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chos gos 'di dag mkhan pos nor te khyer ro/_/des smras pa/_des rku sems kyis blangs pas phas pham pa'i ltung ba 
[\[250b.3\]]byung ngo /_/de nas glags tshol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis de la gleng ba ma byas dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos bsams pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dad pa skye bar ni dka' la ma dad pa skye bar 
[\[250b.4\]]ni bla bas gal te 'dug par gyur na gdon mi za bar yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur gyis/_mdor na mnyan yod kho nar 'gro'o snyam nas/_des yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la ma bltas par des lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas mnyan yod gang na ba 
[\[250b.5\]]der rgyu zhing song ste/_rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba na mnyam yod du phyin pa dang /_de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nag po 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod mthong ba ni kho bo cag dga' na 'ongs pa ma yin no/_/ci'i phyir 'di ltar khyod la 
[\[250b.6\]]brten nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pas sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed do/_/des smras pa/_de ni mad mod kyi yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bdag la 
[\[250b.7\]]gleng ba ma byas dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'dug shig_/khyod ngas chos kyis bslang bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis chos kyis bslang ngo /_/yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams bdag cag gis dge slong nag po skyon med pa gnod pa ma byas pa la mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa gang yin pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas/_de rnams lhung bzed 
[\[251a.2\]]dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ba las/_de rnams kyis lam kar dge slong zhig mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod gang nas 'ongs/_mnyan yod nas so/_/khyod kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po mthong ngam/_mthong ngo /_/de ci bya/_kho bo 
[\[251a.3\]]cag gis de skyon med pa gnod pa ma byas pa la gleng ba ma byas/_dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/bslang zin no/_/sus/_bcom ldan 'das kyis so/_/de na kha cig gis ni 'di skad ces smras so/_/bslang ba ni ma yin gyi thag bsring bar 
[\[251a.4\]]bslang ba yin te/_'di ltar de bdag cag gis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas la/_bdag cag gis mngon sum du ma gyur par de bslang ba ni rigs pa ma yin no/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_gal te bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/_bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rjes bslang na legs 
[\[251a.5\]]par bslang ba yin no/_/de rnams rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang lhung bzed dang /_chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig 
[\[251a.6\]]tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag byis pa/_blun pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa rnams kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po skyon ma mchis pa gnod pa 
[\[251a.7\]]ma bgyis pa la gleng ba ma bgyis/_dran par ma bgyis par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyis pa bdag cag 'gyod pa skyes nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po la bzod pa gsol du 'dir mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rtsod pa de 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pas 'di lta ste chos kyis bslang zin no/_/btsun pa bdag cag gis shul kar dge slong zhig las bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod pa de 'di lta ste/_chos kyis bslang lags so zhes thos te/_de lta lags mod kyi bdag cag gi nang na kha cig gi mchid nas 'di skad ces/_
[\[251b.2\]]bslang ba ma lags kyi thag bsring bar bslang ba lags te/_'di ltar der bdag cag mngon sum du ma gyur to zhes mchi'o/_/gzhan dag ni gal te bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/_bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rjes bslang ba ni legs par bslang ba lags so zhes mchi'o/_/
[\[251b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_kye ma'o nga'i nyan thos rnams ni 'di lta ste/_ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar bya bar 'dod do snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 
[\[251b.4\]]'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/_ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la chos 'dul bas gang zag gis gang zag la 
[\[251b.5\]]mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /_chos 'dul bas gnyis kyis mang po dang /_dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /_chos 'dul bas gang zag gnyis kyis gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /_chos 'dul bas gang zag gnyis kyis 
[\[251b.6\]]gnyis dang mang po dang /_dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /_chos 'dul bas gang zag mang pos gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /_chos 'dul bas gang zag mang pos gnyis dang /_mang po dang /_dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon 
[\[251b.7\]]sum du gleng ba dang /_chos 'dul bas dge 'dun gyis gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang /_chos 'dul bas dge 'dun gyis gnyis dang mang po dang /_dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba'o/_/chos ma yin pa'i mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]pa sbyin pa bcu drug dang /_chos kyi bcu drug go/_/chos ma yin pa'i bcu drug gang zhe na/_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pas gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang /_gang zag 
[\[252a.2\]]chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang /_dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis 
[\[252a.3\]]kyis gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang po dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis dge 'dun chos dang mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos gang zag chos 
[\[252a.4\]]dang mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang po dang /_gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos dge 'dun chos dang mthun pa dang /_
[\[252a.5\]]dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang /_dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis dang /_dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang po dang /_dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas dge 
[\[252a.6\]]'dun chos dang mthun pa ste/_'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug yin no/_/chos kyis mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug gang zhe na/_gang zag chos dang mthun pas gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang /_
[\[252a.7\]]gang zag chos dang mthun pas gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pas gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pas dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]kyis gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis dge 
[\[252b.2\]]'dun chos dang mi mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa 
[\[252b.3\]]mang po dang /_gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa dang /_dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang /_dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang /_dge 'dun chos dang 
[\[252b.4\]]mthun pas gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang /_dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa ste/_'di dag ni chos kyi mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug yin no/_/dge slong dag de ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa 
[\[252b.5\]]ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/dge slong dag ji ltar na de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa 
[\[252b.6\]]ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/_ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong me bzhi dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba 
[\[252b.7\]]brjed pa las/_brjed pa slar dran te shes pa las yang brjed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong me bzhi dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su 
[\[253a\]]
