[\[253a.1\]]yang rung ba la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin cig_/sbyin pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa 
[\[253a.2\]]dang /_dge slong me bzhis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol ba bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong me bzhi dge 'dun gyi nang du 
[\[253a.3\]]ltung ba bskyud pa las/_bskyud pa slar dran te 'tshal ba las yang bskyud nas dge 'dun la bdag de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol na/_dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_bdag dge slong me bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug 
[\[253a.4\]]par 'os pa stsal du gsol/_de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol pa byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong me bzhi 'di dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyud pa las bskyud pa 
[\[253a.5\]]slar dran te 'tshal ba dang /_yang bskyud nas dge slong me bzhi 'di dge 'dun la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong me bzhi la de'i 
[\[253a.6\]]ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong me bzhi 'di dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyud pa las/_bskyud pa slar dran te 'tshal ba dang yang 
[\[253a.7\]]bskyud nas 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong me bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong me bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis pa dang /_gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong me bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsal lags te/_
[\[253b.2\]]'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ngas de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gis rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/_
[\[253b.3\]]gnas mi sbyin/_dge tshul gzhag par mi bya/_'dis las mi bya/_las byed par bsko bar mi bya/_'dis dge slong ma la gdams ngag sbyin par mi bya/_dge slong ma'i gdams ngag ston par bsko bar mi bya/_sngon bskos na yang dge slong ma la gdams ngag sbyin par mi bya/_
[\[253b.4\]]'dis dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pas gleng bar mi bya/_dran par mi bya ste/_'dis gdams ngag dbog par mi bya/_gso sbyong la ma yin/_dgag dbye la ma yin/_gsol ba la ma yin/_
[\[253b.5\]]gsol ba dang gnyis la ma yin/_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las la ma yin zhing /_gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzhan yod na dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dul ba gdon par yang mi bya'o/_/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas 
[\[253b.6\]]pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/chos ma yin pa'i de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa chos ma yin pa gcig dang chos kyi gcig go/_/chos ma yin pa'i gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dge slong gzhi can dge 
[\[253b.7\]]'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran te shes pa las brjed pa de brjed na yang dran pa de la dge 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ste/_'di ni chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no/_/chos kyi gcig 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong gzhi can dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba brjed pa las brjed pa slar dran te shes pa dang yang brjed pa de la dge 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ni chos kyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ste/_'di 
[\[254a.2\]]ni chos kyi gcig yin no/_/dge slong dag de ltar na de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye 
[\[254a.3\]]bar zhi ba yin no/_/dge slong dag ji ltar na rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/_ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dge 
[\[254a.4\]]slong rnams 'thab par gyur cing mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed par gyur nas gnas shing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du rnam par gnas na/_phyogs gcig na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba/_shes nyen can shes nyen can gang yang rung ba/_
[\[254a.5\]]gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa gang yin pa des rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song ste tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed par gyur pa ni/_
[\[254a.6\]]bdag cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/_nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyod kyi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/_khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs par kho bos bdag dang khyod kyi ched du tshe 
[\[254a.7\]]dang ldan pa de dag gi drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong gcig gis kyang smras pa ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/_de nas dge slong des phyogs cig shos kyi drung du song nas bla gos phrag pa 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gcig tu gzar te rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la tsog tsog por 'dug ste tshig 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed par gyur pa ni 
[\[254b.2\]]kho bo cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/_nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa ma rnyed pas gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/_khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs par kho bos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched 
[\[254b.3\]]du khyed kyi drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o/_/phyogs cig shos na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba/_shes nyen can shes nyen can gang yang rung ba/_gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa gang yin pa des kyang rang gi 
[\[254b.4\]]phyogs kyi drung du song ste tshig 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed par gyur pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/_nyes pa rnyed kyis 
[\[254b.5\]]legs pa ma rnyed pas/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyed kyi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/_khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs par kho bos bdag dang khyed kyi ched du tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags 
[\[254b.6\]]par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong gcig gis kyang smras pa ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/_de nas dge slong des phyogs cig shos kyi drung du song nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la tsog 
[\[254b.7\]]tsog por 'dug ste tshig 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed par gyur pa ni kho bo cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/_nyes pa rnyed kyis legs 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]pa ma rnyed pas gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/_khyim na gnas pa la brten pa ma gtogs par kho bos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi drung du mi 'chab par mthol zhing 
[\[255a.2\]]bshags par spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe phyogs cig shos kyis cig shos la'am/_cig shos kyis cig shos la spus la ltung ba lta bur byed/_'byung bar skyong /_mtshungs par nye bar ston par byed kyi phan tshun du ltung ba sgrogs par gleng bar mi byed na de ltar 
[\[255a.3\]]na rtsod pa de 'di lta ste/_rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pas zhi ba yin te/_dge slong dag de ltar na rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing /_de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/_rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang 
[\[255a.4\]]zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhi po 'dis dul bar bya/_zhi bar bya/_nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_khas blang bar 'os pa dang /_mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang /_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa dang /_
[\[255a.5\]]rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pas so/_/dge slong dag bya ba'i rtsod pa ni dge 'dun mthun pas zhi bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gnas gang na dge slong zhig gnas pa de na 'thab pa med/_mtshang 'dru ba med/_'thab mo med/_'gyed pa med do/_/gang na gnyis yod pa de na yang 
[\[255a.6\]]'thab pa med/_mtshang 'dru ba med/_'thab mo med/_'gyed pa med do/_/gang na gsum yod pa de na yang 'thab pa med/_mtshang 'dru ba med/_'thab mo med/_'gyed pa med do/_/gang na dge slong bzhi'am lhag pa gnas pa de na ni 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_
[\[255a.7\]]'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa yod do/_/dge slong dag_/tshangs pa ji bzhin gcig de bzhin/_/brgya byin ji bzhin gnyis de bzhin/_/rgyal po ji bzhin gsum de bzhin/_/de las lhag pa 'khrug par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_tshig 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la yang chos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya zhing /_des kyang longs spyad par bya ste/_'di la ni 'gyod par ni mi bya'o/_/rtsod pa'i gzhi rdzogs so//_//[{D1-17}]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu pa/_dge 'dun dbyen 
[\[255b.2\]]gyi bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_mang pos bkur dang lha g.yos dang /_/ba gam rnyings dang bzang po dang /_/'khor dang kauN+Di na rdzu 'phrul dang /_/kau shi ka zos dang ba dang /_/mnar med lhag gyur phyi ma'o//_//sdom ni/_mang pos bkur dang seng ge'i 'gram/_/legs 
[\[255b.3\]]par rab sad de bzhin du/_/dga' ldan 'dod pa'i ris dang ni/_/'dun pas 'dug dang gzhong pa dang /_/srin bu go cha bzang len dang /_/lhar bcas pa dang de bcu'o/_/yangs pa can du bstan pa dang /_/rab sbyin dang ni grags 'dzin dang /_/dang ba dang ni 
[\[255b.4\]]mkhas pa dang /_/sa 'tsho ma ni bstan pa dang /_/'dzam bu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]nang skyes dang /_/rigs bdun ngan spong bu dang ni/_/rgyal po'i khab dang dka' thub dang /_/ring 'phur dka' spyod dga' bo dang /_/nag po bkra shis de bzhin du/_/bdud gzhom pa ni byas pa 
[\[255b.5\]]dang /_/'khor ni mdo ru bsdus pa'o/_/gru 'dzin du dgra 'dul dang brgya tham pa'o/_/dmag gis mi tshugs su ma rgyal ba las rgyal dang lnga khri bzhi stong ngo /_/bA rA Na sIr bzod dka' dang drug khri sum stong ngo /_/kim pi lar tshangs sbyin dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/
[\[255b.6\]]glang po che'i grong du glang pos sbyin dang sum khri nyis stong ngo /_/rdo 'jog tu bal bu can dang lnga stong ngo /_/brang gis nyal du tshan po che 'dul dang sum khri nyis stong ngo /_/ma rgyal ba las rgyal du rgyal byin dang sum khri nyis stong ngo /_/ka n+ya kub dzar rgyal sde dang sum khri 
[\[255b.7\]]nyis stong ngo /_/tsam par klu'i lha dang khri brgyad stong ngo /_/ta la'i phreng du mi'i lha dang nyi khri lnga stong ngo /_/ta ma lir rgya mtsho'i lha dang khri nyis stong ngo /_/ba so'i grong du blo gros bzang po dang khri brgyad stong ngo /_/rgyal po'i khab tu mun sel dang nyi khri lnga stong ngo /_/bA rA 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]Na sIr dbang phyug chen po'i sde dang brgya tham pa'o/_/rtswa can du rgya mtsho'i sde dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/gru 'dzin du dka' thub spyod dang stong ngo /_/rtswa can du sa'i gdong dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/bA rA Na sIr sa'i bdag po dang 'bum mo/_/dmag 
[\[256a.2\]]gis mi tshugs par sa 'dzin dang 'bum mo/_/mi thi lar lha chen po dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/yang mi thi lar lha chen po nas bzung ste mu khyud nas shing rta sra ba'i bar brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/kun du snang bar nam mkha'i bdag po dang /_klu mnyam skyong dang bdun khri bdun 
[\[256a.3\]]stong ngo /_/bA rA Na sIr kr-i kI dang legs skyes dang brgya tham pa'o/_/gru 'dzin du rna ba can dang bu ram shing pa dang brgya tham pa'o/_/gru 'dzin du 'phags skyes po dang bu ram shing pa la sogs pas khyim gyi bar brgya tham pa'o/_/ser skya'i gzhir shing rta bcu pa nas 
[\[256a.4\]]bzung ste lnga khri lnga stong byung ba la seng ge'i 'gram las bzhi ste/_bzhi po de rnams las gnyis gnyis so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun 
[\[256a.5\]]khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/_shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/_thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/_gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' 
[\[256a.6\]]zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/_shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/_thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang /_thog ma gang 
[\[256a.7\]]yin pa dang /_rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang /_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/_tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[256b.2\]]go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/_shAkya rnams 
[\[256b.3\]]ni gang las skyes/_thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/_gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad ces 'dri ste/_shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/_thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig 
[\[256b.4\]]yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad 'dri na/_bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/_thog ma ni gang yin/_rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/_tshur bdag 
[\[256b.5\]]cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la don de nyid zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags 
[\[256b.6\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/_thog ma ni gang lags/_rgyu ni ci zhig lags/_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud 
[\[256b.7\]]las brtsams te chos kyi gtam glengs na mu stegs can dang kun du rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge sbyong gau ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lta bu ston pas bdag nyid la stod par byed do zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod pas nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyam mo/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' 
[\[257a.2\]]stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu nga rgyab bsnyung bas re zhig de bsal gyis/_khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra 
[\[257a.3\]]bas khas blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas/_snam sbyar bltab ste sngas phangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab ste/_zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du 
[\[257a.4\]]shes dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang ldang ba'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag na shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams 
[\[257a.5\]]gang las skyes pa dang /_thog ma gang yin pa dang /_rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang /_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/_/snyam nas/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 
[\[257a.6\]]sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag na shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang /_thog ma gang 
[\[257a.7\]]yin pa dang /_rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang /_shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]bu chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/_gau ta ma dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig rten zhig na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/_de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing 
[\[257b.2\]]ma tshang ba med pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/_rang gi 'od can/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur 
[\[257b.3\]]zhing mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang /_mkhregs pa dang /_khebs par byed do/_/dper na 'o ma bskol ba grangs par gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang /_mkhregs pa 
[\[257b.4\]]dang /_khebs pa de bzhin du/_sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang /_mkhregs pa dang /_khebs par byed do/_/sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ro phun sum 
[\[257b.5\]]tshogs pa yin zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na mar sar lta bu'o/_/ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/_/gau ta ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa de 'chags shing 'jig rten 
[\[257b.6\]]chags na de na sems can kha cig tshe zad/_las zad/_bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams dang /_skal ba mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams 
[\[257b.7\]]shing ma tshang ba med pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/_rang gi 'od can/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/_rgyu skar rnams kyang med/_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam yang med/_mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang med/_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_dus tshigs dang /_lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba 
[\[258a.2\]]med do/_/skyes pa dang bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi/_gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed do/_/ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta 
[\[258a.3\]]de ltar sred do/_/ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/_/sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed de/_ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la/_ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi 
[\[258a.4\]]zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar rtsom ste/_ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/_/ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/_/gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i 
[\[258a.5\]]bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs par gyur to/_/de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten 
[\[258a.6\]]du mun pa byung na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam dang /_mtshan mo dang /_nyin mo dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_dus tshigs dang /_lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[258a.7\]]ro/_/de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur te/_kha zas kyi 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/_kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no/_/khyod ni kha dog ngan pa can yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de 
[\[258b.2\]]rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal 
[\[258b.3\]]bar gyur to/_/dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang /_tshig dang /_tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na tshogs 
[\[258b.4\]]shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/_smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de'i don ni mi shes so/_/gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi sa'i 
[\[258b.5\]]bcud de nub pa nas zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na dong ka'i me tog lta bu'o/_/ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta 
[\[258b.6\]]bu'o/_/de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/_/kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/_/zas kyi tshad gnyis la 
[\[258b.7\]]brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/_khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag nub par gyur to/_/gau ta ma dgas zhag de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar 
[\[259a.2\]]byed do/_/dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba 'ga' zhig gis reg pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang /_tshig dang /_tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud ces smra ba de bzhin du/_sems can de rnams sa zhag 
[\[259a.3\]]de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa'i 'di'i don 'di yin/_smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so/_/gau ta ma dag sems can de 
[\[259a.4\]]rnams kyi sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o/_/ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/_dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta 
[\[259a.5\]]bu'o/_/de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/_/kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/_/zas kyi 
[\[259a.6\]]tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis yin no/_/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/_khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga 
[\[259a.7\]]rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/_mdun nas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/dper na da ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la tshig drag po'i tshar gcad pas tshar gcad par 'dod pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang /_tshig dang /_tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su bzlas shing 'di skad ces/_mdun nas 
[\[259b.2\]]phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/_mdun nas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa'i 'di'i don ni 
[\[259b.3\]]'di yin/_smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so/_/gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa sbun ma med pa shun pa med pa dag pa gtsang ma skyes 
[\[259b.4\]]te/_de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/_nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas brngas shing brngas kyang slar skyes pas brngas par yang mi mngon no/_/de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/gang nas sems can de 
[\[259b.5\]]dag rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas de rnams kyis dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur to/_/kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o/_/kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o/_/de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang 
[\[259b.6\]]yin pa rnams dang /_skyes pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta'o/_/ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun du chags so/_/ji lta ji ltar kun du chags pa de lta de ltar zhen to/_/
[\[259b.7\]]ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhugs so/_/sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sa dang /_bong ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces sems can 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do/_/sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/_kwa'i sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o/_/dper na da ltar mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na phye ma dang /_dri dang /_
[\[260a.2\]]phreng ba dang /_gos dang /_'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong nas sas gtor zhing bong ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo 
[\[260a.3\]]rnams kyis kyang gtor nas 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do/_/sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/_kwa'i sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod 
[\[260a.4\]]do/_/gau ta ma dag de ltar na sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar chos su 'dod/_'dul bar 'dod do/_/sngon smad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar bsngags par bya bar 
[\[260a.5\]]'dod do/_/de rnams kyis de zhag gcig spangs pa nas zhag gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bdun du yang spangs so/_/gang nas sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de nas de rnams 
[\[260a.6\]]khang pa rtsig pa la brtson par byed de/_'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/_/'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/_gau ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po 
[\[260a.7\]]yin no/_/de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/_de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin no/_/de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs ka sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do/_/nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang par 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas sems can snyom las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par gyi sA lu nub mo blangs so/_/de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong /_de nas sems 
[\[260b.2\]]can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig_/kho bos ni nang par gyi sA lu do nub blangs so/_/de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma de ni legs so/_/kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/_ma la 
[\[260b.3\]]bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang /_zhag gsum gyi dang /_zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blang ngo snyam du sems nas/_des zhag gnyis kyi dang /_zhag gsum gyi dang /_zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs so/_/de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad 
[\[260b.4\]]ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong /_de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig_/kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi dang /_gsum gyi dang /_zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu 
[\[260b.5\]]blangs zin no/_/de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma de ni legs so/_/kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/_ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang /_zla ba gcig gi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/_des zla ba phyed dang /_zla ba gcig gi sA lu blangs so/_/gang 
[\[260b.6\]]nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang /_sbun pa dang /_shun pas yog par gyur to/_/brngas shing brngas na yang phyir mi skye bas brngas par 
[\[260b.7\]]yang mngon la/_sA lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to/_/de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/_dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/_yan 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/_rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/_nam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/_bdag cag sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs 
[\[261a.2\]]pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to/_/bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos te/_gang gi tshe bdag gis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid dag 
[\[261a.3\]]zhugs par gyur te/_kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/_/bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to/_/bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha 
[\[261a.4\]]dog bzang por gyur/_kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kwa'i sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/_khyod ni kha dog 
[\[261a.5\]]ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/_/sa'i bcud de nub pa nas zhag kha dog 
[\[261a.6\]]phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/_bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/_kha zas ches mang 
[\[261a.7\]]du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/_/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kwa'i sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/_khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to/_/sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro 
[\[261b.2\]]phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/_bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/_kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_
[\[261b.3\]]zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no/_/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kwa'i sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/_khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/bdag cag kha dog gi mngon 
[\[261b.4\]]pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/_/myu gu'i tshal de nub pa na ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/_sbun pa med pa/_shun pa med pa/_dag pa/_gtsang ma skyes 
[\[261b.5\]]te/_de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/_nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas brngas shing brngas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/_bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/gang nas bdag cag gis 
[\[261b.6\]]ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sog 'jog gis yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang /_sbun pa dang /_shun pas yog par gyur to/_/brngas shing brngas pa yang slar mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/_sA lu yang sbubs 
[\[261b.7\]]sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcad la 'di ni khyed kyi'o/_/'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug bre bar bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas zhing dgod de mtshams bcad mu thug bres so/_/gau ta 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du mu thug bre ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no/_/de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/_de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi gtso bo yin no/_/de nas sems can zhig gis 
[\[262a.2\]]rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs so/_/sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can des rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kwa'i sems can 
[\[262a.3\]]khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir blang /_kwa'i sems can song la khyod phyin cad de ltar ma byed cig_/sems can des lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par blangs so/_/sems can 
[\[262a.4\]]des sems can de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par len pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kwa'i sems can khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir 
[\[262a.5\]]blang zhes des de phar drangs tshur drangs nas/_ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang khrid de/_shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du lan gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par len to zhes spyos so/_/de nas sems can de rnams kyis 
[\[262a.6\]]sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kwa'i sems can khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir blang /_kwa'i sems can song la khyod phyin cad de ltar ma byed cig_/de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[262a.7\]]shes ldan dag sems can 'dis bdag la sA lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs te/_ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang byung nas spyos so/_/de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kwa'i sems can khyod kyis sems can la sA lu'i phyir phar drangs 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]tshur drangs nas/_ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang byung nas ci'i phyir spyo/_/kwa'i sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig_/de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag sA lu'i phyir phar 'dren tshur 'dren zhing ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du 
[\[262b.2\]]spyo ba yang snang bas/_ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cag gi nang na sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/_lhag par blta na sdug pa/_lhag par mdzes pa/_lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi 
[\[262b.3\]]bdag por bskos dang /_des bdag cag chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/_phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te/_bdag cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de la chos bzhin du thog shes sbyin 
[\[262b.4\]]par bya'o snyam nas/_de rnams tshogs shing 'dus te de rnams kyi nang nas sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/_lhag par blta na sdug pa/_lhag par mdzes pa/_lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te 'di skad 
[\[262b.5\]]ces kye sems can khyod tshur shog_/kho bo cag la chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas chod cig_/phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan thogs shig_/kho bo cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du 
[\[262b.6\]]thog shas sbyin no/_/de de rnams la chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod/_phan gdags par bya ba rnams la phan 'dogs par byed cing /_de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas 'bul te/_skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[262b.7\]]chen pos bkur cing mang pos bkur bas mang pos bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so/_/zhing rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na nyams pa las skyob par byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so/_/chos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed cing tshul 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/_shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sems can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang 
[\[263a.2\]]pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste/_gau ta ma dag rgyal po 'od mdzes kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming tshur shog tshur shog ces bya bar gyur to/_/'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/_gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i tshe mi rnams kyi ming sme ba can sme ba can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gau ta 
[\[263a.3\]]ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces bya ste/_gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge mchog gi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sprin mgrin sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/_gau ta ma dag rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang ta la'i 
[\[263a.4\]]rkang zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/_ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang 
[\[263a.5\]]ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_spyi bo las skyes pas spyi bo skyes spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang /_
[\[263a.6\]]de thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o ma zags nas re res nga las nu nga las nu zhes smras pas nga las nu nga las nu zhes bya bar grags so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams sems par byed/_'jal bar byed/_nye bar rtog par byed do/_/
[\[263a.7\]]de rnams bsams/_gzhal/_nye bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas des na/_de rnams yid las skyes yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po drug po 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]pa yin no//_//bar sdom la/_sems can tshur shog sme ba can/_/sprin mgrin dang ni de bzhin du/_/ta la'i rkang dang yid las skyes/_/sngon gyi de drug bsdus pa yin/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin 
[\[263b.2\]]tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/_ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun du brgyan pa zhig byung 
[\[263b.3\]]ste/_brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen 
[\[263b.4\]]cig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/_ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa 
[\[263b.5\]]gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/_/gau ta ma dag 
[\[263b.6\]]rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/_ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/de smin nas brtol ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_
[\[263b.7\]]mdzes pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gnyis la rgyal srid kyi 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/_dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am/_ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/_/
[\[264a.2\]]de smin nas brtol ba dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes ldan nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu 
[\[264a.3\]]de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/_/gau ta ma dag de ltar na rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes so/_/'od mdzes kyi dge ba'o/_/dge ba'i dge mchog go/_/dge mchog gi gso 
[\[264a.4\]]sbyong 'phags so/_/gso sbyong 'phags kyi nga las nu'o/_/nga las nu'i mdzes pa'o/_/mdzes pa'i nye mdzes so/_/nye mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang /_mdzes ldan kyi nye mdzes ldan dang /_bzang po dang /_legs bzang dang /_btang ba dang /_btang bzung dang /_
[\[264a.5\]]yan lag dang /_yan lag shing rta dang /_ngan spong dang /_skal ldan shing rta dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_rgya mtsho'i bu dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang /_sha ku ni dang /_sha ku ni chen po dang /_ku sha dang /_nye ba'i ku sha dang /_ku sha chen po dang /_legs mthong dang /_legs 
[\[264a.6\]]mthong chen po dang /_rab thob dang /_rab thob chen po dang /_rab tu sgra bsgrags dang /_rab tu sgra bsgrags chen po dang /_'od byed pa dang /_rtul phod dang /_lhun po ldan dang /_lhun po yod dang /_'od zer dang /_'od zer ldan dang /_'od zer yod dang /_
[\[264a.7\]]kun nas 'od zer ro/_/gau ta ma dag kun nas 'od zer gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yul gru 'dzin du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/_dgra 'dul bar byed pas dgra 'dul dgra 'dul 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ngo /_/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/_ma rgyal 
[\[264b.2\]]ba las rgyal bar byed pas na ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po drug khri sum stong yul bA rA Na sIr byung ste/_de rnams kyi 
[\[264b.3\]]tha ma ni rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong kim bi la'i grong khyer du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta 
[\[264b.4\]]ma dag rgyal po tshangs byin gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong glang po che'i grong khyer du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po glang pos sbyin zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po glang pos sbyin gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_
[\[264b.5\]]yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo 'jog tu byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bal bu can zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po bal bu can gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer 
[\[264b.6\]]brang gis nyal du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshan po che 'dul zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po tshan po che 'dul gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byung ste/_de 
[\[264b.7\]]rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal byin zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal byin gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ku n+ya ku ba dzar byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal sde zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer tsam par byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po klu'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po klu'i lha'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_
[\[265a.2\]]sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer ta la'i phreng du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mi'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mi'i lha'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri nyis stong grong khyer ta ma lir byung ste/_de 
[\[265a.3\]]rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer ba so'i grong du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta 
[\[265a.4\]]ma dag rgyal po blo gros bzang po'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mun sel zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha 
[\[265a.5\]]dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad 
[\[265a.6\]]khri bzhi stong grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po stong yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni 
[\[265a.7\]]rgyal po dka' thub spyod ces bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po dka' thub spyod kyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]ma dag rgyal po sa'i gdong gi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i bdag po'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang 
[\[265b.2\]]tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa 'dzin gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong 
[\[265b.3\]]grong khyer mi thi lar byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po lha chen po'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer mi thi lar drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad 
[\[265b.4\]]de/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung ngo /_/mu khyud las 'bying ba dang /_sra ba'i mu khyud dang /_rko ba dang /_nye bar rko ba dang /_rko ba yod pa dang /_kun nas rko dang /_gya nom snang dang /_mnyam snang dang /_thos pa'i sde dang /_chos kyi 
[\[265b.5\]]sde dang /_rtogs pa dang /_rtogs pa chen po dang /_rtogs pa'i sde dang /_mya ngan med dang /_mya ngan bral dang /_brtan pa'i sde dang /_dga' bas sbyar dang /_glen gsal dang /_skya reng dang /_phyogs kyi bdag po dang /_rngul can dang /_bde byed dang /_
[\[265b.6\]]kun dga' dang /_me long gdong dang /_skyed pa dang /_kun nas skyed pa dang /_skye bo'i khyu mchog dang /_bza' btung can dang /_bza' btung mang po can dang /_mi thub pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_shin tu gnas pa dang /_
[\[265b.7\]]stobs chen dang /_stobs chen zhon dang /_legs pa'i blo gros dang /_brtan pa zhon dang /_gzhu bcu pa dang /_gzhu brgya pa dang /_gzhu dgu bcu pa dang /_gzhu rgyal dang /_gzhu bkra dang /_gzhu sra dang /_shing rta bcu pa dang /_shing rta brgya pa 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dang /_shing rta dgu bcu pa dang /_shing rta khra bo dang /_shing rta rgyal dang /_shing rta sra ba'o/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po shing rta sra ba'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong grong khyer kun du snang bar byung ste/_
[\[266a.2\]]de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po'i bu klu mnyam skyong ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po klu mnyam skyong gi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer bA 
[\[266a.3\]]rA Na sIr byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i tshe ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul 
[\[266a.4\]]ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir sngon smon lam btab nas 
[\[266a.5\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po kr-i kI'i bu legs skyes so/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po legs skyes kyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung 
[\[266a.6\]]ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/_gau ta ma dang /_ba ra dwa dza'o/_/de gnyis las gau ta ma ni mngon par 'byung bar dga'o/_/ba ra dwa dza ni rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o/_/des 
[\[266a.7\]]pa chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por gyur te/_bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir ci'i dus 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]la bab ce na/_khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab pa/_yab mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag ni dad pas khyim nas khyim ma 
[\[266b.2\]]mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_bu gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang /_sbyin sreg sreg par byed pa dang /_dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'di'i ched yin te/_nga 'das na rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu 
[\[266b.3\]]'byung /_des smras pa/_yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thog go/_/de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos gal gyis gcu bar shes nas gnang ngo /_/de'i tshe bsti gnas zhig na drang srong mdog gnag 
[\[266b.4\]]ces bya ba gnas so/_/de nas gzhon nu gau ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas dga' zhing mgu la dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas drang srong mdog gnag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag rab 
[\[266b.5\]]tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis bdag rab tu phyung shig_/des de rab tu phyung ngo /_/drang srong mdog gnag ni 'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_chu 'thung bas de yang drang srong gau ta ma drang srong gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas/_gzhon nu ba ra 
[\[266b.6\]]dwa dza pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong gau ta mas mkhan po la smras pa/_mkhan po dgon pa'i zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu rung gis grong ngam dgon 
[\[266b.7\]]pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis ni mdor na dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis/_khyod song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bo byos la 'dug shig_/mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/_drang srong gau ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]gnas so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /_skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba zhig gnas te/_des de la dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro/_/des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas 
[\[267a.2\]]pa las/_yang mi gzhan zhig kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas bzang mo dga' mgur spyod kyis tshur shog_/des bsams pa/_gal te bdag song na kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs pa 
[\[267a.3\]]ma yin no snyam nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa song la pad ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re zhig bdag la skabs ma mchis te slad kyis mchi'o zhes smros shig_/des de'i gan du song nas smras so/_/mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas de dang de dga' mgur spyad 
[\[267a.4\]]nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo /_/des bsams pa/_nam tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems kyang bdag gis bsrung bar nus so snyam nas des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba/_pad ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na/_skyed mos tshal gang 
[\[267a.5\]]du mchi zhes smros shig_/des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod kyi jo mo skad cig la skabs med skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/_bu mo de de dang rigs mi 'phrod pa zhig pas des smras pa/_rje'i sras skabs ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyis de khyod kyi 
[\[267a.6\]]gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do/_/de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris pa skyes te/_de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_bu mo song la bzang mo pad ma'i 
[\[267a.7\]]rtsa lag na re skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog ces byos shig_/des song nas bzang mo la smras pa dang /_de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/_khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]spyad par rigs sam/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras de ni bdag gis nongs te/_'on kyang bud med ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig_/de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad do/_/de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas jo mo bsad 
[\[267b.2\]]do/_/jo mo bsad do zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis thos nas brgyugs pa dang /_de ji tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong gau ta ma gnas so/_/de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta ma'i mdun 
[\[267b.3\]]du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de ral gri khrag can mthong nas rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do zhes de nas drang srong gau ta ma de bskor te mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_kwa'i rab tu byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 
[\[267b.4\]]thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/_des smras pa/_ci byas/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do/_/des smras pa/_kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do zhes des zhi ba smras kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po 
[\[267b.5\]]des lag pa phying ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/_lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bkum lags so/_/rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas des smras pa/_gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs 
[\[267b.6\]]kyis gsal shing la shon cig_/de nas rab tu byung ba de me tog ka ra bI ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa/_lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams 
[\[267b.7\]]su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/_grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon no/_/de'i mkhan po mdog nag de dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su 'gro ba yin pas/_ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas des 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na de gsal shing la gshon par mthong nas de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/_kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig_/des kyang skad mi gsal zhing yi chad la gnad du 
[\[268a.2\]]bab pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/_mkhan po gzhan ci lags/_las lags mod/_des smras pa/_bu rma phyung ba'am/_gnod pa zhig ma byas grang mkhan po bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ni ma yin no/_/bu ji ltar shes/_mkhan 
[\[268a.3\]]po bden pa gsol gyis gson cig_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ma yin na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa 'di gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig_/bdag nyid chen 
[\[268a.4\]]po de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog gnag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/_/kun du drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming gser mdog ces bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[268a.5\]]de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to/_/de nas drang srong gau ta mas smras pa/_mkhan po bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang /_skye ba ni gang /_tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lags/_des smras pa/_bram ze rnams na re bu med pa rnams la 'gro ba med do/_/zhes zer na khyod 
[\[268a.6\]]kyis bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/_mkhan po yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na bdag gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/_bdag gis bu bskyed pa lta ga la mchis/_bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 
[\[268a.7\]]gyis shig_/mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas da ni bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ste/_'gum pa gcig pu dran par bas na/_ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/_de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas des rdzu 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char ba'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa dang /_de nas char pa dang rlung grang mos reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/_des sngon gyi yul la spyad pas rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so/_/gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i 
[\[268b.2\]]'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig lhung ngo /_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/_bdag sems pa dang /_'jig rten sems pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang /_
[\[268b.3\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o/_/khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgong gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang khye'u gnyis shig byung nas/_de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der 
[\[268b.4\]]de gnyis zhugs so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu gcig pa/_de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/_nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong gau ta ma gdungs nas shi'o/_/de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal 
[\[268b.5\]]shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gseb tu zhugs pa las/_ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo /_/des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /_drang srong 
[\[268b.6\]]gau ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/_de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/_des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun bsnyod de/_de gnyis kyi ming btags pa/_nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de bas 
[\[268b.7\]]na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas nyi ma'i rigs nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin pas ming gnyis pa gau ta ma gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes yan lag skyes zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po ba ra dwa dza bu med par shi nas blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag da su zhig 
[\[269a.2\]]rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_de'i gcen gau ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/_rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'os pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro/_/de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song 
[\[269a.3\]]ste son pa dang /_rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po gau ta ma gang du mchis/_des smras pa/_khyed cag kho nas bsad do/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/_kho bos khyed cag 
[\[269a.4\]]dran par bya'o/_/ma nongs so/_/des de rnams dran par byas pa dang /_smras pa/_drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang bsgrags pa ma yin gyis zhog shig_/des sdig pa'i las ci byas/_'di dang 'di'o/_/skyon med pa gnod pa mi 
[\[269a.5\]]byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do/_/de ltar ci mngon/_des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /_de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma lags kyi bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes 
[\[269a.6\]]de rnams de skad du gtam smra bar byed pa na/_khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/_des smras pa/_de kho na'i bu'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/_
[\[269a.7\]]'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/_des byung ba dang bcas pa rgyas par smras pa/_blon po rnams kyis thos te mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shes rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de yang 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]bu med par shi'o/_/de nas cig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas/_de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin 
[\[269b.2\]]du byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/_skar mda' gdong dang /_lag rna dang /_glang po che 'dul dang /_rkang gdub can no/_/dus gzhan 
[\[269b.3\]]zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems 
[\[269b.4\]]khong du chud cing mi 'dug_/lha gal te de lta na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/_ci'i slad du rje'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di dag yod na nga la su zhig bu mo ster 
[\[269b.5\]]bar 'gyur lha dgongs shig dang /_bdag cag gis btsal lo/_/ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa btsun mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de de rnams kyis brtags te rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas de rnams kyis 
[\[269b.6\]]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang /_rgyal pos bsgo ba khug shig_/de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go/_/gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas 
[\[269b.7\]]smras pa/_lha bkra shis par gyur cig_/bkra shis par gyur cig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed ci gsol/_rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo slong ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'thab rir 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na sbyin no/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/_mchis la lha la snyan du gdags par 
[\[270a.2\]]gsol lo zhes de rnams dong nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/_nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin 
[\[270a.3\]]no/_/lha don de la nges pa ma mchis te/_re zhig btsun mo blangs la lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang /_dgyes pa dang dgyes dgur spyod par mdzod cig dang /_de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/_ci ma mchis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/_rgyal pos 
[\[270a.4\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la long shig_/de rnams dong nas bsu ste/_ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par 
[\[270a.5\]]byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/
[\[270a.6\]]btsas nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/_khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bya 
[\[270a.7\]]bar btags so/_/khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/_
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]des de la pho nya btang ste/_tshig rtsub mo dang bcas pa'i spring yig spring ba khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/_gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des sdod cig_/kho bo der 
[\[270b.2\]]'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar brlag go/_/rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal srid dga' 
[\[270b.3\]]rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang bzhon pa rgya 
[\[270b.4\]]che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur la gzhon nu de rnams ni spyug tu gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa 
[\[270b.5\]]ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug_/lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/_lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas skyon ma mchis pa dang /_nongs pa ma bgyis pa yang spyug la/_skyon mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni bzhag go/_/rgyal pos btang snyoms 
[\[270b.6\]]su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/_des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor 
[\[270b.7\]]byas pa/_ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag_/dar gyi chun phyang mang po btags/_me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go/_/de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo /_/blon po rnams skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang /_gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/_'di su'i skyed mos tshal/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i lags 
[\[271a.2\]]so/_/de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig_/ci'i phyir slar ldog_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i skyed mos tshal yin na 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'am gzhon nu 
[\[271a.3\]]rnams rol pa 'di 'gal ba ci mchis de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis/_lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so/_/rgyal po chas pa dang skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra 
[\[271a.4\]]thos so/_/thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gzhon nu rnams so/_/gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so/_/blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis 
[\[271a.5\]]la gtugs te smras pa/_lha bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams spyug par chas pa dang /_rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor 
[\[271a.6\]]gyi skye bo mang po dang lhan cig mchi na de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/_de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te zhag bdun grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo 
[\[271a.7\]]phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de lta na sgo chod cig_/de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/_de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil po dag byas te gnas btab ste [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho bar byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti 
[\[271b.2\]]gnas su dong bar byed do/_/lang tsho dang dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen te sha bri ngan pa skya bo bseng bseng por gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng 
[\[271b.3\]]por gyur/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so/_/des smras pa/_rang rang gi sring mo spongs la/_mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug shig_/drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta 
[\[271b.4\]]bu bgyir rung ngam/_shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor ba rnams kyis rung ngo /_/de na de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar 
[\[271b.5\]]byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te de rnams chen por gyur pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong ser 
[\[271b.6\]]skya'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o/_/drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/_bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas so/_/drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na 
[\[271b.7\]]bzhugs shig_/bdag cag gzhan du mchi na 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag la phog shig_/shes ldan dag rung ngo /_/drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun gyis 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so/_/drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang bas ser skya'i gzhi ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen por 
[\[272a.2\]]gyur te dog pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to/_/lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang /_de rnams der song ste grong khyer cig shos brtsigs nas lhas bstan lhas bstan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus 
[\[272a.3\]]nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spyugs pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blang bar mi bya ste/_gcig kho nas chog shes 
[\[272a.4\]]par bya'o/_/de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma gcig len gyi rigs mnyam pa las chung ma gnyis pa ni mi len to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran te blon po rnams la smras pa/_kye grong pa dag gzhon 
[\[272a.5\]]nu de rnams da lta gang na 'dug_/de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig las spyugs pa las de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang 
[\[272a.6\]]ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/_rang rang gi sring mo spangs te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par bgyid do/_/de rnams rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod 
[\[272a.7\]]par bgyid pa na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so/_/grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod dam/_lha rngo thog lags so/_/de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brgyang ste ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_kye ma gzhon nu 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rnams ni phod pa yin no/_/kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/_kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no/_/kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes byas pas de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[272b.2\]]de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur to/_/de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/_/de yang bu med par shi nas lag rna rgyal por gyur 
[\[272b.3\]]to/_/de yang bu med par shi nas glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to/_/de yang bu med par shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur te/_de'i bu gnas 'jog go/_/gau ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo/_/gau ta ma dag rgyal pos khyim gyi bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang 
[\[272b.4\]]tsha dang /_sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/_de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang /_shing rta brgya pa dang /_shing rta dgu bcu pa dang /_shing rta khra bo dang /_shing rta rgyal dang /_brtan pa'i shing rta dang /_gzhu bcu pa dang /_gzhu brgya 
[\[272b.5\]]pa dang /_gzhu dgu bcu pa dang /_gzhu rgyal dang /_gzhu bkra dang /_gzhu brtan no/_/gau ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/_seng ge'i 'gram dang /_seng ge'i sgra'o/_/gau ta ma dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni seng ge'i 
[\[272b.6\]]'gram mchog tu grags so/_/gau ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/_zas gtsang dang /_zas dkar dang /_bre bo zas dang /_tshad med zas so/_/bu mo gtsang ma dang /_dkar mo dang /_bre bo ma dang /_tshad med ma'o/_/zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/_bcom 
[\[272b.7\]]ldan 'das dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/_/zas dkar la bu gnyis te/_tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang /_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no/_/bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/_ming chen dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o/_/tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/_tshe dang 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha sbyin no/_/gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab sad do/_/dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can no/_/bre mo ma'i bu ni bzang len no/_/tshad med ma'i bu dge 'phel lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra can zin yin te/_
[\[273a.2\]]gau ta ma dag mang pos bkur ba'i rgyud tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin du rdzogs/_srid pa'i breng rgyun chad/_skye ba'i 'khor ba zad de/_da ni yang srid pa med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas/_
[\[273a.3\]]bzhengs te bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu legs so/_/legs so/_/maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam 
[\[273a.4\]]smras pa yang khyod legs so/_/maud gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang /_des na de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[273a.5\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon gyi shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig_/zung shig_/lhogs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams 
[\[273a.6\]]pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan/_chos dang ldan pa nas/_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing bklag pa'i rigs so/_/
