[\[273a.7\]]de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po seng 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/_
[\[273b.2\]]'bras dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/_/grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang /_bde 
[\[273b.3\]]ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/_'bras dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs 
[\[273b.4\]]pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/_/rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa yul gyi bzang mo lum bi ni zhes bya ba yod do/_/lhas bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor 
[\[273b.5\]]mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chu phun sum 
[\[273b.6\]]tshogs pa dang /_bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do/_/lum bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes 
[\[273b.7\]]te/_des smras pa/_lha kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/_gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor 
[\[274a.2\]]los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/_/rgyal po legs par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge'i 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun 
[\[274a.3\]]mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_yan lag dang nying lag 
[\[274a.4\]]thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/_the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam/_
[\[274a.5\]]'on te las sna tshogs sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/_/de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye 
[\[274a.6\]]bo'i tshogs lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o/_/gzhan dag gi mchid 
[\[274a.7\]]nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/_'o na ci zhe na/_las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so/_/bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/_/yang de rtse 
[\[274b.2\]]bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_kha dog bzang mo rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/_
[\[274b.3\]]sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so/_/de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par 
[\[274b.4\]]gzugs bzang bas de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/_
[\[274b.5\]]de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/_/rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la pho nya btang ste/_bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsa' ba ni sgyu 'phrul dang /_sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/_de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum 
[\[274b.6\]]tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro 
[\[274b.7\]]zhes lung bstan gyis/_'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig seng ge 'gram gyis slar spring ba/_gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/_'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas gang la skyes bu chen 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa re zhig 'dod do/_/cig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o/_/des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o/_/de'i tshe shAkya 
[\[275a.2\]]rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas lha skya bseng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo rgas pas de rnams 
[\[275a.3\]]dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/_/lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/_dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa gcig bslangs pa de sbyin pa lta na gtong ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar 
[\[275a.4\]]bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/_des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta'o/_/de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/_lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams 
[\[275a.5\]]bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta' lags pas bdag cag glo ba dga' na gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsung shig dbul lo/_/shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bca' ba sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so/_/lha ci khrims dral lam/_
[\[275a.6\]]des smras pa/_lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/_'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa cig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no/_/lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig_/de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas kho bos tshogs la 
[\[275a.7\]]brtags zin gyis/_bu mo cig shos kyang bkri shig_/des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri ste gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/_'bras dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_
[\[275b.2\]]ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/_/des dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang /_lhan cig steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur 
[\[275b.3\]]spyod par byed do/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/_rigs la gzigs pa dang /_yul la gzigs pa dang /_dus la gzigs pa dang /_rgyud la 
[\[275b.4\]]gzigs pa dang /_bud med la gzigs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta 
[\[275b.5\]]bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_bram ze'i rigs sam/_rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la/_de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/_res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/_da lta ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/_ma la 
[\[275b.6\]]bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas/_smad 
[\[275b.7\]]par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_'bras dang /_bu ram 
[\[276a.2\]]shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/_mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/_dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_yul dbus 'di ni bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_'bras dang /_
[\[276a.3\]]bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/_mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/_dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul 'tha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba 
[\[276a.4\]]blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[276a.5\]]ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas 
[\[276a.6\]]na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa na brgya 
[\[276a.7\]]thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/_mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la/_
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang /_bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/_tshe'i snyigs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma 
[\[276b.2\]]dang /_lta ba'i snyigs ma dang /_dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems 
[\[276b.3\]]dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[276b.4\]]dpa' rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur 
[\[276b.5\]]zhing ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_shAkya'i rigs brgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang 
[\[276b.6\]]chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 
[\[276b.7\]]'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]par mdzad ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/_bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/_
[\[277a.2\]]tshul dang ldan pa/_rigs dang ldan pa/_rgod bag can ma yin la rigs 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang /_
[\[277a.3\]]rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang /_pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_tshul dang ldan pa dang /_rgod bag can ma yin pa dang /_rigs 
[\[277a.4\]]'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang /_rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/_'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin 
[\[277a.5\]]pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa 
[\[277a.6\]]dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas gzigs pa lnga gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris 
[\[277a.7\]]drug la lan gsum du bsgrags pa/_grogs po dag dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la de'i bur gyur te bdud rtsi rtogs par byas/_khyod cag las gang dag 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus kyi mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba longs shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod 
[\[277b.2\]]cig_/da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/_skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/_'dzam bu'i gling rtog ge pa drug dang /_rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so/_/de la rtog ge pa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[277b.3\]]'od srung rdzogs byed dang /_kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /_smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o/_/rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bram ze rgyus 
[\[277b.4\]]rgyal dang /_bram ze gnas rdeg dang /_bram ze bzang ldan dang /_bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang /_bram ze pad ma'i snying po dang /_bram ze dmar po'o/_/snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang /_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur 
[\[277b.5\]]dang /_kun du rgyu legs bzang dang /_bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang /_drang srong ma bcings pa dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can no/_/'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing bdag cag 'di 
[\[277b.6\]]snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/_chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyi bar sems lags so/_/
[\[277b.7\]]de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag de'i phyir rol mo'i cha byad thams cad rdungs shig_/dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha byad thams cad brdungs pa dang byang 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/_grogs po dag 'di la sgra lhag par gang che/_bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so/_/grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang 
[\[278a.2\]]'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang /_rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par byas te bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o/_/mi rtag pa'i dung 'bud par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[278a.3\]]med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/_/rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig_/brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/_/nyi ma gcig gis 
[\[278a.4\]]mun pa du ma rnam par sel/_/grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 
[\[278a.5\]]'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis/_ma la bdag gis de la gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/_lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing 
[\[278a.6\]]lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du bsgrags nas nam gyi gung thun la glang po cher bstan te/_btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums 
[\[278a.7\]]su zhugs so/_/smras pa/_'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir dam bzhes nas/_/lha rnams la bsgo de nas shi 'phos te/_/nang par sprin rum nyi ma gsar 'char ltar/_/de ni bu ram shing pa'i lhums su zhugs/_/'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rmi lam bzhi rmis pa/_glang po che dam pa dkar po 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi rum dral nas zhugs pa dang /_steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_ri brag chen po la 'dzeg pa dang /_bdag la skye bo'i tshogs chen po phyag byed pa'o/_/des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang /_rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag rmi lam ston 
[\[278b.2\]]mkhan dang /_mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khug shig_/de dag gis rmi lam ston mkhan dang /_mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkug pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos de rnams la rmi lam bsnyad pa las/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bstan bcos las ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar na sras 
[\[278b.3\]]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/_gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 
[\[278b.4\]]byung bar gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro//_//bar sdom la/_'chi 'pho lha dang rin po che/_/zur brgyad dub dang brtul zhugs brtan/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems 
[\[278b.5\]]dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/_'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 
[\[278b.6\]]'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba las de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag 
[\[278b.7\]]sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]'gyur bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srung mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gri dang /_lag na mdung dang /_lag na mdung thung dang /_lag na mda' bo che'o/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa ni mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag 
[\[279a.2\]]pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /_sha ma'i dri ma dang /_khrag gi dri ma dang /_mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/_/dper na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang /_ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du/_gang 
[\[279a.3\]]gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /_sha ma'i dri ma dang /_khrag gi dri ma dang /_mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs pas ma sbags so/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems 
[\[279a.4\]]dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/dper na nor bu rin po che ni bai DUr+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po'i rigs dang ldan pa/_dang ba/_gsal ba/_dri ma med pa tshon skud 
[\[279a.5\]]sna lnga sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan la brgyus pa de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o/_/'di ni nor bu'o/_/skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 
[\[279a.6\]]'das gang gi tshe yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[279a.7\]]dpa' 'dzin pas ngal ba'am lus dub par 'gyur ba med do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum deng phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar ldog go/_/ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_sbyar ba'i chang dang /_'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/_sbyar ba'i chang dang 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med 
[\[279b.2\]]pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed do/_/srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mi smra chang la mi brkam dang /_/'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di/_/'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin/_chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 
[\[279b.3\]]'das yum gyi lhums su bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/_skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do/_/nyon mongs rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing /_/de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/_/de yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/_/skyes 
[\[279b.4\]]pa rnams la sems ni gtod pa med/_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa/_kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/_ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skye/_
[\[279b.5\]]mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/_de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te 'di la mtsho 
[\[279b.6\]]chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/_sras yan lag ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_nga ming zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya'am/_de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun du rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 
[\[279b.7\]]'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas bsgo ba dang /_des de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi na 'dug pa la rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bstan te chu blud pa dang /_de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/_kye ma btson thams cad thar bar bya'o/_/
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]snyam pa dang /_rgyal pos btson thams cad thar bar byas nas/_de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/_kye ma sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag bya'o snyam pa dang /_rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin/_
[\[280a.2\]]bsod nams dag byas nas de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/_kye ma bdag gis skyed mos tshal blta'o snyam pa dang /_rgyal pos skyed mos tshal bstan nas de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/gzhan 
[\[280a.3\]]yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/_kye ma bdag skyed mos tshal du 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang /_rgyal po legs par rab sad la lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal yod nas de la rgyal po zas gtsang gis spring ba/_khyod kyi bu mo skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar 'dod kyis skyed mos 
[\[280a.4\]]tshal byi dor byos shig_/des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal byi dor byos shig_/de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas so/_/de nas de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dong ngo /_/de nas des lum bi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa na shing mya ngan 'tshang me 
[\[280a.5\]]tog shin tu rgyas pa zhig mthong ste/_de bltam par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bskor na bltam mi phod kyis thabs shig bsham 
[\[280a.6\]]par bya'o snyam nas des rlung dang char drag po cig sprul nas des skye bo'i tshogs de kun du bros so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du bsdad pa dang /_des bltam par brtsams so/_/
[\[280a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa dang /_brgya byin gyis pags pa'i sleb mos bzung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_brgya byin 'di bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so zhes dregs par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas bdag nyid rdo rje'i skur byin 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]gyis brlabs pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka nga thong shig_/thong shig_/phar thong shig_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de'i tshe yang sa chen 
[\[280b.2\]]po 'di yang g.yos par gyur zhes bya ba nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu gnyis pa/_chos nyid kyis 
[\[280b.3\]]gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa na ral gri shubs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /_sha ma'i dri ma dang /_khrag gi dri ma dang /_mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi 
[\[280b.4\]]tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe de'i yum mi 'dug mi nyal 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltam par byed do/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la sus kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir 
[\[280b.5\]]gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun 'dor zhing tshig tu yang gsungs pa/_'di ni shar phyogs yin te/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i thog mar 'gro bar bya'o/_/'di ni lho phyogs yin te/_'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o/_/'di ni nub phyogs yin 
[\[280b.6\]]te/_nga'i skye ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni byang phyogs yin te/_srid pa'i mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/_/de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i 
[\[280b.7\]]mod la bar snang las chu bsil ba gcig dang /_chu dron po gcig ste chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la bskrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]'bab par gyur te/_de la de'i yum chus chu'i bya ba byed do/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la ltas bar snang las lha'i ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_rgya 
[\[281a.2\]]spos kyi phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro/_/lha'i me tog man dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro/_/lha'i sil snyan rnams kyis kyang sgra 'byin to/_/gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do//_//bar sdom la/_bltam dang bzhengs dang gom pa 
[\[281a.3\]]bdun/_/chu rgyun gnyis dang chu mig lha/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe rgyal po bzhi yang bu btsas te/_mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs byin gyi bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu 
[\[281a.4\]]btsas pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad ma chen po'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig 
[\[281a.5\]]rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/kau shAm+bI na rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig 
[\[281a.6\]]rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/_/grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron ma ltar 
[\[281a.7\]]snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te de ni de lta ma yin no/_/'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no/_/ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba 'jig pa la mkhas 'chags pa la mkhas pa 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]zhig gnas te/_de'i tsha bo ni mes byin zhes bya'o/_/des de la dus dus su 'jig pa'i gtam dang 'chags pa'i gtam smras pas de de las rab tu byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa na 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar 
[\[281b.2\]]gyur to/_/de'i tshe mes byin phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa na des snang ba de mthong nas nyon mongs med la smras pa/_mkhan po/_'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag_/cig char byung bar gyur tam ci/_/'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa/_/'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/_/
[\[281b.3\]]nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/_nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du rno/_/bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni/_/yan lag reg na 'od bsil bas/_/nges par thub pa de yi 'od/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen yin/_/nges par lhums nas bltam gyur la/_/bltam nas sems 
[\[281b.4\]]dpa' chen po de'i/_/'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni/_/dri ma med pa 'di dag gis/_/'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas/_/mes byin gyis smras pa/_mkhan po bdag byang chub sems dpa' ltar mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa' dbang che 
[\[281b.5\]]ba dang /_dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing bzhugs pas gang yang bdag cag gis skabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod do/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir byon nas de'i ming 'dogs pa de'i tshe bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/gang 
[\[281b.6\]]gi nyi ma kho na la byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de nyid kyi nyi ma kho na la rgyal po zas gtsang gi rim gro ba rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang /_rim gro ma rnams las 'dun ma la sogs te lnga brgya btsas so/_/bal glang mo lnga brgya dang /_rta rgod ma lnga brgya la yang 
[\[281b.7\]]'brangs so/_/gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snang ngo /_/khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang dpya phul te/_blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_rgyal pos bsams pa/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na don thams cad dang /_las kyi mtha' thams 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes gdags so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/_'di lta ste don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o/_/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel 
[\[282a.2\]]zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/_/shAkya rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u'am bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan 
[\[282a.3\]]dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par 
[\[282a.4\]]brtsams pa na/_ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po gzu lums can/_rtsub pa/_btsam pa med pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/_ser skya'i 
[\[282a.5\]]gzhi'i shAkya 'di rnams ni gtum po gzu lums can btsam pa med pa yin na gzhon nu nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis pa btags pa 'di lta ste shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub 
[\[282a.6\]]sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang /_gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[282a.7\]]kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/_lha gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs lags so/_/rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag lhas kyang gzhon nu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas/_de bas na gzhon 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gsum pa btags pa 'di lta ste lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis ma ma rnams la gtad nas ma ma khyod kyis gzhon nu la dus dus su bsku mnye 
[\[282b.2\]]byos shig_/dus dus su khrus byos shig_/dus dus su zas byin cig_/dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig_/ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su bsku mnye byed/_dus dus su khrus byed/_dus dus su zas byin/_dus 
[\[282b.3\]]dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do/_/yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shing /_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la phul ba dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te pang du bzhag nas 
[\[282b.4\]]yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas shes ldan dag ji ga gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur 
[\[282b.5\]]gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te/_gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste 'di lta ste/_'khor 
[\[282b.6\]]lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o/_/bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/_
[\[282b.7\]]de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/_chos dang mthun pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_dad pa yang 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nam/_
[\[283a.2\]]shes ldan dag gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po gang dag yin/_lha gzhon nu'i 
[\[283a.3\]]zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so/_/zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis las 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam 
[\[283a.4\]]pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni sor mo ring ba dang /_zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang /_de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/_phyag dang zhabs 
[\[283a.5\]]'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin no/_/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba lags te/_de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 
[\[283a.6\]]'brel ba ni dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i bzhin no/_/lha 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang /_byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i lta bu dang /_sku mdud pa dang /_sku bzhengs 
[\[283a.7\]]bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis slebs shing reg pa ste/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/_de'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni dper na glang po cang shes kyi'am rta 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]cang shes byung ba dag gi bzhin no/_/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni sku ji srid par 'dom yang de srid la 'dom ji srid par sku yang de srid pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu 
[\[283b.2\]]chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni sku ro stod spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku la spu re re nas skye ba yang mthing ga la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni mdog gser dang 
[\[283b.3\]]'dra ba dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang /_pags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba lags te/_pags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mtho ba ste/_sku bdun mtho 
[\[283b.4\]]bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang /_zhabs gnyis dang /_dpung mgo gnyis dang /_ltag pa lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni thal gong rgyas pa dang /_sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /_sku 
[\[283b.5\]]drang zhing kho lag che ba dang /_dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang /_tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang /_tshems mnyam pa dang /_tshems thags bzang ba dang /_mche ba shin tu dkar ba dang /_'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon 
[\[283b.6\]]nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/_ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyung bas skra mtshams nas bzung ste/_zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/_
[\[283b.7\]]lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu'i gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_ka la ping ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang /_rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha gzhon nu ni spyan mthon 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang /_dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang /_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags te/_lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/_/lha 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan pa'i 
[\[284a.2\]]'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis lags so/_/gal te gzhon nu rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[284a.3\]]rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /_de bskrun pa'i yum nongs par 'gyur te/_nongs ma thag tu sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris gya nom par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[284a.4\]]chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mi'i kha dog las 'das la lha'i kha dog ma thob pa skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/_dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i 
[\[284a.5\]]gser las mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan brdungs pa la ba dkar po sar ba'i steng du bzhag na shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mi'i kha dog las 'das shing 
[\[284a.6\]]lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/_skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag pa nas phrag par sbed pa ni dper na ston ka'i pad ma ni skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i 
[\[284a.7\]]snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no//_//bar sdom la/_mig mi 'dzums dang rnam smin dang /_/gsung snyan 'jebs pa mkhas pa bsdus/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la blta ste/_de spyan mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i 
[\[284b.2\]]spyan dang ldan pas des na de nyin dang mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu gzigs so/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang /_gsung snyan pa dang /_gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/_dper na gangs 
[\[284b.3\]]can gyi bya skad snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang /_skad snyan pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang /_gsung snyan pa dang /_gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[284b.4\]]bltam pa'i mod nas mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa rgyud las 'byung ba'i shes rab dpyod pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge dang shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do/_/de nas mes byin 
[\[284b.5\]]gyis smras pa/_mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ser skya'i gzhir byon nas de'i mtshan yang gsum btags kyis/_da ni byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir bzhud do/_/des smras pa/_de bzhin bya'o/_/de gnyis chas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthus rdzu 
[\[284b.6\]]'phrul nyams nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi khyim gyi sgor son pa dang /_drang srong nyon mongs med kyis sgo srung gi mi la smras pa/_kye nang rje song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong nyon mongs med lha zhal mthong bar 'tshal 
[\[284b.7\]]nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig_/de song nas rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan nyon mongs med la su zhig 'gog nang du zhugs shig_/de zhugs pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkur sti sngon du 'gro 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]ba'i mchod yon sbreng bas mchod nas stan bstabs te 'dug pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis bshes pa'i gtam gyis kun du dga' bar byas nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/_des smras pa/_rgyal chen bdag cag 
[\[285a.2\]]'dir mchis pa/_/khyod kyi sras ni mthong bar 'tshal/_/'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/_/thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na gzhon nu nyal gyis ma sad kyi bar du re zhig skad cig sdod cig_/des smras pa/_lha mnal 
[\[285a.3\]]log pa nyid blta'o/_/de bzhin gyis shig_/des ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' mig ma btsums par gzugs rnams la blta ba mthong nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/_/mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/_/dgos pa don 
[\[285a.4\]]gnyer rnams kyi gnyid/_/mig la yun ring mi gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod kyi ma mas pang du blangs nas drang srong la byin pa dang /_drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te smras pa/_lha 
[\[285a.5\]]gzhon nu mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la bstan lags sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bstan to/_/de rnams kyis ji skad du lung bstan/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i 
[\[285a.6\]]bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/_/rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung /_/bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni/_/nyes 
[\[285a.7\]]las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po/_/gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur/_/thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor los sgyur/_/zhes smras nas bdag nyid kyi 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]tshe'i mtha' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa la brtag pa la zhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te/_de nas bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/bdag 
[\[285b.2\]]ni bar skabs der shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur bar mthong nas de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas sngang nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skyes pa bud med rnams kyis gang mthong na/_/ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/_/lus 
[\[285b.3\]]bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas/_/drang srong chen po ci slad du bzhin gyur/_/ga las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa'am/_/tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grang /_/de ni myur du legs par bdag la smros/_/khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar 'gyur/_/
[\[285b.4\]]drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gal te 'di yi steng du nam mkha' las/_/rdo rje ser drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang /_/thub pa chen po'i sku las ba spu ni/_/nyag ma gcig kyang g.yo bar mi nus so/_/me chen rlung gi shugs 
[\[285b.5\]]kyis bdas pa dang /_/mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzad dang /_/drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug rnon dag_/gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jig par 'gyur/_/thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/_/'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/_/
[\[285b.6\]]de ni 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na/_/mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung /_/'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi/_/gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/_/tshangs bcas lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa/_/mi dbang de la 'jigs pa 
[\[285b.7\]]ga la 'byung /_/mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni/_/gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob bdag sdug mod/_/chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang phrad nas ni/_/don ma thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gang dag smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med pa/_/'di yi chos 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang /_/rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag_/skyid cing bsod nams ldan la rims nad bral/_/drang srong nyon mongs med rgyud nyon mongs pa can gyis bsams pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mthus bdag gi rdzu 'phrul nyams te 
[\[286a.2\]]gal te bdag gi rkang gis song na skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang rgyal pos 'phya bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras pa/_lha khyod yun ring po nas kye ma'o drang srong nyon mongs med rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i dgongs pa bskyed pa/_bdag 
[\[286a.3\]]gis rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir zhugs te da ni rkang kho nas phyir 'byung gis khyod kyis lam bstar ba dang /_grong khyer byi dor bgyid du stsol cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer gyi byi dor dang lam stor du chug la lam po 
[\[286a.4\]]che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis/_khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de byos shig ces dril sgrogs shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 
[\[286a.5\]]blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bzhag_/dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng 
[\[286a.6\]]nas lam po che dang /_tshong dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya shes ldan dag nyon cig_/drang srong nyon mongs med grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis/_khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed 
[\[286a.7\]]pa gang yin pa de byos shig_/de nas de nyon mongs pa'i blo dang ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyal po zas gtsang blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /_ser skya na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag du ma rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'byor pa mchog gis grong khyer gyi 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]dbus nas dbus su byung ste/_grong khyer ser skya'i sgor byung nas rgyal po slar bzlog ste ji ltar dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/_rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin gyi drung du phyin pa dang /_de de la 'dzegs nas phan tshun nyul zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas 
[\[286b.2\]]phyogs zhig tu 'dug go/_/de nas de lam gyis dub pa ngal bso ste/_bsam gtan bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul yang bskyed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong nyon mongs med nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i 
[\[286b.3\]]sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas na 'on kyang phyir thu bar gyur to/_/de nas mes byin gyis de'i lus kyi gnas rnams brtags nas smras pa/_mkhan po bdag cag rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni bdud rtsi'i ched dang /_bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir lags na/_gal te mkhan pos 
[\[286b.4\]]bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na bdud rtsi de las bdag cag la yang bgos shig_/des smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u kho bo yang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi'i ched dang /_bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir yin na/_kho bos kyang bdud rtsi ma rtogs so/_/de lta mod kyi 
[\[286b.5\]]shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu gang yin pa des bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur zhing /_bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba tshim par byed par 'gyur gyis de'i drung du rab tu byung shig_/khyod rab tu byung nas kyang rigs brjod par mi bya/_rus brjod par mi bya/_bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[286b.6\]]brjod par mi bya ste/_rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig spyad par bya zhing /_bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/_/de nas khyed kyis bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod 
[\[286b.7\]]na/_/shar gyi phyogs su khyod 'dug dang /_/yang dag sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/_/rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba smras nas/_bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad cing /_/mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes smras te/_dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas mes byin gyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas bA rA Na sIr song ste gnas so/_/de de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze'i gsang tshig 
[\[287a.2\]]klog tu 'jug go/_/mes byin gyi rus ka t+ya ya na yin pas de'i ming ka t+ya'i bu ka t+ya'i bu zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa na spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ka t+ya'i bu de la gdams ngag phog nas 'khor 
[\[287a.3\]]ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/_shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa las 'jog par 'gyur te/_de'i ming ni ka t+ya'i bu chen po ka t+ya'i bu chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring po ma 
[\[287a.4\]]lon par ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas gser gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsres pa'i chan gsol pa na/_de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsams pa dang /_dbrog par ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang /_rgyal pos 
[\[287a.5\]]btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang des kyang ma nus so/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgo ba na de rnams kyis kyang dbrog par ma nus so/_/de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[287a.6\]]sems dpas bsams pa/_'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gis/_ma la bdag gi mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa nas bzung ngo snyam nas des mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang /_glang po che lnga brgya po de dag 
[\[287a.7\]]kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nus so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po che lnga brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na/_gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]po che stong thub kyis de bas na gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags so zhes btags so//_//bar sdom la/_khye'u dang rtsed mo dag dang ni/_/rig pa khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nyid dang ni/_/ngang pa mtshon cha dge ba'i snying /_/dmag dang btsun mo rnams 
[\[287b.2\]]yin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge slob par gtad nas/_yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa' la yi ge bris nas phog pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas 
[\[287b.3\]]smras pa/_'di ni ngas shes so/_/de nas de yi ge gnyis dang /_gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'di dag kyang ngas shes kyis gzhan dag smros shig_/srin bu go chas smras pa/_'jig rten 
[\[287b.4\]]na ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi gzhan ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/_yi ge 'di'i ming ci yin smros shig_/des smras pa/_ma 'tshal to/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs 
[\[287b.5\]]pa/_'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na yi ge 'di mngon par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am 'khor los sgyur ba'o/_/nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/_srin bu go cha byang chub sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/_yi ge 
[\[287b.6\]]'di shes pa ni 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na mngon par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/_/byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags pa la nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas 
[\[287b.7\]]pas tshangs pa'i yi ge tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i zhang po bzang len zhes bya ba des glang po che'i gnya' bar zhon pa bslabs nas 'phong gi slob dpon lhar bcas zhes bya ba des 'khor 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]lnga brgya dang spyod pa slob pa la zhugs pa na bzang len gyis lhar bcas la smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin du gzhon nu gzhan dag ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad slobs shig_/lhas byin 'di ni gdug pa'i las byed 
[\[288a.2\]]pa yin gyis 'jig rten thams cad la gnod par gyur na mi rung gis 'di la gnad du snun pa ma bstan cig_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la legs par bslabs pas gnas lnga po 'di lta ste/_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog 
[\[288a.3\]]pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba dag la yang byang bar gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs kun du sgra grags pa shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[288a.4\]]bzhin du'o/_/de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/_rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po 
[\[288a.5\]]rin po che 'di byung gis dong kha de kho na la dbul lo snyam nas/_de rnams kyis glang po rin po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang /_ma stes te gdug 
[\[288a.6\]]pa'i las can lhas byin phyir byung ba des glang po che dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes te/_de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/_glang po dam pa 'di su'i yin/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu shAkya thub pa 
[\[288a.7\]]mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/_/lhas byin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_re zhig de 'khor los sgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]cag de la glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do/_/ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lhas byin gyis so/_/
[\[288b.2\]]des bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar 'di la lhas byin gyi mthu sad kyis ma la bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur bar bya bar mtha' gcig tu bor ro/_/ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba 
[\[288b.3\]]des de gzigs nas dris pa/_glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/_de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/sus bsad/_lhas byin gyis so/_/mgron rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin na ma legs pa zhig byas so/_/phyogs gang du bsad/_'o nir 
[\[288b.4\]]ro/_/'di sus 'dir khyer te 'ongs/_dga' bos so/_/des dgongs pa/_gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis 'di la mthu sad kyis/_ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las ra ba rim pa 
[\[288b.5\]]bdun dang /_'obs rim pa bdun las bzlas te bor ro/_/de ltung bas gshong btod pa glang po che'i gshong glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to/_/der bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mchod rten brtsigs pas deng sang du yang dge slong mchod 
[\[288b.6\]]rten la phyag byed pa dag phyag byed do/_/'dir smras pa/_lhas byin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad/_/dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du khyer/_/byang chub sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la/_/rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang [{]rings [,]ring [}]'phangs/_/gzhon nu 
[\[288b.7\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_gcod pa byed du 'dong ngo zhes de rnams phyir byung ba byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kyang gsan nas 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa byed du phyir byung ngo /_/gzhon nu rnams 'bras rnga ba bzhin du gcod par byed de/_de rnams kyis shing bcad cing 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bcad pa rnams 'gyel to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni bre'i kha gcod pa bzhin du gcod par mdzad do/_/des shing bcad cing bcad pa rnams ma 'gyel te/_de bzhin du 'dug pa dang /_gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag byang 
[\[289a.2\]]chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa stobs dang ldan zhing gnas lnga la byang ngo zhes thos na 'di gcod par byed pa yang mi shes pa las na/_'di bdag cag pas stobs dang ldan pa ni ma yin te/_'di ltar bdag cag gis shing gang dag bcad pa de thams cad ni 'gyel la/_'dis 
[\[289a.3\]]gang dag bcad pa de dag ni de bzhin du 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang bzo la byang ba ma shes pas byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas shing 
[\[289a.4\]]mthu la yang smod par 'gyur gyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/_des de dang mthun pa'i rlung zhig btang bas des shing de dag thams cad chem chem zer nas 'gyel te/_shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/de rnams tshabs 
[\[289a.5\]]byed pa la zhugs te/_de rnams kyis de na 'ben du lcags kyi ta la bdun dang /_rnga dang /_phag btsugs so/_/lhas byin gyis rkang thabs byas te lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang /_lcags kyi shing ta la gcig phigs so/_/dga' bos gnyis la'o/_/byang 
[\[289a.6\]]chub sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang shing ta la bdun dang /_rnga dang /_phag las thal nas lcags kyi mda' de sa la zug pa klus phyung ba dang chu ro phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 'thung bar brtsams so/_/bram ze 
[\[289a.7\]]dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod rten brtsigs te/_deng sang du yang dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/_/gzhon nu rnams shing rtar zhugs nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs pa dang /_mtshan mkhan grong khyer nas phyir byung ba 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]de rnams kyis gzhon nu shAkya thub pa shing rtar zhugs pa nas/_nang du zhugs pa la lung bstan pa/_gal te 'di lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/_/gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu 
[\[289b.2\]]mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to zhes bya ba thos so/_/thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te shAkya rnams ba sogs nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[289b.3\]]rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa kho bos thos so/_/gzhon nu 'di gal te lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung ste 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na/_bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin 'dong gis 'di khyim phub cig_/blon po rnams 
[\[289b.4\]]kyis smras pa/_lha gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams don du mi gnyer ro/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_gzhon nu la bud med thams cad bstan la 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chung mar blang bar bya'o/_/de nas kha cig gis smras pa/_lha gzhon nu ni sbyin pa 
[\[289b.5\]]la dga' bas rgyan rnams bud med la stsol du stsal la/_de gang la mgu bar skyed par gyur pa de btsun mor blang bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_de bzhin du gyis shig_/blon po rnams kyis rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rin po ches spras pa'i phung po spungs 
[\[289b.6\]]so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyim dang grong khyer phyag dar dang byi dor byed du bcug nas rgyu skar dang /_tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam dag bstun te gdan seng ge'i khri bshams pa la gzhon nu shAkya thub pa bzhag nas seng ge'i khri dang nye bar rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po spungs te 
[\[289b.7\]]blon po rnams dang /_gzhan yang ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams nang du zhugs so/_/de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i cha byad dang /_rgyan dang gos gyon nas zhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan de dag de rnams la byin no/_/shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyi bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba dang /_lang tsho la bab pa/_de ma song nas shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyis smras pa/_bu mo byang chub sems 
[\[290a.2\]]dpa' rgyan sbyin gyis song shig_/des smras pa/_yab ci'o skol cag la rgyan ma mchis sam/_bu mo rgyan med pa ni ma yin mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang bzhed pa de 'dam par mdzad do/_/yab 'dam yang rung mi 'dam yang rung /_de kho na bdag 
[\[290a.3\]]gi sdum thab lags so/_/bu mo gal te de lta na shin tu 'gro dgos pas song shig_/de nas grags 'dzin ma na tshod gzhon zhing cha lugs bzang ba/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dang mig 'phrog pa/_bud med thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi brjid 
[\[290a.4\]]dang ldan pas nang du zhugs nas spyod lam dul bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpas rgyan thams cad byin nas sor gdub brgya kho na lus pa byang chub sems dpas de la bstan pa dang /_des thog ma med pa'i dus nas mchog tu mnyes pa byas 
[\[290a.5\]]pa des seng ge'i khri'i skas la 'dzegs nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag nas rang gis phyung ngo /_/blon po rnams dang ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ni bud med thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/_'dis 
[\[290a.6\]]gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus pas 'di blang bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang gzhon nu shAkya thub pa'i btsun mor blangs so/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba 
[\[290a.7\]]de'i tshe shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba skye bar 'gyur te/_de nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye bar 'gyur la/_ji tsam nyi ma ma shar ba de srid du ni sen mos kyang gcad du rung la/_nyi ma shar nas ni mtshon gyis kyang mi chod cing mes kyang mi tshig pa zhig ser skya'i gzhi dang lhas 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]bstan gyi bar na 'bab chu ro hi ka zhes bya ba'i 'gram na skyes te/_dus dus su chu phrug pas de'i rtsa ba brus nas rlung gi shugs kyis 'gyel te gags bzhin du chu bcad de 'dug go/_/de nas chus rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi yul ni chu med pas ma rung la/_zas gtsang 
[\[290b.2\]]gi yang chus ma rung ste/_rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring ba/_shing dge ba'i snying po 'gyel nas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i gags su gyur te mchis na gzhon nu mthu dang ldan zhes thos kyis de btang ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras 
[\[290b.3\]]pa/_kho bo gzhon nu la bka' mi stsol lo/_/'dun pas smras pa/_lha bdag la gnang ba 'ba' zhig stsol cig_/ci nas kyang gzhon nu la yang bka' ma stsal bzhin du rang nyid gshegs par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis khas blangs so/_/
[\[290b.4\]]'dun pas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i 'gram du gzhon nu rnams kyi skyed mos tshal re re brtsigs nas smras pa/_gzhon nu dag skyed mos tshal du 'dong /_de rnams so so'i shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos tshal du dong ba las lhas byin gyi skyed mos tshal gyi steng nas ngang pa zhig 'phur 
[\[290b.5\]]ba de lhas byin gyis mdas bsnun nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyed mos tshal du lhung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas bzung nas mda' phyung ste sman gyis glan nas sos so/_/lhas byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la spring ba/_ngang pa'o ni sngar ngas bzung ba yin gyis 
[\[290b.6\]]skur cig_/byang chub sems dpas slar spring ba/_ngas gang gi tshe kho na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe ngas sems can thams cad bzung ba yin no/_/der byang chub sems dpa' dang lhas byin 
[\[290b.7\]]lhan cig srid pa tha ma la thog mar sha khon de byung ste/_srid pa gzhan rnams su ni phal mo che zhig kyang byung ngo /_/legs par rab sad kyis gzhon nu rnams shing dge ba'i snying po dbyung ba'i phyir lhags so zhes thos nas des skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngags te/_skye bo'i 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang sgra mthon po grag nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang /_sgra mthon po grag pa 'di ci zhig_/'dun pas ji ltar gyur pa gsol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas 
[\[291a.2\]]gsungs pa/_gal te de lta na 'byin du 'dong ngo zhes byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig dong ba dang /_ji tsam na khung nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du byung ba dang 'char kas byang chub sems dpa' thal bar brlags su 'gyur du 'ong 
[\[291a.3\]]zhes mtshon rnon pos rked du bcad pa las de'i dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog pas 'char ka nag por gyur nas/_de'i ming 'char ka nag po 'char ka nag po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis shing dge ba'i snying po 'byin pa la zhugs pa na lhas byin 
[\[291a.4\]]gyis 'bad pa dang cung zad cig g.yos so/_/dga' bos ni cung zad cig bteg go/_/byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad kyi thams cad du steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs te dum bu gnyis su chag nas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i tshu rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig_/pha rol 
[\[291a.5\]]gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig lhung bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas skye bo'i tshogs la gsungs pa/_shes ldan dag shing dge ba'i snying po 'di ni bsil ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang /_shu ba dang /_phol mig byung ba la byugs na zhi bar 'gyur 
[\[291a.6\]]gyis/_dum bu dum bur byos la khyer cig_/gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi shing rtar zhugs te skyed mos tshal gyi sa nas ser skya'i gzhir dong nas grong khyer du zhugs pa na byang chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs pa la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te 'di lo bdun rab tu ma byung 
[\[291a.7\]]bar gyur na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug pa byang chub sems dpas gzigs so/_/gzigs ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthe bos shing rta mnan nas mi 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]g.yo bar gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas sa 'tsho ma la brtag par brtsams so/_/sa 'tsho mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' la'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa 'tsho ma la rtog pa na phyag na lcags kyi mda' bsnams pa de phyir brlags so/_/sa 'tsho ma yang 
[\[291b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na rkang pa'i mthe bos khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi brtol to/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dang sa 'tsho ma la phan tshun du rtog par byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pa skyes par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_bud med 
[\[291b.3\]]'di 'dra ba 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstun par nus so/_/gtam de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas de 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs 
[\[291b.4\]]par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang /_der nga zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/_de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la bsgo ba/_kye kha lo sgyur ba 
[\[291b.5\]]re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang /_der nga zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bshams te/_byang chub 
[\[291b.6\]]sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub 
[\[291b.7\]]pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgu bo ltar kyar kyor can/_mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing 'dar zhing 'gro ba/_de'i skra se ba/_ji ltar 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba cig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/_sgur po phyam dgu bo ltar kyar kyor can/_mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing /_lus 'dar zhing 
[\[292a.2\]]'gro la de'i skra se ba/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/_lha mi 'di ni rgas pa zhes bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_lha mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas de rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba nga yang 
[\[292a.3\]]rgas pa'i chos dang /_rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_lha yang rgas pa'i chos dang /_rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig_/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas/_nga rgas pa 
[\[292a.4\]]las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/_der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du byon nas/_nga yang rgas pa las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs 
[\[292a.5\]]ngan dgongs so/_/'dir smras pa/_dar yol rgas shing sgur la mgo skya ba/_/lag na 'khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas/_/'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces/_/de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 
[\[292a.6\]]kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/_skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' 'am lha ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs pa na/_mi 
[\[292a.7\]]rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/_sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can/_mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar zhing mchis la de'i skra se ba/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/kha lo sgyur ba mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/_sgur po phyam dgu bo ltar kyar kyor can/_mdun na 'khar ba la rten cing /_lus 'dar zhing 'gro la de'i skra se ba/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 
[\[292b.2\]]'di skad ces bgyis so/_/lha 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/de 'di skad ces gsung ste/_kha lo sgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas/_lha de ni 
[\[292b.3\]]rgas pa zhes bya'o/_/de 'di skad ces gsung ste/_kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rgas pa'i chos dang rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha yang rgas pa'i chos dang rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/de 'di skad ces gsung ste/_kha lo 
[\[292b.4\]]sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig_/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar pho brang du phyin nas/_nga rgas pa las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/lha gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/_de nas nga yang rgas pa las ma 'das pa 
[\[292b.5\]]lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang /_gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig 
[\[292b.6\]]bgos nas/_dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/_ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la/_ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o 
[\[292b.7\]]snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis/_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin te/_ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/_/'dir smras pa/_shAkya thub pa'i yab ste zas 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]gtsang des/_/kha lo sgyur las tshig de thos nas ni/_/de tshe dga' nas bdag 'dor mi gzhug phyir/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las yang byin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed 
[\[293a.2\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/_kye kha lo sgyur ba/_re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang /_de la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/_de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kye 
[\[293a.3\]]kha lo sgyur ba/_re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig_/de la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas/_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams 
[\[293a.4\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags na/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_
[\[293a.5\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas/_skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas/_mi skya bo rbab rbab bo/_/rid pa/_nyam chung ba/_dbang po nyams pa/_skye bo 
[\[293a.6\]]mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so//_//
